text: I work at UPS as a part-time preloader. I'm on my feet for four hours and so I needed a work shoe that was both durable and comfortable. These boots provide just that and hold up to taking a beating. I feel these boots offer some ventilation because my feet aren't soaked by the time I get home. The non-slip soles provide excellent firm footing, and although they are soft toe, they hold up to a 110lb package dropped from waist height. In short, these boots make everyday work a cake walk.

I was upset when I got these shoes because I needed them to go on vacation and did not have time to order another pair. These shoes run a size small. I wear a size 10 and my heel was hanging off the end about a half in and they were too narrow.
This sneakers are just great! They are true size. I am very pleased with my purchase.
I love K-Swiss shoes, I've been wearing them for years, I was disappointed that this styles sizes ran small and narrow.
estos zapatos son realmente bellos y comodos...la flexibilidad, adicionalmente el envio fue realmente rapido y seguro.recomiendo ampliamente la compra de este producto.muchas gracias
These are tried & true shoes. Color was slightly different than pictured, but I'm quite happy with the order. Shipping was fast!

What would I have wanted to know before I purchased this product? I would have wanted to know if they didn't have the color they showed in the picture, which was Burgundy. If I had known that I would have never ordered it. I am a female and I don't want a black timberland boot. The burgundy was a really pretty color and more suitable for a lady. I am very disappointed and will have to now search elsewhere for what I want. I thought I was going to get what was shown in the picture, but it didn't work out. You live and learn - and I learned really well this time around. I am hoping for a refund as soon as possible.

I got those shoes today i reckon they look better in the picture. when i were them the flower at the top goes a bit down and the chains are a bit long. they are uncomfortable, specially at the front because of the thin strap but i still LOVE them :)

Original quality product received, however I followed the advice and bought a US size 11 which is normally a euro size 10.5 (as I take a 10-10.5, this was the size I needed). Converse say to buy a half size smaller than you need, but it would be too risky to do that and have too tight a shoe, so I bought the size I needed. 10.5 wasn't a listed size option anyhow.The label in the shoe says they are US 11 and UK 11. Go figure - doesn't make sense. So they are a half size too big. If only they told you that information somewhere up front.

These are like walking on carpet. Few notes though, I have small but slightly wide feet. I should have gotten the wide. Second, these are actually slippers. My daughter who is 17 wears them out everywhere but when I wore them to work on casual Friday, I was informed many times that they are slippers. I run a lot, so these are absolutely awesome for afterwards and just to wear around the house. Overall, get the wide unless you have really narrow feet and don't plan to wear them out of your home.

I was a little more than disappointed to see "Made In China" in these boots (I was led to believe that Justin were all Made in the USA, and that's part of the reason I bought these). In that respect, the product info was misleading.Also; the felt lining in the heel area only lasted a few wearings before it tore and bunched up, so I can't walk very far without feeling like I've got a blister coming on. The black rubber sole just seems cheap, and they feel off-balance (compared to other boots that I own) when I'm walking in them.Overall, I'm disappointed with the manufacturing and quality, but will probably still keep them since I sit at a desk most of the time.If you're going to work or walk in these boots, I don't recommend them.

Why doesn't anybody state that they run full size large? Maybe it's not even worth mentioning as everybody knows that, but I've never had experience with Converse before. I bought those in size 10 (men's) for my brother (he always wears 10) and they are big even for my husband (who wears 11). Other than that they are OK, good quality.

I purchased this shoe in white using my normal size and they are a perfect fit and feel as if you are walking on pillows. My feet do not get tired with this shoe. I am going to purchase this shoe in another color.

Initially the item was not delivered to the requested address; since the seller is using the USPS, which is not as efficient as UPS or DHL; however the seller made all efforts to track the item and finally was located in some post office and I have to go my self and collect it.For deliveries, I would suggest to the seller, to use UPS or DHL even if you charge the client the additional cost.

I like these shoes very much, i have bought over 12 pairs of shoes from amazon, and these rank in my top 3 pairs. Very white, very easy to keep clean. I have wide feet, and these are not tight at all.
Size run's a little big, but we were able to put up with it in regardless. So we kept them.

I'd been very nervous about buying shoes online, but thanks to many of the previous reviewers, I was able to make a good choice on size. I usually wear a size 7 medium in street shoes, but because I'd read that these shoes run narrow, I ordered a 7 wide, and they fit perfect. I was so relieved! I'd been looking for shoes for worship dance, with a heel not too high, but kind of dressy, and I think these are just right!

I just purchased my 5th pair of Propet Breeze Walkers. I have some severe foot problems post botched bunion surgery, and these sandals are the only shoes that are comfortable all day long for me. The arch is very good and the adjustable straps allow you to adjust to meet your foot needs. Love them.

Although these shoes are really very nice looking they are unfortunately one of the most uncomfortable pair of shoes I have tried to wear. They're ok for a couple of hours as long as you do not need to wald a distance.

i really love these shoes, they have little star cut outs- and who doesn't want that at your feet?? my only complaint is the strange fit, i have no idea why the back raises up and then bends a little.. almost like it was intentionally made to give you blisters. it's tight too. aughh. :(

We all wear crocs in our family. We just throw them on and out the door we go. What more can you say. This is one of the simplest versions with a good roomy fit (you'll see that some Crocs have a single digit size as in "size 8" and others have a size span as in "size 8-9") For the kids in the family we always get the ones with the size range as those tend to get the longest wear. And if you go to the Crocs website you can learn how you can recycle your used Crocs (however us adults have been wearing ours for two years already with no wear in sight)
5 star all the way love vans. No abnormalitys to the show shipped fast great seller. No problems with product works great if you have wide feet as well.

These shoes were for my wife, and I can only tell you what she tells me. She spends 14 hours a day in them as she works at the local hospital, and she's always on her feet, so she needs well made shoes.They are good shoes, and offer good support, BUT the sole liner ALWAYS come out, or shifts it's position in these shoes. These are the third pair she's owned of this brand and style, and this has happened to all of them. Obviously, a design flaw. And, this third pair does pinch in the toe area, even though they are wide.Good shoes, but not the best. She is looking for something better.

After wearing 574 for a few years I decided to try the another retro show the 420. While the show is nice looking and flexible. There is very little padding compared to the 574s I have had. I will wear the shoes till they wear out but will go back to 574s for my next shoe.

I've been using the GT-2000 series shoes for about 2+ years now, and I can honestly say, they're the most comfortable running shoes for my build. This is one of Asics best, if not the best, selling shoes because it offers such a wide variety of fit for most foot types.These shoes are mainly designed for the moderate to heavy over-pronator (when the feet roll in too much) with low to medium arches, but I've met fellow runners with the same shoe who have medium to high arches. I, myself, am flat-footed, but use orthotics. This can be a major problem for me when buying shoes because I need something with a wide enough heel to allow my orthotics to fit, and these work great. Don't worry if you don't have a wide heel because there is memory foam embedded in the heel that forms to your foot over time.The heel and forefoot also offer a good amount of stability and support. The shoe is designed for medium to large builds, but again, I've come across other runners who are much lighter and use the same shoe. When I first began running, I weighed 300+ pounds, now at 216 pounds, the shoes still work well (I've bought newer version of this shoe as I've worn the others out).The "Upper" (the top parts of the shoe) are really comfortable. It's made of a mesh material that allows a maximum amount of air and circulation into the foot, while allowing all the heat, moisture & sweat out. The shoe is so comfortable, you could easily run in it without socks (which I have done only a few times).The 2000 series are versatile, they're well priced, and they come in a variety of sizes, widths, and colors, so chances are they'll fit you. This is by far the best running shoe I've used up to date, and would recommend it to anyone who is just starting or a long time runner.
Shoe was attractive but runs very wide. Normally I wear a Medium but this fits like a wide.Not much arch support. Newer styles of LifeStride seem to be running very wide. Shoeswere returned.
Everyone is always asking where I got these shoes. Absolutely love it and so does all of my friends.
I have had this shoe before and I am going to buy it again. It is a very well made shoe.

Well, what more can I say? They are nice shoes for the dress blues... I had trouble finding the ones I could manually polish, but these work... Just make sure not to scuff them... Because for the most part, scuffs do not come out... Cleaning them is simple and can be done with windex. The shipping was also quick, faster than Vanguard's second day, even though I did standard shipping with these... But they get the job done...

These shoes are very retro and look great with a pair of dark jeans and a blazer for a sort of slightly dressy casual look. However, the arch support inside the shoe is so flat they're a bit uncomfortable to wear for very long. Definitely a shoe for the flat footed.

These are super comfy shoes. I felt like I had just put them on at the end of the day. I like the style, but I think the light blue looks nicer & will likely order them next. No breaking in needed, they fit great out of the box. Highly recommend, esp. if you have to slip in & out of your shoes, like traveling.

My mom is 85 years and its very difficult to find shoes that fit and are comfortable. She is fairly active and wants to look presentable in her day to day activities. This casual shoe is appealing to the eye and is well made and durable. The leather never fades nor "chips" off.
These shoes are the best. They are so comfortable and really cute. I got the lilac patchwork ones and I wish I had gotten a couple of more colors before they sold out.

light and airy but with good soles that do not get shredded if kids walk on pavement or poolside. they cost a bit more but I tired some cheaper ones and the opening was too small for my son's feet and we could not even get them on! I would still prefer if there was a better elastic at the top to stretch more but these work pretty well. My 3 year is picky about how his shoes feel and does not mind these at all. I got our 1st pair last year and got 2 additional sizes this since they were the best we found. His pair from last year I will keep for a siblng or donate- they are in great condition despite a lot of summer wear and swim classes throughout the year!
very comfortable and sturdy slipper, came with the correct size and left and right were correct too and the price is awesome

These shoes are way hip and since they're hightops, my kid can't kick them off in the carseat! I haven't heard any complaints about comfort from him either. They have held up through two sons and are a little faded from frequent washing, but look all the cooler for it.
These are the best sneakers I have owned. They came quickly and in excellent condition. I followed a reviewer's recommendation and ordered them a half size larger and they fit perfectly.

Danner builds boots. Not jacket's or hats or underwear... Just boots, and they do an exceptional job of it. Certainly Danner's are not for everyone, just like a differnt motorcycle helmet manufacturers different brands fit different people. Danner's are narrow by design, and do tend to run a bit on the flat side in the arch. But if they do fit your foot shape, you will never go back to anything else.Acadia's are worn by most of the people who are out there protecting you every day. Fire, police, and military personnel are the people who these boots, and in that task they meet all the requirements those professions demand. I've worn the Acadia since 1996 on my job as a professional firefighter/EMT and though I've tried a few other kinds of boots over the years; I always come back to the Acadia. These boots have seen me through 200 degree ground on wildland fires ( NOTE- these do not meet current wildland specs any longer - boots must be full leather)HAZMAT incidents, and more muddy ditches on motor vehicle accident's than I can count.Are these boots more expensive than a cheap pair of "tactical" boots? Yes, but with a pair of Danner boots you get the ability to have them reconditioned, as well as owning a boot that will outlast almost any other on the market, and they are made in the USA in Portland, Oregon. I still wear my original pair I got in '96 for yard work and such. If they fit your foot, you won't be disappointing in spending the extra money to get the best.
I have been looking for a black pair of Chucks for a long time and I love these shoes!

They are exactly what I wanted and I'm well pleased. I ordered a wider size than I normally wear (based on advice of several reviewers)and they fit fine. Haven't worn them for any length of time yet so I can't judge them for comfort or wear but I don't anticipate any problems.
I love them sooo much! they are super comfy. Im a cali girl- so flip flops are a staple in my wardrobe. and thesea are great!
Came in a timely manner, correct style and size but the color looked different online. Still happy with the color. Very happy with the quality and price!

Caterpillar boots are all I wear! I'm a pipe fitter so they have to stand up to a harsh environment daily, and they just that! I also would recommend the Endure series boots from Cat. You'll be very pleased if you buy these!
I ordered these boots for a trip to Tasmania. They arrived before the due date and fitted beautifully. For the money these are very good value.
This is my 3rd pair in 24 years. That's a fine testimony to their durability. Matterhorn makes great boots IMHO.
could not find this size crocs - only here - hubby was happy -love them
This is defenitely one great pair of boots! It's very soft and comfortable. I recommed to use it with long socks.
very comfortable shoe. I have worn these for many years & have many colors. Good with casual or dressy. I was so happy I found the black again. For a long time they weren't available.

I have a pair of these shoes in brown that I bought some time ago. I love them, although they are getting older now and starting to show smudges and wear. They are still comfortable, but don't look as good as they did. I feel I got my money out of them and am not disappointed at all on their life. They looked great with jeans or dress pants, and are comfortable and well built, although sometimes my friends would tease and call them my "manly shoes". The only reason I haven't replaced this particular shoe yet is because I have gotten spoiled with the other Eastland shoes that are slip-ons, where these require lacing. Not to sound lazy, but it is much easier when your hands are full to slip the shoes on or off at the door, rather than lacing in or out. If an oxford is what you are looking for, I would recommend this one without reservation. They are comfortable, solid, and I didn't slip and slide in them in bad weather either.
These are classic Converse shoes. They arrived quickly. The fit was true to size and they look great with our school uniform.

I gave these a five star based on price and performance. I purchased these boots for about 50% off at 50 dollars. They have served well in the snow- waterproof and warm. I probably would have liked the black color more if it was available. As a workboot, the only things lacking are a steel toe and an oil resistant sole. Overall a great shoe.

I bought these shoes for a choir concert, and ended up standing in them for 5 hours straight. The other singers near me were miserable in their higher heels and different brands, some even ended up slipping their shoes off during the concert. But my feet were happy and I had no foot pain at all the next day. They do run small, like all the reviews indicate. I ended up buying a full size larger than I normally wear. Amazon makes returning things so easy, do like I did and order 2 or 3 sizes all at once, then just ship the ones you don't use back.

I don't write many product reviews, but I thought I'd chip in my two cents to help the next guy. I loved these sandals for their comfort and fit. I wore them on a couple of backpacking trips with 40 lbs on my back tromping through streams along the way, and I never had the slightest hint of a blister on my feet. My review of three stars is four three reasons: First of all, they only lasted about 18 months. Keen has an 12 month warranty, so don't expect them to outlast that by much (my day-to-day use was more sitting in a cubicle than backpacking through wet terrain). Second, they are heavy. These weigh a multiple of your standard flip-flop sandals and probably more than your tennis shoes. Third, and this is probably more me than the shoe, they tend to get very stinky. I don't know if they need a wash out hole in the toe or what, but they tended to build up gunk in the toe and really smell up the house.All in all, I'd buy another pair, but for the price you should be able to expect more durability. They are cheaply glued together and will start the clock to fall apart the moment you put them on your feet.

I really like these shoes! I just bought them at a local retail store and was looking on here to see if I could find them cheaper. I've always loved Asics running shoes because they are so comfortable on my feet. But the main problem with my old Asics is they're dorky looking for casual wear. These new casual style of Asics fit my feet like my old shoes and actually look great too! They are very lightweight and almost feel like I'm not even wearing shoes. Unlike running shoes, these are very thin and offer very little little support. Lots of shoes make my feet look big, but these make my feet look sleek. Workmanship appears good but I don't think they will last as long as other shoes because they are so thin. Normally I wouldn't pay $70 for casual shoes but I did this time because these are so comfortable and good-looking. If you like Asics running shoes but want something better looking, I highly recommend these shoes!Update 10-2009Well I've had these shoes over 5 years now and they are still in good shape. Granted I don't wear them on a daily basis any more but I was really surprised how well they held up given how thin they are. Hope I can find another pair once these finally do break down...

These shoes are pretty tight, most probably due to the elastic they have put to make it an easy Slip-On.. hopefully it'll be okay after a little bit of use.Otherwise the shoes are very light and comfy.. go ahead and order them :)

Was very thankful these arrived so soon after ordering,was a last minute item...and my daughter loves them....she now has 2 pairs..and is planning on collecting them for different colors....Thank youShelia Sale/VA
I got these boots when i was working this summer in the woods not ideal for that but they are comfortable especially to wear if your standing on cement a lot.

I've used Converse sneakers for a little over a decade so I knew exactly what size to order, when I got them they were just perfect. Good to get dependable sizing and quality.They're more of a fashion item, in the most relaxed sense of the word, than running shoes.Did not need to contact vendor after placing the order, I got my notification of shipment and the package arrived on the promised date.
I got a pair of these Crocks for my grandson and he loves them. They are made well and sized properly.We are all very happy with this purchase
I think this will be a great shoe for people who need to wear orthotics. I ordered the wrong size and decided not to get the correct size.
Love these shoes! They feel great and fit well - 8W. Perfect for professional events or evenings out. My new favorite dress shoe brand!
Easy spirit taveltime slip on shoes are the most comfortable shoe I have worn. This is the second pair I hace had. I will continue to puchase the shoe as long as the price is within my budget.
Bought these for a trip to patagonia last minute. "broke them in' on the plane ride down and for one day in Buenos Aires and that was enough. Very comfortable and water proof. Great buy

I got the "pumice" color which is a pretty light gray with blue details, not stiped like the black sandal shown. Protection for the big toe, comfortable to wear immediately. Machine washable. I am very happy with these sandals.
I have ordered this sandles before. But the service was first class. delivery within days. I will certainly order from this company again
A great shoe, but read the reviews - the boot runs a size too large. Other than the delay and inconvenience, I had no problems returning for a size smaller. Quick ship. Shoe is quality.

I got these to replace some worn out character shoes I use for work, and I LOVE them. I work at a cabaret, and wait tables as well as perform. These shoes are well padded and very comfortable, and hold up well to the hard use I put them through on a daily basis. I ordered them a size larger than what I normally wear, and the fit is perfect. The best $$$ I've spent on shoes in quite some time, and when I wear these out, I'll get the same shoe again.
Sneakers were a gift for son-in-law. That's the kind he likes. He's happy.

Absolutely love these. For those worried about sizing, I find Clarks tend to fit a little big and therefore usually go with a half size smaller (the leather will also stretch a bit).Overall, incredibly pleased with them and have received many compliments.

I bought a pair of these (in navy blue) for my baby son several months ago. We live in Minnesota, and I thought they would be nice and warm (and cute) for the winter months. Soon, I realized that not only are they warm and cute, but also the best thing since sliced bread. Or, in the world of babies, the best thing since the invention of disposable diapers. If your baby's socks fall off and leave you searching for its mate, or trying to figure out clever ways to keep them on (tucking them in pants, etc), then this bootie is definitely something you'd love too. Never *ever* has a bootie fallen off, even with crawling, jumping, climbing, etc. So, his feet are toastie warm all the time. Since he is outgrowing the navy booties, I just bought the next size up in brown.Hooray for these Robeez booties! I wish they'd had these for my first two kids!

I read other reviews and they all raved about this flip flop. They were correct. My son is in college and wears flip flops year round so needless to say he is hard on a shoe. They look and wear well and are very comfortable according to him. I was also grateful to find his large shoe size. I would highly recommend this flip flop for anyone - casual or constant. The price was great. We have paid alot more for flip flops and they only lasted a short time.
Good looking shoe that was well made. It was the right size, but just didn't fit. I had to return the shoes. I have a very narrow foot that is hard to fit.

Bought these shoes as part of my daughter's school uniform. Good-looking all-white shoes are hard to find. These fit great and were perfect until she came home with the seams splitting after about 2 months. Don't know if she is just hard on them or if they are not made as well as they used to be. Might give them another shot with a second pair.
I find this pair of boots to be very attractive and likewise comfortable.I wear them for long hours and have No Problem! Great PROTECTION FOR My Ankle Too.!
The product was handled professionally by the supplier and the supplier rendered all assistance that was needed and the product was delivered on time. Good product, good job by supplier

The only reason I don't give the 5 stars to this shoe is because the rubber tip sort of hurts your big toe. No matter how I laced them, tight or loosen, it was hurtful, up to point I had to stop using them.

I bought these crocs size 2XL 12/13. I wear size 13 2E and they feel rather tight. My toes are punching out the front holes of these clogs. I had the crocs chinese imitation size 13 and they feel more comfortable than the originals.Please be warned that these crocs are smaller than the one that came before.I think I should have bought the crocs baya or clasic as they come in whole sizes rather than a range of sizes. My foot always end up at the larger end of the range.

I read reviews of these before buying this pair - I have bought two pairs of Timberland boots before, one pair thats literally lasted app. 20 years with a lot of use, and another pair that only lasted two years. I received these in yesterday, and will update the review if they don't break in well or last. So far my impressions are - 1. Accurate to size, 13w, I wear New Balance / Nike wide tennis shoes as additional reference 2. Comfortable, but not cushiony if you know what I mean, I wore them all day yesterday without blisters or sore spots 3. I was expecting non insulated boots, which I got, but these are still warm to hot - gussetted tongue and no ventilation means these are not a boot I am looking forward to wearing on a construction site in the middle of a Texas summer. I have received in what I expected, and given Timberlands reputation and my exp I'm giving it 5 stars pending further experience with this pair of boots.

Even though the heel is nearly 7" high, they're not like wearing extreme high heels with a slanted foot (on your toes). The fit is snug but not firm, very comfortable inside. They fit large for women, comparatively, since they're sold/made for men, they are wider too.
I am so pleased with these boots. Not only are they adorable on but they are also comfortable!! The leather is rich in color and very high quality. What a great deal!
We had ordered it .it came fast and was exactly what we ordered. Fit well nice product happy with them.
I am very satisfied with the shoes, I have 2 pairs.

I've been wearing this model of Clark shoe for about 25 years now. I regularly wear them out. I didn't know what foot comfort was until I tried on a pair of Natureveldt's back in the 80s. I used to have heel soreness problems. With these shoes, that problem is gone. And the current pricing makes them a bargain. I have paid from $110 per pair (in the 80s) to $135 per pair (early 2000's) and they are worth every dime. I HIGHLY recommend trying these shoes.
Order this shoe 1/2 size LARGER than your street shoe. It is wrongly stated in product description to order 1/2 size smaller!! Also, if you have slightly wide feet, order the Wide.

I just purchased my third pair of Bonnie Lites and own wine, black and taupe. I have knee problems and a hard insole really hurts my knees. The Bonnie Lites are well padded and like walking on pillows. Stylish and comfortable!
These are my favorite shoes in the whole world! They are as light as a feather and stay on your feet without any "gripping" needed! They also last a long time. Worth every penny.
Received what I wanted and wear all the time. I like 'em.

LAST CHRISTMAS I ORDERED THIS BOOT AND NOW THIS YEAR THE PRICE HAS DOUBLED. I AM WISHING THAT I HAD ORDERED MORE THAN ONE PAIR. I WILL ORDER ANOTHER PAIR THIS YEAR. I LIKE THE SOLES AND HEELS ON THIS BOOT BECAUSE THEY LAST LONGER THAN MOST AND THIS IS THE FINEST LOOKING DRESS BOOT MADE AS FAR AS I AM CONCERNED. IT IS THE MOST COMFORTABLE BOOT THAT I HAVE FOUND. YOU WILL GET SOME RESPECT WHEN YOU ARE SEEN IN THESE BOOTS. THESE BOOTS ARE "BOSS" TO SAY THE LEAST.

I got these to wear as part of a Halloween costume--Abby from NCIS. These are the exact boots she wears in the promo photo on the cover of (I think) the season 9 DVD. They're so comfortable--much more comfortable than I thought they'd be! I could wear them for hours, unlike normal high-heeled shoes. They're very adjustable, all the way up the leg shaft--there is a hidden lace behind the buckles. The buckles themselves are also adjustable on both sides. I'm very happy with them! (As a side note, I got a half-size lower than usual--I'm a size 9.5--and they fit great.)

I really like these shoes! I just bought them at a local retail store and was looking on here to see if I could find them cheaper. I've always loved Asics running shoes because they are so comfortable on my feet. But the main problem with my old Asics is they're dorky looking for casual wear. These new casual style of Asics fit my feet like my old shoes and actually look great too! They are very lightweight and almost feel like I'm not even wearing shoes. Unlike running shoes, these are very thin and offer very little little support. Lots of shoes make my feet look big, but these make my feet look sleek. Workmanship appears good but I don't think they will last as long as other shoes because they are so thin. Normally I wouldn't pay $70 for casual shoes but I did this time because these are so comfortable and good-looking. If you like Asics running shoes but want something better looking, I highly recommend these shoes!Update 10-2009Well I've had these shoes over 5 years now and they are still in good shape. Granted I don't wear them on a daily basis any more but I was really surprised how well they held up given how thin they are. Hope I can find another pair once these finally do break down...

I bought these for my 2 year old little boy. The boots look great and are well made but they are REALLY difficult to get on,even with the laces completely removed. After about a dozen wearings they break in and start to go on easier, but if you are buying these for a baby or toddler, be prepared to spend an extra ten minutes putting these on your little guy for the first few weeks!

I bought these for my husband because he has foot problems. He has worn them several times and finds them extremely comfortable. The sizing was perfect. They are a beautiful well made shoe, pricey, but when you can't walk what is price?I highly recommend this shoe.

This is a great price for a tight looking shoe. I do admit it looks a little dull on the web, but it person these shoes are awesome! The fit is great, and its great for running up and down the court.I have had these shoes for awhile now, and they still look new and feel good; probable because i got the black ones. I have been purchasing ATR's since they begin to make them, and i have alwayz been happy with my buy, so i would check out this shoe, or the ATR Elite shoe, which looks nice in white, which i bought.Overall, this is a great price, and a great looking shoe. You won't be dissapointed with this buy, no matter what color shoe you get. Thanx, and plz rate this helpful!!!

These shoes offer great support, and cushion for tired, aching feet. I purchased these shoes for my bad knees and back and love the relief I get. I highly recommend them to anyone needing that little bit of extra support.
This product is nice with high quality sole; after the normal 2-3 day break in, very comfortable. Looks sharp. I also like the shoe strings.

I used these for my wedding.I wore them for about 4 hours and they were comfortable until the end, they started to hurt a bit. But definitely good for several hours! I added a gel pad prior to the wedding, because due to the height the ball of the foot can tend to hurt. Also, these shoes tend to run narrow, so buy a larger size than your average size. The bottom of the heel and the front part of the foot are very flat. I didn't try to dance in these because of the height. Overall they add the needed height, and are very secure (unlike the average "stripper" shoe). One bad thing about these shoes are they tend to scuff easily. This won't be noticed by everyone else, but you may notice the scuffs yourself.
The Boots are great for about two months then break down fast.I think the construction could be alot better,I hope that it can be improved on

I am sure they are great on real grass with the right size. One thing I noted is that they are bigger than what the guide says. I am a 10.5 regularly but they feel like a 11 or 11.5! In addition to that, I got the worse shin splints and hip pain playing on turf and sun backed grass! Unimaginable pain. However, I will give it the benefit of the doubt and blame it on the playing surface.Conclusion: Get these one size smaller, and use them on firm natural grass fields.

I like these shoes a lot but are they really worth almost a $100 more than the sketchers I bought a year earlier. As soon as you put them on you can feel the extra cushioning but would say cushioning insoles be just as effective and cheaper to boot? I guess it is one's individual preference. Me, I wish now I had just purchased another pair of Sketchers and bought some Dr. Scholl's insoles. Only time will tell if these outlast my last pair of boots and if so than that will be another plus.

This shoe looks great with various outfits, including shorts, skirts & capris. Not true to size. I ordered a 7W but shoe fits like a medium width. Very rare for LifeStride shoes, most wide widths fit perfectly.

excellent shoe with classic clarks design.. little trouble getting them on pulls your socks really tight on toes . im sure itll ov away after break in . i recommend a half size smaller than normal shoe size.sent back with 3.99 next day shipping thanks to my prime account .
birkenstock sandals keep your feet cool and feel so good on your feet. get them resoled and they are already molded to your feet. don't be fooled by cheaper ones or knock offs they are not the same.

My husband wanted a pair of crocs for an upcoming fishing trip. I purchased the XL for him as he's a size 10 1/2 - 11. They fit him perfectly and the color is just right (khaki). So far so good.....The crocs were put to use on a recent fishing trip and worked great.
They din't send my this item after 2 months and charge to the credit card.This is a rob
My son wanted these for basketball and it was hard finding them. Ordered them - got them in great time and he really enjoys wearing them.

The shoes ran a little smaller and so I had to exchange them to a half size bigger. I did not have any problems with the exchange. The shoe is a wide, but still feels a bit snug, but at least it fits better now. I am not sure I would buy this brand again. I well have to wear it for a couple of months to see how it performs.

This shoe looks totally awesome from the side where the picture is taken. However, the other side is a tan color and it like a hightop shoe. The shoe is different on both sides! I recomend saving your money!

I bought these for my wife, and she loves them. Some reviewers have complained about the tags in heels, but they don't bother her. She says they are warm and comfortable. She normally wears a 7.5, and since these don't come in half sizes, I bought a size 7 for her. Since these are made of foam and conform to her feet, the half-size smaller was the way to go, versus a half-size larger.
Second time ordering these shoes. I would order a complete size up. Perfect shoe for play and to wear with a nice outfit.
I just purchased this shoe in IVORY ... and what I expected was an offwhite shoes but it was beautiful shimmery pinkish hue ... WOW is all I can say ...GORGEOUS shoe!!!
THE BOOTS WERE GREAT, VERY SOLID GOOD FOR WORK VERY DURABLE, WOULD I BUY THEM AGAIN? OF COURSE I WOULD YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR

Brought these shoes couple months ago & have been happy with them. I generally am US sz11 or AU sz10 but found these are running a little bigger so when I purchase my next pair of these will be getting US sz10.5 instead of 11. I find them very comfortable for working long shifts & they are wearing well so far, but am thinking of adding a little more arch support but they are ok without added extra's.Update: I've had these shoes for near 12 months & they are great. I want to order more but amazon dont have them only other shoe sellers do that dont do shipping to Australia.Plz Amazon get these shoes back to being able to be shipped to Australia as I need another 2 pairs.These shoes fit my insoles for Plantis nicely & am finding that these shoes are the only ones I can wear atm because of hip ligament injury

I have worn Enzo Liberty Loafers for years because they are the perfect flat shoe. This pair did not disappoint. The quality is excellent. The leather is soft and supple. No break-in time needed. They are true to size. I purchased black smooth leather which is basic black. I recommend these shoes. They are the most comfortable shoes in my closet. A great shoe with slacks, jeans, skirts or dresses. The ordering and shipping experience was good. I received the shoes during the time frames outlined during the ordering process.

Comfortable boots that are indeed water proof and actually do breathe. They seem to work well for the winter wearing anything from cotton socks to solar socks depending on the outside temperatures. It should be noted that they do not have a slip resistance sole so they can be slippery on smooth wet surfaces. I haven't had a chance to use them in warmer weather to see fully how well they breathe. For the price they are a very good buy.

The first time I saw this shoe (in black/white patent leather) was on the feet of Boston Celtics All-Star forward Antoine Walker. Being a fan of "old-school" shoes and Mr. Walker, I immediately took a liking to the Adidas Promodel 2G.The Adidas Promodel line has been around for over four decades now and many a current and former NBA player has spent time in a pair, whether in high school, college or at the pro level. The first thing that stood out to me was how Adidas kept the classic "shell toe" as part of the shoe while adding minor adjustments to give it a nice blend of modern/retro looks. The patent leather also gives it a nice touch making the shoe simple, but unique.Another huge plus which I'm sure everyone will notice is the price. ... it ain't gonna clean out too many pockets and for this price y'all can go out and cop a pair or two (one for home games, one for the road). So, the bottom line on the Adidas Promodel 2G is that it's worth considering if you're a junior high or high school-level team looking for a good value in a team shoe (... the Promodel costs a lot less than most shoes designed for team use) or if you need a shoe for those lazy Sunday afternoon games down at the park.
Leads; still love them after all these years! Wore them as a kid and they still feel great! Yay Keds

This shoe is awesome. If you appreciate the kitten heel and added stability of an ankle strap, this saucey little dancing shoe is for you. Always order 1/2 size up and consider the wide version if you don't like the feel of a form fit, these babies are very slender and run small. I'm wearing these to work and out dancing with the boyfriend and they've been fab so far. love them!
The shoes were in excellent quality and the size and the color were correct. Very good product. I am very happy with my purchase.

Black All-Star High-tops ConverseHonestly these are the best shoes I have ever owned. I bought a pair for school, and I instantly knew that these were the shoes that would last me through the school year. And so far they have. My dad told me "You should get the smaller size." I asked why, and he said "You ruin and ware down shoes easy." But I have proved him so wrong. It's been 3 months and not even a single scratch. What I love about these shoes is they don't try to be special because they already are special. The makers don't add glitter or sparkles to make them stand out. If you are looking for normal this is the way to go.You should know there is only one word that can describe these shoes: "Unique." Here are some other words that describe them just as well: Elegant, amazing, popular, mind blowing, smooth, and just plain absolutely incredible! They are very, very comfortable shoes that could possibly go with any outfit. (Just Joking) But they do go with numerous outfits which is great. And did I mention that they are stylish.When you go buy them (most definitely) really it varies on where to go and buy them. The price is a very touchy subject, mostly because they cost different at every store. If you are looking for a bigger size, you might want to go to Footlocker or Famous Footwear. But the thing is even those are a bit more expensive than others, but they have better quality than the rest. They may be expensive but they are totally worth it.Some pros and cons of them would be:PROS-if you want comfort you want these shoes-You want style they are definitely the shoes for you-You want your feet to be a little bit airy you might want these shoes-They are light weight for faster runningCONS-On hot days your feet will sweat a ton. So if you live in Texas these are absolutely, most definitely not the shoes for you!!!-If you want airy these are not the shoes for you.

These are very nice shoes, but the site showed them available in a triplewide but what was shipped was a double wide. So, they were too small for my mother-in-law to wear. This was real frustrating because she has such a hard time finding shoes that fit and my husband spent quite a bit of time shopping on the internet. They were sure they had found an answer when they ordered these sandals. We got our refund (minus shipping) and that's all good, but we wish the shoes had been what they were represented to be in the beginning!
I have worn them for years, they fit and ware well. I ware them as slippers and when I fly.
I wish I had seen the 1/2 size larger recommendation. Mine are 1/2 size too small! Nice boots though.

Bought these for my boyfriend. He LOVES them. They are very sturdy and the leather is thick enough not to tear or anything. He uses them as hiking boots. As far as I know they are true to size and comfortable. I bought different (darker) laces for them because the ones they come with are kind of light and they look weird, but laces are cheap.
The shoes looked exactly as they appeared on Amazon; however, I wear a size 11 and I ordered a size 11, but the shoes are very big on me. They feel like they are a size and a half too big.

These are the most comfortable shoes ever made and they look very conservative. I have them in several colors because they look good with slacks or skirts. They hold up well with everyday use and are lightweight so they pack well. If you try one pair, you keep coming back to them for your basic wardrobe.

I am on my third pair of converse, and I LOVE it to bits. They're reliable (My first pair lasted 2 years, i was reluctant to buy another since it broke in), last forever (you know, 2 years is a lot considering the other cheap China made crappy shoes), and when you break them in, they're heaven to your feet. One thing though, if you are going to use it for exercising, bad idea. Some Dr.Scholl's slip-ins might make it more bearable. Overall, comfort 8/10 and style 10/10. Customizable 10/10. Great buy!

Well, what more can I say? They are nice shoes for the dress blues... I had trouble finding the ones I could manually polish, but these work... Just make sure not to scuff them... Because for the most part, scuffs do not come out... Cleaning them is simple and can be done with windex. The shipping was also quick, faster than Vanguard's second day, even though I did standard shipping with these... But they get the job done...
I replaced a pair of wore out Crocs that were great everyday around the house shoes. Order arrived promptly and was just as I ordered.
Love the looks and confort of this shoe. Fit true to size and required no breaking in period. Goes with so many of my summer clothes.

The all white shoes are cool and all, but the red and white ones are sweet. They look and play great. They don't slip on an indoor or outdooe court. These are the best looking and best playing shoes you can get for $85. You should buy two pairs; one for playing and one for just walking around.
I love they way they fit and feel. Rockport makes a great quilty shoe.I would buy these shoes again. Thanks Rockport.

These shoes need no breaking in. They are comfortable fromthe get-go. It is hard these days to find a pair of truly WHITE shoes.These fit the bill perfectly and are generic-looking enoughto go with any outfit. I originally ordered a pair for tap dancing.They were so comfortable to dance in that I ordered a pair for "street" shoesas well. Glad I did! (Remember to order one full size bigger than your regularshoe size when ordering these shoes.)
I have worn these shoes for a while now and they are the most comfotable sandal I have ever owned. I am about to buy another pair. Oh, did I mention I have foot probems? Not with these sandals.

I rated this shoe a three because i thought i could wear this shoe for running but it is not a running shoe. I like the unique look of the shoe and is comfortable for casual use. The price wasn't bad when I bought it from amazon. The delivery came very fast as well.

I discovered this shoe while recovering from a foot injury and bought it for the ease of entry/exit and philosophy of the manufacturer. I have since bought a second pair and when not at work, wear nothing else winter or summer. Only draw back is the wear of the sole but have found a convient cobler who replaces the heel every other year. Definately a shoe worth every penny.

1. The colour of the shoes I got is Silver/Silver/Royal, I like it very much. But the acture colour of the shoes is much darker than the picture. So I think chromatic aberration is a serious problem. I love the colour appeared on the picture.2. The size of the shoes is smaller, so I have to return it to champs for a larger one. So please order a larger size(+0.5 at least) than what you wear usually3. The shoes are light and soft, which earning points for it. Otherwise,I think 2-stars score is exact.

I recently bought a pair of these truly amazing shoes, it is impressive looking and has a snug fit ensuring complete support. I am an athlete and this shoe is one of the best running shoes I have ever come across. I love these shoes and would really recommend them to anybody active.

The perfect fit. It reminded of the pair that I had owned 12 years ago. As soon as I received them, I put them on with a pair of short jeans accompanied by a pair of white footies and they looked great on my feet.
I found these shoes to be very comfortable......and fun. For someone just learning to tap, I didn't want to spend a lot of money on something that may not fit well. These were perfect.
These are wonderfully comfortable shoes todo just about anything casual in. I will gladdly get another pair when I need soft shoes again.
Love the looks and confort of this shoe. Fit true to size and required no breaking in period. Goes with so many of my summer clothes.
These shoes are great they look nice too! The only thing is that they don't have great arch support so I suggest getting some Dr Scholls Insoles.

I've been wearing Chuck Taylor's since the varsity issued them in High School. I wear a half size (can't get them @ the mall). Amazon had my size & color selection (this is the third pair I've bought-I'm still playing). Everything else (convenience, getting the order right, getting them delivered quickly, etc.) was excellent. I'll buy @ Amazon again.
my girlfrind love this sandals , they are very good looking , confortable and easy to clean

I have an old pair of Jungle Mocs that I wore for 5 years. I put a lot of miles on them. They stood the test of time until I messed them up in a snow storm. The leather held up but some of the stitching stared coming out. I bought the new pair on amazon and they fit like a glove. So comfortable. The leather is almost like suede. Merrell has also put a new tread on the Jungle Moc. Makes me feel more stable, like I've got a hold on the ground. Good, comfortable, slip-on shoes.
This shoe is exactly what my son wanted. The quality much better than cheaper versions. This is the real converse shoe

The only reason I don't give the 5 stars to this shoe is because the rubber tip sort of hurts your big toe. No matter how I laced them, tight or loosen, it was hurtful, up to point I had to stop using them.
I love the sneakers. They are better quality than the ones at Payless, and a good price too.

Got this $20 for my boyfriend. He was disappointed that the picture isn't exactly as shown. The bottom and sides of the rubber portion of the shoe was orange color and not white as shown in the picture. If you don't mind the shoe having orange around it then its for you. Its not well padded like name brand shoes ie puma or k-swiss but you get what you pay for which is $20 on sale. The unlisted orange tag on the bottom of the inside of the shoe doesn't rub off on his white socks. The shoe feels like its made out of some faux leather rather then genuine leather...maybe because its cheap leather material.

I love UGG boots...this pair is my second. However, I am not happy with EastBay, the shipper. They shipped me the wrong product and then took three and a half weeks to send me the right product. I had to continuously email them about the status of the shipment...very annoying. I love the boots though...so soft and comfortable.

Having a wide foot they fit a little on the narrow side - I kept them knowing that canvas will probably stretch without to much problem. Also my shoes make a slight hollow sound from one of the baby toe tips; I'm assuming with time that too will abate.

Years ago I realized the value of spending money for quality footwear. That said, shelling out over $300 on a pair of boots was not an easy choice! My last few pairs of boots (including 2 pairs of Magnums) failed me within 6 months, so I wanted something that was going to last a long time. I did a lot of reading and looking around online and kept coming back to the Danner Fort Lewis. Everyone who owned a pair raved about them, so I sucked it up and took the plunge. Great decision!I have bizarre feet. At 6'4" tall, one would expect a size 12 or greater, but I wear an 8.5-9 EE. In addition to high arches, I have hammer toes, so I need room in places most shoes don't allow; hence I wear boots most of the time. When I got these in and put them on, I was a little nervous. They seemed to fit well, but there was some rubbing on my outside toes. 2 days of break in later and I was good to go. I've now worn them for 2.5 years in a variety of conditions, including motorcycling through massive down pours and on hikes through mud and muck with no problems at all. In fact, each time I polish them (which isn't often enough), they could almost pass for new! I've been surprised at how well the waterproofing has held up, as this is often one of the first things to go. I have never treated them and they still keep my feet dry, even when I stomp through puddles just to see my wife's look of exasperation.Since buying these, I've been in the Danner Outlet in Portland a few times and learned that these are still US made boots, which is cool. They tell me they remain on of their best sellers, especially with LEOs, and the only time they sell a second pair is when someone wants a dress pair. I can believe it, they really are remarkable. As with all boots, trying them on first is a good idea, but for wear and durability, you can't do better than these!

For all of those people who would rather pet the animals than wear them, these are the shoes for you! Converse has been making "Chuck Taylor's" longer than I have been alive and not one animal has lost it's life to make them! The only downside to Converse is that they are not the most comfy shoe, however, a insole insert fits rather nicely into them and then your good to go.

I have hand/foot syndrome from chemo, which means that my feet get very sensitive, hot and irritated. I need very comfortable shoes. These are average. To me, they are not as comfortable as everyone claims, but it could just be because I don't have average feet. I normally wear a 9.5M. I bought a 10M and they just fit and are quite snug. If I were wearing thick socks, they would be uncomfortable. They do look nice and I have gotten compliments on them. I will keep them for Summer wear when I'm wearing thinner socks than normal. I guess if you're looking for super comfort, you are going to have to cough up the big bucks for the pricier shoes.

These shoes are very nice. They fit fairly closely to the actual street shoes size. (Amazon states it runs about half a size smaller.) The only thing I am not thrilled with is that the upper is not real leather, but I couldn't find anything else in white that was all leather. :) I highly recommend them! They are comfortable and are well made.

Very comfortable shoe, quiet walking, good for standing, nice for work (which is what I bought my second pair for). Looks good and super comfortable - and this in the context that I usually don't go far without orthotics in every shoe that will take them and am not wearing orthotics in these shoes.

I bought a pair in the summer of 2001 for a trip and have been wearing them, usually with nicer slacks, ever since then. Have wanted to replace them and finally decided to do so. The 2001 pair still looks great, but isn't quite as comfortable as the new pair.

I'm on my feet all day as a Surgical Tech. This shoe is the absolute best for me. They provide great support, as well as protection, and hold up well. I've been wearing mine for a year now and even though they're still comfortable, they're beginning to look bad due to the abuse they've taken. I'm purchasing the same shoes as a replacment.
these ugg boots are extremely warm and comfy I don't think my daughters taken them off since she received them I highly recomend them and want a pair of my own.
This shoe is true to size. Love it love it love it!!!!! And most stores are NOT carrying timberlands in kids sizes at the moment.
I bought these for my sister-in-law for Christmas. They look super cute and comfortable. I bought them because my mom had a pair like that years ago And loved them.
This is a great pair of shoes and also fun to wear with a lot of compliments.
Quick delivery and item was just as described. These are pretty hard to find so I was very happy to get these for my husband

I work at an airport and am standing up to 8 hours or more per day. Bought the Professional 3 years ago and they are still in great shape. Looking for new pair as with all shoes the heal does wear down, but it took 3 years to wear. Would have many pairs in all the colors for my personal wardrobe if not for the price. Only other downfall is that I am not comfortable in any other shoes, even my athletic shoes.Dansko Professional

Actually allowed me to put my orthotics inside these shoes. Usually my orthotics only fit in athetic shoes, so I was pleased. I do have hammer toes, and got a few red spots on top of my toes, but I don't know how I could have avoided that.
I have bought several pairs of these shoes(other vendors) & love them. I found these on Amazon at a great price. I would wear these all the time if I could.

I bought these sandals for my mom because they looked nice and were from Softspots a company I love. She hasn't worn them out yet but reportrd them to be very comfortable. Just what we were looking for. Excellent product as usual. I highly recommend,

Original quality product received, however I followed the advice and bought a US size 11 which is normally a euro size 10.5 (as I take a 10-10.5, this was the size I needed). Converse say to buy a half size smaller than you need, but it would be too risky to do that and have too tight a shoe, so I bought the size I needed. 10.5 wasn't a listed size option anyhow.The label in the shoe says they are US 11 and UK 11. Go figure - doesn't make sense. So they are a half size too big. If only they told you that information somewhere up front.

I really love these, I finally have a pair again. They haven't changed at all and that's good, I like that they haven't messed with it. Although they do have more conventional styles of shoes for those who won't go the way of tradition. I had a pair of these when I was a teenager. I used to wear them with shorts, skirts, jeans. They make this wonderful wooden clopping sound when walking, which is fun in itself. Your toes will grip the front to keep them from sliding off. Which brings up a point...if they slip off while you're walking or in a fast stride it's gonna hurt like nobody's business. I've had that happen a few times in my day and it is very painful. But I survived. Ya live and learn. Enjoy!
great looking shoe with a comfortable fit. Versatile since it can be worn with shorts, jeans or a casual skirt. Love them!

Nice little arch support -- firm enough to do some good & last a while. The thong is just a little short for me -- hoping wearing them little by little will stretch the thong & squish down the sole just enough to be perfect.
The item was exactly as described and good quality. They matched the socks given to my daughter by the soccer league. Very fast shipping.
I also bought a pair of boots for my daughter. They run very small - at least 1 to 1 1/2 sizes too small. I had to return at my expense.
I already own a pair of these shooes and like them, so I bought an extra pair and I'm really happy and they arrived fast;).
muy buen producto llego en el tiempo esperado y con las condiciones de la publicación lo recomiendo al 100 %

I recently ordered my third pair of these K-Swiss and right away noticed a change in comfort over the previous two pairs that I still have to directly compare with. I also noticed the new pair are now made in Indonesia where as my previous two pairs where made in Thailand.There is a VERY noticeable decrease in the padding around the ankle sides, so much so that the new pair fit looser around the ankle area than both of the old pairs. I really do not like how lose they fit now nor the feeling of my foot coming out the back of the shoe.Bottom padding does feel like a new shoe should but overall they just do not have that amazingly comfortable new shoe feeling like my second pair had when they replaced my first pair. I remember how amazing the second pair felt when they were new compared to the ones they where replacing. This time I had to put the old one on one foot and the new one on the the other to feel a difference.I am on my feet in my restaurant for 12-13 hours a day and I wore my first pair for about 6 months and my second pair about 4 months. These I may use only as long as it takes to find a pair that are made in Thailand or another brand all together.Even with the decrease in comfort they are a decent value. In my opinion though they went from a good deal for comfortable shoes at $60 to just an average $60 pair of shoes. I would rather go back to spending $80-$100 for a comfortable pair of shoes that last the same amount of time.

I am very hard on soles and have finally worn these out after two years of hard use. These shoes do it all- look nice, keeps water out, and is the most comfortable I have ever worn. I am looking to get the exact same pair- but hard to find on sale anywhere but since the are so nice, they are worth the price.

I have purchased Sketchers in this style the last few years, perfect look for work and casual wear. They are comfortable to wear even during long periods of walking. To this point I have not had any issues with Sketchers, this particular shoe however the sole has split in the right shoe after 3 months. I would like to make sure that you are aware that I do walk approximately 3 to 4 miles per day in these shoes and they are perhaps just not built for that type of wear. Other than that which was most likely less due to a design flaw than it was an issue with it being used outside of it's purpose, it's a great shoe and I will be purchasing another pair.
These shoes were exactly what I was looking for. The price was the best I've seen anywhere. I couldn't be happier.
The shoe fit me well, and it came in the original condition - no damages, and it came on time.

I bought this boot for my son who is 8yrs old. it is made of the usual high quality material, looks like it will last a lifetime. I will recommend this product to anyone who has a kid that is very active. Also it arrived quickly!

Great support and Super Comfort. Great relief for back pain due to the support and contour of the heel. Highly Recommend these shoes. I have multiple Clark shoes and find them extremely comfortable and sturdy. Professional looking as well for business.

Teva has the best shoes for those of us who have bunions and/or high arches. The shoes form to your foot shape and provide adequate padding. If only they could come up with a flip flop type shoe that also is somewhat enclosed so that they can be worn at work.

Purchased these for my 75 year old sister who had been looking and looking for some navy keds. She loves them.
the boots came in faster than the date scheduled which was awesome and they fit better than i expected! Everything came in the box and the shoes looked exactly like in the picture.
My only probelm with these shoes are that they are not comfortable at all. do buy some type of inserts..
These shoes are my fav! reebok classics are the most amazing shoes eva just took awhile to get here thats all.

These are the most comfortable walking shoes going. I have had many pairs over the years and love every one. However, occasionally some sales clerk will convince me that they have something better. I buy...I'm sorry and then I get another pair of Prowalkers. They are light and you can wear them forever without that tight heavy feeling that so many "walking" shoes get.
only worn twice but seems decent quality for price, tongue is set low so wont be waterproof past halfway point and size seems pretty accuratehard bare inside so should use an insert

They looked the same unless you get really close and see the inside isn't terry cloth they are cheaper made. I bought a med it is what I wear but i'm in the process of trying to stretch them out. not bad, looks a little plain though.
I am just breaking these shoes in; but to this point in time they are very comfortable. They appear to be made quite well and for the price they are a good value.
