Unfortunately, they also turn the bottoms of my feet BLACK and the discoloration doesn't come off easily - it takes some scrubbing with soap and a washcloth. These flip-flops would get 5 stars if it weren't for that.

this item i had ordered was for my teenage son it was one of the few places i was able to find this on line he was happy i was happy the order was quickly filled 5 stars thank you amazonsincerly bethConverse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Top Black Canvas
The size is way off on these shoes. I did end up returning them but they were very helpful with the whole process
relatively comfortable. The front of my ankle hurts if i lace it too tightly. We will see if this improves with breaking it in.
Nice looking shoes, but the ones I received are way too small. They say size 7.5N, but definitely are not. I will have to return them.

I got the "pumice" color which is a pretty light gray with blue details, not stiped like the black sandal shown. Protection for the big toe, comfortable to wear immediately. Machine washable. I am very happy with these sandals.
I bought these shoes for myself. They look nice but there is no arch support and they just don't fit all that well. They are sitting in my closet and will probably end up at the local Goodwill.

These flip-flops are super in quality but i was disappointed with the size i order. I received a pair of these Havaianas Brasil flip-flops in pink as a gift and the size 39/40 fitted perfectly but when i ordered the size 39/40 online it was a bit small, i needed the next size up, don't understand why the same sandal in the same size has 2 different fit, 1 just right and 1 a bit small.If you intend to order these order a size up from your regular size.
My God baby looks like a little man in these. When I saw these I knew I had to get these for him. He looks so suave in them and the are true to form as seen in on the screen.
Box toes - people do not have boxed toes....Other vendors will accept returns - but Amazon will not....due to an arbitary date of return .......
The shoes were great, but I have such a small feet they were too big. Sorry I had to return them.

I love reefs and these do not dissapoint. Very comfy and will match all the earth tones in my summer wardrobe! Note: I normally wear a 9.5 and ordered up to a 10 b/c they dont have 1/2 sizes and it was perfect a 9 wouldve been too small so order UP!
this is a great product. i would buy this product again. i have no regrets on making this purchase. dj

I ordered these for my granddaughter's birthday. They were shippped promptly, and I was able to track them very efficiently. They were exactly what we wanted!!! They are very attractive and wear well.
The shoes were not the size that I thought I was ordering. I wanted a women's size. These will be sent back.

These sandals have been comfortable to wear for the most part, but due to the lack of odor control they become smelly and burn from extended wear. I have had to add foot powder before each use to be able to wear for more then a couple of hours. Keen should either remove the odor control as an attribute or improve its function.

I just bought my third pair of these boots in five years. I found them to be almost indestructible for light machine shop and daily use on the street. They are VERY COMFORTABLE, ideal if one is on your feet all day.They also polish up well and are presentable WORN as a dress boot/shoe.They felt like a favorite, comfortable old pair of shoes from the first time I put them on...SORT OF INDUSTRIAL STRENGTH BUNNY SLIPPERS!The boots are very well made from real leather.They are not heavy duty enough for heavy construction,logging or concrete work. Good for light farm work and driving.THEY ARE THE BEST WEARING WORK BOOT, I HAVE FOUND FOR DAY TO DAY WEAR.The soles have some tread, giving you fair traction in the grass, snow and ice plus have excellent wear resistance.Also...the boot's sole patterns does not leave large clumps of the outside on the kitchen floor, while stepping into the house.The boot sizing is pretty much exact. Only buy your exact sizeExcept a WIDER SHOE if you plan to wear multiple pairs of thick socks in the winter.They have an excellent size / width selection. I usually need a 14 EEEEE in a boot.The boots are almost waterproof, you will need to apply a reasonable coat of waterproofing silicone spray or mystery oil leather treatment. KIWI SHOE POLISH makes them shine up very well.The leather uppers are well cut out pattern and sewn together with care.I never had problems with the leather, material, sewn seams splitting or tearing, and no loosening or unusual wear with the heels or soles.The leather is thick enough to protect but still thin enough to be flexible.I have bought both he 6 inch and 8 inch versions of this farm boot.Both boot heights are just as easy to get on and off, however the eight inch high boot does gives you a bit more ankle support.So, I prefer the eight inch height.The only thing I can recommend extra for these boots...Order a bit thicker,round nylon boot laces, instead of the flat, cotton shoe laces that come FACTORY standard with these boots.If you need soles with more traction get something with a VIBRAM sole.However, trust me, your wife will remind you,often, to remove your boots before coming into the house with VIBRAM soles on.The only tougher and better boots I have seen and bought,have been just as happy with, are the White's Smoke Jumper Logging Boots and they COST ALMOST $500.00The FARM BOOTS are a great deal! I wish more American companies made things with this amount of care /pride in the product,a good design philosophy, used quality materials and all put together with wonderful workmanship!The people at WORK AMERICA remind me and hearken back to an earlier time in this country, when something that was stamped AMERICAN MADE or MADE IN USA meant often this product was the best made in the world!http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B008D94HNQ/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title
These Tim's are very comfortable & can be worn with just about any outfit. They are attractive to the eye & the best construction boots on the market. I highly recommend them.

MY HUSBAND WAS VERY PLEASED WITH THIS BOOT AND I WAS PLEASED WITH THE PRICE AND ALSO THAT THEY ACTUALLY FIT HIM. YEAH,,, HE IS HARD TO BUY SHOES FOR. SHIPPING WAS GOOD BUT HAD NO RETURN LABLE IN CASE THEY DIDN'T FIT JUST SO YOU KNOW. HOWEVER, I WAS THRILLED THAT WE DIDN'T NEED ONE. THANKS SO MUCH.. WE SAVED FIFTY DOLLARS ORDERING THESE FROM AMAZON.

The Angioline Liberty Flats are available in numerous colors for a reason. The comfort, fit, quality, and appearance can't be beaten. No matter what you wear, there's a color of shoes to match, and they always look nice. I have many people ask me where I buy my shoes, and I'm more than happy to tell them. I recommend The Shoe Mall, and Angioline shoes to anyone who'll listen.

I buy these every year for my preschooler. They are great summer shoes, perfect for water play and the backyard. My daughter is able to put them on and off by herself. I like them better then water shoes they slip on easier and they are easy to clean.

What can I say? This is my fourth or fortieth pair of birkies - and no matter how much money I spend on other expensive name brands or how many different sandals I really try to love, I'll always come back to my first love, my birks. I feel the most comfortable in them, and I'll probably wear them into my serious old age. One tip - I bought a pair and "saved" them for my cruise to Acapulco - MISTAKE!! The sole pretty much melted from the heat of the asphalt and their life was shortened dramatically. Wear your old ones or something else when you are in the real heat.

I bought this shoe last year in navy suede, and loved it. This year I wanted another pair in beige suede, but finally found it in beige smooth leather. Love them both as they cover my bunions without pressure, and have a small heel. The bumpy padding feels so good, and gives great support. It must have been discontinued, but if they bring it back next year, I'll buy red.
The boots are high quality but my daughter told us to buy one size smaller because they stretch. Wore them all day and all they did was hurt my feet. Wish I could return but I already wore them.
My husband, wearing a size 9, could not get his foot inside this slipper. Will probably have to return and try a larger size.
THANKS FOR GETTING 2 ME SO FAST......HE LOVES IT....THANKS AGAIN HAVE A GOOD NEW YEAR FOR ALL U DID FOR ME....
I love these shoes! They are comfortable and stylish. I have gotten nothing but great complements from them. Well worth the money!

I LOVE the style of Converse, always have. But the quality of the shoe is going down :(. I have had my black pair (They look just like the ones in the pic) for about 2 years now, and they're pretty much starting to fall apart already. I dont even wear them everyday! Very disappointed in the quality nowadays, but they are still stylish. (Until they fall apart)

Not only are the the Puma Anjan trendy and hot but they are also the most comfortable shoes that I have ever worn. I bought my first pair last summer, as I work long shifts on my feet and these shoes are excellent for that. They are thin and have breathable mesh, I very much recommend you go out and buy them.

Shoes are comfortable, but the L.L.Beans shoes are more comfortable. Also found them cheaper than on-line. So was a bit disappointed. Bythe time I paid shipping I could of saved $18.00.These also are not the latest style.Thanks Sofia

This is the 3rd time Amazon has requested a review and as I said before in my first review, the product arrived in a timely fasion and I'm completely satisfied. AMAZON needs to stop sending me review requests!

These shoes are cute and convenient. I pair them with jeans to do chores like grocery shopping, or when I go to the movies. They don't really have arch support so I won't be wearing them for long walks.They do fit a little differently and are narrow, but it works for my feet. I would not recommend these shoes to people with wide feet or who plan to use them all day, everyday.
These are the best shoes! I walked for miles without difficulty, pressure points, or blisters. They are so comfortable I barely knew they were on my feet. I highly recommend them.

This is the second pair of Merrell Jungle Moc I own. The first one bought in 2006 is still in use but after all these miles in town and nature the sole is becoming thin now and I absolutely wanted the same shoes again. Slipping in is so easy and they fit perfectly, even when it is hot or when I do long walks over several hours. They are tough and cleaning them is so easy. I never want to miss them

I would have given 5 but I have been buyer these for a long time and I feel the quality is falling just a bit. If a manufacturer in the US would make something as comfortable and as nice looking, I love this style I would buy them as I really hate the fact they are made in China.

Good-looking shoes but not to trek in. What you see on the outside is the only layer - you step into a thin layer of suede that will not stand up to elements. The bottom is rubbery and sort of gluey and the inside is thin.

These are the best boots I have ever purchased. Unbelievably the most comfortable boot I have ever purchased, even brand new. I won't be buying another Redwing boot again. These put them to a shame. Haven't had soar feet from break in at all. With redwing I can barely walk after the first week of wearing them. Quality seems the same as any brand out there. Best part of all, MADE IN THE USA!!!!!!

Arrived on time to my home address while I was away at school. The shoes had no imperfections, and I get compliments on them now and then. I will likely do business with this same seller again for another pair/next sneaker purchase.
This is a nice little bag. The leather is soft, and the hardware is nice looking. It is good quality for the price.
I bought 2 of these and have worn them almost everyday to work for over a 2 years. I am getting ready to purchase 2 more pair. I love them.

We just received these shoes for our almost 4 year old. He LOVES them. The soles are nice and the single velcro strip is quick and easy. Difficult to tell from the photo, but McQueen has a little toothy grin at the toe. He is convinced he is now fast as lightning! It was nice to find a Cars shoe in a color other than black.
Purchased for a nursing home resident who had totally worn out an exact pair. Perfect! The resident was delighted! Thank you.
I bought this shoe in the giraffe print...it fits great, looks great, no complaints. Fast shipping, great price. Highly Recommend!!!
These shoes were exactly what I was looking for! Well made. They were a little tight, but because of the material they stretched nicely.

I purchased these as required by my 5 yr old's ballet teacher. They were durable and did their duty as ballet shoes. They were easily able to be tightened to make them thinner for my daughter's foot. Easy on and off. I can't complain :)
I bought the shoes for my son. He likes it very much. Your Amazon services are excellent.

I have had these slippers for over a year. They wear very well, are warm and comfortable. Good construction and well made. They hold their shape and don't get stretched out or sloppy. Great quality at a good price. The sole is tough enough for outdoor wear around the yard.
bought it from amazon, last week. the shoe sole is made up of rubber, old fashoioned, thought it would be synthetic, like adidas & rbk. however, got good looks when worn, and quite comfortable.

Looking for a luxury loafer that stands out? If you are in the lower latitudes this is a great choice. Excellent quality. Light weight. Wear in the office or for special client meetings. Not intended for extensive walking, e.g. 85 Broad St. to the subway. Not intended for rain or dirt. Fit for 8M is exactly as it should be not like the Tommy Bahamas that run half a size large.

Nice shoes, but lack up support might not make them last after while, but nice design and concept. I get alot of compliments.BUT I would not order form footlocker again. They shipped these in a bag!? A shoe box in a bag?! By the time they got to me the box was totally crushed and not in any good condtion. BAD BAD SHIPPING I called footlocker and they could have cared less.
This shoe looks awesome and once its broke in feels great. I got a blister breaking them in, first time ever in a New Blance shoe.

These sneakers are from back in the day, but people still wear them! You can wear them with no laces and the tongue sticking out.....like Run DMC, or you can just wear them any way. They go with almost everything and they're definitely comfortable!

I wasn't really feeling the other colors that came out before the gray and reds. These are so hott and definitely a MUST HAVE. Don't forget to throw on some jeans and a gray & red rocawear shirt and you're good to go. ROC

I have been a huge fan of the 760 series, starting with the 762, and all the way up. These are the best yet. Perfect support, and extreme comfort. They work with you to get great workouts. Buy them while they still have your size!

I love the shoe but I did not get the shoe I ordered. The company had discontinued the shoe and did not have my size. They tried to replace them with another shoe but sent me a men's shoe and I had to return them. I finally got a replacement shoe but it was not a mid but regular shoe. I needed them so I am wearing them. The Amazon customer service was really bad the only help I got from them was an offer for $5.00 off my next order. Why would I use Amazon again? I told her to keep the $5.00.
I ordered these shoes in black. They are beautiful. However you should order half a size bigger than you normally wear.
Look sharp at the gym. Kind of squeeky when wet. I throw them in the washing machine to clean them. I liked them enough to give a pair away as a gift ...j.g. Staten Island, NY

The only shoes I am able to wear all day. I have bad feet and need orthotics. Lower cut shoes don't allow me to use them. Sorry to see the price keeps going up each year. Also, harder to find each year. Couldn't even find them at Reeboks in my size (average). Have been wearing them for over 20 years.
The shipping was prompt, the shoes are GREAT and I have another order ready to send! Thanks for your commitment to customer satisfaction!!

I absolutely love these sandals. The delivery time was super fast (about 3 days sooner than expected) and they were in perfect shape. I've been wearing them near constantly and they seem to be holding up really well and are much more comfortable than any other pair I have ever used. Reef uses two types of foam in their sandals, a firmer foam for the sole and a softer foam that eventually molds to your feet. The firmer foam also provides some arch support, it's not great but it's a lot better than what you usually get with flip-flops. On some sandals I've owned, the stalk (idk what it's actually called, it's the part between your toes) causes discomfort but on these the fabric they used is really comfortable and took no time at all to get used to.I highly recommend these sandals, they're awesome!

I'm so glad that I discovered these shoes! I have them in every color and wear them most of the time. I travel a lot and I can walk all day in these shoes without pain. I especially like the idea of the velcro straps everywhere so that if your feet swell from sitting too long, you can let them loose a little while. They don't take up lots of room in your luggage. You can be dressed up or dressed down. I've worn them to the beach and also for evening wear with a long skirt. Treat yourself and buy a pair of these wonderful shoes! Order your regular size as they are true to fit. Ignore the person who compared these to Clark's. These are better.
great look...but not too comfortable. overall i am pleased with them and have received many compliments. i just wish they offered a more cushiony fit.

He has been wearing these boots every day for over 2 years now...whether he's landscaping, logging, snow shoveling. plumbing or working on a vehicle., it's a guarantee it will be done in his Carolina's...just yesterday he started rambling on again about how much he really loves them. Every once in awhile he gets out that flat gold can of black wax and replaces the laces and then holds 'em up to the light with pride," Look Hun, just like new again!" In fact, while I am right here on this link, right now....I think I will secretly order him another pair to keep aside for him, as a back-up..... ;)
I had no problems whatsoever with this order. For a supersaver delivery, it was here within a couple days! Love the shoes, very happy with the company.

The boots are comfortable and easy to wear. Are not heavy, which was the main reason I was looking to replace my other pair. The boots are durable and appropriate for the snowy winter in Boston. Water does not penetrate them at the bottom. Nice buy!
I have always loved Keds sneakers, however, 2 weeks after purchasing these shoes, the bottoms came loose and I had to throw them away.

This is the only shoe that I could find with a sole that doesn't cake up with mud (to be released bit-by-bit around the house). They are not as comfortable as some that I've had, but they are very well made.
These are the best boots I have ever owned. They are very comfortable and I love the zipper sides.

This is my third pair of these shoes purchased over the past 4 years. I now have azure, natural, and black and wear them all summer long. It's very hard to find summer casual shoes that come in narrow widths, and these are very comfortable as well as versatile. You can wear them with shorts or casual skirts. When I can find them, I wear a 9.5AAAA in dress shoes. A 9AA in the Trinidads fits great.

I bought these online through Amazon.com for a friend because it has the built-in bottle opener on the sole of the sandal and he absolutely loves them, they are comfortable, durable and very useful. I recommend these sandals to anyone.
Great comfort. Great for all day wear in HOT weather, your feet stay so airy. They beat out Tevas's for comfort by far.

Im a Flight Nurse, so I work in EMS. These boots were extremely comfortable from day one. They are my favorite boots Ive owned so far. Ive had Bates, Rockies, Oakleys....these are the best. I think I would order 1/2 size smaller next time, there are a tad bit large, but my foot doesnt slip. Also, I meant to order side zippers, but these boots slip on and off very quickly so Im not slowed down in the middle of the night.
Sandals were everything I expected. I found good advice from former owners about moving UP a half size, which I recomend.

I've had the Scrusher bolted to my back porch for years. The brushes slowly deteriorated to the point where only the frame remained. Floors & rugs suffered for it. Should have got these brushes long ago. Doesn't clean toe or heel but gets off the worst of the crud.
I love this shoe. It is very comfortable all around and great for running. I will probably buy another pair if the price is stays the same at $74 and no tax.

I agree with all of the positive comments about this boot. I've had a pair of Hi-Tec Altitude "originals" (before they started putting numbers in the name) that just wouldn't die... until recently. I now have a brand new pair of Altitude IVs, and they're as good and almost as comfortable right out of the box as the old ones were after several years of hard use. This is a quality, comfortable boot. I'll keep buying Altitudes as long as they keep making them -- regardless of what number they put in the name.While I purchase quite a bit every year on Amazon because they've always provided me with excellent service and good prices, I found my new pair of Altitude IVs at HikingBoots.com. They were a little cheaper (including free shipping) and the customer service was every bit as good as Amazon. I'm not an employee -- just a very satisfied first-time customer.

Traditional style and "feel" (I wear these at home as slippers). Order up at least 1 1/2 sizes. You can adjust the fit using the elastic cord sewn in along the top. Detached straps to sew across the top if you'd like.

I bought these because I have arthritic hip joints and thought they would be helpful when I have to do lots of walking. They work very well! I've even worn them to Wal-Mart to do lots of shopping. I plan to keep several pairs on hand from now on.

I started wearing these shoes when I was 19. Five years later, I've gone through two pairs (about to buy my third), but they've been my one and only pair of shoes. I just haven't had the desire to wear anything else. I've worn them for nearly 12 hours a day, every single day, year-round, working at a job during the day that requires constant movement, and then walking around the city at night. You can't really tell by looking at them that they've been literally everywhere with me. They could use a bit of a polish, but other than that, nothing's worn down. I suppose if I wore more shoes, I would only need one pair of these, and they'd last longer. But thats not stopping me.

I just purchased a pair of these shoes to replace some exactly like them that I have worn every day since 1994!! Those have reached the point where the heels are so run down that they make me walk a bit crooked and one sole is nearly worn through. But can you believe that kind of service from a pair of shoes? They are so comfortable from the first day of wearing and like a well known bunny the just keep going and going. I can't reccommend highly enough.
love this shoe. it's in wde width. don't have to travel to numerous stores that invariable don't have the wide width.

I have had these shoes for probably 5 years. They are still fully functional. I have owned Vans for that length of time and they have worn out in the first 2 years but Keds are extremely good quality. I have bought different colors but they never fail me. They are comfy for walking. Although, I have found out if you are walking long distances that they might strain your feet By long distance I mean a couple of miles. But overall, I love them and they are definitely worth the price.

I've had these boots for about a year now, and they have worn very well. I wear them all the time and the quality is great...and you can't beat the price. I have a wide foot (EE width) and the opening or upper of the boot was very narrow. I also have a pair of Red Wing boots in the same size and they are much more loose at the top. They do stretch but it take some time.

Real ballet shoes at a reasonable price. We bought them for Christmas for our 3 budding prima ballerina granddaughters. They were ecstatic. They danced the day away. It made for a very Merry Christmas.

Women you know that when a husband finds something he likes, it's almost impossible to change his mind. Mine loved his slippers and wore them to shreds. then I couldn't find them and he hated every other option I offered. Finally found them and bought 3 pairs so I'd have spares for later. Great product--made my home much happier.
The shoes arrived quickly. Unfortunately the shoes must have been seconds. Not only are they not narrow on the right shoe the one strap was sewn on incorrectly.
I have been wearing them for about 3-4 years now and I love them and will continue to buy them.

I have these shoes in brown. I have been complimented several times on these shoes, and they match everything. I don't dress for comfort, but these are pretty comfortable. The only problem is that they look old quickly.
Great shoes, after a short break in these are some of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. Will buy again.

Great Product, Supper nice company, who do what they say there going to do! An Ace plus Seller ++++++High encourage all to view and purchase there fine line of products. My wife love them so well I ordered another pair for christmas.
I like it a lot. I think it should have a way to block the vents that you're not using if you only have one pair of boots or gloves to dry. But otherwise I really like it. Works great.

Dada's are some of the best basketball shoes i have ever had. The only bad thing i have found is the price difference between youth and large. $20.00 more for a bigger size is rediculous, but other than that they are really cool shoes especially how you can personalize them with your teams colors and your team name, your name, and your number. Some of the reasons they are really good shoes are because they are comfortable, have good traction, and just look good.

They are lightweight and soft leather with a flexible sole. However, there was something about the way they fit my feet that didn't work for me. There is nothing unusual about my feet (no surgery or conditions). I tried normal width first and they were too narrow. Although I don't normally order "wide," I tried it. Still not right. Also, I thought the length ran large, and nobody mentioned that. I normally wear a 6.5, but needed a 6. I returned them all and am trying a new style. The price would've been right if they were a perfect fit, otherwise not worth it.
Bought these for my daughter to play Tracy in a high school production of Hairspray set in the 60's. Great classic style and fit and perfect for a lot of dancing!

Love these boots i can wear them all day. I live in Alaska and it can get cold and wet so far these boots are doing great! very cute they even make my feet look small! :) I ordered them before i found out i was pregnant and i was worried that when my feet swell if i would be able to wear them still and YES! I love how you can adjust the width just by the laces. in fact these are the only shoes (other than flip flops but those aren't very good for winter walking :)) that my very pregnant swollen feet can fit into and i can wear them for hours! the only problem i have with them is the velcro strap at the top that is supposed to keep it closed is bothersome it would be nice if the zipper went all the way up.
The boots live up to their description, they are very comfortable. And I got them in the mail a few days after I ordered them.
The merchandise is impeccible, the service was timely and I am very satisfied. Thanks for a smooth transaction.
The shoe is comfortable but a bit heavier than I like. Nice looking kick-around shoe.

I find this shoe to be perfect for walking. I clock an average 7 miles a day on uneven ground. The sole is very comfortable, and the heel support is perfect to alleviate side to side movement. This is my 3rd pair of this shoe. I hope they keep making them......

when clicking on the product at you site the image kept changing from a shoe string to velcro. The walking shoe category I went to was velcro shoes. But I received tie strings instead. Had to return at my expense t6o New balance who shipped out the correct product but the wrong size. Still have that shipment and will again have to return.

I really like the way the shoe feels, I would have given it a 5 if it had better arch support (My other experiences w/ Propet they all had great support). The foot bed on this sandal is flat. It does not feel like it will pinch or give blisters. I have only worn it around the house so far to see how they will be.
I bought these for my Mom. Is actually the second pair for her. She loves them so much. She wears them everywhere! Best shoe for gardening and working outside because they clean up so easy!
I already own a pair of these shooes and like them, so I bought an extra pair and I'm really happy and they arrived fast;).
Bought these for my wife. Just what I was looking for. Perfect fit (since there are no half sizes, buyer needs to go down to next full size). E.g., If you are an 7 1/2, you need to order the 7.
Amazing for the money and a must-have. I wish the build quality was better but this thing works and has held up so far for a 72-day ski season - used 72 times for 2 people!

Why doesn't anybody state that they run full size large? Maybe it's not even worth mentioning as everybody knows that, but I've never had experience with Converse before. I bought those in size 10 (men's) for my brother (he always wears 10) and they are big even for my husband (who wears 11). Other than that they are OK, good quality.

Love this sandal, I work as an adventure guide treking through rivers and forest in the same adventureand I have to say this is the best shoe ever, and drys quick. Has good grip, very cumfortable and light.
Comfortable, stylish and comes in narrow sizes which are difficult to find in many shoe brands.

I have wore these since I was a kid, but now sadly these are hard to find. If you are looking for both quality and a product made in the states then these are the shoes for you. The nice thing is that Chucks come in a variety of colors so you can get different ones if you want to have a certain look.

I had this pair of shoes for probably 3 years before I wore them to the ground. They are incredibly comfortable and very versitile. I had to part with my first pair, but I am definitley considering buying a replacement pair!

I love them!! They are extremely light, and the most comfortable pair of shoes I own, PERIOD even over my tennis shoes! I wear them 5 days a week to work, and usually wear them on the weekends too because of their comfort. The Zippered feature makes getting in and out of them extremely easy! I have owned two pairs, wearing them pretty much daily a pair lasts about two years. Then I wear the soles off of them! They are definitely non-slip and have great all terrain traction. I have been in all sorts of situations with them: muddy hills (they bite into the ground like a beast! I don't slide), Oily parking lots in the rain (in normal shoes the oil makes me slide all over the place).

Dada's are some of the best basketball shoes i have ever had. The only bad thing i have found is the price difference between youth and large. $20.00 more for a bigger size is rediculous, but other than that they are really cool shoes especially how you can personalize them with your teams colors and your team name, your name, and your number. Some of the reasons they are really good shoes are because they are comfortable, have good traction, and just look good.
This is about the 4th pair of these I've bought. They are nice and confortable, and look good. Only problem is they make my feet sweat a bit. Still a good value IMO.
I love these sandals. The soft mushy insole is really comfortable.I will wear these & my regular Teva sandals all summer.
These are so cute!! And comfortable, too, especially given the heel height. I love the pewter color - goes with everything, and a nice change from black, black, black.

I purchased these shoes as a gift for my aunt in PA. She said it is the most comfortable shoe she has ever worn. I will purchase another pair for her closer to spring but told her the red ones are year-round too. Next, I will purchase a pair for me. Many thanks. NJ
once again amazon brings great deals on stride rite shoes, I always come back for more.what a deal....

I bought these for my husband and although they looked nice and cozy they run very very small. I ordered him an 11, which he usually wears in a slipper, to allow room for heavy socks for winter, and they were so tight across the instep that he couldn't stand to have them on. I sent them back. These are too expensive to not fit right.

The shipping fast, the product came in the right size that i ordered. The shoes are great I love them. Only problem is they sent me a different variation of this product than what is pictured. The stitching shown in the toe area that looks like a "cowboy style" is replaced by a rounded curved line. I bought these over a cheaper model to get that "cowboy v" stitch and received the cheaper model anyways... should have ordered them elsewhere and saved 5 to 10 dollars.
This sandal fits perfectly. The size runs a little small/true to size, which is just right for me since I am a size 5.

I read the other reviews on this site, decided the purchase these boats. I love the fact that they are lightweight, yet very supportive. I have not been able to test them to see if they are waterproof. Others on this site said they are not. They came with a tag on the right boot that says they are waterproof. I sprayed them with a water repellent just in case.
We bought these boots for our son and he was extremely happy with the fit and feel. Good price too.

I ordered the product in my normal shoe size. Unfortunately it was painfully short - at least a full size too short for a narrow foot.So I think 'No problem - Amazon has a great return policy'.I fill out the return form online, print the RMA & send 'em back.But Amazon does not include mis-sizing as a 'reason for return' on the RMA. Since the decision to return the shoes was just my own choice then Amazon does not reimburse for return shipping.I guess it really doesn't matter though. Two weeks have gone by since I returned them and there has been no sign of a refund anyway.My last three orders have been jacked one one way or the other (only one of three pieces delivered on one order - 35 days to get the complete product and the other product listed in stock - two weeks and it hasn't been shipped. the part that burns is that Amazon just has this lackadasical attitude "... too bad - whatever"

I ordered a different model with the same brand for my daughter and the sizing wasn't even close. She had a 1.5 last year in the model that uses velcro so I ordered a 3 this year. They were smaller than the 1.5 last year. Her true foot size is a 3. Nothing bad with the quality of the shoe but the sizing needs some work. If you need to order this shoe, size up 1 to 2 sizes.

This is my 3rd pair of Reef flip flops. I love the arch support in them and they wear well. They dont fall apart like other brands do. I have a pair for the pool, one for around the house, and one for out and about. They are fabulous and totally worth the price.

Amazon advertised free shipping so I took the Bait. I will not use AMAZON again. I deal with liars all day at work. I do not need to deal with more over the computer.________Amazon's reasoning: The Item was not from their inventory. So What! I feel they should back their word up and pay the shipping costs! Can I get a Hell Yeah?

I have been looking for a year for lowtop converse in red for my daughter. On the rare occasion that I found a pair, it was not the size I needed.I had no trouble locating them through Amazon. They arrived in plenty of time for Christmas and my daughter is thrilled. It was exactly what she wanted.

Aside from the old-school good looks, comfort, support, and style of the New Balance 991s, these are the unofficial shoes for prep school students and fraternity members. Wear them with khakis, a polo shirt, and a baseball hat (preferably of a large Southern state school - UNC or UVA is ideal).They are also ideal for use with contrasting laces - thick red ones are best.

Good looking shoe -- I've worn it about 15 times boating -- they do a good job relative to grip on the boat -- however, the leather is showing wear at this point I didn't expect. The color is fading in some areas and not in others. They shoes appear a lot older than they are.

This shoe came and I was able to wear them right away with out breaking them in. I am a hairdresser, so long hours on my feet mean comfortable shoes with good support. Love the sharp looks and the quality. Would love to buy some more.
These shoes are great! I had a pair already and wanted a spare...could not find them locally but found them on Amazon.Amazon has almost everything I want and provides great service as well!
Love these shoes, not too heavy but real comfortable and great support. I have bought quite a few pairs of Asics as they fit my foot well. Also like the 2120's but I got a great deal on these
THIS IS THE FIRST TIME I ORDERED SHOES FROM AMAZON (SHOEFLAKE) AND THEY WERE ENTIRELY THE WRONG SHOE. FORTUNATELY, I HAD SOMEONE TO GIVE THEM TO. HOWEVER, I AM OUT $60+ DOLLARS.
The service was very good, the product arrived as request.The product was excellent, and was sent on the date specified, and their arrival was equally efficient.

These are excellent boots. I have worn them for years. Also, the seller, PapaShoe, is very nice to work with, and the people there are very friendly and helpful. I would recommend their store to buy shoes from to others.

I ordered the "Chuck Taylor" Converse All Stars in Black, just because I think they go with almost everything. The packaging was fine and I had no issues with the product. It arrived before the projected date and looked exactly like the photo. The box did include two pairs of laces, both black and white. I've been wearing Converse Chuck Taylors for years and needed to replace my pair that I've worn out. I rotate my shoes, so they had just ran their course. I really enjoy these shoes, I like the look, the style (which is very classic), and the comfort. These are the most recognized sneaker, ever. More people comment on these more than any other pair that I own. The only drawback is that they run large. Make sure when you order them, you order them to your true size. Other than that, I have had no issues. YMMV.
These little pumps are exactly what I expected to receive. They look simple and neat. I had to stretch the right one a bit as my right foot is wider than my left. I would definitely recommend them.

This seems to be a very nice shoe, but they run incredibly small! My daughter is normally a 12 1/2, so I ordered 1 13 1/2 and she could not even get her foot in it. You then have to pay a $5.00 re stock fee to exchange the size!I would not have been so annoyed with this, had the description said runs small! We are awaiting the new pair. The original came pretty quickly (about 4-5 days) I sent them back a week ago.

I was originally hesitant to spend this much on shoes but considering I wore holes from seven years of wear on my last Sperrys, I decided to bite. These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn and will probably be buying the exact same pair in another seven

Having a mountain farm can be murder on floors in the house. Mud, straw, chicken manure can create a nonstop cleaning agenda. I installed this on the wood crossties that create the steps up to the house and it has really decreased the amount of mud and junk coming into the house. The product is solid, installs easily with the included screws and when the scrubbers wear out (whenever that might be) you can buy replacements without trashing the entire thing.
This is a good work shoe for the weekends. I wouldn't use it necessarily for running a whole lot but more for errands and working around the house.

Bought these boots to replace a pair of New Balance boots at twice the price that didn't hold up. These boots are easily more comfortable and are better built. Even though my current pair are still in great shape, I'm tempted to buy another pair in case they become discontinued.

These shoes are fine if you can get the right size. I've ordered several in the same size and they were actually different. Watch the Youth versus Adult as they vary in width, but not length in the same size. They are a great shoe to wear in the summer, they dry quickly and can just get washed with the hose.
I mistakenly ordered the wrong width, have reordered it but havn't recieved it yet, I hope it fits as it is a nice well made thong.

The shoes have cushion where needed which makes it a very comfortable shoe for walking. They are also very good when you have to be standing for a lenghth of time. I would recommend this shoe for people who have to be on their feet (working/standing) for a long period of time.

I was soooo tickled pink with my pink Nellie Chukka boots. I saw them on the web page and I had to have them. Pink is my favorite color. They are extremely well made. They didn't need breaking in either. That is a major plus. They fit perfectly. Also they arrived in record time except it was like waiting for Christmas. I love them so much it is all I can do not to wear them to bed. :-) I want several more pairs. I am waiting for them to be available in red leather.

Received these for Christmas and tried them out for the first time today. I got 10.5 Wide, and after calling Hi-Tec realized that Amazon mislabels these as 2E shoes when all wide shoes from Hi-Tec are 3e.These shoes are great! Super waterproof, true to size, and simply a great hiking boot. Hiked 8 miles today to break them in, no blisters. Slight pain for the first few miles, but after they were great.I'll keep everyone posted as I keep using them. Very impressed so far.
I've had many pairs of these Clark sandals because they are the most comfortable sandal I've ever owned. They give great support and are good for walking. This price was excellent.
My son loves these shoes so much, that when he grew out of them, we bought him another pair just like them. A good value!

I own three pair of these shoes. I bought them for over $50 each in a department store. Shows you how much I liked these shoes. Since Amazon has them at a lower cost I will probably buy a couple more pairs.

I have been wearing Clark's Natureveldt Oxfords for over 2 decades, and this is a great shoe.First, the price: Sure, they are pricey, but they more than make up for the added cost in comfort and durability. My first pair, which I bought for about 100 dollars, lasted me over 10 years! How many shoe brands last that long? I took regular care of them of course, adding dye and polish as needed. The sole finally wore out after 10 years of very comfortable use. I almost cried when the sole cracked, as I loved my Clark's shoes that much. So I went out and bought two more pairs, one brown (my favorite) and one black.These shoes are described as casual shoes, but I wear them with my suit and they look fine. Whether you wear then to a formal occasion or to the mall, they will look fashionable.These shoes are truly the most comfortable shoes you will ever wear. There is no "break-in" period with these shoes. The moment you put them on, you will feel how comfortable they are. The laces are top-quality as well, thick and strong, and will not break over years of use. The sole is very durable and literally will last 10 years. The stiching will not come loose or fray. Top-quality in every component of the shoe.I have no reservation in giving these shoes a 5-star rating. These are the best shoes I have ever worn.Jim "konedog" Koenig
These shoes are cute and match outfits very well, but I think that they forgot about comfort. If you plan on walking around for awhile, these are not the sneakers to do it in.
i got these shoes back in like early January and all ready the side is coming apart there is a open on the side. but there good shoes.
I had been looking for a pair of pink tennis shoes. Online I found the color that I wanted, I'm very pleased.

I bought this for my husband to wear as work shoes as he is standing all day and he needs ankles support. The leather and manufacture seems pretty flimsy and smells really bad. And not like leather but like chemicals. The inside lining looks cheap. Too bad I bought two pairs.

I purchased this suit for my 17yr old. He wrestles tournament during the off season and summer, so he needed a suit. I also bought matching shoes. He thought the suit was just a comfortable as his regular suit and it didn't ride or pinch in the crotch area. My son has a tall and slender frame. He generally wrestles between 125 - 138. We ordered the medium and it fits great.

This is my second of these - it's the best front-pocket wallet I've run across. It's nice and thin, while still holding 6 or more various types of credit / ID cards. The only negative is that your cash is simply folded and placed into the main pocket of the wallet. When you pull out your bills, be careful - some may end up on the floor. As long as you're careful, though, it's terrific.

I just re-purchase that shoes, around yr ago, i bought the white color speers, when I found out is discount item, I re-purchase another pair (Black/gold). That is a comfortable, cool shoes.Just for your information, I am working in HK. It's very different to find DaDa basketball shoes here. I need to purchase online and ship to HK. (Takes 14 days). So you guys in North American are so lucky.I am highly recommended for those sourcing a high-quality & inexpensive basketball player. That is 100% good choice. (Try it... Very Good Deal)Excuse me! Am I too hard-sale that DaDa basketball shoes?
Ellegant,great quality materials, excellent taste...pretty unique.I'm not a fan of that kind of ankle wrap,but this time, I simply didn't care.
Liked the way this shoe looked and the way it was made, but it ran very, very small and the opening was too small as well. Had to send them back.
I enjoy my purple chucks a lot. I get lots of comments on them when I where them. It is fun to see peoples reactions.

Have worn out 2 pair of these shoes in past years. The only thing I don't like about them, they are not made in the UNITED STATES now.. I needed them or I would not have bought them. Hope they will give me the service the others did.

These shoes are great. I value a lightweight, sturdy, hightop shoe for playing basketball(prison rules style) with the 11 other firefighters I work with. They require a tough foot, but if you can hack it they will save you some money.

Well, i bought those shoes for my sister when they go onsale, roughtly 21$. Price is very good for addidas shoes, and the degisn is nice ,too. But only thing my sister does not like is the the plastic base. you feel it is prertty hard when you wear shoes. she like the softer heel.

Ive been wearing converse all stars for over 20 years and still love them. Ive also found they make a nice driving shoe because there thin and you can feel the pedals. If youve never had a pair its time to try.
Great shoes. comfortable and a good fit. I now own 5 pairs in different colors.

I love how comfortable they feel on my feet. I did forget that Timberland's are usually sized a bit large when compared to shoes. Normally I'm a size 12 shoe but only in Timberland's I would be a size 11. Luckily for me I ordered a 11.5 size so it wasn't bad enough for me to return. Just have to lace them up tighter but still not an issue when it comes to them being comfortable and durable. It did take me a couple of days to break them in so now the size issue is none existent.

I purchased these sandals as a gift for a friend...She is Very pleased with them and has worn them every day to work since I gave them to her this summer, and tells me every so often how much she loves those sandals! :)
The insole in the shoe was installed improperly. It was easily repaired but still not up to quality control standards

I first purchased a pair of these Spira walking shoes about 5 years ago and the ones purchased from Amazon are my third pair. I turned to Amazon after my traditional source, a local shoe store, closed their doors after the owner died. I found it difficult to find another shoe store that carried them but was pleased to find them on Amazon. These shoes have patented springs built into the soles, which creates a sort of shock absorber for your feet and knees. You have no sensation of walking on springs, only comfort -- and they wear like iron. They are expensive but worth every penny and they last forever. I wear mine virtually every day and they always look like new even though I shovel snow in the winter and mow my lawn in the summer, all the time wearing these shoes. If they get a little scuffed, a little black shoe polish brings them back to like-new condition. Try a pair and you will not be sorry. I did find that they run a little small. I normally wear a 9-1/2 or 10 in a dress shoe, but I take a 10-1/2 in this shoe.

these are good ballet slippers for the beginning and young ballet students. we have used this brand and style since my daughter started ballet at 3 and she is 6 1/2 now and they have held up well with classes and recitals.

Delivery was fast and these were exactly what I ordered. I use my crocs for gardening. Easy to clean off once they get muddy. Note that the color of these shoes online looks more coral, but once they arrived in the box they are definitely a true red. I look like Minnie Mouse!

I have been wearing these shoes for most of my life. They aren't $15. anymore, but they are still worth the money. They are very flat, so don't forget to get some insoles with arches for them! You may want to add 1/2 a shoe size for this.

I started a tap class a few months ago. This is an adult beginner tap class, and our teacher likes to teach us new things to challenge us. The class is an hour a week, and I practice about an hour a day outside of that class time.The toe tap on the right shoe came loose after the 3rd class. And being riveted into the shoe, there was no way to re-attach the tap. Maybe I had the wrong size. Maybe I was being hard on them. But maybe they're just not meant to tap more than 5 hours per week either.
Great skate shoes, my son loves these. These were cheaper than alot of the others and we don't know why, they are GREAT sk8 shoes!

i was so excited when i ordered these shoes. First of all, these shoes arrived a week after the estimated arrival which upset me greatly since i was highly eager. then when they finally got here,they sent me the wrong shoes! i ordered the patent shoes (shiny) and i even reviewed my order form to see if maybe it was an error on my part. and it wasnt i infact ordered the patent wedges and was sent the pu wedges (non shiny)>_< the shoes non the less were very comfortable and since these shoes took so long to get here im not even going to return them who knows how long itll take before the new pair get here. then to top it off after trying them on and modeling them around the house to show them to my family the label inside the shoe peeled off....in short, beautiful shoe, very comfortable.terrible service.
These are by far the most comfortable shoes. For someone who is on her feet daily they wear exceptionally well, the suede goes well with any type of brown and the support is invigorating.

I am a fan of Keds and have several pairs of Keds shoes on different colors. They are true size and fit my feet very well. I wear them every morning for exercise and got much compliance. Highly recommend them for active women.

A friend of mine was wearing these when I was visiting her on vacation and I commented how cute they were. She immediately took them off and said I had to try them because they are so comfortable. As soon as I did I had to have them! It also was great that they came in my favorite color. I also like the idea they are made out of recycled yoga mats! Enjoy!
These shoes are very hard to come by .My husband use to wear these butThe stores stop carry them so guess who has them . A very nice shoeI will buy several pair
These boots are really cute! the little pull handles should make it easy for the little one to put on.

The shoewallet is a great little item! I debated between this and a similar product, but I chose the shoewallet because in addition to holding my Nike+ipod sensor it also has room for my house key and a photo ID (very helpful!). Not only is the product really good, but the customer service has been excellent. I've already recommended it to several of my friends who run frequently. :)
Lots of copy cats out there but there's nothing like the real Sperries. We were really happy to find them so reasonably priced.
My husband loved his first pair of these boots so much, when he wore them out, he wanted another pair. So we ordered them online at Amazon.com, great price and quick service.
Needed a wide cleat for my son and these definitely fit the bill. Held up under pretty constant use. I will be purchasing these again next soccer season.
I like these pair of sandals because they do not hurt my feet.
This is a most comfortable shoe with great support for an excellent price. My friend went out and bought a pair after seeing how the shoe moved with the foot.

I bought the green shoe. First, it's really good but I mainly run on the hard concrete so it probably wasn't the shoe for me.I can't tell you how well it works off road, but on the road, my knees take a beating due to the lack of padding. These shoes definitely weren't designed for distances of over two miles on the road. Right now, I mainly use them for sprint workouts which they excell at. They are very flexible and lightweight so it's almost like running barefoot and is excellent training for calf muscles.I haven't got a chance to use the spikes but without the spikes, they have traction on snow and ice due to the metal on the bottom.
the sandal is so sexy and i love it!!! thank you amazon for the prompt delivery... will surely shop again...
i love these shoes. i ware them alot. i have three pairs red black and royal blue. one bad thing about them is you can not get shoelaces for them in the stores. i had to get them offline.

Initially the item was not delivered to the requested address; since the seller is using the USPS, which is not as efficient as UPS or DHL; however the seller made all efforts to track the item and finally was located in some post office and I have to go my self and collect it.For deliveries, I would suggest to the seller, to use UPS or DHL even if you charge the client the additional cost.
Bought these and thought they would be good quality, but when I got them, the stitching wasn't so good. It was coming apart in some places.
Received sandals very fast and fit perfectly. Wish the straps would stay up so I can slip on faster, but overall a good buy.

Lets be honest I needed a cheap pair of LARGE wrestling shoes fast to fight in for a army combatives tournament, these were $19.99... How could I go wrong? Well after having got them ONE DAY after I placed the order. And starterd to wear 'em... DAMN!!! I'd of paid the full price for them (whatever it was befor the huge mark down) Well worth it, the company that sent them was EASTBAY.
its a good place to buy ur shoes u get ur products on time.
Thanks a lot!!! Good brand, good shoes, I like it very much! Classic shoes, I recomendate this item to my friends!

I have 2 pair of Chacos and I love them both, but these are so pretty and go with almost everything in my wardrobe. I have a pair of W9 and I like them, but even tho my foot is narrow these are almost too narrow, so with my Serenity pair I bought the W8 wide and I could live in them! They are so comfy and wonderful for living in the mountains!

These shoes have been my mainstay dress shoe when I need to wear something fancier than the beaten-up dansko clogs that I usually wear to work. They were very comfortable when I first got them and they are even more comfortable 2 years after the fact. I wear them all day while standing up and shuffling between distant points at the workplace and my feet hold up, no problem. Good looking, and well-constructed shoe.Great shoe, great value!
This is a nice sturdy shoe, but no matter that it is advertised as a "slip-on", a shoe horn is very much needed to put it on.

I spend a lot of time on my feet and have worn some other shoes out in less than two months. Have had at least 7 pair of the Akrons and will continue to purchase them. The factory soles are thinner than the replacements that I get but they are very comfortable. I've had some that I've re-soled 3 or 4 times. With a little care the tops still look good after daily use for a couple of years.I will be back for more.

Whether you're buying them for military service, or just wearing them for the style like myself, you can't go wrong with boots like these. Solid, sturdy, and comfortable... when properly laced these boots grip the calf, and after a short break-in period, are as comfortable as sneakers. The cost only reflects the quality of the product... I may not be buying another pair of boots ever again.

The first time I saw this shoe (in black/white patent leather) was on the feet of Boston Celtics All-Star forward Antoine Walker. Being a fan of "old-school" shoes and Mr. Walker, I immediately took a liking to the Adidas Promodel 2G.The Adidas Promodel line has been around for over four decades now and many a current and former NBA player has spent time in a pair, whether in high school, college or at the pro level. The first thing that stood out to me was how Adidas kept the classic "shell toe" as part of the shoe while adding minor adjustments to give it a nice blend of modern/retro looks. The patent leather also gives it a nice touch making the shoe simple, but unique.Another huge plus which I'm sure everyone will notice is the price. ... it ain't gonna clean out too many pockets and for this price y'all can go out and cop a pair or two (one for home games, one for the road). So, the bottom line on the Adidas Promodel 2G is that it's worth considering if you're a junior high or high school-level team looking for a good value in a team shoe (... the Promodel costs a lot less than most shoes designed for team use) or if you need a shoe for those lazy Sunday afternoon games down at the park.

These were my first converse, and I was a bit hesitant to buy a pair online, so I went to Khols and tried on a pair there to find the correct size. I bought the Black Monochrome, and they are stylish and comfortable. And look great! I have had several compliments on them in the first week or so. A great buy!

I love these shoes and have owned many Chuck Taylor Converse shoes for 30 years. I did forget that when getting this shoe I must order a size smaller than my regular shoe size. This can be frustrating when ordering shoes online, so don't forget to order 1size down :)

These boot moccasins by Minnetonka are great! I've been wearing them since high school. Feels like walking around in your slippers-- there so comfortable! Unique frontier, hippie type look that goes great with denim (faded looks best) and leather--particularly in fall and spring. More guys should try them out for a unique, confortable look.
I suspect the vendor sold out of these, so just sent any size they could. Cute boot, but sketchy vendor.

THESE REVIEWS ARE SUPPOSED TO BE ABOUT THE PRODUCT - NOT THE SELLER! SO DISREGARD THE PREVIOUS 2 REVIEWS! ALL PROPET SHOES ARE FABULOUS! QUALITY & COMFORT! AND NO- I'M NOT AFFILIATED WITH PROPET IN ANY WAY! JUST AN EXTREMELY SATISFIED CUSTOMER OF ALL PROPET SHOES FOR 8 YEARS NOW :)

I'm giving this shoe 3 stars for one reason. The width runs too narrow. I have had a similar sizing problem in the past and that was with Reebok. Otherwise it is a very attractive and comfortable shoe that looks like it it will last for a long time.
Love the shoe! It's kinda retro but it feels great. Exceeds my expectations. What more can I say? It's a Reebok!

These shoes are true to size, are authentic converse, are comfortable, and arrived on time and in the correct color. My only complaint about converse is that they are a bit too narrow. However you can find them at pretty much any shoe store so you can always try them on first before you buy them. I am happy about the price too (they were $10 more expensive at DSW than here on amazon). They don't offer much in terms of arch support, but overall I can't complain.
These boots are great. My husband swears it's like not wearing shoes at all. They are tough and withstand his job as a groundsman for a tree company. Outstanding. You can't go wrong with Tims.
These shoes are light and comfortable to walk around in all day. Thier sizing is a little confusing. These run about one size larger than most shoes. I recommend using extra or replacement insoles.
Don't know how many pairs ive owned over the years but I keep buying more. Comfy, stylish and cool to boot. I'd give a 5 but i wish they werent as expensive...
These moccasins are very comfortable right out of the box. This is my second pair, but the first pair lasted about 15 years. Excellent product.

Love these boots! I made the mistake, though, of listening to reviewer's comments suggesting that the boots run large so they should be bought a half to full size smaller. I normally wear a 7, so I ordered a 6, and they were too small. I immediately returned them for a refund, then had to place a new order since a direct exchange wasn't possible. My 7 has now arrived. I'm extremely happy with them, and wear them all day and evening. By the way, I also bought an UGG care kit from a different seller. When I sprayed the mist, I noticed that the boots were not absorbing the liquid; it just beaded on the surface. This suggests that the boots may have already been treated. If I had known this ahead of time I would not have spent the additional $20+ for a care kit.
This is a good work shoe for the weekends. I wouldn't use it necessarily for running a whole lot but more for errands and working around the house.

I wear an 8 in some shoes and 7.5 in others. I ordered a half size smaller than that, a size 7 and they are a bit tight but am keeping them because I know they will stretch out some. Cute and comfy otherwise.
great boots, if they fit. had to send them back cuz they ran too small by one size
This is a great shoe that my wife has worn for years and is no longer available locally. This was a grat price and arrived very quickly. We will buy again.

I have no idea what everyone is talking about when they say that these are poor quality. They appear to be the same exact keds that you would buy in any store. I'm not sure if the other reviewers received a different shoe, or just aren't familiar with ked's. Also, the sizes are the same as normal ked's. I regret listening to the reviewers who said that they run small. I ordered a half a size up from what I normally wear, and they're too loose. I'll keep them anyway because they're so inexpensive, but I wish I hadn't listened. Probably unrelated, but I ordered these on friday at 8pm and chose one day shipping and they arrived saturday morning at 9:48. Excellent shipping.

I ordered these for my granddaughter's birthday. They were shippped promptly, and I was able to track them very efficiently. They were exactly what we wanted!!! They are very attractive and wear well.
My first time wearing them I thought I need a wider pair but then the second time was better and so forth, I truly enjoy my shoes. They come a half size bigger, remember that when ordering : )

The shoe looks nice and is very comfortable. I thought it would be a little dressier, so that is why I don't give it 5 stars. I don't have any real complaints about the show. It's a solid black shoe that does well in most situations other than situations where you really need a more formal shoe.
Bought these for Christmas for my 13 year old daughter and they were a huge hit.

Justin Ropers are the most comfortable boots there are out there. I wear Justin's everyday to ride in, weekends to show in, and also to just go out. You will not find a more comfortable and sharp looking combination and the affordable price of a Justin.

I usually only rock Nike but I had a brief affair with Pony. These are almost exactly like Nike Air Force One for the budget minded people. I compared the 2 and they were almost identical. All I really have to say about these.
love my boots they got here a day before time! im very pleased. everywhere else wanted 98 dollars for them but i got them for 48 dollars here! im super stoked
The boots I received for child, were high quality and were delivered very quickly. This was my second order from this company and I am pleased with their service.

I bought these shoes for my boyfriend for Christmas. He usually is between a 11 and 11.5 in Sperrys, so listening to the other reviews, I got him a 10.5 in these. They fit well! I ordered the dark brown (not the dark brown lariat) and they still ended up looking a little more red in color than I had imagined. Also, I'm not a huge fan of the way the sole looks; it isn't exactly as pictured and looks a little cheaper. He seems to like the shoes though, says they are comfortable too. Will update if there are any issues with them in the future.

These shoes have been great for work, but they only lasted about 6 months. Granted, I do work in a laboratory dealing with coal, limestone, and various other matrices, but I would think the soles of a good shoe would last longer than these have. With that being said, the shoes are comfortable and are definitely stain-resistant. I've spilled or dripped many different acids and caustics on them over the past 6 months and they've held up well (except for the soles, of course). These are good work shoes if you don't mind replacing them every 6 months.

This is a nice looking shoe, well made and good price. But I had to return them because the medium width was too narrow for my usual size B. A wide width probably would have worked, but was not available. Too bad, because I liked the style and construction, and basic oxfords for women are hard to find these days. I usually buy Timberland oxfords, and wear a 7 B, but they have no oxford styles for women at the present.

Super light, Amazing grip, and just AWESOME! I wear these shoes whenever I go trail running. I have some gnarly hills behind my house and these shoes give great grip when I'm sprinting up those long steep dirt hills. I absolutely love 'em! And I'd buy more pairs when/if mine dies out on me. Still going strong.

OMG these are the best boots i have ever bought!! they are so warm and comfortable .. i cant explain in words how fantastic they are!! I only wish that i jumped on the "ugg"ly boot bandwagon last year!! I got the Chocolate, mainly because i know that the sand can stain easier and i personally prefer darker shoes. I am so happy with my purchase i think i might be getting some family members a pair for the holiday! i do agree to order one size smaller, i was hesitant, because i have large feet (10) but the 9 fits like a glove.you will not regret this purchase!!

I hike several days a week all year in rough mountain terrain, much of it off-trail and over rocks. I've gone through several pairs of these Hi-Tec Altitude boots over the years. The factory supplied insoles are comfortable initially, but are made of a compressible closed cell foam that eventually does not rebound from compression well after some months of use. When the foam becomes compressed, the padded effect is lost and my feet begin to hurt. This can be solved by purchasing and installing an aftermarket pair of insoles such as the Sole Softec Ultra foodbeds, or another quality insole.This problem is not exclusive to Hi-Tec, as I've seen it with other boots and running shoes also. Some aftermarket insoles/footbeds are made of resilient material that does not tend to stay compressed with heavy use. I am not sure why the manufacturers of boots and shoes don't just use suitable footbeds in the first place, but I assume that they save a little money by doing what they do.Aside from the poor insoles, the boots themselves are comfortable, keep my feet warm in fairly cold weather even though they are not insulated, and the soles provide good traction.

My eight year old received these for Christmas and wears them constantly. They are durable, comfortable and look great! I did order them in his actual size and found them to be roomy, but with a heavy sock it's fine. He absolutely adores them!
I have only had these shoes for a short time and maybem they need to br broke in a little, but the arch area is a little uncomfortable.

lasted through 4 years of high school wrestling and I've got no complaints. They're still in one piece which is more than I can say for the 2 backpacks I went through. Can't ask for anything more than that.

**If you've never tried these on and want to order them online, I usually wear a 11.5 but I wear these in a 10.5**Just a few words for this purchase. The shoes look great and break in really well. They go good with just about any type of pants in any color (except the exact color of the shoe). If you're going to buy them online use the Amazon 20% off shoe coupon and you can get them for around 61 dollars.That's all!

Wore heal down in 3 months. Small Little Left Toe wont go into shoe or stay there if forced. Tore my little toenail back attempting to wear. I love Teva but wont buy another pair of these.

This shoe holds up well under my 210 pound frame. The shoe also supports my orthotics well and fits perfectly (I am actually about a size 12 1/2). I still think this is the best heavy duty shoe for the money.

As most of the other reviews state, these are nice boots - both in looks and quality - for the price. I compared these boots directly with the more expensive Timberland White Ledge boots. I was disappointed with the Timberlands' cheap materials and construction. The Hi-Tec boots are clearly superior.However, if you have wide feet and order the wide model, know that you will not receive true wide (i.e. EE or W sizes) boots. Unlike the properly wide Timberlands, the wide version of the Hi-Tec boots are only slightly wider than a medium width set of shoes.The only other complaint I have for these boots is that they lack loops on the back to help slip them on/off.As for sizing, I find these boots comparable with Nike's sizing or 1/2 size bigger than New Balance or Timberland, e.g. Hi-Tec boots sized 9.5 are about 9.5 Nike, 9 New Balance, or 9 Timberland.If you need properly wide boots, I recommend Merrell as they accommodate wide feet very well.

I bought these shoes over the summer to replace my NewBalance shoes. I figured the build quality would be similar and was just looking to save $20 or $30. Unfortunately, these shoes were a bit of a disappointment. I had them for about a week and the toe part of the shoe somehow tore. Then, about 2 weeks later, the heel part of the shoe came apart. I've only had these shoes for about 3 months and they're already completely work out. Next time I'll spend the extra money to get a pair of NewBalance shoes. I'd suggest you do the same.

The fit of these is not bad, I have no complaints - otherwise I wouldn't have bought them in the first place.However, the reason why I decided to go out of my way to rate these is because I believe the materials used in these shoes are susceptible to and promote shoe odor. Now, you say..."that's a matter of opinion and for all I know, your feet just stank!" Two things: 1) I tend to be obsessive about hygiene. 2) I have a number of dress shoes of other brands that have seen a lot more usage than these, and have NOT this problem.I bought these no more than a month ago, and the best way to describe this odor is a strong "new shoe smell," which escapes the shoe, even if you're wearing them! Sitting at a desk I can smell it, and it drives me quite simply nuts. I suspect that these shoes are awful breathers...as the feet do get noticeably more hot and sweaty, reacting with the materials (upper portion of the inside, I believe), giving the end result.Curious to know if there's anyone else with this issue.The only reason I wouldn't rate these a one is because they do look good and fit well. But the odor is a deal breaker. Using some Odor Eater insoles at the moment. Will report back later with the findings.

I use this shoe for training and for racing, for long runs and for interval workouts. My weekly mileage is in the 30-38 mile range, and the Green Silence is a nice, light ride. I believe the weight is advertised as 8.3 ounces, and without getting out my wife's food scale, I'd say that's a pretty accurate estimate. My sense is that there's a limit to the number of miles I'd take this shoe. The cushioning is limited, but the overall feel is pleasantly surprising. Short distances feel really smooth; longer distances slightly less so, compared to traditional trainers. The payoff, though, is the lightweight feel and speed--the exact qualities I want in a shoe when I'm looking to do faster training.
