My Reebok Mid cut Hightop sneakers are very comfortable and lightweight. I love wearing them because I have weak ankles and being mid cut they give my ankles the support I need. I would recomend these sneakers to anyone who has weak ankles.Thank YouCherokee Indian

Clarks used to be exclusively made in Britain or Ireland. Most Clarks sold in the US nowadays are made in China. The Parthenon is Chinese made, but so far as I can tell, the quality is as high as any Clarks made elsewhere. The British-made Clarks used the European scale and a size 8 on the European scale is almost like a size 8.5 to size 9 on the American scale. These Parthenons run true to the American scale and come in only medium width.I've worn these Clarks Parthenon boots almost everyday for four to five months. I can unabashedly say these are the most comfortable footwear I've ever worn. The shape of the footbed fit my feet like a custom fit. I am kind of a heel striker when I walk and these shoes have eliminated the heel and ankle pain I used to experience when walking on concrete pavement for more than 10 minutes. The polyurethane outer sole is very durable compared to those cheap Walmart or Kmart shoes. In fact the polyurethane outer soles seem to be more durable than the Vibram soles on my expensive hiking boots! The full grain leather upper is supple and does not require break-in. It isn't all that waterproof even when copiously coated with a waterproofing wax polish. I think the water comes in through the stitchings. On rainy days I usually have to wear something else.The brown style is dressy enough that they work equally well with my formal suits as with my khakis and blue jeans, but somehow the black style doesn't look good on me, especially not when I'm wearing suits. I can't explain why but the brown style just looks much better all around. The only real downside with these boots is that, since they are only half-high, my wool slacks almost invariably ride up and get caught at the top of the boots whenever I sit down and then get up. This always requires me to use my hands to fix. For this reason, I sometimes wish they were either just plain shoes or full-height boots and not half-height boots. The plus side is that half-height boots breathe much better and feel much less clammy than full-height boots. All in all, I am willing to put up with this inconvenience for the unparalleled comfort that these boots have offered my tender feet.I have since ordered 4 more pairs, two in black and two in brown just in case Clarks discontinues this model. I just couldn't resist the massively discounted prices from $40 to $60 a pair when Amazon ran those special promotions. Boots that fit my feet this well are hard to come by at any price.

I bought these for my son who will wear them rain, shine, or snow. He likes steel toes (the steel covers his toes more completely and the soles have better traction than the Dunham work shoes he had previously) and he doesn't mind that they are heavier than some shoes because they protect his feet so much better. The shoes are well built and give good support. This will be the only pair of shoes he plans to wear for the next year and they look like they'll last that long. It took a bit to break them in, but for a work/general purpose shoe it wasn't a lot of time. If you want light weight shoes these are not them. If you want something that will protect your feet better than the average athletic shoe on the otherhand....

THese sandals met all my expectations. I purchased these for my mother-in-law who had worn out this exact style of shoe. She had not been able to find them in a store and was thrilled to have them replaced.

I think Chuck's look cool, which is why I bought these, but I had no idea they were so uncomfortable. If you can deal with a shoe that has almost no cushion and no arch, then by all means get them (I still wear them every once in a while). But if comfort is a big thing to you, I would look elsewhere.
Just what i was looking for. the product is in perfect condtion.i have been looking for these shoes for WEEKS and no one had my size.im really happy with my purchase

These are well-made, nice looking casual shoes. I've had them about 2 months now and they're holding up great. I work in the office and wear these about 3-4 days a week. My biggest complaint is that there is no cushioning in the shoes. The insole is very thin. After 1 week I bought Dr. Scholl's gel insoles just so these would feel comfortable. I wear these for about 9-10 hours per day so comfort is very important to me. The shoes are slightly longer than other shoes I've purchased, but I've been told that Clarks tend to run long. The soles don't have much tread, so I wonder what they'll be like on snowy and icy sidewalks this winter.

Shoes arrived in original box; pristine condition; exactly what I ordered.HOwever, we ordered the wrong size. Return was handled well; account to be credited for purchase price only. No shoes in stock in the size we needed, and it would be spring before any more arrived. When you see your size, order it ASAP.
The size fits perfectly, the color is exactly like the picture, and above all it's super super cute.Makes me want to purchase another color!
Acquired as a gift for my son, who is an accomplished soccer player, and he uses them all the time. Great gift.

I am not sure why, but these particular shoes are getting rather difficult to find in retail stores in our area. I am on my feet a lot at work and do a lot of walking. For the price, these are probably the most comfortable and long lasting shoe I have ever worn. I have several pair of them because when I do find them, I buy two pair at a time.I must admit to being rather rough on shoes but these things hold up just as well as shoes that I have paid four and five times more for.These shoes give you plenty of toes room and the cushioning is wonderful. I tend to land rather hard on my heels when I walk and the cushion in these shoes is perfect.Of course as the shoes become a bit worn for the work place, they go into my outdoor walking and scrounging around shoe pile; they work wonderfully for that purpose also. The sole is quite even and stable which helps prevent ankle strain or sprain when moving over rough ground. I have one old pair; really, really old and beat-up, which I use for my creek wading. Of course it does take awhile to wear a pair of these out and they clean up quite well using only a damp cloth and a brushing now and then.For the price it is really rather difficult to beat these things.Don BlankenshipThe Ozarks

Bought two pair of the shoes, alternating them for work. I love them. The black ones are sharp and both are very comfortable and convient to slip on and rush out the door if I have to. I suffer from pain in my achilles heel and the slip on design has certainly relieved this discomfort. The price was great and there was very little wait time for either pair.

The cord to tie is very useful and they are also waterproof!The only con is that it is really easy to get sand and pebbles depending on where you are and removing them is not that easy.

Since Rockport introduced the Men's ProWalker, I have purchased at least a dozen pairs. They are the most comfortable leisure shoe I have worn. They are durable and have a long life for everyday wearing. In today's economy, one can be sure of getting his money's worth in value.

I've had these for about 2 years now and I love them. Sperry's are comfy and go with everything. I wear them most everyday and I don't even think about it. I had the classic sahara color for a long time and decided to go a little more riske. Well this color is nearly as traditional and the contrast sole is a great look. They match with everything, and arguably with more than my sahara sperry's that look a little too similar to khaki color pants. Love them

Bought as a gift for father who actually requested another pair of Hi-Tec boots for Christmas but after reading reviews regarding foot and ankle support selected the Altitude IV instead. Size fit great, color was dark chocolate and best of all was delivery... bought last minute before Christmas and was delivered to my house on Christmas Eve! Highly recommend for mountain hiking via my dad's comments.

After reading all the size discrepancy I was nervous about what size to get. I finally measured her foot with amazon's kids foot size measuring print out. According to that she was a size 11, 11.5, although her shoes she wears to school every day are size 10 and still are roomy! So I ordered 11's and they fit perfectly. I could have gone to 11.5 to have growing room, but the 11's are great and I didn't want to deal with the hassle, we'll just know to go a tad bigger next time. And, she loves the flowers on the inside, she mentions them every time she talks to people about taking ballet: "And my shoes have FLOWERS inside them!" So cute.

I am a highschool junior, who didn't start seriously running until track season of last year. I have a wide foot with low arches, and some amount of overpronation. I tried several pairs of Asics and Nikes last spring and over the summer, yet my knees were always sore, I was having ankle injuries, shin splints, etc. Finally, come XC season this year, one of the salesmen at a local shoe store told me I "had to try" these shoes. They were perfect. The shoes are supportive without being restrictive, and they corrected my overpronation without feeling unnatural (which was my complaint with one pair of Nikes I had.) These shoes have held up well. I've ran on average a little over 40 miles per week from the beginning of August until the middle of November and continued to run a little less than that for these past two weeks, and the shoes have held up very well. They feel as if they could very easily hold up another running season, though I've just ordered another pair of the same shoes to replace them.The shoes are supportive, yet non-restrictive and also light weight. The only complaint I have about them is that they seem to retain odor more than most running shoes. If you have feet that start to smell really bad (like mine) plan on using shoe deodorant.This is an excellent shoe for those with low arches, especially, but not only, those who require a wide toe box.

first of all, i am a big soccer fan and i have been playing the sport for more than 12 years, i play at least 3 times a week so i have tried aloooooooooooot of shoes,dont bother by the nike crab ( except for the talaria model for its light weight 7 lb ! ) ... this addidas shoe is really great, gives you great grib on the ball thanks to the leather exterior and curivng of the side. when you try it you might find it heavy so give it time (two games max) and you will see . great heel support and for the fashon lovers its nice looking.
These are classic Converse shoes. They arrived quickly. The fit was true to size and they look great with our school uniform.

I wear these shoes everyday and I am on my feet most of the day. I have tried different shoes and I always come back to these. They last me about 5-6 months. Once the insole support is gone, I have to get a new pair. Aftermarket inserts don't work. It would be nice if they had a little more ventilation as they get hot when the weather is warmer. Good traction on ice and snow.
Nice-looking shoe, but too expensive. For big foot guys like me, makes your feet look a lot smaller.

THESE ARE NICE AND SPACIOUS BOOTS AND THE BURGANDY IS A HARD COLOR TO FIND BUT MY GOD THEY COME WITH NO INTERIOR CUSHIONING SO BEWARE.....IT TOOK 2 SETS OF INNER CUSHIONS TO RENDER THESE WEARABLE. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE COLOR THEY WOULD HAVE GONE RIGHT BACK.THEY ARE DRESSY ENOUGH FOR WORK ON IN CLEMENT DAYS BUT THAT HARD FOOT BASE ALMOST GOT THESE A 1 STAR RATING.

lighter and more breathable than anything i've worn before (great for hot summer days) - so comfortable, it's hard not to wear them around casually - i hope they hold up for awhile, but i'm ready to buy a new pair when these wear out - definitely buy .5-1 size bigger as recommended

Wow, my first review. Naturally, I would review the T-Macs first, but I just love the Reebok Amaze classics. I got the baby blue and white. If you cool ghetto and urban, defintely it's a pick up. Comfortable, stylish, good ankle support, and lasts for a long time. I just keep buying more of it.
I love these shoes. They're great for walking all day, and I like the fact that the straps are adjustable in three different areas. And they're so cute!
I purchased these shoes a half size larger than I normally wear and found them still very tight. Toe area is quite narrow. Otherwise, well made and good height for dancing.
Received when they said it would be here... was exactly what they said it would be... and I am totally happy with it...

I've gone through three pairs of these shoes in the last decade. Yes! Ten years! I'm about to turn 29 years old and got my first pair at the end of high-school from a friend. The second pair is still with me and has worn all the way through the sole but they are still comfortable and very wearable. IMHO there isn't a better casual styled shoe out there in terms of comfort, retro style and look.I will admit that I have fairly flat feet, and the slight lack of support might be part of what makes these a little more comfortable for me.In my opinion, for fifty bucks or less depending on where you buy them, getting three to four years out of a pair of shoes is simply awesome. And I don't own a bunch of shoes I wear these every day!
These are one of the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever worn. They fit perfectly. Could walk around with these all day.

I now have several pairs of Bonnie Lite Oxford Shoes - because when I find a shoe that is comfortableand in wide width, I purchase several at a time. I have black and brown. They are just right forwalking in big department stores and malls, as well as in my neighborhood. Comfort is importantto me, but also support and "looks." These shoes fill the bill for me. I hope to purchase navy andred when they are available!

Paid prioty post for this as had no choice . It cost $50. Double the price of the shoes. The shoes above I paid for the slower postage. It cost $19 for the three pairs. Was told they would arrive in about 3 weeks. The boots in 3 to 4 days. The boots arrived as said and three other pairs arrived the very Next Day!!!!! Felt totally ripped off in regards to the boots!!!!!'

This loafer was a good buy for the price. However, it was a little narrow & not as comfortable as I had anticipated. I was really looking for a "slipper" type comfort. Soft leather with a grip sole was what I thought I would receive. I did not find that comfort in this shoe but all in all it was a good price.

I have been wearing Justin boots for over 8 years now and they are by far the best boots I have ever owned. Every few years I get the idea that this other brand of boots that cost a little less will work just as good but after a couple weeks of wearing them I am back in my Justins again. I would recomend these boots for anyone that wants a boot that looks good, last a long time, and will be comfortable dad after dad.

I waterproofed this boot with some snowax, and use it for all sorts of weather conditions and I never have had a leak or wetness inside of any kind.The boot keeps me warm in as low as 30 deg weather, rain or shine. It's hard for me to get on, since my instep is pretty large compared to the boot opening.But that's ok.Durability seems quite good.... I don't see any signs of failure like I have seen in some reviews. They seem quite solid and on track to last for 10 years plus.

Bought this boot for my daughter at Christimas. She loves the boot and style but it runs small.Very disappointed because I ordered a size 9 which is her true size and it's too tight. They don't come in half sizes and the size 10 will be too big.

And as you wonder, what exactly is this "shizzysweet" that she speaks of, I will enumerate the qualities of the Comptons and you will understand. The body of the compton is made with a killer fabric, the orange is my favourite though I own both colors, that is thick and would take serious wear to do any kind of noticeable damage to them. The soles, and soul, are pretty substantial. Knowing lots of people who dig writing slogans and other assorted B.S. around the sole, the substantial sole gives space for soul. They're also good for those of us who are shoe-lacingly challenged (or time challenged) and just put the shoes on with the laces tied behind the tongue. You can slide them on like this without your feet sloshing all around in shoe and you falling over in front of your co-workers, looking like a dumb---er, okay, I'm getting off on a tangent. Whether you're a Ben Sherman sycophant or you've never heard of this Sherman guy before you will love these shoes and understand the "shizzysweet" label slapped on them.

These are very nice shoes, but the site showed them available in a triplewide but what was shipped was a double wide. So, they were too small for my mother-in-law to wear. This was real frustrating because she has such a hard time finding shoes that fit and my husband spent quite a bit of time shopping on the internet. They were sure they had found an answer when they ordered these sandals. We got our refund (minus shipping) and that's all good, but we wish the shoes had been what they were represented to be in the beginning!
Love these Sketchers shoes. They look and feel great. I have big feet and they do a great job of camouflaging them. They run true to size and are very comfortable.

These were a great buy, I had tried several different shoes and these were the best fit. I have slightly wider feet and the curved top of shoe is better for my toes than any other. They may be expensive but are more likely to fit the best!

These boots are both comfortable and provide good ankle support. Unlike some boots with toe protection, the toes are not cramped by the toe cap. Side zip allows the wearer to put the boots on quickly, while laces permit adjustment when needed. Good looking boot, and with pants-over can be worn to town. Very lightweight, but appears to be solid Converse quality

I am sure they are great on real grass with the right size. One thing I noted is that they are bigger than what the guide says. I am a 10.5 regularly but they feel like a 11 or 11.5! In addition to that, I got the worse shin splints and hip pain playing on turf and sun backed grass! Unimaginable pain. However, I will give it the benefit of the doubt and blame it on the playing surface.Conclusion: Get these one size smaller, and use them on firm natural grass fields.

Was looking for a good shoe for Formal Wear. Found them at a local Mens Clothing store. Decided to go on line and shop around. The exact same Shoe but for 15% less and free shipping. Total overall savings was 25%.I am very pleased.
I am pleased with this shoe...however it isnot leather and I'm sure it was advertisedas such.Thanks,GW

I gave these a five star based on price and performance. I purchased these boots for about 50% off at 50 dollars. They have served well in the snow- waterproof and warm. I probably would have liked the black color more if it was available. As a workboot, the only things lacking are a steel toe and an oil resistant sole. Overall a great shoe.

We live in the country where my daughter runs, climbs everywhere and gets into everything. I bought these sandals for last summer (2009) for my 6 year old daughter. It almost met all my standards for a good shoe; 1) Sturdy, 2) Easy to clean (ran them under the faucet and scrubbed them clean), 3) Able to run in them, 4) Easy to put on, 5) Still looks great! After having worn them a whole summer, my daughter will be able to hand these down to her sister! Now that's value. The only minor annoyance was that the toe part of the sandal wore by mid-summer last year, but you can't really tell since the color is the same throughout. Perhaps my daughter drags her feet?

I purchased these shoes because they were highly rated on Consumers Reports. I needed comfortable shoes for walking many hours at work. They felt good for about two weeks. The cushioning just didn't seem to provide comfort over a long period of time. The cushion inserts are very thin, like most other shoes. I had to purchase good over-the-counter (OTC) cushion inserts to provide the cushioning and support I need.My podiatrist examined the shoes and said they were good, but lacked the correct cushioning and support for me. I also purchased some custom-made inserts, designed for my feet, and I'm still breaking them in gradually.I don't like the all leather tops and side. They get too hot in the summer heat. I purchased two other pairs of shoes (Nike Running Shoes)to rotate through my wearing cycle. The inserts in the Nike's aren't any better, so I just move my OTC or custom inserts to whichever shoes I plan to where that day and everything seems to work out great! Lasting comfort seems to come from a good quality cushion insert that does not come with the shoe.My recommendation for anyone needing a good pair of walking shoes, is to purchase a good quality shoe then spend more money on cushioning inserts OTC or custom made for your feet.

This shoe was purchased for my wife. We go to 4-21 days long trekking trips in Turkey (Lycian Way, Aladag, Kackar) as well as frequent non-technical high altitude mountaineering (Mt Ararat, Himalayas-Nepal treks). After sensitive search my wife has selected this shoe to fit her needs better than other models/makes for our non-winter trekking/Non-thech backpacking activities. Few of our friends have been using the same shoe for similar purpose in our Club and have recommended us. So far , product performs well, especially for harsh ground/scree condition. It is very lightweight and robust. Good value.

The boots are comfortable and easy to wear. Are not heavy, which was the main reason I was looking to replace my other pair. The boots are durable and appropriate for the snowy winter in Boston. Water does not penetrate them at the bottom. Nice buy!
These sneakers are OK....don't know if these are original or knock offs...fit is not the same as the Keds I remember!

These boots replaced a pair that had finally worn out after over 10 years of frequent wear. I was expecting and dreading an uncomfortable break-in period. To my surprise and immense joy, these boots -- size 9.5D -- slipped on easily and fit comfortably from the very first wearing. NB: I wear them with insoles and they fit snugly but are not tight.The soles of the boots provide sufficient and safe grip/traction on slippery surfaces but still slide well enough for dancing. They also take and hold a shine extremely well.I've had several occasions to wear them in rainy weather and my feet stay completely dry even after wading through shallow puddles.I wasn't happy with the tags on the exterior. They are easily removed.All in all, these boots are a great value. I wear them almost every day and highly recommend them to anyone wanting a comfortable, dressier style of cowboy boot.

I bought these boots in 2007 and in the first week of wearing them I hiked over 50 miles in the Sonoran desert and I think I got 1 hotspot on a heel that first week. They are undoubtedly the best boot I've ever had. My feet are small, with a narrow heel and ankle, and high arch, and these boots are narrow and fit my feet perfectly. They also have a hard-shank sole which I need for my high arches, and my feet never get tired in these boots because of that. My pair are actually coming apart on the seems near the toes and they rubbed too much around the ankle, but I was told that is untypical of the shoe and REI is refunding my entire purchase. And I'm buying them again!
I bought these shoes for my daughter and she loves them. They were a very good price and I will probably buy more.

I bought the blue hippos for my year old son who was starting to walk all over the place. the slippers fit ok, and though a bit chunky they were light enough for him. the reason that i gave these only three stars it that the toes on these are easily worn and after the second time they looked beat up.
Great shoes for bouldering. Have not tried them out on real rock yet but I am happy with them. Five Ten recently came out with some new shoes so I am thinking I will go for those next.

I was hesitant to order shoes for our son online, but he is a size 13 shoe, and this was the only place I could find with his shoe size and style. We were/are very happy with the shoes!!! He wore them over the Christmas break and liked them. He brought them back to college. Thank you!!
Great product. Fit very well. True to size. No break-in period needed due to soft leather and quality product.

I love this pair.These shoes are fabulous! I had them all summer.They sexy and easy to walk and what a charm shoe!!!And I bet more summers to come.Very comfy.As always A+++++ for Donald J Pliner !Fantastic buy!!Great price on amazon.You could not find better deal.
Not much to say. These are great! I love the hemp as they absorb moisture and don't get as sweaty on hot days. This is my second pair of the EXACT same shoes.
Very pleased w/ this shoe brush. It is sturdy, works well to remove mud, and is attractive because it's compact in size. Would highly recommend it!

i found this pair very stiff and heavy compared to my one other pair of rockport. adding to my review,after wearing these shoes for 6 weeks and walking about 4 miles a day, both in these and a pair of mephisto shoes, i am very disappointed in this model of rockport. still stiff , didn't breathe, and gave me blisters.i would give these 2 stars at most. still like my other rockports though.
Quick delivery and item was just as described. These are pretty hard to find so I was very happy to get these for my husband
As the title has said, this product looks nice but it's not comfortable at all. I had feet pain and back pain from these shoes. They're in the trash now.

I ordered a pair of Rainbow Sandals a week before Christmas for my son as a gift. I wasn't sure if they would arrive in time and I was so happy when the sandals arrived a couple of days before Christmas!

I must be one of the few people who didn't own crocs. I thought they were ugly and no "plastic" shoe could possibly be comfortable. Boy, was I wrong (at least about the comfort!). I was complaining because standing in the kitchen preparing dinner was taking a toll on my back. My husband suggested trying his crocs. Even 2 sizes too big, they worked great. So I ordered some in my favorite color. I am so glad I did. No more back problems. I wear them around the house instead of slippers because crocs have more support. They do have cuter styles, and I don't know if they all offer the same support, but I will stick with my bright purple crocs.

Los zapatos son de muy buena calidad. Me quedaron un poco grande, pero no hubo problemas. Me agradaron... me cobraron 116mil por el envio a venezuela :-s ..ya saben q traer zapatos no vale mucho la pena, pero en general los zapatos son bien bonitos....

These shoes(2 pair) arrived quickly and were very attractive. When I tried them on, the fit was wonderfully comfortable. They look great and will be a good shoe to wear during the warm months. They are dressy enough for almost any occasion. They also look nice with carpis or crop pants. I highly recommend these shoes.

I GOT THESE SHOES FOR X MASS 06 THEY LASTED FOR A GOOD 2 1/2 YEARS BEFORE THE OUTER SIDE STARTED TO RIP. I WAS ABLE TO PLAY ABOUT 2O GAMES IN THEM BEFORE THE SOLE STARTED TO RIP Oh AND I USED THEM FOR PRACTICE AS WELL.

THESE ARE NICE AND SPACIOUS BOOTS AND THE BURGANDY IS A HARD COLOR TO FIND BUT MY GOD THEY COME WITH NO INTERIOR CUSHIONING SO BEWARE.....IT TOOK 2 SETS OF INNER CUSHIONS TO RENDER THESE WEARABLE. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE COLOR THEY WOULD HAVE GONE RIGHT BACK.THEY ARE DRESSY ENOUGH FOR WORK ON IN CLEMENT DAYS BUT THAT HARD FOOT BASE ALMOST GOT THESE A 1 STAR RATING.
I was so excited when they arrived but I used them for a month and they came apart verry poor quality.

These are nice slippers, I like them, but they're not what I was expecting. The size runs a bit short and narrow--not a lot, but not true to size. The thickness of the shoe liner between the pile and the rubber sole is a little thin. Sometimes I actually feel a ridge of the waffle shape inside the rubber sole poking into the bottom of my foot through the lining of the moccasin. The synthetic pile makes my feet sweat and then they feel cold. Guess I should have bought the moccasins that are true, breathable sheepskin. The materials seem to be of good quality, and I like the leather ties. The ties are actually threaded through the collar of the shoe so that you can tighten or loosen the fit. Yes, I will buy again, but I will go with the soft-sole, sheepskin moccasin one size larger.
My son needed these for wrestling and is very happy with them. He says they are comfortable and also look good. I would recommend them to anyone.

I used to be a sneaker salesman, and this is one of the more comfortable causal sneakers out there. I had a few pairs that lasted many years before having to buy a new pair. Also tends to look better as it gets a little dirtier... if that makes any sense.

My son is on pair four. He loves the comfort of this shoe. Oddly enough he needs a shoe horn to put them on but once on they are like a comfy glove. Sadly it looks like they are phasing out and the black and white ones are rare to find which are the only ones he'll wear.
THESE SHOES MAYBE DONT HELP MY SON JUMP HIGHER, BUT THEY ARE MADE REALLY WELL AND STURDIER THAN MOST

I bought these for my 2 year old little boy. The boots look great and are well made but they are REALLY difficult to get on,even with the laces completely removed. After about a dozen wearings they break in and start to go on easier, but if you are buying these for a baby or toddler, be prepared to spend an extra ten minutes putting these on your little guy for the first few weeks!

Found them....loved them....ordering was easy....shipping was speedy. The boots are just as described and I wear them all the time. I love the 'bomber jacket' leather. Makes them just different enough from most other Uggs but you still get the amazing comfort and style that's becoming classic. No complaints here.

Going shopping to buy shoes for my 96 year old Mom is difficult to impossible. I was able to go online since I had the brand and shoe size. I compared prices on several sites and Amazon offered the best. The shoes arrived quickly and they were exactly what I wanted. Mom is wearing her new shoes and the entire transaction was soo.. easy for me. Thanks, SFSoftspots Women's Annie Hi Oxford

I just moved to NYC, and after our first blizzard, I realized I needed snow boots. I browsed, read the reviews, and decided on these boots. This was one of the best decisions of my life! These boots are warm! I can step in any puddle, in any snow embankment, and even walk across an inch of ice. I highly recommend them!
This is a great boot at the sale price. It's really comfortable and easy to slip on and off. Looks great with jeans. Kinda UGG looking but way less expensive.

Dada's are some of the best basketball shoes i have ever had. The only bad thing i have found is the price difference between youth and large. $20.00 more for a bigger size is rediculous, but other than that they are really cool shoes especially how you can personalize them with your teams colors and your team name, your name, and your number. Some of the reasons they are really good shoes are because they are comfortable, have good traction, and just look good.

These shoes fit well, are comfortable but do not last a real long time since like many other brands the knobs on the tread of the shoe are hollow and as they wear down a hole developes and when walking in snow or water puddles your feet get wet from water coming in through the sole of the shoe. But at this low price I just replace them when the soles get a little worn.
The slippers were just what my husband needed. The price was very reasonable too. The service was flawless.
these are the best boat shoes so well made, even wet, non slip on deck or dock I have several pairs, and these have more support in sole and arch, good price too.

I ordered my boots because they sounded great. I am not disappointed,they are great right out of the box.Fit well except the tongue is very short and could fit better around the ankle more. My order was delayed because of the snow but i am happy to finally be wearing them. Thank you very much for selling these fine and affordable boots. P.S I will spread the word to all the people i know who want happy feet. signed Mark Berglund
This style of Keds are cute enough to wear with summer dresses and maxi skirts. They provide more arch support than ballet flats and are good for lots of walking.
It's soft, and it lasts. I bought my over 2 yrs ago. My company pays for boots once a year and they last much longer than that. Great value.
These are fantastic! Great fit and wonderful to wear. I plan on buying more in all colors later. It is very hard to find shoes that fit me but these fit amazingly.

These are the most comfortable shoes I've had in a very long while, and they fit like a glove! I haven't owned a pair of converse in well over 3 years, and I'm so happy I decided to buy a new pair. Will definitely keep buying from all-star for a long time to come.

The best footgear ever invented! You can hike, walk effortlessly on sand, run, bike, you name it, and your feet will feel like they're being massaged gently the whole time! Looks-wise, they are not the sexiest shoe that will ever grace your feet, but if you're not expected to dress to the nines, these will fit the bill. I wore my crocs everyday to work this past summer and my feet have never been happier. You'd think with such constant wear and the grime and slime of summer heat the crocs would smell funkadelic, but oh no! They were stink-free, even though my bare feet rubbed and sweated all over them, everyday, for 3 months!Don't waste your precious wads of cash on $100+ sneaks when you can easily buy 3 pairs of these feet-friendly shoe sandals. Your dogs will never be tired again!

I had my first pair of Converse All-stars in high school in the early 1960's. That was before they were known as "Chucks." They were, and still are, the best basketball sneakers around. They're good for everyday workouts and just hanging around the house. Comfortable, inexpensive and they last just about forever.

No question, this is the best, most comfortable sandal you will ever own. My first Reef Smoothy pair lasted 10 years! I just bought a new pair and absolutely them them.I prefer the regular Smoothy over the Contour Smoothy. The Contour is still a nice sandal, but the pre-built "natural" contour already in the sandal may or may not be right for your foot. I like them, but there is not as much opportunity to individualize the sandal to YOUR specific foot. The regular Smoothy is a full flat surface, almost like a blank canvas. After only a couple of days of wearing the sandal, it is already shaping to my foot. After about a week, it is perfect, specific to the contours of MY foot.Both Smoothy sandals are great. But if you have a choice, stick with the original.
It is true that they come larger than the regular size. They are comfortable casual shoes but would recommend them for long walks, they give me blisters.
Not as comfortable as the world walking classic shoe . i would recommend the latter although the pro walker is less money
Nice-looking shoe, but too expensive. For big foot guys like me, makes your feet look a lot smaller.
Good and quick. Love the shoes although it was a bit confusing whether it was hi top or not as it showed up differently on my order form. But it was hi-tops and I'm happy :-)

The Melissa shoe gives a perfect look to any outfit. The texture and the unusual varieties of colors this product gives can make any outfit seem like the best. The way the shoes shapes the foot and brings out your natural texture as well as the shoes color is awesome. No wonder this product is so popular among all teenage girls today. Melissa's are a great shoe, it brings out the best in you and whatever you may wear.
Love the color of these boots. They are exceptionally comfortable! They put some fun into your step....not to mention your wardrobe! Definitely a must-have!
Great product. More comfortable than they used to be and they seem to be very well made. I recommend this product
The shoes were not clearly identified as narrow width. they were way too tight. I gave them to a friend.

It took me awhile to get over the ugliness of them but once I put them on, I couldn't take them off! They are actually more comfortable than bare feet!!I think they look great with jeans. I know have 3 pairs!!! A must buy!
Great looking shoe that can be dressed up or down. True to size and great dancing shoes with the leather soles.
6 N is a hard to find shoe size. This white sandal was perfect in every way. It's exactly what I was looking for !!

I wear a men's 12 normally. Per the other product reviews I ordered these a half size larger at 12.5. Even with the extra size they are very snug. After 3 days all day wear though they haven't caused any blisters and the inner support feels great. My only other gripe is not readily apparent in the product photos. The tongue on this shoe is very long and comes up to the front of the ankle. I don't think it would be comfortable with crew or no show socks. Worn with long socks it hasn't been a major issue. The shoes look great and appear to be well constructed. Time will tell how they hold up.
Receiver??? You are denied!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Adidas plus talented corner back equals devistating defense and victory against any offense!! Adidas is Victory!!

Bought a pair with the same UPC from a sports chain locally, so I got the right size. Mine were made in Mexico. Will use them primarily to wash my cars and work in the backyard. I don't know how long the strap will last. But it is in place so far, so I shouldn't complain yet. The front holes are positioned odd. The "index" finger is sticking out and unprotected. Why not skip this one hole or use a different pattern? Besides that, the crocs feel comfortable. They don't seem to mark floors and decks, which was my requirement. I guess they will do.

I purchased these hiking boots for a month-long trip to China which was going to include a lot of hiking and not a lot of packing space. Aside from the initial try on when first receiving these boots in the mail I did not wear these boots in before setting off to China, with any other boots this might have been a poor choice. My first experience of these boots then was on a 15 mile hike on the Great Wall, up rough terrain and through some snow, and at the end of the day my feet felt fine. These shoes seem to have really great support without being constrictive. They are comfortable, durable, waterproof, and best of all for me, they are warm without causing my feet to sweat, even during rigorous activity.Another plus for me was these shoes odor fighting powers, despite being worn for 30 days straight, often without a fresh change of socks due to lack of laundry facilities, they wore very well. These shoes have been everywhere from strange nightclubs in Beijing to open-air markets in Tibet and continue to be sturdy and functional boots. I would recommend for anyone looking for a versatile and comfortable boot for your next adventure.

Already own a pair purchased about 2 years ago. Sizing is much smaller now even though I ordered the exact same shoe. The bottom of the shoe reads the same as before but it's about 1/2 inch shorter. Caution to order a larger size now!
Very nice looking shoe and very comfortable !! You can wear them all day and no problems.I bought them for my daughter and she loves them .
This boot fits perfect and only took a couple of wears to work in. The C width is a secure proper fit for a narrow foot. Steel toe is comfortable. A great work boot.
These boots fit my son and he really likes them This is the first time I was successful in purchasing footwear on line and actually having them fit. Hooray!
These shoes are okay, they are poorly cut and cramp my toes, though. I use them just as "costume" shoes as they are wearable for short periods only.

I just got these in the mail today, and I am unsure as to whether or not these shoes are legit. Although they came in a box, the shoes did not come with the "Converse Chuck Taylor" tags that usually come with the product. There are also some minor cosmetic issues (the stitching near the toe area of the shoes are uneven). Also, the label inside the tongue says that these shoes were made in Indonesia. The Converse that I used to wear were either made in China or Vietnam.
First worry when buying shoes is their age as leather can by dry. This pair has soft leather. I would buy the same again.
These flip flops are very comfortable, like the look. Washes up great. The best part is the novelty of the beer opener.

Great buy. Size fit perfectly. Normal wear and tear is almost unnoticeable. I gave them a four because in the beginning they cut at the back of my ankle but after a month or so of wearing them out they now fit like a glove. Came before delivery date. I highly recommend them. :) :) :) :) :)

I got these shoes for my son last year for Christmas because he asked for them. I wasn't sure he'd wear them very much, but he wore them so often he asked for another pair this year. They wore very well, but he's in them all the time and he wanted a new pair. He says they're the most comfortable shoe he's ever owned.

These shoes are very comfy. I bought them for about 20 dollars at a Dilliards in Colorado. I got a bright orange pair that caught my eye. When you first get them to put them on, they are not the most comfy things just yet. But once you break into them after about a month or so of everyday wear, they DO feel like you are walking on marshmallows. Even though if you have unproportionatly large feet like me, these do not help, but are a great purchase anyway. Yes they are extremely ugly but i actually feel bad for the people who do not have them and are making fun of them. In conclusion, JUST BUY THEM ALREADY!

These are by far the best quality sandals- period. Why?1. Premium materials and construction. These are made to last forever2. Ergonomic. They mold to your feet to give you custom, correct support for your feet. So comfy3. Terrific look4. Guaranteed against breakage5. Made in USA, not some cheap, inferior import manufacturerSeriously, I am very discerning of quality and only buy the best. You will be very pleased with Rainbow sandals.

Great shoe for little dancers. It is perfect for my 3 year old daughter's beginning ballet class. She loves them and does not complain about the fit. The plus is that they are so adorable and sweet-looking!
They look good. They are very comfortable. I have wide feet and high arches the EEE was a good choice. Not made in America... but not made in China. Indonesia is not Indiana but better than China.
It skips on easily and fits like a glove. Comfortable. You can wear it the beach or polish it up and wear it as a formal shoe.
The service was unbelievably easy, and the product was shipped sooo fast! Thank you! This was my first purchase but it won't be my last

I have 4 pairs of these shoes and I love them to death! They are as close to indestructable as any shoe I've ever owned. Then you're probably asking why I have so many. Well, the answer is that this is the only shoe I know of that comes in so many colors (I've seen at least 7 or 8 colors) and works with just about everything in your wardrobe! Jeans, khakis, whatever- they work, and I love 'em!!!

The only thing I was dissapointed about was that there was some brown markings on the white sole. It wiped off no problem. But brand new shoes shouldnt have to be wiped off straight out the package. Other then that they are great!

I bought this shoe without having tried it on (which could have been a mistake) and was lucky enough to find my feet fit. Because there are no laces and the tightening system isn't that great, it would be advised to go down a size for a tighter fit. One of the shoes at the seam rubs on my ankle causing discomfort, however this could simply be my ankle and may not affect others rather than a problem with the shoe itself. The shoes are somewhat heavy (don't expect to be able to jump any higher) and the leather is quite soft and wears easily. I give these shoes 3.5/5, loosing points due to their weight and discomfort they cause me (again may only be in my case), however they look great.

Just arrived and best described as a slipper.No separate insole or structure. The soles are very narrow so the upper in the D width must hang over the edge. I have been wearing deerskin moccasins for 50 years or so. The quality seems to be going downhill.

In the past I had purchased my favorite slippers at Nordstroms, then they discontinued them a few years ago. I had looked for replacements for them everywhere and finally found the Slippers International 400P and I am so happy to have them, they are almost identical (sole material is just slightly different) it's great to have them back. My son's are now ordering them as well. Love these!!

Couldn't find this particular color/design combo in stores, so was very happy to find it here at a great price!Converse shoes run a bit big, so make sure you order a good half to one size smaller than you would wear

I love this bag. I can't tell you how many comments I have received while carrying this cute seatbelt bag. I like that I can hang my sun glasses on the side (through one of the seatbelt loops) when I'm in a restaurant or store. Way to go Harvey!
I am very particular about my boots. It only took a day to brake them in and they are very very comfortable. I would recommend buying these boots. I also just ordered ananother pair.

Love this product! Confortable, waterproof and cute! The only negative is that the black button that hold the straps came off. Hope they have replacements!

These were given to the boyfriend for his birthday... He's got big wide paddle feet and works in a hospital (such as me) but he works about a hundred more hours a week than me. He's been wearing them to work and LOVES the arch support...and they look ADORABLE with his scrubs.
I need to change shoe size from 6N to 6M. You have no place to make a change. Other than that I like the on line ordering.George
None of the stores seem to have BLUE! Only black, which is similar to this brand. The sponge soaks in the ink, and I paint it on my shoes. Goes on quick and my shoes look like new. Love it!

I wear them around town, for comfort. I find them very comfortable, very easy to get on and off. I don't wear them enough to comment on odor issues.When they get wet, they do take some time to dry, but there's not much to get wet anyway.
I purchase the Asics GT 2160 in Late October. The service and shipping at Amazon was quick and easy. The price was great and I didn't have to deal with the teenage mall shoe store salesperson...

These clogs are perfect. As an artist, student, Gardner, and a worker, this shoe is great for standing all day long without a lot of fatigue at the end of the day. This is a beautifully classic shoe and quality is nice. The heel composition is the exception. It is a hard, hard plastic or rubber. It is very slippery on tile or brick floors. Be careful. As other reviewers indicated, the sizing is off. Consider ordering a half size larger.
I love the look of these shoes. They were a bit uncomfortable at first and caused a few blisters, but now that they are broken in they are comfortable.

very comfortable and easy to put on. my doctor recommend this type of sneakers because of their support system.

I've only owned one pair of Clarks prior, and after this experience, I'm convinced they are one of the best shoe manufacturers out there. They are soft, light-weight, and use good leather. Very comfortable, definitely would recommend them to others.

I bought these because everyone was raving about them and now so am I. These are my go to heels. I wear them all the time. They are so cute. They are very versatile and are perfect for work, dates, and nights out. The heel is the perfect height, tall enough to make a difference but short enough so you don't get super sore wearing them. They are the most comfortable stilettos I've ever owned but don't expect it to feel like slippers, they are heels and still hurt my feet every now and then. The black patent is hot and gives a little edge to any look. Nine west shoes run a tad big so either get your size or a half size down.

Thank you for sending this fast and correct! These are my daughter's favorite shoes and when her old pair finally got holes in the soles she put these on her Birthday list. She unwrapped them and immediately they were on her feet!

Classic Vans. The style hasn't changed in more than 10 years. I've had mine for that long. I've skated them for that long too. Super comfortable when they're broken in and will last you for years. Vans for life.

OK, So everyone knows Brikenstock shoes are good for your feet, especially sore tired at the end of the day achy feet. But when you have foot problems like I do - you really need to have several pairs around. For the rest of you - these shoes are great to put on after you kick your work shoes off. So much better than going bare foot!!I like these becuase they look dressy and sharp and not so hippy-ish like most of their sandals do.Even thought they are closed around the toes - they are still airy.I love Birks. I bought a pair for me and my daughter. A word of advice though. Try them on in a store first. Some Birk shoe lines - like these from their original line - have a high toe bar - the ridge under your toes on the inside sole. They may be too uncomfortable at first for some. After experience using these - you learn they help your toes grip the shoe as you walk.I only gave a 4 becuase I keep wishing Birkenstock would offer more shoes with their cushion over the cork foot bed. Those are so wonderful. But honestly I have no problem with the hardnes of these becuase it cups your foot and feels good.I think they look smart enough to wear a lot of places. Since I do not wear heels - these were a good shoe at a great price !!!
used this shoe for 13 hours in the office, going up and down the 2 flights of stairs from one department to another. So comfy.

I think Chuck's look cool, which is why I bought these, but I had no idea they were so uncomfortable. If you can deal with a shoe that has almost no cushion and no arch, then by all means get them (I still wear them every once in a while). But if comfort is a big thing to you, I would look elsewhere.
These are the most comfortable timberlands my husband has ever had....He loves and wants another pair for work he said its worth it!!

These shoes have been my favorite purchase in a long time. I bought the red ones because red is my favorite color. the only bad thing about them was the fact that when i took my foot out of them the dye had rubbed off on my feet. a Cherry popsicle was not an exciting thing for me to have as a foot.

I love the look and design of this shoe. It's so stylishly retro, the ultimate sneaker. However, that's where the love ends.I've used Superfeet arch supports for years because I have very low arches and knee problems as a result. I don't typically care what kind of insoles shoes have when I'm shopping for new shoes, because I know I'll just pull them out and insert my Superfeet. However, to my dismay, the insoles in these shoes do not come out!! What shoe manufacturer makes shoes with non-removable insoles?!! Apparently Adidas. For me this is a deal-breaker, and I've returned them. Despite what I've read, these insoles have very little arch support.

I'm a big man with a wide feet, plus I work and walk on my feet for 8 hours a day. This shoe is perfect for someone who has to dress professional and plus it has style. I'm a Atlantic City casino worker and I have been buying this shoe for years, this is like my 20th pair. It's has enough comfort and cushion you don't need insoles. The wide width fits perfect to my fit everytime. The good thing about it is, it gives you a casual and professional look. I can wear them on my days off with a pair of slacks and shirt or at work with a business suit. This is the first time I bought them from Amazon. For only one reason, the price. I use to buy them them shoebuy.com but something told me to check here and they were a little cheaper. I guess if I have free shipping like shoebuy than I would have felt a big savings, but a few bucks was just as good. BIG MEN, WIDE FEET MEN, CASINO WORKERS...THIS SHOE IS FOR YOU. \O/
These are the only Brand of Sandals I can buy and be guaranteed to be able to wear without taking time to "break them in." They are comfortable for walking and very nice looking to wear.

I have worn chucks for several years now and have always been pleased with the shoe, but this was my first purchase from the seller and I am very pleased with the service and quick shipment of the order...

I bought these for my son because his old shoes were falling apart. He really loves these. He said they were really comfortable and almost effortless walking. I dicided to get a pair for myself and I love them!

Be aware that this shoe--in a WIDE- is not really WIDE ENOUGH to be called a Wide. The shoe runs narrow. However,it does come in an Extra Wide. Although the shoe has little to no arch support,it is, nevertheless a "dressy" alternative to gym shoes if you have problem feet.

I got these shoes hoping to wear them to work, wanting to replace a pair of Rockport topsiders that are starting to wear out. The sole on these isn't really great for standing for 8 hours at a time, so now I just wear them for going out.

I don't have too much carpet to vacumn, so this is perfect for me. I tried several other kinds but I don't like the heavy weight monster vacumn at all. I am suprised how it work, it could clean my kitchen, stairs, and even wood floor very well. I put shoes to the test, I am on my feet and moving for 12 hour shifts.I will buy these shoes again because they are shaped like my feet. I don't have those little slivers of feet that everyone else seems to have. If you were to take my shoes off and look at my feet, they would look more like a duck's foot than any standard shoe off the shelf.All the stuff people say about padded this and shock absorbing that, doesn't mean a darn thing if your foot is too wide for the shoe. My toes scream: "Give me freedom to move or give me nakedness!"(I have very outspoken toes).

I am from New Zealand and buying this shoe all the way from USA was an extreme decision. I got this shoe in June 2011. I have been using it for the last few months and the following points are worth mentioning.1. Great balance and fit. though initially a bit tight and takes a bit of wearing for proper fit which is quite natural for leather.2. wear at the back heel at minimum which is a common problem for me and in some cases shoes may almost wear out in a month. (I walk to my work and return with is about daily 5kms)3. They are really waterproof! Not a even any moistness inside! Just wonderful4. Elegant and good looking!5. Worth the money spend including the $25 shipping! Will buy again the same brand and product!

Timberland 50061 Newbuck Chukka is the same as this black chukka. This is THE most comfortable and lightweight all around no BS boot I've ever worn. There's no Thinsulate but it is very water "Proof" I'm sure you don't want to walk into a pool with them but again, they are great boots Make sure you get the 50061 they have a lighter sole than the other Timberland boots less "Beefy" I use them for work and for the gym as well. Just all around the best boots I've ever worn. For Deep snow I would say get an 8' at least boot but for hiking, gym, work from CA to NY the 50061 is great. The new buck gets dirty fast so get 2 pair. One for beating on and one for going out "styling" if you will. Again, very light weight, true to size can't beat em for under $100.00. Great for landscaping, hunting, you name it. If you need severe cold weather you may try something with an Insulate if not these are the best boots ever made. The Black model is a different # but exactly the same just in Black Leather.

This is my go-to walking shoe when sneakers just won't do. Just returned from walking at Belmont Lake State Park where I wore this Jocelyn shoe. Since I've purchased it, I've put it through its paces--from muddy trails in Maine to sidewalk rambles here on Long Island, and it has held up. Comfortable for sure. The material never seems to scuff, and simple clear gel polish keeps it shining. The heel hasn't shown any wear either. This is the second pair I've owned, and they last quite a long time. The only consession I've had to make was buying a cushioned insole product to "beef up" the cushioning which eventuals gets thin. It's true to size, but the extra wide width I bought had just enough toe room, not a lot of extra. I'd buy it again.

My son is on pair four. He loves the comfort of this shoe. Oddly enough he needs a shoe horn to put them on but once on they are like a comfy glove. Sadly it looks like they are phasing out and the black and white ones are rare to find which are the only ones he'll wear.

very comfortable boots that breathe very well. I used mink oil to weather treat them and it darkened them up a little more than i would have liked. Other weather treatment methods may be preferable. no complaints they are the most comfortable pair of work boots I have maybe ever had.

I thought I would try some Havianas because I have been seeing them all over the internet. When I was a kid we always used to have what we called "zoris" for most of the summer and part of the rest of the year. Growing up in California, these were the obligatory shoes for kids. And cheap. Havianas aren't cheap, but I thought I would try a pair to see if they were sturdier than discount store thong flip flops. The one problem with thong flip flops is they wear out. And a lot of the ones you can purchase at discount stores are made of very cheap materials, not rubber, like they used to do back in the day. These appear to be made of rubber, and it seems like they will last longer than the discount ones. That being said, they probably won't last all that much longer, and they also have very high straps for some weird reason. You can tell this from the photo. I don't have skinny feet; my feet are somewhat akin to a ducks and are thick, but these were very loose and when wearing a thong sandal, you don't want loose straps. I purchased another pair in another color and they were the same so I am assuming this is true for all Havianas. Big box retailers, some of who sell here on Amazon I was happy to find, are now making thongs in more rubber-like materials and I bought some really sturdy retro ones the other day for $2.50. So this was the last pair of Havianas I will be purchasing, regardless of the cute patterns and colors they have. Save your money and just buy another pair of the color you like best at the big box store or here on Amazon so when the first ones wear out, you still have the same color. I could buy 4 pairs and have the same thong for a lot longer than these Havianas will last me, that's for sure.

I purchased a pair of altitude iv boots from amazon a week ago. I had a chance to wear and test them yesterday. I was very unsatisfied with the way that they preformed. The "cleat like" sole made it impossible to walk up a slightly inclined damp board. If I was able to return these shoes I would without hesitation, but instead I am stuck with a pair of boots that I feel are useless bordering on unsafe. These boots are one dimensional; they seem to work well if you only walk on soft earth or dirt. If you plan to wear these in to town... don't buy. They seem to be affordable, but found them cheaper at my local outdoor store.**Update**While I stand behind what I said above... These boots did turn out to be very comfortable. The footbed provides good arch support. They are very much a hiking/ snow clearing boot. Great if you don't intend to wear them to work. The rubber on a work boot like (timberland pro) is very different and allows the wearer to walk up a wet inclined board while these are better suited for a muddy inclined path.

I bought these when they were deal of the day for around $15. Can't complain about a deal like that. In response to the reviewers who said to order a size up I'd say maybe order up a half size if you like your slippers fairly loose. When I first got mine I thought they would be too small but after wearing them a couple of days they stretch out and I think they run pretty tru to size. I wouldn't pay $50 for them but if I see them for deal of the day again I'll be buying them for all my family.

I absolutely loved these shoes in the pic, and I'd bought them to go with a bridesmaid's dress. The color matched perfectly, but of course, a three-inch heel is not exactly meant to be worn for 8 hours of walking, pictures, and dancing! The shoe is a little narrower than most, and I would say it runs about a half size small overall. They look absolutely smashing, but make sure you've got an alternative (preferrably a flat, soft one) for those long party nights!

I received my first pair but I found the shoe to be too big. It's about 1/2 size too large but it seemed to be good quality. I sent back the first pair and ordered the smaller pair. However, it did not seem as good as the first. The removable padding was lifting out of the shoes. They are comfortable but not the quality I was expecting. If I were not leaving my home state I would have returned them. They are comfortable and Bargain Outfitters reimbursed me for my first pair and included the shipping which was awesome. So basically, the shoes are not what I would really like but the company was very good and they shipped out quickly.
The shape is good ,but the color and it's arrangement doesn't match.
i like this produce very well. i use it when i ride my bike. the only problem is that i need to wear a sweat band under it because it can get very wet and the money inside can get wet also.
This is my sixth pair of Traveltime shoes. The most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I am especially happy when I can get a good price on them.
This is the third pair of Clarks Desert Trek Boot I purchased. Love this boot. Comfortable and rugged. I say buy and pair and be as pleased as I have been.

the shipping time was great, but they sent me low tops instead of high tops. they said if i send them back they'll send me the right ones but i shouldn't have to, they should've got it right the first time.

I have a difficult time finding shoes that will work for me. Most stores do not carry fashionable women's shoes in wide widths. I am enjoying this pair of Easy Spirit Shoes in the color red. I would purchase these again without hesitation.
Aside from being super comfy, these UGGS have a subtle tropical print pattern and the color is unique. Very happy with this purchase!

I will never buy anything from this company again. I bought these shoes for furture daughter in-law's wedding, they were not what she wanted, we returned have to pay shipping both way and a restocking charge. Boy they are reaaly making money off customers.

This is a nice looking shoe, well made and good price. But I had to return them because the medium width was too narrow for my usual size B. A wide width probably would have worked, but was not available. Too bad, because I liked the style and construction, and basic oxfords for women are hard to find these days.
