Here's this skinny about these shoes. Theyre super comfy and have a great feel to them. For that, I enjoy them.I wear mine to work when I'm dressing a little more casually and sometimes out with friends. I intentionally don't wear them when i know I'm going to be outdoors or standing in dirty areas. I do this because of the white-ish/yellow-ish colored sole.Even being very judicious with wearing conditions, the sole is completely black on the bottom and the discoloration is creeping up the back heel.I've probably worn the shoes 5 times so this result is frustrating.Second, and to a lesser extent, I was disappointed to find that the pictured Beeswax Leather color (shown on most retailers and the Clark's webpage) is nothing like what you get. The picture shows a distressed look where the actual product is not distressed at all. The coloration is a uniform dark chocolate color that looks nothing like the picture.If you're OK with a solid dark brown shoe that will have a quickly blackened sole even when worn carefully. This is the shoe for you.

I have been blessed with feet that do not sweat much... and generally stinky shoes are not a big problem.I got some Keen Taos sandals- my sis in law bought the newports...Both of us have discovered... they get a distinctive fungal funk within a few times of wearing them.Ordinary laundering does not remove the odor. I finally used an enzyme for cleaning septic taks. It diminished the odor about 85% - but still did not totally eliminate it.
Has worn Easy Spirit's shoes for years and loves them. Local store no longer handles and was very pleased to get this pair. Service by seller was superb.
The rockport shoes that i purchased are the most comfortable shoes i have had. I will definitely make future purchases in the future. Totally satisfied with the product.

Great shoes for wet wading or just hanging in the river. However, even though they are self bailing, they are not safe for swimming. I've had these for about 2 yrs and used thim many times. Last weekend my kayak got swamped in a waterfall and while trying to swim out, these shoes just about made me a permanent fixture of the river. So don't use them for swimming, they do not allow you to kick well to swim and the added weight of them after being completely submerged is a killer...literally

This shoe goo clear is exactly as described, rather large tube, about the size of a regular toothpaste. Dries pretty fast, Quite potent smell and vapors though so use in a well ventilated area & be careful around children and babies. Just my personal two cents. A+
These are very nice boots. Love the styling and appearance. They do need to be broken in a little when you first get them.
The product is quality with the matching "classical pink" that is needed in our studio. The laces tighten well and tuck in easily. Our daughter loves them.

My classmates would show up to school with red, green, white, and black, and numerous other color schemed Converse, and wear them all day, every day...even during P.E. (now THAT tells you something). Their conversations would be full of "Are you getting new low tops or high tops? They're on sale today!" or "Cute Converse!!!". I'd smile and wave them on. Converse...REALLY? What in the world is so great about Converse?I used to see Converse as unneccessary, too common, and not worth the money. Boy, was I wrong! I recently purchased my first pair of Converse over Spring Break. The first thing I said when I wore them for the first time was "WOW, ARE THESE LIGHT!!!!" They are extremely comfy and can go with almost any outfit! And, while the stylishness of Converse may be an opinionated topic for some, I think these are the cutest shoes in the world. No wonder so many people love them. I can say with confidence that these will not be my only pair ;) So, with that in mind, if you do not own a pair of Converse, check them out. You'll be glad you did. Believe me.
Shoes are very comfortable and a great fit for my feet. Extremely satisfied w/ this purchase.
My daughter wanted these timberland for Christmas, she has purchase them before so I known what she wanted. These are very nice boots
I love these shoes. They are very comfortable, and people compliment me about these shoes all the time.

I got my shoes on time and they look great! I wear a size 10 and was nervous about whether would be loose or tight but they were the perfect size. They are very comfortable and Sperry makes a great product so they should last. These would look great with any casual clothing and the price was reasonable as well.
My oldest grandson picked these out so I ordered for one of his Xmas gifts. They arrived and look exactly as he wanted.You can't beat the price!!! Another gift crossed off.
These are really Great boots,............ I would recommend these for any growing boy, or girl,............ Just buy a half size larger!!!!!!
This was perfect.. It was true to size brand New as suspected and I would recommend this product to anyone

The size runs small. My daughter wears a size 6 in shoes so I ordered a 6 in this shoe too, however it was way too small. Couldn't even get on her foot. It seems a 6 in this shoe is equivalent to her other size 4 shoes.The quality seems good though if you how their sizes run.

My daughter found these at a major department store, the last pair they had and the clerk went to check the sizes and had one 6 and one 8 so she checked other stores and we could not get any. I came home and looked them up and they were basically the same price and they were sent to my door. Now for a dance team she needs another pair and I will just order them from here, so easy! Thanks!

As someone who spends most of the work day on his feet, I really appreciate a comfortable, well-fitting pair of shoes, and these Rockport Margins fill that role admirably. They have that classic oxford styling; professional-looking, but not too fancy to be practical in a retail/office environment. This is the third pair I've purchased, and I've found them to be durable and easy to care for. If you need a dress casual shoe that's kind to your feet, try these.

This is standard issue footwear for anyone who wants the "look" of indie rock (the others are t-shirts that look to be from a redneck bar circa 1978 but really came from a suburban Old Navy circa 2010 and those "washed-out" blue jeans that were purchased at the same Old Navy). The shoes are grossly unfit for any athletic activity (I don't know how the heck I survived playing street hockey in these things as a teenager), provide no protection against the cold or stepping on sharp objects, begin to smell horribly after 9+ months of use and have a tendency to have the sole tear away from the rest of the shoe after those 9 months (if the smell hasn't destroyed them yet). But their coolness factor will never, ever be replicated by any footwear, past, present or future (the Roman sandal gave them a run for their money in the 1980s by the garage punk band Thee Mighty Caesars, but that's another story). Everyone should own a pair of these shoes at least once in their lifetimes.

This is the 2nd pair of shoes I have owned in this same style, and I LOVE them because they last FOREVER! However, the best part about Eastlands is they make a large selection of women's shoes in a size 12. Thanks Eastland for looking out for us women who have long feet!!!!

First off, I'm not really a kid, but I don't want to sign up for an acount. Know that. I bought a pair a couple months ago. They obviously get kudos in the cool facter right off the bat. Then I put them to the real test. On the court. They are super comfortable and are still holding up great. They also breathe very well.This brings me to the only problems. Soon after I bought a pair, my friend did too. He plays in them not only on the hard-court, but on the black top when he's practicing also. Therefore he uses them A LOT. A few days ago one of the air pumps in the sole sprung a leak and his right shoes rim no longer spins. I've only heard of this happening to a couple people, but if you abuse your shows as much as my friend does, you might want to look else where. Also the sound of the pump is audible. Not terribly noticable, expecialy on the court.All in all, this is a great shoe and really encourage you buying it. Whether you want it for hoops or for style, it's sick no matter what.

Got my boots and have been using in my wooded property. The fit is good and the boots work as advertised. The price point on these are just right - good value for the dollar and its a recommended buy. I saw a post here complaining about the smell of the new boots. They smell like new PVC... as one should expect...but they are outdoor boots so not sure what the issue is there. Another complaint I saw was that they are not fashionable enough. Really? These are work boots so if its fashion you are looking for then PVC work boots probably are not an area you need to be looking into. Anyhoo, good boots for the price. Go get 'em.

Been wearing Etnies for years but for some reason they have lost some of their quality and comfort recently. Decided to give these eS's a try. Worn them a few times already and I am more than impressed. I generally live in skate shoes when not at work and these have been impressive. I wear either a 14 or 15 depending on the style and manufacturer and these fit great and are extremely comfortable.

These shoes are what I was looking for..but, they do run a little big. So be sure to get a size down from your regular size. I wear 10 1/2 But i could probably wear a 10 or even 9 in this shoe..They are comfortable and you cant beat the price..shipping was pretty face as well.
I have using this shoes for more than 3 years it's so comfortable I got 3 pairs including the latest I ordered.Its durable and comfortable to use.

I have multiple pairs of Kenneth Cole Reaction shoes, all in size 8.5, so that's what I ordered. These are a size too big on me. Very disappointing.Adorable shoe and looks like it'd be comfortable, but can't walk in them to find out.
Keds is a classic and never goes out of style. It is always hard to find my size, 12W, but I found it here with no problem. Would recomment to everyone!
Love these shoes, these are the 3rd pair I've bought b/c I wear them ALL THE TIME!! Great shoes, so comfortable, versatile!! You will want to live in them ALL summer!
Expensive shoes, I was really excited about it but got a little dissapointed with it, quality little low, materials seems to be cheap
Very smooth purchase, excellent price - the best anywhere and believe me I searched, very fast delivery, really good communication. Thank you

I'm a beginner to intermediate climber and these shoes are great. Several of my climbing friends have this brand and I knew my size because my climbing gym has this brand. Love he velcro - makes it slip on and easy to take on and off between climbs. Only thing is if you're into a lot of outdoor climbing it's probably best to get a shoe with more rubber at the toes. For me this is pretty much what I needed, at a great price. I'm usually a 7.5 or 8 and went with a 7.5. A little too tight at first but loosened so it's just tight enough as climbing shoes should be.
It was a great bargain for the money. I priced this product in a lot of different sites and it was a deal. They feel wonderful.

Easy Spirit shoes of all types are unquestionably the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I recently bought 5 different types of shoes and they are all fantastic. I have medical issues that make it difficult for me to wear shoes of any kind. Easy Spirit allows me to walk like I haven't for several years. Quality and comfort are fantastic.

this is the second pair of softspots, but this pair the leather is not as soft it is stiff, and hopefully will be more comfortable when I break them in. The other pair exactly the same that I had purchased years earlier was and is so soft.
This is a wonderful shoe, however due to the European sizing, each size covers two US sizes. Had to return for next smaller size which was a little snug.
These shoes are very soft, comfortable, elegant and they are molded excellently to the form of the foot. They are the best shoes that I have and do not change them into anything.
The shoes are nice but not in the way I expected. I should have ordered them a bid larger and much wider.
quick response, fast delivery, great shoes for just about any outfit.

I absolutely love the way these shoes look. But, the strap in the back will not stay up. I tried everything. I even put a new hole for the buckle to go through just thinking they need to be tighter...No luck. I only wear them when I am not going to do a lot of standing...
They're comfy and look great with skirts, jeans, etc. Almost always get a compliment from a passserby.
I have worn these all winter and they have kept my feet dry and warm. I live on a college campus so I do a lot of bike riding and walking and they have held up great.

The shipping fast, the product came in the right size that i ordered. The shoes are great I love them. Only problem is they sent me a different variation of this product than what is pictured. The stitching shown in the toe area that looks like a "cowboy style" is replaced by a rounded curved line. I bought these over a cheaper model to get that "cowboy v" stitch and received the cheaper model anyways... should have ordered them elsewhere and saved 5 to 10 dollars.
I needed a bag to carry a computer in that would serve as a handbag as well. This bag was as advertised. I have adapted it for use as a handbag also. Good quality.

this is my first time buying from amazon and it was a great experience. with 3-5 day shipping they came in 3 days. the shoes are great of course. this is my third pair of converse so i knew what to expect. they were in perfect condition when i received them. definitely don't hesitate to buy!

The Melissa shoe gives a perfect look to any outfit. The texture and the unusual varieties of colors this product gives can make any outfit seem like the best. The way the shoes shapes the foot and brings out your natural texture as well as the shoes color is awesome. No wonder this product is so popular among all teenage girls today. Melissa's are a great shoe, it brings out the best in you and whatever you may wear.
The crocs I ordered for my son was reasonably priced and was delivered on a timely fashion. I was very hapy with the convenience of the purchase.

They look great and intially felt great on. So much so that I brought them on a week long trip as one of two pairs. After day two I realized I made a mistake. The lace design lacks ankle support and after walking it shows/feels. I still like the way they look, but I won't wear them to work or if I know I will be on my feet most of the day.

I am a teacher and at Christmas time each year I ask for a student's name of whom the counselors or home health nurses know is not going to havea Christmas because of family finances and/or struggles. Well, this year I was given the name of a student I had in my own class and whom I had already had sucha great connection and loved this kid. To find out they were not going to have a Christmas broke my heart!! Anyway, through some other sources,I was able to find out what this student wanted more than anything, if they could ask for just even one gift for Christmas. The student said they would love to have some REAL Chuck Taylor blue high-tops !!The fake ones they had saved money to buy at a local "discount" store fell apart so fast and they felt they had wasted their money.So ... I ordered these for that student and had them given anonymously. Let me tell you ... when that student entered my classroom the very morning after the y received these surprise gifted shoes ....that kid was so excited to show me, so happy in general, so excited to see everyone and openly socialize with head held high. Wow ... what great things these shoes did for this student in far more ways thanjust keep their feet dry My heart was fulfilled and this student will forever remember these shoes, I am certain!!

How can you go wrong with traditional Chuck's? I've got several pairs and wear them everywhere from weddings, to school, work and shopping. Jeans and shorts.
An absolute necessity for a Wisconsin Winter with a 60 pound border collie mix pulling you down the ice-skating rink of a sidewalk!They were delivered in 2 days. Great buy!

I love Reebok so much. The shoes are so comfortable and the other stuff is also really great! All my friends and I have at least 6 pairs of reebok shoes in our closets. And the designs are really great too.

i am very pleased with my product- it was a gift for my son who is an avid skate boarder and vans has b come 1 of his favorite shoes

Love these boots, if you are looking for a comfortable stileto heeled boot, THIS IS IT!You should order 1/2 size larger than your usual size due to the pointed toe.They are comfortable, even after hours of wear.LOVE THEM!

I have this flip flop in graphite. It actually looks like a gun metal and shines. They are thicker in the sole than the thinner strap style making it cushiony when you walk. Again I have no problems with any rubbing and the toe feels great. The color that is advertised is different when you see it in person. No matter since the color is unusual, and I have had a woman walk up to me and bend over to see them. She could not believe how pretty they looked and the price is fabulous. Ten dollars cheaper than the thinner strap style. I never saw these before until I saw them here on Amazon. Macy's sell these as well but not in this cool color. Low stars because I never got to them try out. Bought the desert boot ankle high a little before. Oxford length was ok, but wrap around top of foot was way tight. Might try a 1/2 size larger on these. The desert boot ran a full size below just like another reviewer mentioned. I'd go 1/2 size below normal size on the oxford.

I have flat feet and have trouble finding shoes that are comfortable.The bone on the side my foot would hurt and nothing seemed to help. I bought a lot shoes in hopes of getting some relief. It seems that every pair could use a little adjustment of one form or another. That was until I bought the Eastland Newports. I am on my third pair. They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. When your feet hurt you are not able to fully function. Get these so you can quit thinking about your feet. If you have wide feet or bunions I recommend these shoes.If you are on your feet a lot these shoes will make you happy.
I normally wear an extra wide shoe. I ordered these in size 4E and it was too narrow to even start getting my foot into it.
The laces are a little annoying if not tied securely, but do go a size down if your socks are not very thick. I usually wear thicker socks with this pair (and I already have inserts) for a nice fit.
I purchase this sandals for my mother. She likes this sandals because they are very soft and easy to put on. Also the leather is very soft and comfortable.
My grandson hasn't taken his boots off since Christmas. He loves them and thinks they are the coolest! I think they are going to hold up really well too.
I bought these for my partner for xmas & he loves them, says they feel like walking on clouds. They look very nice too, I'm so glad he has some decent dress shoes.
I think that is a good product, is very important the cost, and this product is comfortable.buy now. Thanks

I've been looking for this specific color and style and went to every athletic shoe store in Phoenix and Las Vegas but could not find it until i happened to look on Amazon. I bought a pair of Eastland 10 years ago and they were fantastic shoes, comfortable and long lasting, they finally died. I then purchased 2 pairs of the newer version of the shoe shown here, not as comfortable as the original (the others looked better for the work place too) but I broken them in and they were acceptable. Now a year later the sole of the shoe has split in two. Definitely not as well constructed as the last pair but they cost the same. Actually the interior of the heel of one of the shoes broke very shortly after I started using them. Right now it would seem I would get about as much usage from a pair costing 1/3 as much. One of the reasons for going to these was because the cheaper shoes die after about a year of wear. The quality has really degraded. You might want to look elsewhere.
Feel like I 40 yrs. younger. For a causal shoe for Santa these are Great. I really enjoy them feels great to be able to wear a really well made shoe. Thanks ConverseSANTA GARY

Love the Rivas. Bought at $10 less than anywhere else I could find. Fast delivery and shoes arrived perfectly.

I love my Crocs! I had a pair before and after 2.5 yrs. of wearing them at least part of every day, the treads were wearing off the bottoms of them so I had to order a new pair. i got these shoes back in like early January and all ready the side is coming apart there is a open on the side. but there good shoes.
I loved these shoes as they were comfortable and great with jeans. After a few months of wearing, the sole on both shoes split in half. I was able to glue, but that only lasted for a week or so.

For the money, this is well made, comfortable shoe. I purchased it in both black and cordovan and the leather appears to be well dyed so that color will not scuff off. The soles and heels are not as "hard" a rubber as I would want, but I would not expect a shoe at this price point to last more than a year any way. I would purchase these again.
The Reebok Amaze mid is a comfortable shoe that also provides great ankle support and a cool look. These shoes can match any outfit you have and make people look twice. Highly reccomended

I wanted something that was a bit dressy but not as fancy as to be incompatible with something casual.From the looks of it, this shoe seemed like the perfect fit. I wish I could have gotten views of it at different angles before I bought it, but that's just too bad.I think they're a bit too pointed in my opinion, but they fit great and look good. I think there are better shoes, though, if you wear a suit to work. If your dress code includes khaki's this is more than alright.
First pair lasted a couple of years and served me well; paid a little more for a full leather upper a year ago and these babies still keep my feet warm and dry. Good value boot for the money.
Nice solid old school looking shoe. Not as comfortable as a lot of athletic shoes I own, but not bad either.

These shoes are one of the most comfortable I have ever worn. They hold up very well. I have been buying them for years. It was great to find them on line because not every store carries them. I don't know why.

They have really big bumps and lots of them inside. Then the raised part under the toes is not too comfortable for someone with uncommon foot shapes. They are probably really good once you get used to them. I just looked inside the worn-out pair I have. They are smoother. I think they vary in the interiors quite a bit. I bought a pair of these, but returned them due to them being too bumpy. Mine are so old now, I don't know what they were like new.
I am very pleased with these shoes. They are extremely comfortable and very well made. I've also received many compliments on them.

These shoes are great and comfortable for my daughter. Just be sure to order about 1 1/2 size UP with these. We ordered a 13 1/2 for my daughter and they were VERY tight! She needed a size 2 to have a little space in there.
I have these in several colors. They are so comfortable to wear. My feet swell alot and these make it easy to at least wear a shoe, with or without socks.

Desert Boots and Chukka's have quickly become one of the most popular style of boots over the last couple of years. There are literally hundreds of different options out there if your looking for this style boot and the prices can range from roughly $50 all the way up to $400 dollars. With that being said, Clarks Original Desert Boot is easily one of the best of the bunch especially when it comes to getting the most bang for your buck.I absolutely love this style boot and have over 15 pairs sitting in my closet from companies such as J.Crew, Johnston & Murphy, Frye, Diesel, John Varvatos, Red Wing, Bed:Stu, Original Penguin etc. Out of all the companies I have purchased this style boot from, there are really two that stand out more than the others in regards to getting the most bang for your buck. Those two are Clarks and J.Crew. Both make high quality boots and both keep things simple in regards to the design and that is exactly how I prefer them.Clarks Original Desert Boot is really the epitome of simple design. No flashy cuts of leather, no funky patina's, just a clean design using classic colors and high quality full grain leather or suede. If you think these are comfortable when you first try them on, wait until you have had a pair for 6 months. These boots become like butter on your feet. In all honesty, that is one of the greatest aspects to this style of boot, they break in and become one of the most comfortable pairs of boots you have ever worn. Out of all the boots I own, its my broken in Chukka's and Desert Boots that are the most comfortable. Some of my Clark Desert Boots are over 4 years old and they are still in amazing shape. In fact, as I stated in regards to comfort, they only getter better with age. If you take proper care of them they will last a very long time.Bottom line - Again there are now hundreds of choices out there for this style boot but very few can match Clarks Desert Boots especially when you consider the price. These are easily one of the best deals out there in regards to mens footwear. If your late to the Chukka/Desert Boot game then what are you waiting for? Every man should have at least a couple pairs in his closet. Clarks Desert Boot is a perfect place to start. The Taupe Suede & Brown Suede are the 2 that I recommend the most. They go with practically everything.5 Stars!!

I ordered these crocs cayman shoes in light blue as a birthday gift for my 2 year old nephew. They are lightweight (literally, light as a feather!) and form perfectly to his little feet. He loves them...he can even put them on himself. They are adorable on kids, and I love the light blue color. I definitely recommend these for toddlers.

These sizes published are off an inch. I can get my feet in them, but the top arch makes them to tight. The extra toe length wont matter because these come to a point anyway, your feet will not be lose in them. I've been buying these shoes for over a decade, same problem with size today as a decade ago. They are very soft, and super comfortable if you get the right size, zero break in time. Very soft rubber which wears out pretty quickly on cement/pavement, but great around the yard or short chore stuff, great grip no slip. These are always sharp looking too, athletic look to em, but I would not work out in them because they do wear out quick. I buy 2 pairs at a time.
buy them for the new year, I like the classic tennis and this is perfect, comfortable and a great price. certainly buy them again.
Unfortunately these run a bit tight. Length is fine but width is actually tight. I wish I could fix this issue but I really do not want to have to send these back...

This is the best running shoe I have ever owned! I had trouble with my LCL, not anymore. I used to start to get tired after 4 miles, I can go twice as long with these. If you have flat, narrow feet and small ankles, this is the shoe for you. Pretty good arch support. Could use more, but I'm not complaining!! I hope they never discontinue this shoe!

These were my first pair of really nice shoes and will probably be the only tennis shoes I will ever buy. They are very versatile; I can wear them when I am out on a walk, on a run, to school, to church and they are great when I am traveling. They even fit bulky orthotics and my wide feet that other tennis shoes are not made to handle. Adidas are comfortable, stylish and the ultimate tennis shoe!
Get about 1/2 size bigger than the actual shoe size. Quite comfortable. Got it for my 5 year old cousin and she loved it.

I just bought a new pair of Ecco Track II Highs -- replacing my previous pair that I wore nearly every day for over 7 years. (I said nearly every day -- I did give them a rest now and then.)From day one, these boots fit my feet perfectly -- like they were made for my foot! (Absolutely no hot spots or pinching whatsoever.) They are classy looking and work well with casual office attire, yet rugged enough for almost any non-extreme activity. I have used them for absolutely everyting! Slogging around in the rain and light snow, distance hiking, walking, putzing around town, driving, motorcyling, working in the yard, you name it. Light and supple yet still rugged, they provide excellent ankle support and keep your feet dry during wet adventures. They breath exceptionally well also. My old Eccos have been demoted to the Jethro Bodene boot pile, but I still intend to wear the old pair for grubby wear until they just give out completely.Friends, these Ecco Track II's are simply top quality foot gear that you will be proud to own and pleased to wear. And with just minimal care, they will provide you with years and years of reliable service.
These shoes proived to support for a hard game and have the looks of a street shoe. The perfect all around shoe.

The sandals are cushy enough and seem sturdy, but the straps get twisted every time I put them on and if I don't take the time to straighten them out it makes it uncomfortable to walk. I've never had this problem with a pair of flip flops. Maybe the straps are too thin.

I've owned various colors of this shoe over the years. They are classic and comfortable. They feel a little tight when you first try them on, but they always stretch to fit your feet like a glove. Great shoe!
Great purchase. The only place we could find these shoes in the right color. Fast and quick.
I bought them as a present for my boyfriend and he couldn't be happier. The color is vibrant and full of life! Also, converse are great shoes.

I stumbled upon this boot in wine patent leather and was so impressed by its look, decided to try it on. I was a little afraid that the pointy toe would hurt if I didn't go up a size. To my surprise the boot fit perfectly in my normal size 10. I got quite a few compliments on these boots. They are stylish, sexy and relatively comfortable. Because of the heel the arch is a little high so I don't see it as a shoe that can be worn throughout a long day. But still a lot of bang for the buck.
I've been playing soccer for my entire life and at last I've found a shoe that doesn't hurt my feet after a game.Very good traction , beatifull design and very original model.Thank you ADIDAS.
These are perfectly comfortable, I have had these boots before, so I knew I could not go wrong and the price was within my budget. I wear a ladies 5.5-6 and the 4.5 big kids fit great!
These are some of the most comfortable shoes that I own. I never thought that flip flops would provide so much support or be comfortable enough to wear all day, but these are!
El producto fue entregado en el tiempo establecido, Producto original, Departamento 100% garantizado, los converse chuck taylor negros son los clasicos y por ser así son los mejores
I have had many Eastland shoes and this is the one I prefer if I can get it. Liked the AMazon price.
I never would have thought this shoes look cute. They are very comfortable and sport looking very easy to match with t-shirts and jeans or shorts. The price was really good.
I love these Life Stride Sandals. Can be worn when dressed up or casual. Very comfortable. Planning on purchasing more in several colors.

I have been wearing Reef Ginger sandals for several years now. They are the most comfortable flip-flops I've ever worn. I stand on my feet for 8+ hours a day and when I wear these sandals, my feet don't hurt. I've had several pairs of these flip-flops and I've never had a pair break--I just wear them out from wearing them so much!
Love them have been wearing Keds for yearsand they never let me down. My 10yr old daughter also loves hers.

Right O, this is a good shoe and very well made. I don't feel as if the shoe is true to size (at least for me - US 15W) out of the box. Not sure I'd buy them but that said, I am not entirely annoyed since it's a chance you take buying stuff online. Cheers!
I have worn this shoe before so I knew what i was buying and it was just what I expectged
I've been wearing this shoe for years. It has always been very comfortable and long-wearing.

I needed a pair sneakers that were extra wide (8.5 EEEE) and had good arch supports. Propet sneakers are comfortiable, run true to size and have good arch supports. Plus they have a guarantee to last one thousand miles of walking.
Being a Santa these shoes ar GREAT! They take me back to my childhood and what I do now. How fun. I get so many complaments.Thanks so much for making such a great product.
Received the shoes sooner than expected. Will do business with you again. Thanks.
You can never go wrong with SAS shoes. The delivery of the shoes was great and in a timely fashion, I'm sure I will order again, and the prices can't be beat!

I bought these and ended up returning them. The shoe is exactly as pictured. The height of the shoe was comfortable. The rhinestones on top I found to be uncomfortable for me while walking so I decided not to keep them. They are an attractive looking shoe though.
These shoes arrived so quickly - 6 days earlier than promised! They fit perfectly - I am a 7.5 and they are true to size. Too cute for words, and comfortable too!
Christmas gift for my daughter. She got to open them early and she looooooves them!! Shipping was quick and no worries about the Uggs being authentic!
These are my second pair, I have a black pair and, now these are the only dress shoes I wear at work! The most comfortable shoes that you'd ever wear!

Couldn't find this particular color/design combo in stores, so was very happy to find it here at a great price!Converse shoes run a bit big, so make sure you order a good half to one size smaller than you would wear

These shoes are comfortable for getting around. Since it is a mans shoes I normally order down one size. There were no tens so I ordered the 10.5. The shoe fit fine, the 10 would not have given me the same comfort. I would recommend this as a walking shoe.
This is a wonderful soft comfortable shoe that's perfect for every day wear but can take you into the evening as well. I bought two of the same in different colors. Highly recommend.

I had owned a pair similar to these before and was impressed with their durability, long lasting and remain looking good. These shoes are comfortable right out of the box without need for any break-in.
buy them for the new year, I like the classic tennis and this is perfect, comfortable and a great price. certainly buy them again.
These are the only sandals I wear. Have been ordering these for more than seven years....why buy anything else?

These are my second pair of Earth Lazers. I have a narrow foot, size 11, and they fit just perfectly. The heel is snug, and the toebed is more of a medium fit. But, when you walk in these shoes, the weight falls towards the heel, so you don't really need a narrow toe box. I did order them in a size ten, instead of the 11, and my foot feels supported and secure. It's great for someone with a bad back too. They are ultra light and fit easily into luggage for travel. You are probably not supposed to wash these, but I did in a low setting. They came out just fine. I don't think you should put them in the dryer, however. The price offered on Amazon, in conjunction with the Amazon credit card, made this too hard to resist. So glad I got them. Highly recommended!
Bought these shoes for my teenage son.He loves them - still wearing them after two years.The great part of Vans is that the size is consistent around the world.

Mootsies Tootsies have always been my favorite. Have been wearing them for years. BUT the last pair I got ( which was ordered on Amazon) came apart after wearing them only a few times. Had to take them to a shoe repair to get them fixed. But now they are o k. Don't know if I will try again or not. Have to think about it.

I've been a Dansko wearer for about 5 years now. I still wear my first pair, but have several others. I am a hairstylist so a good, supportive shoe is a must. I have to warn anyone who wants a pair of these to keep something in mind; if they fit you in the heel they are too small! There should be a bit of "slip" when you walk in this shoe, as it should feel like a clog. People who don't like them usually buy the wrong size. A great investment!

I just received my "navy"/black shoes. They are not the navy shown in the picture. The color is almost exactly the same as the blue in the blue/orange shoe.I haven't decided if I will keep the shoes or not. Shipping was quite fast.
These are the most comfortable thong sandals I have ever worn. It took some time to get used to the strap between my toes, but there was no chafing or blisters. I'm wearing them at work right now!

I bought this shoe in size 7 1/2M and I love it.It is stylish and comfortable. I normally stay away from pointed toe shoes as they hurt my toes but I love these. They are absolutely comfortable and they go with several outfits, from jeans to skirts.Amazon delivered on time and I'm pleased as always with their service.
These are very nice. They have great coloring & very supple. I would recommend these shoes. These are very well made.
They were very nice slippers but I didn't need two pair. And they were too wide for me.
I have been wearing Saucony Sneakers for three years. I have yet to find a comfier pair of walking shoes.
I have always loved Keds sneakers, however, 2 weeks after purchasing these shoes, the bottoms came loose and I had to throw them away.
This is a great fitting shoe if you put a double air foam insoles in them. I now owe 6 pair in different colors.
quick response, fast delivery, great shoes for just about any outfit.

This product was purchased for my mother-in-law who has poor circulation in her feet and has to be very careful to have shoes that do not constrict the blood flow or cause any blisters or sores. These shoes have been great for her. She has them in several colors.

These are the most comfortable boots I own. Very good cushuninig, making walking a pleasure. This is my second pair of this boot. Great value too. I've purchased boots at over twice the price and have been less satisfied. The soles won't last forever due to their softness, but they last long enough.
I am a cancer patient and need to keep my feet warm but be able to step out on doorstep to get mail, feed cats etc. This is great and everyone has complimented them. Very stylish and comfortable.
I gave this to my wife whom went to The Ohio State and was very happy to receive the Ohio State Crocs. They were received in a timely manner and was well represented.
Excellent shoes,they are very confortable and easy for my feet, the color I would prefer Dark Red but was my mistake the color choice, they are pretty well made.
i love these. if you are getting them, get your EXACT size. really comfy. GETTING MORE. happy buyer, and more to purchase!

TROOP Footwear is back for the 2k3 and they are hot. These shoes not only look amazing, they some of the most comfortable shoes ive ever wore. they are definately worth ever penny i spent on them. Anyone who knows the TROOP story will tell you that these shoes were one of the hottest shoes to come out back in 85'. This new line out is made by averix and they have totally done justice to the name. I recommend you pick yourself up a pair or too, either on here on Underground station, Shoe City, or any other store you can find them. Hope you enjoy them as much as I do.
We Purchase these every six months, they are great walking shoes, very comfortable, sturdy and excellent for drop foot condition

When will there be more colours and sizes in 9M available???? This is a very comfortable shoe and good wearing. Will more be offered and if so,when? When one finds a good shoe and style it is disheartening that more are not on offer. Why change a good,sure thing????
My daughter shamed me into wearing these comfortable and stylish shoes, claiming that I was "dated" in wearing my regular running shoes. They are comfortable and I receive many compliments.

I purchased these less than a year ago. They were beautiful, comfy, and warm when I first got them. I had to purchase a new pair (I ended up getting Acorn brand) last week because these are falling apart. If you wear slippers everyday, you may want to consider getting a more durable brand.

I've been wearing Skechers's Alley Cats for 5 years now, I haven't worn a different shoe on a regular basis since, If it isn't broke, don't fix it. Alley Cats provide the comfortability I need throughout the day, and the style and design are awesome and rugged. For me, nothing beats a pair of alley cats to wear all day long. I wear them almost every single day and they don't start to tear or rip until minimum a year later. Great value for the money !

This is my second pair of Timberland Pro Titan Hikers. They are rugged, good looking, and quite comfortable for steel-toed work boots. My only complaint is that the laces hooks at the top were too closed and fairly quickly wore-out the original laces. The replacements I bought are a little thinner, and that seems to have solved the problem.
Was bought as a Christmas Gift. He enjoys them because of the material your feet can breathe much better.
This shoe is nice looking but it is not as comfortable as some of the other Easy Spirit shoes I have.

I normally wear an 8.5 (wide, if they have it) so I ordered these shoes a 1/2 size up (and wide) from other reviews suggestions. Welp...it still wasn't enough. These shoes definitely run small, and with hindsight I would have ordered a 9.5. Because it's too small, and because I'm too cheap to send them back, I will wear them anyway and just suffer a little bit from the pinching on the top side of my foot and toe box area. They are very cute though, and the heel is low enough to walk a moderate distance, but tall enough to add a little length to the legs. I took a risk by buying shoes I had never tried on before online, and it was almost a good idea.

First off its Not attractive looking. and it feels stiff and bulky and FLAT. Arch support really? I don't feel it at all.It hurt my foot after I wore it a little in the house (didn't even walk around whole much). Very uncomfortable. Can't believe the price!!! If this is what Reef offers for all other sandals and it's considered one of the best ones they have, I say REEF SUCKS.
Exactly what I was looking for. Quick with no hassles. Beats gas, time and crowds that are experienced when going to a brick and mortar store.

As I write this review, I'm recovering from a broken back, and the last thing I want to worry about is slipping on my hardwood floors. These guys give me the traction that I need. And who's idea was it that open-back, flip-flop scuffs can actually make for comfortable walking? Once again, losing a slipper in mid-stride is something that I want to keep off my worry list. The high back on these grippers is perfect for me. I've read reviews with complaints about them being warm. It's winter here now, and I view that as a bonus. If they're too hot in the summer, I'll wear something else. And then there's the size issue. I normally wear 13's so I ordered 12's hoping that after a week of wear they'd be a snug 12.5. That seems to be exactly where they're at now. The snug fit hasn't turned out to be annoyance. I started to look for them the other day and then realized that they were on my feet. I had a "duh" moment, but I got over it.

This shoe walks me! I guess that means that most other shoes fight the natural ergonomics of human stride, heel to toe! It is impressive! But beware, Merrell shoes run SMALL! I wear 9 1/2 to 10. This shoe fits me at 11 1/2! I have a very similar Merrell low top hiking shoe; but it is size 11! So for mail order, MAKE SURE RETURN IS FREE! Otherwise you will have to pay as I did to return for correct size. This shoe came as an Amazon purchase from ShoeMall! ShoeMall said I was not their customer so they do not pay for return shipping. Amazon paid what ShoeMall would pay = $7.00, but the cost with FedEx was $15.80 to return. OK! I love the shoe.
Ordered for a Christmas Gift for a friend. But product looks fine. But Timberland does not make a wide enough width for my feet.
very cute and comfy. highly recommend. nice sandal that will never go out of style. thinking about getting more in different colors.

These are some very nice shoes. I love the blue and black ones. These really should get some more publicity because the are better than all other basketball shoes. They are also very comfortable. If you want to get some high quality shoes for a good price, get T-Macs!!!!!!!!!!!

I bought these shoes as a beater pair to only use while playing basketball outdoors. I have been pleasantly surprised at the good cushioning, comfortable fit, and great traction these shoes provide. I now use these shoes as my primary basketball shoes for indoor or out. I've had the shoes for a few months now and they have proven to be very durable as well. My only complaint is that if you get one of the glossy colors, it scuffs easily - but it's only cosmetic.

I am not a boater but I have always liked this style. I where these shoes everwhere and they are holding up well so far.there didnt seem to be more than a 2 hour break-in period which was really cool. They fit my feet well. The laces arent holding up quite as well as I hoped and I have had to replace them twice but at least laces are cheap.

good indoor shoes. stylish as well. These are volleyball shoes which have enhanced outsole rubber for improved tractino and flexibility.fitting is ok. they just run a little narrow. I would suggest to buy half size up and wide if possible.

I am very happy with my purchase. The slippers are very elegant, they don't look like slippers, more like beautiful shoes. However, they are very comfy and come in several widths. My next pair might just as well be the same one !

I ordered the black-multi, and was a little hesitant because the online pic looked like it had a kind of shiny texture in areas. I was very happy to see it is all suede-like texture, with cute stitching. Very comfortable, and usually I have trouble with boots fitting all the way up my muscular calves. For girls like me, it's nice to find these! (I paid $26.90 - a real steal!)

I'm forced to purchase shoes over the Internet given my shoe size and that the local (Caribbean) stores don't often have my size in the styles I like. I'm partial to Bostonian and Giorgio Brutini as they seem to have standard styles. This Bostonian is the first shoe I've purchased unseen and I am pleased with the fit and the look. The shoe is also stitched at the bottom and that's very important to me. As I've only had the shoes for a month, it's a little early for me to discuss longevity and will update on this characteristic if durability becomes a factor in the future
Comfortable!Love it! Looks great with skinny jeans. DIdn't know it came with white laces so I bought it beforehand.. oh wells. Love it! looks so clean and cute.

I ordered these on speck as I like Skechers brand they are nice shoes but quiet a small make. I am normally and 8 1/2! so if ordering these consider this. Good service disappointed with the shoe size though.Thanks

I bought these for the sole purpose of weightlifting. Excellent ankle support and flat bottoms without much heel make these an ideal shoe in the gym. These shoes provide very firm footing and i would highly recommend them to bodybuilders on a budget.
I usually wear a 10AAA, but this shoe was too narrow for me. Maybe it would have stretched out, but I don't have the patience for that. So I had to return it.

Product reviews are very subjective. Based on the reviews of this boot I hoped for a great boot at a fair price. Instead I found the boot to be subpar in terms of comfort. They shoes were stiff and far too 'roomy'. My feet where floating inside them. I returned them immediately. I've had far more comfortable boots right out of the box.

I bought these shoes in white, and they are adorable! I always get compliments when I wear them. That they're so ladylike, 40's/50's looking etc. I'm in love with these shoes, and despite the other review... I think they make my legs look great! There's nothing like a pair of high shoes to show off your legs! Only gripe, they're hard to walk in!
The shoes were just what I expected from Stride Rite at a wonderful price. My granddaughter wants to keep them on all the time.

These shoes are the best things I Bought on amazon. I recomeend this product who wants the real converse. I love them and now i wear them everyday and everywhere i go!!! I cant wait till i buy or get my next pair!!

This is the only shoe that I have found that doesn't lose its support after months and months of wear. My husband now wears them too because he does a lot of walking and this shoe is really kind to his feet and back.

I buy these shoes for my daughter to wear for P.E., she love them! The soles are thick and sturdy, something the school wants the kids to have. This is our tried and tested tennis shoe we use year after year! My daughter is 7 years old and has no problem in wearing these shoes.

I have a wide toe box, but a narrow heel. Wide 4E widths in New Balance or Asics fit me fine in the toe box and heel. The Spira in a 4E was a tad narrow in the toes and my heel popped up and down. Their wide width would be great for those with big, huge, fat wide feet all around, or those with wide heels. I tried Spiras a few years ago, and could feel the spring in my step, but NOT with these. And the cheap Chinese craftsmanship was very apparent--I had to cut the top holes of the shoes all the way through myself with scissor tips to make the laces go through. These classics were a real let-down and have promptly been returned.

I don't have this exact pair. I got mine from Bass Shoes (not Bass Pro) for $39. So, I like this one because of its price but also because of the toe portion. Some might shun sandals because stuff gets in them while you walk. Wood chips are not fun under your arch. However, the toes on these are covered which minimizes this issue. Nothing got in mine during the second half of a ten mile day hike I was on. The heel is not covered on these (mine are covered), but still provides a shoe like feel. If it's warm enough, these are great. You can walk through water without being bothered at all. Even water proof boots can get wet inside if the water is deep enough.

First of all I suggest 1/2 number less... if you compare it with adidas sneakers. The shoes are great, made with good materials, good design and very comfortable. I ordered these sneakers on black, but came gray on logo and the rear part, but there's no regret about it, looks so good. Definitely I recommend this item.

Great style and comfort... i love ADIDAS and i LOVE these shoes... great for daily wear, indoor or outdoor.they get a little dirty because they are white but since they are leather, they can be easily cleaned!
These sandals are just great in comfort and appearance, wonderful for vacations. The service was speedy as always.

My wife has feet that hurt a lot. She chose these sneakers based on all the positive reviews. After wearing them for only one day, she declared these were her all time favorite sneakers! Thank you, Amazon for offering the best prices!
I love this shoe! Very comfortable, light, and durable. The fit was perfect, and I got a lot of inquiries about where to get them. Can't wait to get my next pair.
Pink cowgirl boots arrived on time for Christmas. The size ran small so I wish I'd order a larger size.Joanie

The first time I saw this shoe (in black/white patent leather) was on the feet of Boston Celtics All-Star forward Antoine Walker. Being a fan of "old-school" shoes and Mr. Walker, I immediately took a liking to the Adidas Promodel 2G.The Adidas Promodel line has been around for over four decades now and many a current and former NBA player has spent time in a pair, whether in high school, college or at the pro level. The first thing that stood out to me was how Adidas kept the classic "shell toe" as part of the shoe while adding minor adjustments to give it a nice blend of modern/retro looks. The patent leather also gives it a nice touch making the shoe simple, but unique.Another huge plus which I'm sure everyone will notice is the price. ... it ain't gonna clean out too many pockets and for this price y'all can go out and cop a pair or two (one for home games, one for the road). So, the bottom line on the Adidas Promodel 2G is that it's worth considering if you're a junior high or high school-level team looking for a good value in a team shoe (... the Promodel costs a lot less than most shoes designed for team use) or if you need a shoe for those lazy Sunday afternoon games down at the park.
My son is very happy with this shoe! Very comfortable for getting around campus. The style seems to work with any casual wear.
They are chucks! You cant go wrong! Best shoe out there for the price, you give up a litle comfortability but they do what they are meant to do!
Globe's Mojo shoes are by far the most comfortable, cushy pair I have ever worn. Been wearing them for at least three years and no complaints.
Bought these for my daughter for Christmas. They are beautiful, classy, comfortable and were at a great price.

I noticed that crocs shoes don't give my kids blisters on their feet.They seem to be a softer material than if you buy the cheapers ones at Target or Walmart.These crocs are great, an nice bright blue color, and really comfortable for my son.I will definitely purchase more in the future.

These shoes are very comfortable and good looking for casual dress. Furthermore, on a really rainy day I found out how waterproof they are. I stood in 2 inch deep puddles and my feet stayed perfectly dry. 5 stars from me.

I only buy boots every thirty years. These are lighter and better feeling than the heavy clod-hoppers they replaced. My only complaint so far (I've only worn them once to date) is that the bow-part of the laces tends to slip behind the tongue of the boot, coming to rest on my socks.

My Mom has neuropathy in her feet and has a terrible problem with shoes. This shoe works very well for her. She wears a size 5WW which is very hard to find in shoe stores. I was able to get these on sale with Amazon's help. I couln't believe how quickly we received them... Great service....

The shipping fast, the product came in the right size that i ordered. The shoes are great I love them. Only problem is they sent me a different variation of this product than what is pictured. The stitching shown in the toe area that looks like a "cowboy style" is replaced by a rounded curved line. I bought these over a cheaper model to get that "cowboy v" stitch and received the cheaper model anyways... should have ordered them elsewhere and saved 5 to 10 dollars.

Good part: it's airy, good looking, cushioning as they said, received on timeBad part: It's too tight around your foot and I would say you should consider this factor before to buy it! However, you can get a little bit comfort if you keep shoelaces loose otherwise ok
Horrible shoes. Sucks, Horrible red label at the sides of the shoes

Had my first pair for seven years. Most comfortable shoes/boots I've ever found. Just a little too worn to look nice. I'll use them around the yard. Paid even less for the new pair than I did seven years ago. Thanks Amazon!

I decided to try these sandals as a possible replacement for the old Clark's Sunbeat, which no longer lives up to its former standard of quality, unfortunately. These have a very similar appearance and, if anything, are more comfortable. I thought I might dislike the look of the Velcro straps, but it's actually not very noticeable. They are very comfortable and, I thought, more attractive than they appeared in the picture (of course, I'm at an age where "comfortable" tends to be synonymous with "attractive"). I downgraded them one star because the ankle strap tends to ride a little high on me, rubbing right underneath my ankle bone. I think when they get broken in and soften up a little, this will probably cease to be a problem, but for now, it's very irritating after awhile. Overall, though, I like this sandal and look forward to wearing it this summer.
This shoe is so comfortable and got to be one of the best running and basketball shoe. Plus your getting official Iverson shoes!Great shoe!

I had no idea what to expect from these sandals since I ad never heard of the brand before. But the reviews were mostly positive and the price sure was right. I'm glad I bought them. The cushioning is nice, and I like that it gives some decent arch support. That's something I need for high arches and most sandals are too flat to do anything.I've been able to wear these all day long with no issues.
bought for my wife. very pleased. comfortable enough for her to dance all night. would recommend worth the money.

I have a difficult time finding comfortable Flip Flops for summer so I tried these. I found them to be uncomfortable because of the ridges in the insole (they agrevate the bottom of my feet). Most Flip Flops today have a smooth inner sole, but these specific sandles have some pretty rough ridges (I suppose to keep you from slipping). I have another pair of this same brand in a flowered insole pattern and they are a bit smoother and more comfortable. My other complaint is with the sizes. I would prefer if they did not combine sizes (example 8 to 9). It would be better if they offered some whole sizes.
I love the stretcher as I need it to widen my right shoes. Good quality and works very well. Thanks so much

I got these boots for my daughter when she was 7 months old (in December), and she wore them all winter. Even in the cold Quebec winter they were able to keep her warm (they fit inside her snowsuit) without having to deal with socks. She never even wore socks until the following September! They are very convenient, wash really well and are an automatic baby gift for every baby I know!

Maybe a little more than I wanted to spend, but in comparison to other dealers this price was great. Shoes fit well - I have very narrow feet and these fit the bill. They are comfortable and seem to work very well.
The quality and price of these boots were great. I received the shipment very quickly. I would definately do business with this merchant again.
Super comfortable.I have truly enjoyed my pair and plan to order more in a variety of colors.I can wear these all day without any foot issues. Very durable shoe.

These slippers were ok, but definitely run wide. In street shoes I wear a 10 or 10.5 and I often size up to an 11 in loafers or ballet flats to accomodate my slightly wide feet. I ordered a 10W since these slippers are not offered in an 11, and they were loose even with the drawstring completely tightened. I ended up exchanging for a pair of Blochs, which come in longer lengths.

We bought these shoes for my daughter as a follow up to her first pediped soft soled shoes. We needed a little more protection and durability for walking outside.The soles are a very soft rubber and very flexible. I think they are great for beginning walkers. The only reason I gave these a 3 is because the leather on the ridges around the stitching scuffed badly and immediately. So they looked pretty tattered after just one wear.You can't beat the price though! All-in-all a good value.

I ordered these boots in the cognac color. They look and feel great! I was a little worried about ordering these when I read the problems that some people were having putting them on and taking them off. I have had no trouble at all. They slipped right off and on. I did order a half size bigger like another customer suggested. This could have been the trick.

I own two of these wallets, one for everyday use, bulging with all my credit cards and stuff, and one for travel purposes that is not all stretched out - I don't take all my cards with me when I travel. You can't beat this for the price. The paper currency section is not sewed up on one side because these wallets were originally meant to hold Euros. They stopped sewing up the side so that paper dollars will fit. And they fit good enough and the velcro holds everything together. The velcro-closed change section is a greatly useful thing. I keep my St. Christopher medal in there and a couple of quarters in case my cell phone stops working and I need to make a phone call. I will continue to buy these useful wallets as my other wallets wear out. I recommend this wallet for men and women too.
I bought these boots for my grandson. It seems that all the boys in his school are wearing them. They fit well and he loves them.

I was hoping to order these in 10 1/2, but that appeared to not be an option. I have a difficult time with many shoe manufacturers not offering my size. I use extra inner soles & that helps, but I wish my size was available.

First, I have to say, I had a pair of heavy soled skechers boot before and wanted to replace them. These looked almost exactly like it but they weren't as heavy soled as I thought. Other than that disappointment, they are a good boot and well constructed. I just got so used to the heaviness and these seemed like slippers compared to it.

These are by far the best boots that I have ever owned. I have mine for 8 years and have worn them through New York winters each year. They run true to size and width and are totally waterproof. They are also stylish enough to wear with anything, including dresses and skirts. I am ordering a new pair now. I wish they came in brown or gray as well.
i recommend anybody to buy a pair and plan on buying a second pair in the near future. awesome purchase
These are absolutely the most comfortable shoes I've ever had on my feet. My work environment requires me to be on my feet all day, but no tennis shoes. These take care of the problem beautifully.

As a new infantryman, many many years ago, I was advised by a NCO to save my money and purchase a pair. I bought them a few weeks later and being a new private decided to break them in on a two week FTX that ended with a 25 mile hike back to base. I should have painfully regretted that decision but I returned with nary a blister and a new found love for Mr. Danners wonderful boots. I kept the same pair for the entire 10 years and I'm sure thousands of miles, only having to resole them twice, and sold them when I ETS'd for 75.00 to a new private. Hands down the best money I have ever spent and I can't recommend them enough for anyone spending a large amount of time on their feet or walking.
Recieved a 1/2 size larger than I ordered..but love the shoes nonetheless. Suppose I could have returned them, but I will just wear thicker socks...quality as always by converse!
Great boots. Quick response. Will be ordering more. I have been wearing this product for many years and love them.
Bought this for my daughter and she says is very confortable. The material looks like is going to last. I definately wil recommend it.

These weighed a ton. They fit all right and everything, high quality and the color I like, but I had to ship them back, they were just too big and heavy. I opted for a low cut athletic style safety shoe with an alloy toe that weighs 1/3 less than steel toes.

I had knee surgeries on both knees in the 1970's when large segments of cartilage were removed compared to the minimally invasive surgery today. Because of this, I have to be very careful of the shoes I wear.What is required is a shoe with lots of padding and support. Wearing the Softspots Marathon allows me to have a pain-free day. If you have knee pain, you will not go wrong with the Marathon.

This is the second time I purchased these boots. The first time (7 years ago) everything was good. This product is very comfortable. It feels broke in the first time I put it on my feet. The color goes with many different outfits. I will suggest for someone to give me another pair for Christmas.

I purchased a pair of these shoes while on vacation in Virginia some eight years ago or so. I loved them; however, they finally just wore out. I searched for an identical pair and found them here on Amazon. These are identical to my original pair and I love them!

My son is on pair four. He loves the comfort of this shoe. Oddly enough he needs a shoe horn to put them on but once on they are like a comfy glove. Sadly it looks like they are phasing out and the black and white ones are rare to find which are the only ones he'll wear.

Great value and comfort. In fact, this is the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever owned. I will definitely purchase more prophet shoes. I have wide feet so I ordered EE width. I've never been more comfortable. Thank you Prophet!

Years ago I realized the value of spending money for quality footwear. That said, shelling out over $300 on a pair of boots was not an easy choice! My last few pairs of boots (including 2 pairs of Magnums) failed me within 6 months, so I wanted something that was going to last a long time. I did a lot of reading and looking around online and kept coming back to the Danner Fort Lewis. Everyone who owned a pair raved about them, so I sucked it up and took the plunge. Great decision!I have bizarre feet. At 6'4" tall, one would expect a size 12 or greater, but I wear an 8.5-9 EE. In addition to high arches, I have hammer toes, so I need room in places most shoes don't allow; hence I wear boots most of the time. When I got these in and put them on, I was a little nervous. They seemed to fit well, but there was some rubbing on my outside toes. 2 days of break in later and I was good to go. I've now worn them for 2.5 years in a variety of conditions, including motorcycling through massive down pours and on hikes through mud and muck with no problems at all. In fact, each time I polish them (which isn't often enough), they could almost pass for new! I've been surprised at how well the waterproofing has held up, as this is often one of the first things to go. I have never treated them and they still keep my feet dry, even when I stomp through puddles just to see my wife's look of exasperation.Since buying these, I've been in the Danner Outlet in Portland a few times and learned that these are still US made boots, which is cool. They tell me they remain on of their best sellers, especially with LEOs, and the only time they sell a second pair is when someone wants a dress pair. I can believe it, they really are remarkable. As with all boots, trying them on first is a good idea, but for wear and durability, you can't do better than these!
I was so happy with this purchase. I purchased this just days before Christmas. These came on time and were exactly what I wanted. Thanks for the great service.

These shoes are comfortable for getting around. Since it is a mans shoes I normally order down one size. There were no tens so I ordered the 10.5. The shoe fit fine, the 10 would not have given me the same comfort. I would recommend this as a walking shoe.

This isn't the best ballet shoe I've ever had, but it's not the worst either. It's just pretty average. I wear a size 7.5 street shoe so I ordered a 7.5 for this shoe. The length is just a little short, but my ballet shoes always stretch after a while, so I think this will be fine. However, they're way too wide for my feet even with the strings tied as tight as I can get them. Also, the elastics are already sewn on even though the picture doesn't show them that way. I wish they weren't, because they're not exactly in the right place for me. The shoes are made in Thailand for those interested in country of origin. They're an ok shoe, but I won't get them again when these wear out because the sizing is too awkward and the elastics are pre-sewn.

I have worn Dansko's for over 20 years and never had any problems. They have always been my favorite most comfortable shoes and well worth the cost. In the last year I have had 3 pairs of Dansko's less than 3 years old fall apart suddenly. It is like the soles just disintergrated. I store my shoes in boxes w/ silica packs to keep moisture at bay and keep the leather oiled and treated. I am very very diligent about my shoes and feel like they should last more than 2 or 3 years since they are only worn occasionaly. I will probably not purchase Dansko again anytime soon as I have found several links on the internet that this has happened to others also. I gather Dansko has changed the material for the soles in the last few years and it is common for this "dryrot" issue to occur.

I love these. These are my favorite sandals now. I have trouble with my one arch, and these give good support. The shoe is well made and classy. You can dress it up or it looks great with jeans or shorts too. Wise choice!!

I am considering buying another pair just in case they might stop making these. I rub some shoe oil on them once a year and some light wax in the winter time. Thank you Nunn Bush.

These shoes are very comfortable and good looking for casual dress. Furthermore, on a really rainy day I found out how waterproof they are. I stood in 2 inch deep puddles and my feet stayed perfectly dry. 5 stars from me.

I have a few pairs of Danskos and they have really made a difference in my lifestyle. Walking in New York for more than two or three blocks used to be torture (hard pavement, uneven sidewalks, the snow, the broken bits). Now I can step out of my office and go for a 20/30 blocks walk without a doubt, since this shoes are extremely comfortable and resistant, and quite durable. Ideal for holidays when you expect to walk a lot, too. I have the clogs and also a couple of sandal pairs. BE ADVISED that the fit in this shoes is not like other shoes: you should try to buy your first pair at a shop where the assistant will measure your foot and suggest an adequate fit. I normally wear a 39.5 Medium, and I wear a 42 clog and a 41 sandal in DANSKOS. So try them the first time, before deciding to buy, and you should be just fine.

When I was growing up, my Floridian grandmother only wore one kind of shoe that I can remember: Keds. They were white, always so perfectly white, and as a fragile older woman, she could walk on her feet for days and not complain once. I can't say that it wasn't for all of the exercise classes she took in the pool at her apartment, or living directly on the boardwalk, but she never seemed to complain about her feet hurting.So why am I reminiscing about a shoe? Well, as an 18-year-old who believes she has somewhat of a fashion sense, I recently purchased a pair of black Champion Basic Canvas Lace-Up Keds through Amazon.com. I had always been more of a Converse shoe person, but with more straight-leg/boot-leg jeans in style, a size 10 Converse looks a lot bigger than it needs to. So, I went out on a limb and ordered the Keds. I must admit that they were hard to take off. It didn't really seem to matter to me that there were 4 inches of snow outside or that I was supposed to be wearing my new boots. Nope, it didn't matter to me.What I'm really trying to say here is that these Keds are by far one of the best purchases I have made in my "adult" life. They were cheap, about half the price of Converse, extremely comfortable, and [at least I believe] are pretty stylish. Although I'd probably never purchase the white ones, as they would remind me too much of my grandmother, any other color is great.
Very happy with my uggs. They arrived quickly and are perfect. Comfy and great as expected. Very satisfied customer. Thanks

These shoes are very comfy once worn in, and perfect for anything from walking to skateboarding. I would choose them over converse any day. They are also quite durable.

I'm really, really happy with these boots. An awesome price for a super-sturdy piece of footwear that seems like it's going to last a really long time. I needed footwear that would support my ankles, for both every day walking and hitting the hills with my dogs. These fit the bill.Why buy a second pair?Two reasons:1) I'm paranoid the price will go up.2) These are nice enough to wear out into the real world, and I didn't want to have to worry about keeping my daily pair "nice".The biggest problem for me? They do require some breaking in and for me, it was kind of a painful process. They are rigid, strong boots, and they do give way eventually. Already, after only a few months, my first pair are taking on that nice patina that well-worn leather boots get.It makes me said that I'll have to go through that process again with my second pair, which will take longer because they will be worn less frequently.

The first time I saw a pair of Superstars was 8 years ago and I thought they were the coolest looking all-purpose shoes I had ever seen. I immediately went out and bought my first pair and haven't been without at least 2 styles ever since.
