I have used on average 4 times per week. recommend
These things are timeless. Their image is undeniable. My only complaint is that they are kind of thin and flat; if you're looking for cushy comfort shoes, they aren't for you.
Purchased for my 84 year old Mother since she has foot/arch problems.She loves them. She had same style but, wanted in the black leather.
When I First Wore it,It Felt Like It Was Weightless!It Was so comfortable that i bought a few more pairs.....
The shoes were not the size that I thought I was ordering. I wanted a women's size. These will be sent back.
These boots are great. My husband swears it's like not wearing shoes at all. They are tough and withstand his job as a groundsman for a tree company. Outstanding. You can't go wrong with Tims.
This is a perfect sandal for dress or casual. I needed a navy pair to wear when I am working conferences and these are great. They are comfortable and look very neat with dresses or suits.
Nice-looking shoe, but too expensive. For big foot guys like me, makes your feet look a lot smaller.
Super comfortable, nice detail in perforations and bow, and can walk in them all day without any pain. It runs true to size and looks adorable with colorful skirts or your favorite jeans.
Trotters Women's Megan LoaferI loved these shoes. Comfortable, yet dressy with a high shine.

Its a bit overrated and overpriced, but uggs classic boots are super warm and cozy to wear. I do like the tall boots because of the fold down looks that you can get out of one boot. Problem is that the sole support is not that great. For the amount of money, I expect to be able to walk in these boots as if they were sneakers. I am a size 7.5, but a 7 fit me perfectly.
only worn twice but seems decent quality for price, tongue is set low so wont be waterproof past halfway point and size seems pretty accuratehard bare inside so should use an insert
Shoes are nice and durable like only vans are, however this classics are very harsh on your feet the first couple weeks
These are the perfect school shoes for my 8 year-old daughter. She wears them on the weekends as well. The soles are very soft and flexible. True to size and very cute.

I always liked Converse and they are the same, great shoe they have always been. If you haven't ever had a pair, get some! They are very basic, no lumpy arch supports that drive me crazy, and they come in every color you can think of. In my opinion, they are pretty fashionable. :) Enjoy!

.... if they'd fit.Unfortunately I was very disappointed when my shoes arrived. I love any type of open-backed shoe and thought these would be good to have for my upcoming trip to Las Vegas. As anyone who'd been to Vegas knows, good walking shoes are a must given the amount of walking that can take place during your stay!Most all shoes in a size 10M fit me just fine, but I found these Skechers to be way too small. I was going to pass them on to my daughter who also has been blessed with her Mom's ol' size 10's, but they didn't fit her either. I don't know if it was a case of mis-sizing or if Skechers just run small, but there was no way I was going to be doing any walking in these shoes.So, a word to the wise, if they're available, buy a size larger to be sure you get a comfortable fit.

These are some sweet shoes. I used to have some Nike Ronaldo cleats that had the blade style spikes but I lost those 4 years ago. Since then I have had some cheap Addidas cleats but always wanted my spikes back, as well as a higher quality cleat. I saw these Leggera's at an amazing closeout price and decided to give them a try. They are full Kangaroo Leather with the Rotax style cleat pattern and the engage removable insole. One thing to be weary of when buying them is that not all of them have the Axeler soles. You can instantly tell if they do by looking at the bottom of the shoe, you will see a wire going back and forth. Some people have advertised that their Leggera has the Axeler system but they actually don't.It is a very classic cleat with no goofy technology pumped into it so if you are looking for the latest styles, look elsewhere. If you are looking for a quality cleat that will get the job done without screaming, "Look at me", than this a cleat for you. So far it offers a very supple feel on the ball and it feels like I get more power out of it. The traction is excellent and it is a great feeling shoe. The one thing to watch out for is the sizing on it. My advice would be to go with the European sizing as I find that to be more accurate between brands. The 42 (8 US) that I bought fits just a tad looser than my Addidas 41 2/3 (8 US) but the 8 Umbro Owen 10's I tried on at a store were SUPER tight because they were listed as a 41 (8 US). Finally, the Leggera's come in Black with white, Silver with Ferrari Red, and Pearl White, the latter which I bought. I have always wanted white shoes and I must say that they make me feel faster:) Overall these are great cleats and they feel like they will last me a long time.Update: I have used these shoes for 5 pickup games so far and I love them even more. At first they gave me a blister on the back of the heel just above the protruding bone but now that they are broken in they no longer do that. Keeping them clean is as easy as keeping some Kiwi cream in your bag and wiping some on after each game. Get them while you can!
Not much to add here. Birkenstock makes the best sandals, period. This one is no different. I got it at a good price. More than that this sinful world cannot provide .....

I really like this shoe! It's hard for me to find a shoe as narrow as I need, but this one fits just right across the toes and on the heel. It's a little wide at the instep, but I can definitely live with it. I was a little dissappointed to find there is no arch support. I think if there were a support, the wideness would disappear.

These sandals are the most comfortable shoes I have worn in a long time. I have several pairs in different colors and practically live in them all summer. I would recommend them to anybody who wants a pair of sandals.
My wife tells me that these Teva flip flops are the most comfortable summer fip flop she has ever owned. She loves them and has bought several different colors. Great product.
Great shoes for cheerleaders! They are durable, don't tear up real quick and last. This is one of the best pairs of cheer shoes from Converse that I have purchased.
These boots are extremely comfortable and very stylish. I'm very happy with them!
I was in between choices of the patent leather and leather black. This choice is a great combination of both..
I adore wedge heels and this shoe has a high enough wedge to indulge the "Diva" in me. they are fun, sassy, and very comfortable.

I bought these in both white and stone. I really like the stone, as it doesn't seem to stand out as much as the white. Also, it's a nice change from white all the time. My mom liked the stone color when she saw mine, so I ordered a pair for her as well.We've noticed there is a change in the way Keds have been made since the 90s. They are not as comfortable. The arch can be "bumpy" or nonexistent, and they run a little small. I wear a size 8, and the stone pair are tight on me. Tighter than the white for some reason. I'm sure they will get better as they break in, but I've never had a pair of Keds that is this tight. My feet actually hurt the first day I wore them. That never happened to me with Keds. And I have narrow feet. Someone with a wider foot couldn't wear these comfortably, at all. The sneakers also don't last as long as they used to. I wore Keds a lot when I was in high school, and one pair would last me a long time. Now, I notice the edges at the bottom of the shoes start to come apart with much less wear, and the footbed becomes very flat and uncomfortable. They don't feel as cushiony as they used to, even when brand new. Very different. Wearable, and I like them, but they are not as good as they used to be. I suspect they were not made in China a decade+ ago. I think they are made smaller than they used to be, because even looking at my feet while wearing them, I noticed they make my feet look smaller. I like that, but, not at the expense of comfort. I might try an 8 1/2 next time. The white fit better for some reason, not so small.Update: I wanted to add what happened in my experience with the stone colored sneakers. I am downgrading this review from 4 stars to 2.They were very tight at first. I thought I had broken them in because they felt better. However, after wearing them several times, I noticed that my small toenails had started to turn inward a little. I have never had foot problems in my life, and I am sure that this happened to my nails from the tight Keds. I have not worn them since and will not wear them again. I will probably throw them away. I went back to wearing my old white pair on days I want to wear Keds.I'd recommend if you try them, make sure you try them on right away and if they feel at all too small, send them back.
I love these shoes! They added to my new years eve outfit. I'm soo glad that I used amazon.com to find them. Took me a long time of looking to finally find these shoes and at a great price.
These are the only shoes my feet will wear! They are supportive, comfy and perfect for someone who has to be on their feet all day!

I bought a pair of Yaktrax last winter as I had heard how good they were. I put them on a pair of boots that I wore all winter everytime I went out in the snow or ice and I could not believe how great they are. I was so afraid of falling before I got them, now I can go out and not be so afraid of falling. I just ordered my second pair from Amazon. Yaktrax are great!!! Yaktrax Walker Traction Cleats for Snow and Ice
I adore these boots. So well made and the calves width has plenty of room and the heel and sole are so comfortable. I am so pleased with these.
good looking shoe, well constructed, but size runs small, at least 1/2 size.

I so love the kangaroo leather.They fit like gloves.My feet don't hurt even on the 1st day.Feels great touching and kicking the ball.This is my 4th pair since my high school days.These boots are the best so far.
This are super confortable shoes if you do not mind the 'men' look. Great with pants. Wear for 8h or longer with no pain, padding is extraordinary. The brown is beautiful.

Greatest Most durable boots I've ever purchased. I'm actually very surprised with these for the price I paid. All comparable boots in local stores were easily twice the cost. I'd highly reccommend these boots to someone who wanted something long lasting.

I have had these boots for about 4 months now and have been real rough on them from the start. they were a little uncomfortable while breaking them in but now they fit like a glove. I have green superfeet insoles for more arch support and couldn't ask for more. The leather is pretty scratched up on the outside but they clean up nice. I walked all through germany and italy in them and while my feet hurt like hell, it wasn't due to the boots (too much walking and standing for someone like me). I work in a mechanics shop and its taken the continual fluid spills and corrosive chemicals that I encounter every day. My girlfriend accidentally ran over them today and aside from a broken pull tab on one side they were ok. these boots have surpassed the two other pairs of doc martens I own and I expect another year or so out of them. I definitely recommend these boots to anyone looking at them..
So glad they make them in a size 16.. I do wish there was a larger selection to choose from but after size 13 the selections naturaly dwindle.

These were a Christmas gift for my son in Kentucky. He is a photographer and does a lot of work with breast cancer survivors and did a photo project with the women before and after treatment. Always wears the pink sneakers so people will ask him why. His other pair was quite tatered so I was extremely happy to find a replacement.
They feel comfortable and true to size. The black and white go with everything. I'll be buying this same pair again.
The slippers are brightly colored but do run a bit small in size. I bought a pair for my daughter and myself, we do like them.

This boot is fantastic. Its a updated and improved version of the 1970 Israeli commando boot. I have worn these in the desert, climbing-rapelling, even diving. New sole and foor support helps with foot fatigue and protection, drys fast without usual wet boot issues, very easy to maintain and all at a fraction of a price of most duty boots.

I have purchased at least six pairs of Crocs previously and I have always had great luck with them holding up through all kinds of wild little boy behavior. Which is why I am really disappointed that the straps on these Crocs broke after my son wore them 4 or 5 times. Maybe these were seconds of some type? Fakes? Not sure, but very unhappy to be purchasing another pair less than two weeks after purchasing these.

What is there to say about these shoes besides the fact that they're very comfortable, feel great (redundancy), and look good? Not much, I guess. What else do you say about shoes? Did I mention that these shoes feel great on the feet, as they would feel anywhere else? Seriously, buy a pair if you're into that whole wearing-shoes thing. $40 or so for a great pair of shoes, very good deal. I mean, you could do a lot worse; you could be spending any money at all on a pair of Crocs. (Whatever America did to deserve those, we sincerely apologize.) Anyway, wearing them with a pair of shorts is fine, but if you're vain when it comes to your legs or you're not quite ready to let your friends know that you too shave the fuzz from your legs, wear these Originals with a pair of trousers, khaki or gray, whatever you're feeling. The shoes are casually athletic, like white guys who say, "Yeah, I play soccer" but in fact have never played soccer for a recreational team and have little-to-none-at-all knowledge about the sport, but the idea sounds good. What's better than running around on green grass, sometimes getting to kick a ball, in short shorts and a jersey, giving yourself and others the impression that you're athletic? You're fooling everyone, don't worry. And after you wipe your forehead and throw your short bangs back, covered in sweat, after you trot over to the sideline, breathing hard, grab a towel, wipe yourself off, sit down in the grass and not the bleachers (on purpose, of course; athletes don't sit in seating apparatuses), take off those hopefully-filthy cleats and slip on these cool-as-hell vintage shoes. I promise they will reinforce your image as an athlete. Did I mention they feel like a foot-rub given by the most beautiful girl in the world? Please, wear these shoes with a sense of honor: be yourself, and for God's sakes, don't pop your collar.

I ordered the Reebok Women's "Princess" Aerobics Shoe in White, size 9M. It is a great classic shoe, not too sporty, not too fussy. Doesn't look like a "kids" sneaker. They are very comfortable and springy, with top-quality stitching. These shoes will definitely last. Shoes have a very soft terrycloth lining and a thick padded tongue. They shipped very fast and arrived 2 days ahead of schedule. And the price can't be beat! I paid $34 for them and for the same price in the store I would have gotten cheap knock-offs that would have fallen apart in months! One thing I did have a problem with is that they are a little too narrow for the base of my toes - ordering error on my part, I should have ordered a 9W. It's not too extreme, and I expect they'll break in and get more comfortable. Can't go wrong with these shoes!

Most important is that the Stephanie pump is comfortable. It's true to size and still available in narrow (AA) widths. I'd like to be able to get (AAA). The colors are Black, white, taupe, Navy, and bronze.

First let me say that i love naughty monkey shoes! nect these shoes are extremely comfortable and even with the high heel. The color is said to be green but is more or less brown with some army green accents. Thank you for another great pair of shoes.

These boots have a sturdy, comfortable sole with a heel that is easy to walk on and ample toe room, but beyond that, I am disappointed. The material is very thin and flimsy (don't expect the shaft to hold up like it does in the picture -- it sagged and wrinkled on my thin calves, leaving a huge gap between the shaft and my leg). In short, if you're looking for comfort, affordability, and have the calves to fill these out, they are a reasonably attractive boot. But don't expect anything beyond that. Given the thin quality of the material, I doubt these boots would last long.
These are great sneakers. Easy to put on, wide width and the colors keep then shoe looking clean. I would def recommend this sneaker.

I got these boots for Christmas and had to send them back soon after putting them on. They fir very awkwardly and were too uncomfortable. It felt like there was enough padding and they were well constructed. They just felt really weird on my foot. I opulent walk easily in these boots.

Problem with this shoe is that they don't carry my size 8.5 double E. So why is that I am having a problem finding my size. Is there some kind of conspiracy going on the the size department. To me there is no excuse of not carring my size.

I can't add much more to all the reviews about the versatility of these shoes, but I will cover what I like best about them.First and foremost, I wear them around the house instead of bedroom slippers. We have ceramic tile floors, and in the past I have had problems with plantar fasciitis. Anyone who has suffered from this will know how painful it can be and how long it can take to heal. In order to avoid this, I have had to purchase $400 orthotic shoe inserts, which my insurance (like most insurances) did not cover. I used them in my tennis shoes, but they didn't fit well into my slippers. Also, I like to wear a sandal-type shoe in the summer most of the time. So basically I only used the orthotics about 10% of the time; a huge expense for so little use. Crocs really solved that problem. I got rid of all of my other sandals and slippers and pretty much wear these 90% of the time year round. I recently bought a pair of lined Crocs for the coldest months. Crocs have excellent arch support and also provide cushioning for every step I take. I haven't had a problem with plantar fasciitis since I started wearing them years ago.We travel a lot and spend several months of each year camping. We have a small motorhome and usually end up showering in campground bathhouses. We don't like to go into the showers with bare feet, and the Crocs are perfect for shower shoes. They're also handy to use in hotel rooms where we definitely do not like to walk around in bare feet. You don't have to pack a separate pair of slippers. These are your shoes and your slippers. I also like to wear them in the car on long trips so that I can slip them off and back on quickly and easily. And of course they are great for the beach. You can wade into the water and not worry about ruining your shoes. No other shoe is this easy to wear when traveling.Basically, what I love about Crocs is how easy and quick they are to slide on and off. I usually keep the back strap pushed up out of the way unless I'm going for a long walk and want a little extra help keeping them on. You can rinse them off with a hose or in your laundry sink, or you can throw them in the washer with a load of towels if you really want to make it easy on yourself. When they first came out, I thought they would be a fad that would come and go. After owning them for a number of years, I can't believe someone didn't come up with the idea sooner. They are no doubt here to stay.
I received my sandals in great condition and fast. I recommend this person for future sales.

My cons were cheaper than getting them in the store and are my first pair. I love them they won't be my last. The people I ordered from through amazon sent me a shipping confirmation and on the confirmation it said it was a different shoe, but when I got them they were the ones I ordered from amazon so no harm done.

Awesome shoes, only complain is that I got a hole in each shoe by the Toe over some months, otherwise these shoes IMO are the best ones in terms of look and feel and comfort. I would not switch brand to any other as these shoes are so comfortable and very well built offering a great support.
I liked the shoe because of it's support to my ankles but it doesn't do to much if you have flat feet.
What can be said about a pair of canvas tennis shoes ?They fit, the laces tie, I wear them.

These shoes hurt my daughter feet which is who they were for. I did not recieve the shoes for approximately 10 days and by the time my daughter came over to try them on and I got on the site to download the info. to return them I was already past the 15 day limit to return. This was a horrible expierience and not sure I will be using amazon anymore.

Now first thing is first I am not a dancer... at all but I bought theses shoes because they where cute and I wanted something nice to wear around the house. Now I saw that people where complaining about how to shoe gapes around your foot. Well you know the string that is in the front? Untie those and pull them has hard as you can and BAM it gets tighter! I got annoyed for the same reason because I thought about taking the elastic off and moving it to the gaping hole but after the string became untied I tried that trick and now they are perfect. Another thing is I would suggest to order at least a half size smaller because personally I like shoes to be a bit snug but this is my thing. Just another note if you are in a dance class then its better to take the advice of your teacher V.S a review from amazon :)
The sizing is way off! My daughter is a 4. Ordered the 5 - too tight. Exchanged for the 6 - too loose but keeping. Would prefer to buy in a store but couldn't find.

The boots are comfortable and easy to wear. Are not heavy, which was the main reason I was looking to replace my other pair. The boots are durable and appropriate for the snowy winter in Boston. Water does not penetrate them at the bottom. Nice buy!

Thank you so much for your prompt arrival!! These were purchased as a gift to my best mate and the godfather to my daughter as he is a bit addicted to shoes! He absolutley loved them and put them on straight away! He found that the added spare pair of red laces was an added bonus! The size was perfect and the description exactly as advertised!Thank you again for your quick service and quality product!

I gave these shoes three stars because they are comfortable and good for just walking around. However, I would not ever do anything that involves running or jumping in these shoes. The aharp edge on the bottoms make it difficult to land safely. I've sprained my ankles three times in these shoes playing volleyball (went up for spike, came down with the worst sprain I've ever had), basketball (sprained while trying to cut while running; foot sideways and my ankle gave), and once just walking (walking along a sidewalk, I stepped on a tiny pebble. my foot went sideways, and the edge of the bottom cause my ankle to go out instead of helping my foot go flat. minor roll, could've sprained). I'm prone to sprains, but I've never had this many issues with any shoe before. Here's hoping it doesn't happen to someone else, though I'm sure it has.
Feel like I 40 yrs. younger. For a causal shoe for Santa these are Great. I really enjoy them feels great to be able to wear a really well made shoe. Thanks ConverseSANTA GARY

After trying on every pair of flip flops at a specialty shoe store I picked these as the most comfortable. Comfort is my primary consideration but they also look good too. I purchased a red pair and later a black pair on Amazon. The bottoms do not become slippery when wet nor do my feet slide around. I ditched the Teva's for these and I highly recommend them.

I purchased this tennis shoe for my 87 yr old mother as she wanted a pair like the ones Ked's made 25 years or more ago. The shoes arrived very fast in the mail to her, but the rubber sole much thicker, not like the ones originally made by Keds. Also, she is always a size 9.5 narrow, this is the size I ordered, but they were too short. If she kept them she would have had to have a size 10. Unfortunately, these shoes are made in China,so who knows what you are going to get. Why don't we have these shoes made in the USA where then the size would be correct?

I like it. They are very comfortable. I like reef sandals always since I first tried.Me gusta que este diseño traiga el abridor de botellas. No lo he usado aún pero como vivo en Costa Rica espero usarlo cuando vuelva a ir a la playa :-)

I chose this product over other slip on shoes advertised because of the aggressive sole. I live in snow country (Tahoe) and was looking for a shoe that I could slip into after removing my snow boots. The shoe still had to provide good traction for athe occasional jaunt across the parking lot in ice and snow. They fit great and give great traction. The only criticism I have of them is that they are not very waterproof. The suede upper stains very easily. I should have immediately applied some form of spray on stain guard...was concerned that it would darken the suede in a non-uniform manner.
it looks really cool and really comforible. everything on it is great except sometimes there will be some dirt that sticks to the dark black part in the front even if im not walking by dirt.
Excellent quality. I just wish the whole shoe was patent instead of top and heel.

Big fan of Top-Siders for many years, but the Gold Cups still need a little "breaking in". With the Deerskin lining, they are hard to slip on a bare foot, especially under the tongue. I thought the Deerskin sole lining was coming unglued because it started to pull out stuck to my foot until I pulled the lining out to reglue and found that it is Velcroed in. All in all like the quality of materials and craftsmenship. Would defin. buy again. Terry in Solon, Ohio
My son wanted either red or green Chuck Taylors which are fairly difficult to find. The shoes I bought arrived quickly, were good quality, and were priced very reasonably.
My Husband loved these Lugz. He even liked the color. I would recommend these to family & friends. The product came in quick & was what I expected.

I love the look of these shoes!!!When sitting and working at my desk, all i have to do is look down and see these shoes and I get a smile on my face :) They are even prettier in person than on the screen. (I bought them in bronze)One thing that I really despise is when toes overhang sandals. I normally wear a six and sometimes a six and 1/2. ~Bought these in six and one/half. That was definitely the smart move. I would say that they run a bit on the small side. I'm having a little of the overhang (tsk! tsk!), hence the 4 and not 5 star rating. I'm going to look for those things called "foot petals" and see if those will help.Also I have worn mine in the house to "break them in". That is also a good move. The straps are very thin. They take a little getting used to.Living in Los Angeles (temperate weather) I'm expecting to wear these through the Fall. If I have any problems, I will come and change my rating. For now, GORGEOUS and loving them!
great product my husband works on a aircraft carrier all day and these really come in handy.
These are the only shoes my mom can wear comfortably. Great product and good price. Have ordered other colors for her
A great shoe. Doesn't show off a lot. Really comfortable, and never out of style

I ordered shoes an got those by accident. So I wanted to send them back and I got a refund. The only irritated thing is that this company has a return form that demands that you send it back and make sure you add insurance and tracking number and they'll refund that as well when they get their shoes back. They didn't. it was only about $6 but still... you promise something - deliver.
These shoes are so comfortable to wear. I actually brought them in 3 colors. They are great for me to wear to work in the summer (except when it may rain, of course). I absolutely luv them!

This particular shoe is a staple to my adidas collection. I have spent countless hrs searching for this shoe. Before the Airforce 1 there was the Forum and there will always be "The Forum". If anymore of these white/white/white in size 13 come available please let me know. I need to add 2 pair to my existing pair. If you work for Adidas and just happen to be reading this listen up ..... The white/white/white should be available year round and not on your mi adidas site that offers the shoe for $140 and I cant get the ENTIRE shoe in white. Thanks. Love this shoe.
I received the great Moccasin slippers, correct color and size, in a timely manner. They were just what I ordered and I was very pleased.

Love, love, love! This is my second pair. The last pair I had for approx 6 years! They are still wearable but a little thin under the balls of my feet so I decided to buy a new pair. These are the only shoes that give me the support that I need when I am pregnant.
These shoes were instantly comfortable. They required no breaking in process. What a great deal. I wore Mizunos before, but love these now.
The fit is perfect.I also ordered the exact same pair in black. The Black and Navy are so similar in color, I really only needed to order the black. The color is exactly as pictured.Prompt arrival.
The shoes are very cool. And so is the price. Fast shipping also.

Robeez are absolutely great! My son and daughter wear them from birth. However, the elastic on these is a bit too tight so I just replaced it with a longer one, which made the slipper a bit looser at the ankles. Another brand that I LOVE is Bobux. Same quality and they go up more sizes so your older toddlers can still enjoy the comfort of these slippers.

i work retail and this is the best comfort shoe ever. I am on my feet all day and have worn Merrells, Birkenstock's and Joseph Seibels and these are by far the best. I have a wide foot and a high arch and they are perfect. I bought the orange color first because I liked the color and combination of leather/suede. I wore them all summer and fall then bought the black and wore them on a tour of Australia, New Zealand. We walked every where for three weeks and my feet never hurt. They are pricey but well worth the money.

I own two pairs of the Softspots Tela, and wear one or the other to work practically every day of the summer. They're soft and cushiony. Could do with a bit more arch support, but I can live without that. Get this one instead of the enclosed huarache - it's not as padded. This one is great for wide widths!
Hands down best shoes ever made. Yup, that's right. Comfortable, versatile, look great with everything - jeans, chinos, shorts, or a swim suit.
Being a Santa these shoes ar GREAT! They take me back to my childhood and what I do now. How fun. I get so many complaments.Thanks so much for making such a great product.

I wear the size small with socks. I have it in a few colors now. It feels like a cloud. I actually choose it to wear at home intead of my slippers because they are more comfortable and comforting. Corrdinate them with clothes and wear matching socks and they are less conspicious. They are really great because they feel like a cloud. The soles are non skid so they feel really safe. I am not a vegan, but know that vegans struggle with non leather choices and think now the finally have something that works for them that feels good.I hear men choose black or brown to wear with Kackis. I think these are a great breakthru. If your feet hurt like mine you will love these. If you are lucky and you can wear high fashion shoes you are lucky. If you hurt this could open a world of comfort to you. Try the differnt models and styles because they fit differently. This size did not fit my mom and like I said the cayman looks similar but does not fit me.I looked on the crocs official web site and the have higher fashion ones in additon a RX line that is a medical line. I am going to try some of the dress crocs and see.Oh I reviewed some microfiber chenille socks and that is what I like to wear with my crocs. Crocs makes their own socks but they say cros all over them and I do not like logos.
good looking shoe, well constructed, but size runs small, at least 1/2 size.
I bought this for my son and this is what he has to say: "These boots are great. Completely waterproof. They are very comfortable on my feet and fit perfectly."

I have these shoes in Black, Brown, Red and White. I just love them. They are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. I can wear them all day, even shopping, and my feet don't even hurt! It's amazing! Just last week I bought a fifth pair - I've been wearing them all summer, and I don't know what I will do when it gets cold and starts snowing - I'll have to move to Florida so I can wear them all year round! I just love them - and they are so afordable also.

I purchased this shoehorn for my husband. His last long shoehorn broke, and he was in dire need of one.The beauty of this shoehorn is that is is long, with a grip handle, and make my husband's experience of putting on shoes fabulous. In addition, my husband uses it anytime he needs something that is long, or to reach an item that is high, etc....It is not only the best shoehorn there is, it can be used for virtually anything!!!
I ordered for my son for Christmas . ...he loves them ..I didn't know the left sole was different from the right but one is for gripping and one for sliding
Timberland Men's Euro Hiker Boot, Grey/Grey,9.5 M US great boots for work or very day life very comfortable, worm and soft inside great boots for fare value.

This is my 3rd pair of AP1 Easy Spirits - each pair lasts from 2-3 years at least, and I have to walk ALOT for work. These wear well and are very comfortable! I hope Easy Spirit NEVER stops making this type!
They fit great, they look great and are built to last. They shipped fast too. Can't go wrong with these.

How can you not love Tony Lama TLX boots! Rubber soled cowboy boots in the 'rain city'. Pretty much a must have living in Seattle! Super comfortable boots that will hold up in the weather. Plus, they are stylin! Love! my Lama's!

These boots are not true red. They have a bit of dark brick or maroon tinge to them. I was disappointed in the color but my daughter did not notice. They seem comfortable and sturdy, although after just a few weeks there are a few spots where the color has flaked off, but I'm not surprised because they are being worn hard and often.

I bought these in 8.5 as a successor to my Evolv Defy shoes, which I had in 9. The fit was very snug at first, so much so that I could only wear them for a couple boulder problems at a time. Around a month later, they've broken in to the point that I can send multiple sport routes before having to take them off.Soles are nice and stiff and I can stand on far smaller features than I could with the Defys. These also smell far better.All in all very good shoes. If you're a vegan like me, it's one of your few choices but it doesn't feel like a compromise.

These all black Chuck's are my favorite All Star model ! It is no small task to find them at a regular retail store-most often your best bet is to buy online. They shipped in a timely fashion. Great Kicks, good deal.
I really like these sandals. These are very comfortable and I always get compliments on them.

Very light but with plenty of cushioning. I am 6' and run my marathons at between 185 and 109lbs. 3:30 best, 1:31 best half marathon. My feet do what they want and I almost forget I have these on. I tend to wear my shoes on the outer side so i could use more high abrasion rubber there but I will buy these again.
This is a nice sturdy shoe, but no matter that it is advertised as a "slip-on", a shoe horn is very much needed to put it on.

TROOP Footwear is back for the 2k3 and they are hot. These shoes not only look amazing, they some of the most comfortable shoes ive ever wore. they are definately worth ever penny i spent on them. Anyone who knows the TROOP story will tell you that these shoes were one of the hottest shoes to come out back in 85'. This new line out is made by averix and they have totally done justice to the name. I recommend you pick yourself up a pair or too, either on here on Underground station, Shoe City, or any other store you can find them. Hope you enjoy them as much as I do.
Love these shoes--they're cute and comfortable. And they come in size 12! I have them in the blue and the red and wear them all of the time. Quick shipping, too!

The Dansko Professional Clog is the only shoe I can wear for the entire day and still be happy at the end of the day. I love these shoes and I own them in every color, (almost). Buy and be comfortable!
These are the only work boots my husband will wear. They do run big so he gets an 11 instead of his normal shoe size of 12.

How can you go wrong with a pair of classic black Chuck Taylor's. Just keep in mind that the shoe sizes run BIGGER. I wear and 11 and ordered a pair of 11s. A whole size to big for me. I don't mind returning, but just keep that in mind.

Very light but with plenty of cushioning. I am 6' and run my marathons at between 185 and 109lbs. 3:30 best, 1:31 best half marathon. My feet do what they want and I almost forget I have these on. I tend to wear my shoes on the outer side so i could use more high abrasion rubber there but I will buy these again.

My work takes me out in bad weather frequently, and I really need a boot that will keep my feet dry. I have suffered through 3 different pairs of "waterproof" boots that gave me no protection--you get what you pay for, I guess. Someone suggested I order from L. L. Bean, and I was getting ready to fork up the dough, when I saw these in an e-mail from Amazon. They are not fancy, but they ARE waterproof! And, after an initial breaking-in period, they are quite comfortable. I am thoroughly satisfied with these boots.

Mono-Black Chucks are amazing utility shoes. I wear mine when:* working (with tie)* sledding* partying* hiking* gardening* attending black tie formal events (yes really)Ironically, the thing Chucks are bad for is the shoe's original intended purpose: athletics & sports.
My wife reports that this shoe is not only good for running but walking too. Try it you'll like it.
The Men's Moc Slipper is OK but the sole comes off and I have had to gluethe sole back on 3 times in one year.Not the QUALITY you would expect for the PRICE!

Right out of the box I knew these were going to look awesome with casual clothes for work or fun -- Love the Navy color, the white laces are a stark contrast and complete the outfit.Enjoy wearing them!
Skechers are like walking on air. If you have a problemwith your feet or ankles, skechers are the solution to comfort.

i was unable to find this line at three major department stores where i have previously purchased easy spirits for the past dozen years.they are extremely comfortable and long lasting.i probably should have bought more than two pair.i recommend them highly.

These sneakers are great. Super comfortable and fit really well, esp. considering they were bought online...Keds are well made I think, and they were delivered to my door in a short time.. a little pricey, but well worth it

THE SLIPPERS LEAVE BLACK MARKS ON MY FLOOR THAT I HAVE TO SCRUB UP EVERYTIME I WEAR THEM. I LOVE THE MEMORY FOAM AND THE FEEL OF THE SLIPPERS SO WAS REALLY DISAPPOINTED THAT THEY LEAVE THE BLACK MARKS ON THE FLOOR.

I just bought a pair of these off here and am VERY pleased with the whole process. Shipping was fast as expected, and the Wallabees are SO comfortable. After only wearing them for one evening, I have already felt how quickly they adapt to your foot and the comfort they provide. BCBG shoes hardly disappoint me...these sandals are the perfect blue, true to the size and very high: exactly what I was looking for.
AWESOME shoe comfy from the get go and looks beautiful. it does run 1/2 a size small

My sister in-law recommended this product when over for a gathering to my mother-in-law. Since she does not have internet access, I mentioned that I could get her a set if she wanted one. I did and now my mother-in-law is very happy. She has a slight inclined drivway that gets a light coating of snow and ice that makes it hazardous for her to get her mail. She now has no trouble walking out anywhere in winter and lets me know how appreciative she is of me for getting them for her. This is a great product for anyone who needs to go out in icy conditions.

My toddler loves these! He had a pair he outgrew and likes to wear 'shoes' around the house. They look cute, fit well and he can get them on and off himself. The only thing I don't like (which is true of all crocs) is they don't breathe well. I'll let them wear them inside as house shoes but won't allow them outdoors.
very comfortable shoe. I have worn these for many years & have many colors. Good with casual or dressy. I was so happy I found the black again. For a long time they weren't available.

I've bought this style shoe over & over for years for all day comfort. Also having osteoporois, I feel safe from falls. And appearance is important, too, of course. #1 all the way!

Way better than I though it would be. escpecially for $50. Love this shoe and I plan on buying a couple more pair in different colors.. amazon has the cheapest price i've found especially if youre with prime.
These and another pair of Roper's I purchased are so very comfortable and I wear them to work (I'm a nurse) very styish & recommend for everyone!

the image has saturated colors that are stronger then the real product. the shew is nice but its not as nice as it looks in the display. i like the good deal they gave. i got the shew with a small pigmentation so i don't know if that means that theses shews are on discount because there not the highest quality but from an overall look at the show and the way it feels on my foot I'm happy and i don't have strength to deal with sending the show back for it but its a shame that they don't sort out.

This product has performed very well for us. It dried the kids boots and gloves within two hours during the sloppy wet winter season. It dramatically decreased the nasty foot odors and my kids loved putting on warm boots before heading outside into the cold. The DryGuy worked exactly as stated. My only regret is that we did not get one sooner.

This is my second pair of these shoes - I literally wore out the first pair. Very tall, very pointy. As far as size, I'm an 8 and they are just a tiny bit big - my heel slips a little when I walk, but I think a 7.5 would be too small.

the shoes were perfect and came right on time. however, the very first time i wore them, they got scuffed by a tricky curb. i wish you could have installed some kind of invisable force field around them so that they would stay so white. you really need to work on that.

I bought these shoes mainly because of the color,I always wanted red shoes. This the first time I have been able to find the right shade,I like dark reds. I am not in great shape,but was able to walk six miles strait though ,with no breaks.

For me, Clark shoes, slipons and sandals have always been a cut above the rest. This purchase is no different. The sizing is accurate, the quality of construction is great, and they are very comfortable.Once again, I recommend Clark products and the shipper was fast and friendly.
Not as red as pictured. Overall I'm ok with the item but keep in mind that the colors are not as vibrant as pictured.
This item was ordered as a gift for a relative, my nephew in Kansas. He received the item promptly and is very happy with it. Yes, we would order this item again.
excellent!!!My daughter wanted red and we couldn't find them anywhere, not even on the converse site. So we are real pleased with Amazon for finding them for us.
Love these moccasins! They are so comfortable, but I have very narrow feet and had to pull the drawstring a bit tighter to keep them on my feet.
These shoes have been my favorites over the years, and are light weight, yet last a long time. Delivery was normal, and I would purchase these on-line, again.

This is my second time purchasing this shoe for my child. He outgrew the first pair and I ordered more because the quality, style and comfort are awesome for the money. Will continue to purchase these shoes for my child as his feet continue growing.
These are great bedroom shoes, very comfortable, very sturdily made, soft inside with nice ribbed soles on the bottom. I like the nice dark brown color, too.
I like soft cushioned shoes.But these are a bit hard.I like hushpuppies shoes. I tried this company this time. Not great shoes for me

Good shoe for nurses, aides, waitress, etc. never need to worry about laces coming untied and shoes have very professional appearance. However, I wear a AFO brace and cannot fit into these shoes. I plan on returning the shoes for Propet Tour Walker that I have worn in the past with the AFO brace.
Excelent!, hard to football and soft to my feet XD... great quality ass adidas always do, durable and exactly like my needs.
