You would expect a name like timberland to have reached a certain level of expertise to be able to build a $ 100.+ shoe that can compromise between comfort and toughness... ,but it doesn't .
If you want a shoe that gives no matter how much you stand on your feet-these are for you! Comfortable-affordable and well made-best shoes for your tired feet!
A very nice shoe & great looking. I had to return it because it wasn't narrow enough but it looked great on me & I was tempted to keep it.
I received my shoes in time. Great product. I recommend it to anyone. I think the price was reasonable because the shoes are very well made.
I love these shoes. This is the 5th pair i've bought over the past 3 years. They are wonderful for hiking and very quick and easy to put on. I would highly reccomend them to everyone.

I ordered thise for my son for Christmas. He usually wears a 13 but would have needed a 12 in these. He didn't really like them for hiking; they are more of a work boot. You can't just ship these back to amazon; you have to pay to do it.

I got this bag, and was very excited. All my friends loved it, and so did. BUT, I have used this bag for less than 6 months, and it is falling apart. The leather handle started to peel away, which I have glued now twice. I even went as far as taking it to a leather store, to see if they could fix it. The guy said it is only bonded leather, and it is going to continue to do what it is doing. Then said, I hope you didn't pay alot of money for the bag. I didn't reply. IT GETS BETTER, the other day, one of the metal studs by the handle fell off, and I can't find it. So I have this hole by the handle now. If I knew it was going to do this, I would have never spent the money. And I would NOT spend over $100 for it, it should be less in my opinion.
This shoe is very comfortable and so far easy to clean. They were comfortable at the first wearing. They are excellent when you have a lot of walking to do.
Did exactly what I thought they would. Which is, be shoes. I am still wearing them and probably will continue to wear them for some time.

The way one dresses is a form of expressing our likes and interests, we express our style down to the shoe, literally. Having such a vast variety of brands to chose from, what style and price suits best to an individual can be challenging. So why not save a couple dollars on a good pair of shoes that can give you style, comfort, and suit both male and female gender? Converse foot wear is the perfect answer for all of these categories by offering everything one can ask for. What was started in 1908 by Marquis Mills Converse with Chuck Taylor joining in 1918 as a sneaker for athletic wear would become a stye trend by the 1950's. The Chuck Taylor All Star collection is the most popular collection from the converse brand with the wide range of colors it has to offer.In this tough economic time everyone is trying to get the best deal on the products they want most, no one wants to spend over one hundred dollars on a pair of shoes because we cannot afford it, or we're just trying to spend our money wisely. Converse prices range anywhere from thirty to eighty dollars depending on the style of the shoe. Some of Converse competitors are Nike and Vans both having decent shoes but at ridiculous prices both having shoes start at fifty dollars and going over a hundred dollars, which is not worth the money. Luckily All Stars can save you a couple dollars and still be stylish.Not only is the price reasonable for this product but you also get an enormous variety of colors to select from making your possibilities endless. From personal experience I have used over 10 pairs of Chuck Taylor's and have many colors and styles to chose from. This collection being my favorite, with the options of choosing either high tops or the classic low tops one cannot go wrong.The classic style of the black and white low top is simply a must have for everyones closet. These shoes are long lasting and comfortable to wear the entire day. Having worn both Vans and Nike's in the past they were no where near being as comfortable as chucks are. No one wants to walk around with blisters on there feet from having a bad pair of shoes.Converse suit a broad range of ages from infants, teenagers, to young adults and even mature adults. Both male and female foot wear run in very similar looks making it almost hard to know which shoe is male and which is female which is great. From previously being a high school student and now in college I saw that this age group gets the biggest use out of chucks since they have a simple sold look to them and in no way are uncomfortable. These shoes are for a more casual look, and fit to any persons style, so they're for every day use making it easy in the morning not having to decided what style of shoe you'll wear because you'll know exactly what pair of shoe to reach for.Having comfort, style, and a great price for a pair of shoes makes ones choices endless, and makes you want to get more than just one pair of shoes. So why wouldn't you want to go get a pair of Chuck Taylor Converse, It is the best choice you can ask for and you most defiantly wont regret buying this pair of shoes. Best way to go is to purchase a cheap pair of shoes that look great a provide the best comfort as apposed to having a good looking pair of shoes on the exterior and uncomfortable on the interior.

I ordered these shoes and received them in LESS than 24 hours. I had ordered them first from Trendi USA and after 5 days they had not even shipped them yet so I cancelled and bought these from GamedaySoles and received them the next day. So I would suggest always making sure it says, Order Fulfilled by Amazon.The shoes do run a little big so I should have ordered them a 1/2 size smaller but it's not enough to return them. Just keep that in mind before you order.Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Shoes (M9166) Low top in Black

classic shoe. Mine came in not looking like the picture which is a pleasant surprise. Mine are darker and retail for 130.00. I am not sure how I got the darker ones because I cant find them for the price i got them

I purchased my first pair of Matai, by Naot, shoes in early September. I had some Naot shoes years before, and remembered how comfy they were. At first I only wore them a few days a week. Then I noticed that the days I wore them my legs and hip did not hurt as much. I fell on the ice last winter, and was finally going for a dreaded cortisone shot in my hip, after many other therapies did not help.Now I don't need it. Yay!! I have been wearing these shoes exclusively for almost 2 months, and have already purchased another pair and will buy another soon. I am so afraid they will sell out and I won't know what else to wear. I cycled through all my other high quality shoes to see how my hip felt. Dansko which I used to love, too heavy and more pain. Shoes I loved in the past, like Born, just don't cut it anymore with my hip issues. I had not had hip pain before. I work on my feet for 8 hours or more a day. I was beginning to think I would have to look for another job, but now I am mostly pain free. Thanks, Naot for these wonderfully crafted shoes. Keep them coming. PS, I am ordering my 3rd pair right now. My own testimony made me realize I needed the 3rd pair to keep them fresh! Try them. You will love them.

I bought these so my 3 year old daughter could start dance class because I wasn't able to find any stores in my area that sold them. I was a little nervous ordering shoes without having her try them on first but I went by the size chart that was provided. According to that, I was supposed to order an 8, however they are a bit small. I would recommend going up a half size from what is suggested on the size chart. They will work in the short term but I will be ordering at least a half size up if not a full size very soon. In the mean time I used my hair dryer to soften the shoe and stretch it out a bit so her toes weren't so cramped.Other than the inaccuracy of the sizing recommendations the shoes are great.
Allen-Edmonds always puts out quality items. This oxford style formal shoe has been discontinued so if you can find a pair spend the money and buy it.

I bought these to dance in: swing and cha-cha-cha. They are perfect. The height (2" heal) is elegant without making me lose my balance. And the fit is exactly the same as my street shoe size, making ordering easy.The tan leather is supple and soft and the hard leather soles of the shoes glide easily. The soles are cross-hatched on the bottom to provide a little traction, but I would not recommend wearing these as street shoes, since you will ruin them as dance shoes. I only wear mine inside on carpet or on hardwood.If you want to use these as street shoes, you will need to take them to a cobbler as suggested by other reviewers. I think that would be a wise investment, since they are really pretty shoes that go with everything from summer skirts to party dresses, and they don't cost a fortune.My husband even thinks these shoes are pretty and feminine, which surprised me. Like most guys, he never notices my shoes! Why oh why do women waste hundreds of dollars on Choos and Blahniks anyway? These shoes are as elegant as you will ever need, are all leather, and are reasonably priced. My husband even suggested I get a pair in black!Happy dancing!
I had a pair size the same as my shoes (13) and did not enjoy themWhen I got this pair (14-15) I use them every day and enjoy them a lot.crocs rock!
The shoes are nice but not in the way I expected. I should have ordered them a bid larger and much wider.

I received many compliments when I wore these bowling shoes for a company bowling fundraiser.... they are sooo retro.Better yet, they are extremely comfortable and offer great support while bowling. No more sticking to the bowling lane with the rented shoes.I only wish I'd bought them sooner.
shoes are supportive, and wear well on both roads and trails.

I ordered both a sand and a black men's size 10. The sand was properly sized, the black was tiny--the sole was 3/4" shorter than that of the sand. Return of a defective product netted another tiny black 10. It's pretty clear that they have a warehouse full of improperly labelled black size 10's, and that nobody at Amazon reviews the customer comments about an order.
+quick delivery, good product,-had to pay extra customs, would be nice if rates are mentionned...didn't know that...

Got my boots to go hunting just a day before leaving for the trip. Hoped they would not require break-in as other reviews suggested, and indeed, they fit great on my narrow (A/B width) feet and were flexible and comfortable right out of the box. I did insert Super Feet orthotics in lieu of the provided half-orthotic. It does slightly increase the height of your foot in the boot to do so, but I like the comfort and extra arch support I get with the orthotics, and didn't cause any fit problems for me. If I had any sort of quibble with the boots, it would just be that they don't have padding at the top like the Danner's Trophy boots, but it's nothing that socks with some pad on the leg (I use snowboard socks) won't solve. So far, they've help up well in rocky and uneven terrain, and my feet weren't tired like they usually are after trudging around all day. A great investment, as I expect these pair to last me for decades (and be repairable/resole-able with the stitch-down boot) , unlike my last pair where the synthetic midsole just disintegrated after about 10 years.

Great buy pluss good confure, worth the money.And great look for casual dressing,they feel like walking on air.I recommend this foot ware to any one that like to feel there feet in confert. Worth the money.
excellent!!!My daughter wanted red and we couldn't find them anywhere, not even on the converse site. So we are real pleased with Amazon for finding them for us.
I love these boots! They are my second pair of bearpaw and they are fantastic! My daughter has uggs and really these are softer inside. Very cozy... Very cute... Very affordable.

We have ordered a pair of these shoes from Amazon three times before and have been happy with their durability. This time we were able to get these in a narrow fit which have been perfect for our tall yet very thin daughter. Again we feel this was a great buy.
The sandal is stiff and the quality is so so. The original price is marked much way too high compared to the quality.

While they look nice and are light weight, the length seems to be off between the left & right shoes. Left shoe fits nicely, but the right is cramped for my big toe, even though there is plenty of room in the toe box for the rest of my toes. Have not had a problem like this with any other shoes.
It is true that they come larger than the regular size. They are comfortable casual shoes but would recommend them for long walks, they give me blisters.
Very good quality boat shoe. Superior to comparable brands.Nevertheless, the shoe's (M) could be misleading.As user of Timberland's brand, among others, Dockers is definitely Narrow.

I usually wear a 10.5 in most shoes, including Vans, which are my normal brand. The 10.5 Chucks that arrived are almost a whole size larger than what i'm used to. They are more like 11.5 They fit fine width wise, but my toe barely reaches the white rubber in the front. So word of advice, order a size smaller than you think.
Perfecto estado hasta Venezuela! Excelentes y de buena calidad recomendado al 100% ningun problema en lo absoluto! . . .

Crocs rock! I wear mine everyday. They are not the most attractive footwear, but I don't mind and since they are so popular, no one really judges the look, just the feel! I hope they are always available. I will wear them the rest of my life!

I was always critical of crocs because, in my opinon, they are some pretty ugly footwear, but I thought I would give them a try. Being in Afghanistan and having to use public showers, you really dont want footwear that is going to fall apart on you. These things not only do the job when it comes to showering, but they are just extremely comfortable. Waking on gravel back and forth from the tent to the showers, you cant even feels the rocks under your feet. As assumed, they breathe really well and just good shoes to wear around and kick back in. The only thing is that they ran rather big and I had to send the first order back. I wear an 11.5 and a 12 was absolutely gigantic. I ordered a pair in 11 from another site later on and they were perfect. yes, they might not be the most visually appealing shoe on the planet, but they are amazingly comfortable and durable.
i love these shoes, they are so comfertable. and are easy to clean. I plan to buy another pair in another color!

I love the look and design of this shoe. It's so stylishly retro, the ultimate sneaker. However, that's where the love ends.I've used Superfeet arch supports for years because I have very low arches and knee problems as a result. I don't typically care what kind of insoles shoes have when I'm shopping for new shoes, because I know I'll just pull them out and insert my Superfeet. However, to my dismay, the insoles in these shoes do not come out!! What shoe manufacturer makes shoes with non-removable insoles?!! Apparently Adidas. For me this is a deal-breaker, and I've returned them. Despite what I've read, these insoles have very little arch support.

Wow, my first review. Naturally, I would review the T-Macs first, but I just love the Reebok Amaze classics. I got the baby blue and white. If you cool ghetto and urban, defintely it's a pick up. Comfortable, stylish, good ankle support, and lasts for a long time. I just keep buying more of it.

I had them since I was in HS and they were one of the most comfy shoes I have had since. I am now about 3 years into college and they continue to be my favorite pair... And of course, Globe knows their stuff!Enjoy!:)

One of the LOWEST & CHEAPEST quality shoes I have EVER seen!!! Any positive feedback (in my opinion) must come from an employee or someone with VERY LOW standards...DO NOT BUY!!! They WILL NOT last very long!!

I saw these moccasins in a store in San Juan Capistrano CA but by the time I went back to get them, they did not have my size anymore, so I found them on Amazon.com. Lucky me! They are so soft, and comfortable. I like the color because it is neutral and I can wear them with anything and they will be good in warm weather.

If you are considering buying docksiders, the Billfish model is the one to buy. I just bought my second pair, and they are terrific. The rubber soles and heels make them very comfortable to stand or walk in, unlike the basic docksider shoe with leather bottoms. They cost a little more, but are well worth it.

After wearing 574 for a few years I decided to try the another retro show the 420. While the show is nice looking and flexible. There is very little padding compared to the 574s I have had. I will wear the shoes till they wear out but will go back to 574s for my next shoe.
I like them. They are a little dorky looking but perfect for work. Very comfortable and great price, i recieved them on the earliest possible date, which was great!
I usually wear a 6.5 but they are a little big so I would order a half size down but other than that they're great.
These shoes have been the traditional Xmas gift to my sail boating son-in-law for 20+ years. He will not wear any other boat shoe. The 9 wide is a perfect fit. Most other brands do not come in wide.

I discovered Havaianas two and half years ago, shortly before a trip to Hawaii. I bought two pairs, black and orange, at rock bottom prices thinking it was insane to pay $20 for flip-flops.Good lord, I was wrong.These are the most wearable, walkable flip-flops I've ever known. I've walked miles in these things, across hot tar even. After two years, the original two pairs hardly showed depressions in them...this is highly unusual with the cheapos.I recently ordered 7 new pairs (crazy, yes, I know), and found all of the solid colored classics fit and look just as great as the ones I first fell for.

Purchased UGG Classic tall for my daughter but she preferred the short version. Unfortunately Metro Shoe Warehouse did not carry the short. Upon contacting them, they forwarded all the necessary paperwork for return and refund and within a week my account was credited properly. I am very satisfied with the transaction and would purchase from them again.

I've not had my Keen Newport H2 sandals very long, but so far I'm really impressed with the comfort. They fit my wide, sized 13 feet very well.Yes, you can wear them hiking. I tested them out on a trail that included asphalt, boardwalk, fine gravel and rocks. The Keens did great and stayed comfortable. I realized later that I was getting a small heel blister, but I hadn't adjusted the fit on that foot quite right - and I ran an asphalt section of trail just to give them a good workout and they never felt uncomfortable.I can confirm what other reviewers have said - that when something gets stuck in them you pretty much have to take them off to get the debris out, and they are slippery on wet rocks (the main reason I give them four stars instead of five), but overall they did great.I walked through a wet spring and they dried out quickly. I haven't had them long enough to tell if there will be odor or durability issues, but so far I really like them and would consider other Keen products.

I bought my first pair of Crocs while recovering from neck surgery over two years ago. I was really looking for some walking shoes so I could exercise in the Mall. Well, the Crocs were on display so I tried them on. Cheap, lightweight and oh, so comfortable. I figured they would last a few months and they would get tossed but, so what? Well I've worn that original pair for all this time and I've been using them this summer for my yard work. I hose them off and leave them by the back door. They've gotten beat up and they're now pretty worn looking but they are still comfortable and still practical for a yard shoe.Of course, they're goofy-looking in all those electric colors and that funky toe shape. Not an issue for me.These things are as comfortable as Birkenstock sandals and clogs but cost considerably less. They're so cheap, I don't mind abusing them. And they take the abuse and only need a quick hosing down to be clean and ready for more abuse.Since that original pair, I've bought two more. One pair is kept by the front door and one in the RV. I just ordered two more pair from Amazon on sale. I can always justify comfortable shoes.
I have used these boots while hunting caribou,moose and elk. My feet were always comfortable no matter if I were in the snow on a mountian or in a bog. They were also comfortable at the fire station.
Son states that these are one of the most comfortable pair of shoes he has ever worn - will be ordering more soon.
I thought these shoes would be perfect for a wedding...I think I expected them to be just little flats and not like a slipper. A little dissapointed.

These swim shoes get on and off easily even when wet. What I did not like was that there is no "grip" to keep you from slipping on tiles or smooth surfaces on the pool deck. I also needed shoes that would grip so I could work out better when doing water aerobics. If you need this too, then these are not the shoes to buy.If you plan on using them on sandy beaches, then they should be fine.

These boot moccasins by Minnetonka are great! I've been wearing them since high school. Feels like walking around in your slippers-- there so comfortable! Unique frontier, hippie type look that goes great with denim (faded looks best) and leather--particularly in fall and spring. More guys should try them out for a unique, confortable look.
Nice looking shoes, but the ones I received are way too small. They say size 7.5N, but definitely are not. I will have to return them.

Great with jeans, great for fun and sport but mostly a universal staple in ones wardrobe man or woman! I would order them again and in every color of the rainbow. I am not thinking of the high tops and the other higher tie up ones.

These boot are great for my work. They are very light, needed very little time to get them to fit and conform to my feet. Just like other reviews, they are like wearing running shoes. And these do get my feet hot. Very comfortable and stylish. I have received several compliments in the two weeks I have them.Great price and value. Plus they do carry 5.11 Tactical's lifetime warranty.
You would expect a name like timberland to have reached a certain level of expertise to be able to build a $ 100.+ shoe that can compromise between comfort and toughness... ,but it doesn't .
These worked great and the price was much better than I could find elsewhere. They do run a little big which is perfect - they'll last through the entire year of dance :).

The plan was to order these from overseas and pick them up from a friend's house when I holidayed in America. They were very narrow, and measured against other W shoes, were distinctly ..er..unwide. I had no chance to return them and so now I have a nice pair of moccasins I can use for a present for someone else.

Love these boots. They are comfortable and easy to wear. They look as new as when I took them out of the box on Christmas Day and I have worn them everyday since. They came to my front door the same week I ordered them. I will order again.

This boot is cute, comfortable and not too expensive. I'm a larger size 10 (10s don't always fit me but 10.5 can be too large) and these fit nicely. The platform wedge is a heel one can wear comfortably all day even when there's a lot of walking to be done and the soles are very light and don't stress one's knees. The floral pattern on the fabric part of the shaft makes this boot distinctive and a great casual style with pants or skirts. Roll your pant legs up, tuck in skinny pants or wear crops to show the pattern - the light color shows up well in dark clubs.

I have 6 pair of the Scout, and have had more that I have worn out! They are the most comfortable sandal I have ever worn, and I am about to purchase another pair. I am 76 years old, and have problems with balance and my back, and have had foot surgery, and the Scout keeps me moving!

I have owned 3 other pairs of these boots. I have worked outside and as a bartender. The lace up boot gives my ankles extra support in the late and long hours. and the Waterproof is a bonus. I can be standing in 2 inches of water, and my feet are nice and dry.I wear them with my work clothes or with blue jeans, and they look great. and they feel even better. Wouldn't travel or work without them.
I love my crocs. Walking around barefoot around the house hurts my feet. I love walking on these.
have been wearing this style of sandle for years, don't know what i would do without them. and i am a shoe person!
I love the way they mold to my foot shape. They are so comfortable. The color selection is very extensive.

I ordered these over a week ago after a long search for inexpensive Gore-Tex boots. They are comfortable, offer no pinch spots for my medium-volume feet, and performed well on a five-mile hike in 20 degree weather.I have two gripes - one, after such a short period, I've already noticed slight separation between the leather upper and the rubberized outer sole. Secondly, my sturdy-looking laces have already begun to fray and weaken in one spot.Both of these issues are minor, though, and easily repairable. I'm pleased with their waterproof qualities so far, and found nothing comparable in their price range.
The item is OK, just a color is different from the image that the seller showed in the website
Love these converse shoes.They are a great shade of red, have already got a lot of comments on them.Thanks Chuck!

Estos zapatos son de lo mejor, muy deportivos y provoca tenerlos todo el dia puestos.Sirven para uso diario o para practicas de deportes. Buen diseño, bastante agresivo. Lo recomiendo con los ojos cerrados.
A size different from my order was sentand I ended up paying tge return postage. The boot looks nice but it runs small.
I almost always wear a size 6 but as soon as I put these on, they hurt my feet. They are extremely narrow - returned right away.
The "roper" boots arrived promptly and were exactly as listed. They are well build and very comfortable as well as attractive.James Lyons

My husband wanted Crocs for house and outdoor casual use. He loved the fit and ease and waterproof qualities of his Crocs, but we were were surprised when the soles wore through in 6 months. We expected longer better wear of a "beach shoe." But still Crocs are Crocs: we ordered another pair.

I never thought I would find something like this especially in time for Christmas, thank you so much- they are awesome looking and the recipient will absolutely LOVE them as a Christmas Gift. I will be a returning customer for life.
Great shoes with a very soft heel. Had to order 1 size smaller than usual - size runs big. Received many complements on these.

These are the most comfortable shoes I can remember wearing in a long time and they look great with flare and boot cut jeans. I am going to buy my second pair right after I write this review, I wore my first pair so much I have worn them out!

I bought these as character shoes for opera performance. They are very uncomfortable for now and I cannot wear them more than an hour without swearing, but all the singers I work with tell me that once you wear them for a while, they become very comfortable...
These are good shoes. They have a classic look and the monochrome look adds a nice little something something. A good, safe buy.
These are a favorite. I have three pairs. I have a small wide foot and finding 3Es is tough. This new pair is for dress and the older pair is worn enough to look good with jeans
Nice appearance but rather small ammounts of polish. Brushes somewhat hard for shoe surface. Overall it is as depicted.

These boots were just beautiful! I bought them as a Christmas gift for my mother and they were a hit. They were well made and very stylish. They do fit a bit narrow though - so they're in the shop being stretched. I would buy Penny Loves Kenny boots again.
awesome shoes. what can i say. look great with pants, jeans, khakis. whatever. versatile, durable, sylish. you won't regret this purchase. maybe run a half size bigger than my size. but it's iffy.

I love these shoes. It takes a little break in time because they are leather. I love the ostrich and have been looking for some good looking shoes like these. I won't look any further. Thanks for such a pretty and well made shoe.

This is a beautifully classic shoe and quality is nice. The heel composition is the exception. It is a hard, hard plastic or rubber. It is very slippery on tile or brick floors. Be careful. As other reviewers indicated, the sizing is off. Consider ordering a half size larger.

I purchased a pair a couple of years ago to help strengthen my feet and recover from tendonitis. They seem to operate like those plantar fasciitis therapy devices that make you squeeze your toes to form a "fist" with your feet. My old sandals definitely helped! Decided to add to my Dr. Scholl's sandal wardrobe and received a new pair today. After struggling to adjust the straps like on my old pair, I realized the buckle does not slide. If you look at the side of the buckle you will see tiny screws on the side nearest the little toe. That is the hinge. Gently pry open the buckle from the side near the big toe; that will expose the pin so you can adjust the strap.

I have come to expect great quality from the Puma brand, and that's what I got with these flip flops. If you want something you can easily slip on and kick off, as well as enjoy comfort and style, look no further.Having said that, frankly I would rather pay less for a flip flop, but I'm paying for the brand essentially. Rest assured these aren't cheap pieces of rubber or plastic, though. There are three layers of platform material and the straps are nice. If you can afford the brand, go for it. It also may be worth noting thePuma basic sandal, which appears to potentially have even better support and comfort, is cheaper than the basic flip flop. I find that peculiar.Moving on, I brought these on vacation to Jamaica and I actually spotted someone else with the same exact pair. They were from Europe, proof that Puma is everywhere. We may have been the two most fashionable people on the beach! I'd say you can wear these flip flops just about anywhere - at the beach, at home, at work - but let me warn you that the thong post between your toes can become uncomfortable after awhile. Also, even though the outsole has somewhat of a grip, you should be careful on slippery surfaces. Other than those two caveats, these are comfortable and serve their purpose in a sexy manner.

These are quality moccasins, and extremely comfortable. The size ran slightly larger than actual size. I have another pair of Minnetonka Moccs and they were true to size, for some reason this pair is a little larger. I'm keeping them although they do slip off my heal a little but I'm concerned that if I go down 1/2 size they would be too small.Thank you for reading,Michelle

Bought these for our 15yr old son at the beginning of High Soccer season. Best soccer shoes he's ever owned. Made it thru August, Sept and Oct with either 2 hours of games or practices at least 5 days per week with minimal wear. The insoles were the first to go, however, he's still playing in the shoes over the winter because they are more comfortable than the Diadoras he wanted to try next. The shoes come with leather conditioner - we used it about every two weeks plus we kept cedar shoe trees inside the shoes when not in use. Some other brands may be a few ounces lighter, but I doubt you'll be as happy with them.
I love these! Softspots knows how to make them comfortable right away. Yes, they come a little snug, but it gives them the ability to shape to your feet. Very attractive! Highly recommend!

I ordered my boots because they sounded great. I am not disappointed,they are great right out of the box.Fit well except the tongue is very short and could fit better around the ankle more. My order was delayed because of the snow but i am happy to finally be wearing them. Thank you very much for selling these fine and affordable boots. P.S I will spread the word to all the people i know who want happy feet. signed Mark Berglund

After always wearing athletic shoes, I finally returned to my beloved Keds. They are just what I needed to wear with jeans and shorts to avoid the messy, clunky look of my big feet in athletic shoes. I really like the graphic color because it is so neutral that I think will not shoe dirt as much as white ones do.

Firstable I have to say that the service was perfect!!! They were perfectly in time and I really like them. They are warm and confortable. You must buy a smaller size. I usually wear 8/5-9 and I bought 8. Thank you Amazon!! and Happy Holidays to everybody!

I absolutely love love love these boots!!! I'm a New Yorker living in Atlanta and im so used to wearing these boots so i was super excited to find them on Amazon...On top of the fast shipping they arrived before Christmas...These are my work boots and they were packaged just right... I'm very thankful...and great job Amazon!!

Just what you would expect if you owned a pair of these 10, 20, 30 years ago, except with a custom peace sign logo on the outside only.They do sure highlight however just how far shoe technology has come by comparison to a pair of ASICS running shoes - in terms of support, comfort etc. They are 30 year old or more shoe technology.I hoped that logo would be on both sides but the inseam side of the shoe bears the traditional converse chuck taylor logo.Still, 5 stars from my view. They are what they are supposed to be.

I've ordered Ked's Champions in the past was very happy with the quality. The ones I recently received from this vendor are like the cheap rips-offs I could buy in ChinaMart for $5. No support, thin canvas - just junk. I'm taking pictures of them and sending them to Keds to ask if this is really their shoe. I think they are fakes.UPDATE - I did contact Keds and they admit they are not making these shoes like they used to. No support, no padding, more narrow, thinner canvas. I've bought Keds for almost 35 years so I know the difference. Save your money. You can get this same sneaker in any cheap shoe store for between $5-$8, it just won't have a Keds tag. This is no longer the bargain it once was. Another really good American product turned into the lowest common denominator. What's really sad is most of the people buying this shoe don't even know it's junk compared to what Keds sold just a few years ago.

I purchased these in preparation of a hike up Mt. Leconte in Gatlinburg, TN. After breaking them in, they fit great. I didn't have a single problem the whole hike and look forward to using them for future hikes.

i am very pleased with my purchase! i purchased these boots for my sons birthday they arrived sooner than expected in great condition! i had standard shipping and they arrived two days after i placed my order which was great so that i could complete my sons wardrobe for his birthday party! they were in good condition and authenic timberland quality!!! i would highly reccomend this seller to someone else!

Bought them for my husband's bday early this year, so far he doesnt complain. He said they are comfi. And ithey are also very stylish in every outfits; formal and casual. They are also cheaper than in stores. They are white, so of course will be so easy to get dirty but to me the dirtier they get, the more stylist they are. Lol.

The new style of the T-macs. These are the best. They are very comfartable. I bought them the day they came out. If you are into black then buy them now. Because I know they are coming out in White and Blue so they will have the same pattern as last year. So if you like black buy now if you like white wait till mid December. Otherwise this show is very comfy and better than last year.
Not what I expected but I was pleasantly surprised once they arrived. Delivery took forever because of the processing of the order...
They keep me on track and in balance no matter what type of workout I am doing.
I have worn Easy spirit Women's shoes for years and they are really a good shoe.Gives good support and always fits well.

I'm a loyal Reebok basketball shoe buyer, these being my 5th pair of Iverson's to date. I've worn Answer 3s through 7s, and they've always been pretty cool kicks with a strong court presence. I was skeptical about these at first cause they look too flashy with the pump and all however I've been proven wrong since I bought them 2 months ago. The Answer X pumps are legit, the pump system works incredibly well and gives you a truly close to custom fit sneaker. I really like the high ankle strap because of past ankle injurys I've had, with it I feel a lot more safe/stable. The pump works atuomatically as you walk. You simply turn it's knob to a setting and it'll inflate within your first 10-20 steps. I wear most of my Iverson's off the court as just stand alone sneakers, but not these. Theres no question about it, these are straight up baller shoes. I only use these when I play basketball, I don't wear them to or from the court, I take them off. If you're not wearing next generation basketball shoes for your game today, these shoes will blow you away. Definately is one of the best basketall shoes available right now. I haven't worn Kobe's or T-mac's, but I love these shoes so I'd be biased if I tryed the others right now. You won't be dissappointed with these. The only reason I give them 4 stars instead of 5, is cause my pump knob lost it's sticker gauge and the knob feels flimsy sometimes now. Overall though I think they've helped my game, and are the best Iverson's to date.
These shoes work excellent in a lot water conditions. My husband has been using them for more than 4 years. We tried others brands but this ones are the best.

These shoes were exactly what my son wanted for Christmas. He loves them. They run true to size and they are comfortable. He has a hard time keeping the tongue straight on the shoes. When he tightens the laces, it will stay in place.

Very comfortable sandle. Hard to find a good quality sandle that offers support and leave your feet feeling good even after walking a long time. The sole is thick enough to absorb hard pavement. Best sandle I've ever owned.
Beautiful shoe, but way too tight. Had to return and order a 1/2 size up and am hoping it will fit.

These are some of the most comfortable yet durable slippers I have ever worn. I needed something I could wear around the house every day but that could handle my hard wood floors. I think these are just the slipper.

My daughter wanted the tall gray classic Ugg boots for Christmas. I was worried that they would be sold out, or that the order would not arrive in time. It got here 3 days after I placed my order!!! The boots are great, and I am really impressed with the service - especially since shipping was free.
This is such a cute shoe and would be very comfortableb, but it runs small.
Not very comfortable feeling.They are very hard and dont flex much at all. We returned this for Leo's Unisex Tap shoes.They were much softer and seemed better made.
These are classic black gym shoes. We needed plain black gym shoes for the school play. These shoes were perfect.

Got the shoes really fast, however they didn't fit. Called the number got the information to verify they had the one I wanted in my size. Returned and got the replacement even faster than the original order. Excellent service. Will definately shop here again.

I bought these to replace a pair that I got over 15 years ago. That pair, BTW, was still in good condition except that the rubber sole had cracked and worn out. (I was able to have them re soled with a local rubber sole as the uppers were still very good and comfortable).The new shoes are identical to the old ones in terms of appearance. However, they seem to be a bit tight width wise, though this is probably due to the fact that they are new and need to be broken in a bit.These are THE classic boat shoe, recommended for everyone!!!
So far, good for my daughter. Comfort on the feet, no issues, just love the Endless Style, like other brand name shoes for women. She's enjoying them. Happy Holidays.
I have looked all over for red crocs and I found them here at a better price than the stores!

>Comes with an extra pair of black laces for you to exhibit your fashion spunk.>Also has the traditional white laces so that you can stay...traditional.>You get two pairs of laces for the price of one.>Note: the shoes come already laced with white laces. The extra pair of black laces comes in the shoe box.BTW, these don't come with the black laces as advertised. Obviously that's not why I bought them, but I thought it was a pretty good deal to get both white, and the black they advertised for. Overall, the shoes are good as always, but kinda dissapointing to not get what was offered. Guess I can't exhibit my fashion spunk afterall...lol.

These boots are quite the surprise! At first I thought "another tennis shoe boot" . Not so! I started to wear them to get a feel and they were pretty good out of the box. After a long committed hike of about ten miles I stopped and thought wow these are actually feeling BETTER than when I started! From there on I hunted in these for about 60 miles with close to 20 thousand verticle feet(checked by GPS). They were great! I have had two neuromas removed from my feet and soft shoes are a must have. These have been the best boots even against my Danners at half the weight and a quarter of the price. They also have great traction in all conditions. In wet deep grass they will get wet inside. They also don't stink inside unlike older boots of this type. Will I buy another pair? Well I'm shopping for another pair to replace these right now.

I have been wearing Ariat Roper boots with my uniform for the past 5 years. They are always comfortable and I usually get about 2 years out of them before they look like they need to be replaced. They were usually dull in luster though and required frequent polishing to look good. This new Black Onyx is quite shiny to begin with and makes it much easier to look nice between wax jobs. I do remove the insoles that come with the boots and replace them with Dr. Scholls insoles that I find more comfortable. For me they are the perfect year round uniform footwear.

I've worn them all over Disney World-- twice-- and never had the slightest issue. They're comfortable and hold up from year to year. They're like walking on clouds.I've made converts of everyone in my family, including my 12 year old son who hates flip flops. I just ordered a new pair for everyone on the family, and 2 pair for me.Buy yourself a pair. You deserve it!
Great seller, Super fast shipping. These are a great pair of shoes. They just have to be broken in before they'll truly preform at their best.

My orginal order was too big, however the instructions on how to reorder and ship back so as to maintain the free shipping offer were very clear and concise. The new pair arrived very quickly and were exactly as expected.
These shoes are great, not too narrow, just wide enough for my feet, plus the cushions are good and its light. One of my favorite basketball shoes.
Super comfortable.I have truly enjoyed my pair and plan to order more in a variety of colors.I can wear these all day without any foot issues. Very durable shoe.

I was worried that the shoes would be an ill fit. When they arrived I found my worries were for nothing because the shoes were true to size, not too snug or loose. The material is good, and the heel is strong! You don't have to worry about it snapping off if you have to do a lot of moving around (which happened to a pair of costume shoes I bought from a different seller!) they hold up fine. Highly recommended to break in the shoes before the event you plan to wear them for though otherwise you'll be sore all day. :) Also as other people have mentioned if you are a half size I would suggest ordering a size UP instead of DOWN.
I have worn Easy spirit Women's shoes for years and they are really a good shoe.Gives good support and always fits well.
Dit not fit, but that was my own fault.

When will there be more colours and sizes in 9M available???? This is a very comfortable shoe and good wearing. Will more be offered and if so,when? When one finds a good shoe and style it is disheartening that more are not on offer. Why change a good,sure thing????

Quick delivery brought my much needed white keds to me. I had my old pair for 7 years and they were falling apart. These are my favorites and I love the new keds logo showing on the side of the shoe rather than on the back. Very cool for keds! What else can I say, for 40 years +, keds classics have been there. I couldn't wait as a 7th grader back in the &*$@'s for my first pair and ditching those orthopedic white oxfords saddle shoes! Oh happy day! Been wearing them ever since. Now they come in a rainbow of colors (and new styles, too) but the white keds will always be a classic in my wardrobe!

I was really excited to get these and try something different. The length fit fine, but was way too tight across and right behind the ball of my foot. I've got them on boot stretchers to try and widen them out. I'd seriously reconsider buying another pair.

I bought these a couple of months ago and thus far they are my favorite shoe. Good for running, great for standing, very stable. They did at first seem kind of tight at the very front, but that's probably for a more secure fit. If you're somewhere between sizes, I'd say go with the larger one.

This is a wonderful shoe. I have always had trouble getting comfortable shoes but I really think these are great. The product description exactly matched what I received. The velcrose straps are perfect - I have had a lot of trouble in the past finding shoes with velcrose straps. I have undergone 3 spine surgeries and needed something comfortable that was easy to put on and do up. The shoes arrived in a timely manner and were clean and new. I have to do a lot of walking and have found these shoes to be the best I have experienced. I will definately purchase these again. Thanks for a great shoe!

THIS BOOT IS VERY NICE. I FINE THAT IT IS A BIT NARROW AT THE TOES COMPARE TO THE OTHER STYLE LIFESTRIDE BOOTS THAT I HAVE. I'M HOPING THEY WILL STRECTH A LITTLE BIT AS I WEAR THEM. I WISH THEY CAME IN NAVY BLUE!

Definitely order at least 1 size up- they run small and seem very narrow. If you have a wide foot, then these probably are not for you. I am a 9 and ordered a 10, but I wish mine were a half size larger. I've only worn them a couple times and they seem comfy enough- I do notice the difference in arch support between these and my cheapo Target flip flops that needed to be retired this year. I would definitely buy these again, but I would order a size 11- a full 2 sizes larger than I normally wear.
They look beautiful! A little slick, but that can be taken care of with some a little scuffing.

Being a Letter Carrier for the past 30 years,these are the best boots I've ever worn.I've had the conquest boot in the past and lasted about 4-5 years. After that boot, went to a less expensive boot to save a few bucks and made a big mistake,went back to the sorel boot and can't be more satisfied.They give you the support and warmth you need to work in the cold weather.So good,I purchased a second set to have on hand.sorel is the best.

I love my converse! You should get some too. I love theway they look and smell when they are brand new! They come in allKind of colors and you can make your own . they have lasted on theMarket since 1935! You need to run and your own pair right now!

I bought these for my Dad and he loves them. You get what you pay for. These shoes maybe a little more money than others that look similar, but they are far better. High qualityleather , and made so well. My Dad has a large foot and it's hard to find shoes that fit comfortably and these fit the bill! A+++++++++++

I like me fuzzy slippersthese are a bit expensive and feel tight on the footthey are warm thoughthere are less expensive slippers from the same sellerprobably have the same tiny slot to put yer foot inmaybe they will stretch outwe'll see they came in todaythey shipped first and arrived last

As a nurse I have to say I love these shoes! Bought them after an EXTREAMLY expensive pair of shoes came in contact with a code brown! These shoes have no cloth parts to worry about-- Loves the patient but didnt want to carry her code brown around with me in the fine mesh on my shoes! -- Also the treads are amazing-- no need for a knife-- toothpick etc to remove... dirt? just wipe them off-- they are really really comfy, convienient and best of all easy to clean. I have found the shoe for the rest of my nursing career here!

I had purchased these shoes long time back(purchased in 2005). They are still going good now. The sole is slightly worn out on the side, but rest of the shoe is good. Fits perfectly, does not slip and very comfortable.
These are my mothers shoes. She really love them. Don't hurt her feet at all. She has worn these kind of shoes for years.
I have this boots just a few day and use it just a few , i like this product, if in the next monts I don't find any problem I'll buy a new ones, no the same model, but the same comberse products
Cute shoes but my feet bulge at the sides (8M seems more like narrow). I'm not comfortable with the way they look on me so I hardly ever wear them.

This very attractive little sandal would probably be very satisfactory, but it runs both short and narrow. It is not true to size by any means, so rather than return them, I gave them to a cousin with smaller feet. They were on sale. Now I know why.

I ordered these shoes for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves them. They look great and are true to size. He said he wishes these shoes had more arch support because he has to wear insoles, but that is typical of this particular shoe.
I love them! I actually wore them last night! They are very comfortable ad the know doesn't bother me at all. I would recommend them to anyone.

At first, these boots are really warm, I used it in -5oC and it worked 100%. Second - they are really comfortable, and not heavy at all (heavier than sneakers, but light for the boot). the only problem I've got, is that it's hard to maintain it clean, or undamaged, but for me it doesn't matter, I bought these boots for hard working purposes. So I recommend you to try and buy these ones, they'll provide warmth and protection in any weather (in my opinion)

The mocs were beautiful, soft and supple, and didn't fit at all. With feet swollen from a recent accident, I thought they would be perfect for the times I actually have to wear shoes, and was crushed because they didn't fit. Other shoes, marked less wide, do. Classic Vans. The style hasn't changed in more than 10 years. I've had mine since 2002 I dont skate so much but I love the style, this shoes was a little bit bigger but it's ok..good choise VANS OLD SCHOOL
Unfortunately, I did not received this product on time so I had to wear something else. This will not stop me from ordering from Amazon again. When I receive it I will give a further review.

These aren't quite the quality of my previous Sperry Topsiders, but they're still really excellent shoes. These are a hair tighter and the leather quality isn't quite as soft. However, I believe that if you're looking for boat shoes, you'll have trouble finding better shoes than these.

I LOVE the style of Converse, always have. But the quality of the shoe is going down :(. I have had my black pair (They look just like the ones in the pic) for about 2 years now, and they're pretty much starting to fall apart already. I dont even wear them everyday! Very disappointed in the quality nowadays, but they are still stylish. (Until they fall apart)

...Chuck Taylor All Stars are good for doing squats. That's why I buy them. A lot of athletic shoes have a good amount of padding on the bottom, which is fine for running, but while doing squats, makes my feet feel slightly wobbly. The Taylors allow my feet to stay firmly planted, which helps me maintain proper technique.
I'm so glad I brought these shoes for my father because he's been wanting a pair for so long, so I got them and he loves them. They're a great Shoe for a great price.
Comfortable shoe and cute. Had to stretch as was a bit too tight but perfect now.
14+ hours and no pain...must have....you will love them and they last 6-8 months if you wear them everyday...just bring the price down and will buy in bulk...

I bought these slippers as a gift for my teenage son, who has not liked wearing slippers in the past. He says they are warm and likes that they are easy to get on and off. However, they became a little too big after he wore them for two weeks. I had ordered size 16, since many reviewers had suggested ordering one size larger than actual foot size to get a good fit. My son has decided to keep them anyways instead of waiting for an exchange pair. They appear to be constructed well and I hope they will last for a while.

This is the second pair of boots I've owned of this style, and I forgot how cheap they were. My old pair of steel toes have worn out, so I wanted a cheap leather boot to transplant the toe caps in.There's really not many great things about this boot apart from its price and it actually is pretty waterproof. It takes a hell of a long time to break in, the leather/constructed is cheap, there was a staple sticking out of the sole into my foot (it was easily removed, but still, wtf?), and I KNOW the insoles are gonna fall apart by spring. I would have also liked to have known that they were made in ChinaFinally, in an unexpected flaw, after the first time wearing them out the laces tore up the tongue and stripped the finish on the leather. That's likely something you can't fix. Considered sending them back over this.I'm not saying they're not decent once they brake in and take a few beatings, but just be weary that your buying some of the cheapest leather boots out there, likely made in a sweatshop.
I'm a professional gardener and it's hard to find a good workshoe made for women. This is a great work shoe - provides good support and is well made.

Well, what more can I say? They are nice shoes for the dress blues... I had trouble finding the ones I could manually polish, but these work... Just make sure not to scuff them... Because for the most part, scuffs do not come out... Cleaning them is simple and can be done with windex. The shipping was also quick, faster than Vanguard's second day, even though I did standard shipping with these... But they get the job done...
It is said you're no better than the tools you use. This tool is perfect in it use and looks [by the various un-requested comments I have received.

I brought the women's classic tall ugg boots for my daughter for christmas she love them, she stated they were so warm and cozy also comfortable. only thing she hope they start widening the upper part of the boot, some of us have bigger calfs than others.

I've been wearing Chuck Taylor's since the varsity issued them in High School. I wear a half size (can't get them @ the mall). Amazon had my size & color selection (this is the third pair I've bought-I'm still playing). Everything else (convenience, getting the order right, getting them delivered quickly, etc.) was excellent. I'll buy @ Amazon again.
On my third pair in last many years. Must be satisfied with this model. You will be pleased with these for yard work, hiking or general industrial work.

Comfortable and practical shoes at a reasonable price with prompt delivery. I've been wearing Rockport shoes for decades. I know what size Rockports fit me so I'm safe buying them on line. This is my second pair purchased on line and I have no regrets.

I have worn these shoes for years. They last me about 7 years (alternating black and tan ones, that is). Have them re-soled several times. The leather is thick and high quality so the shoes are initially stiff and require breaking in. This takes wearing a few times and I have even gotten blisters during break-in. But, once they fit you, they are great and polishing and sole dressing makes them look new after several years of use.
I love these shoes. However, I ordered the wrong size and exchanging them has been a hassle. It has been over a month and I do not have the shoes or the money and no one can seem to help me.

I hate you guys, seriously! No, not the product! The shoes are absolutely wonderful. No, no, I hate the people who reviewed these shoes.Why? The majority of the reviews say to order smaller than you normally would if you are a half size. And, well, I did just that and the shoes do not fit! I repeat: Do not order small, they will not fit.I'm a 7 1/2 normally. I ordered a size 7 - like ya'll told me to - and guess what? My toes are beyond scrunched in 'em. These are absolutely unwearable and I will be exchanging them for an 8.Thank heavens the event I need these for is still over a month away. I hope this review gets read so people don't have to go through the same thing.
Love these shoes! Have been wearing them all my life and still think they are the best! Great price and super fast shipping! Couldn't,t be happier!

Bought this for my son. Thought that I had the wrongsandal but customer service was great in helping me.This was the double stack. Did not look like that fromthe side. You must look on the inside of the foot.He is happy with sandal.

This LifeStride shoe is one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever had - I like it so much I have it in three different colors. Even after wearing it all day my feet are feeling great. You can't go wrong with this shoe.
What can I say great shoes and a competitive price. These shoes take the rough beating that a toddler can levy on shoes. They look great and are easy to clean given they are waterproof.

These Grasshoppers are an identical replacement for a pair I have worn to shreds and couldn't bear to part with as they are comfortable and durable and fit well. They were hard to find and I was delighted to find them on Amazon.com. My purchase went smoothly and the order arrived as promised.Roz

My Crocs are phenomenal. I have to have them for school and they are soo comfortable. Great product

these boots are great. the only grip i have is that the buckels are cheap. i had mine replaced by a very good boot repairer. i live in washington and it's very wet here and i've had no problems with these boots. i highly recommend them if you are to wear boots alot. also they are soft and there is no brake in time.
I have recived the converse shoe yesterday.. opened the box and took a close look at them, really do not like the finish and they really do not look original to me. i am thinking of returnig them

I bought this last year for ski boots. It worked ok, but the biggest problem is that it tends to tip over if the load is not balanced. So I end up loading it back-left, front-right, back-right, then front-left. It works, but a little awkward.Also, for some ski boots & buckles, the posts are too close together, so it required ADDITIONAL planning to load it so that everything fits.Also, my recollection is that the air is not really WARM, just adequate.Bottom line: I will probably continue to use this. But I will be buying a similar item as a present this Christmas, and am looking for a different brand/model, that may not have these issues.
Teva makes great sandals. This is my second pair, and I wear them constantly. Thank Heavens for Amazon where I got them for $10 off.
size was not true to us sizing,so a send back and reorder was required.

For all of those people who would rather pet the animals than wear them, these are the shoes for you! I got these shoe in black. Great fit and are very comfortable.Lady Darline

These shoes are really cute and pretty comfortable (relative to other brands. For Aerosoles, they're one of the least comfortable styles I've owned). Overall, great product. Note: if you have wide feet, order a 1/2 size up because these shoes are somewhat narrow.
These were a perfect fit for my girl, she was excited to see them under the tree. She loves them and the were shipped very quickly.

The shoes I got were the pink glitter ones. They were true to fit, perfect for my Halloween costume and very comfortable. I gave only 4 stars because they were a little stiff and the glitter caused some snags in my knee high stockings. Overall, highly recommended.
These shoes look fantastic, but they seem to be a different shape to my feet - they're too long and too narrow, giving me blisters on my pinkie toes.

I've worn Bostonians for over 15 years and they are great for my weird feet. I'm wide at the toes and narrow at the heels and the Bostonian wides fit me great. They last forever - I have one pair that is on its second re-sole.

It felt so tight and uncomfortable for my instep when first tried on. Not sure whether it's an exceptional irregular pair or it meant to be tight for it's my first time to try for the volleyball shoes. But throughout the first game with my new shoes, other than it felt a bit tight to 'breathe', it's overall comfortable and stable, better than my non-volleyball shoes.

MY HUSBAND WAS VERY PLEASED WITH THIS BOOT AND I WAS PLEASED WITH THE PRICE AND ALSO THAT THEY ACTUALLY FIT HIM. YEAH,,, HE IS HARD TO BUY SHOES FOR.
