I would recommend these shoes to anyone who is either just starting out or has been going at this for a while and needs a new pair of shoes. Perfect fit.

I got these shoes to work catering wedding events on a recommendation from other servers at the events. You are all your feet all night/day and by the end of the night my feet would hurt so much, it would travel to my legs and back. I got these shoes and wore them right away to my first event and was amazed. They were very comfortable, didn't take a lot of breaking in. Good if you are on your feet all day. Almost every other person working was wearing a pair.
Love these sandals. Pricey, but they last forever so it's not hard to justify the price. My feet and knees feel great in these even after wearing them for hours at a time.
Normal chucks...awesome as always. I've worn them for the past 2 years. They're looking a little worn now, time to buy another pair. :)

As i say i bought it for a friend and he says that is great. He wasn't wait too long for it (thanks!). He got a RDV with girl, he planned to wear it at the rendez-vous. He was worry thinking will he get it at time.

i love these shoes, this is my 4th pair and my second pair from amazon.com, i love them and i can't find the good colors in stores but amazon always has every color ever made so i always have endless options.
Vert comfy - but I would suggest a half size to full size larger if you are not fimilliar with such bodacious heels - they make your legs look KILLER!

Great moccasin. I love to walk around the house in them. They keep your feet nice and warm. I have several Minnetonka moccasins but this one is one of my favorite because of the soft soul bottom. I was a little skeptical about buying soft sole moccasins because I didn't think they would last long but I've had these for about 2 years now and they are holding up very well with just walking around the house and to the mailbox occasionally.

Comfortable and relaxed once the boots are worn in. I usually wear size 11 shoes and reviews recommended to go one size smaller. I ordered 10.5 and they fit great. After researching the Internet Amazon.com offered the boots twenty dollars cheaper than the Frye's website.

Actually allowed me to put my orthotics inside these shoes. Usually my orthotics only fit in athetic shoes, so I was pleased. I do have hammer toes, and got a few red spots on top of my toes, but I don't know how I could have avoided that.

I have never tried these moccasins before, and I need to rave about them for a moment. They are very comfortable, and beautiful to look at! They conform well to your feet, and the suede is very sturdy. About the sizing, I was very scared to order a size too small. I went with an 8, and I am usually an 8.5 or 9 in womens. The 8 is a perfect fit, with about a quarter inch to spare. Although this is the first time I have ordered them, it is definitely not the last!
I had forgotten how much I loved my "sneakers" back in the day when I routinely wore Keds. Now I am in love with them all over again. Great shoes!

This type of sneaker is not a durable quality sneaker at all. I have purchased at tag sales old Ked's sneakers for $3-$5 dollars which were much more durable. I save this pair purchased for going out on business trips or the like since this type of Ked's sneakers wouldn't last a week with my daily work chores, sad to say.
The boots were beautiful, but were too small and I had to send them back. I did not re-order another pair.

Actually allowed me to put my orthotics inside these shoes. Usually my orthotics only fit in athetic shoes, so I was pleased. I do have hammer toes, and got a few red spots on top of my toes, but I don't know how I could have avoided that.
I purchased these for my mother and she was happy with the color and the size. Thank you very much.

I am 67 years old and have worn these type of shoes most of my life. I started with Hush Puppies and then switched to Wallabees when they first came out. There is a place where you can have them resoled if you wish. Wallabees are highly recommended by me but of course they are not for everyone.

Found the Trailmeisters on sale for $40 and at that price they are a real bargain - probably wouldn't pay twice that price though as I can usually find something comparable from Columbia for less. These are great light-to-medium duty hikers that can do double duty as casual sportswear as they are attractively styled without being too flashy. I am a slightly wide 11 and the 11 in these fit just fine. Plan to do a little breaking in to get them to the optimal comfort level before hitting the trail for an extended hike, though the break-in period didn't cause any undue discomfort. In my experience one ought always break in hikers before committing to the trail to maximize enjoyment and to make sure there aren't any fit issues. I have owned many Columbia hikers and they are built to last. All in all these are winners - good support, solid construction, and comfortable.

Brooks are good shoes..My favorite are Sauconys hands down,then Asics, then Brooks...Id feel well protected in these shoes but i can tell the variance. ounces different , seem like bricks sometimes compared to a lite weight shoe... like the look
These are the only sandals I wear. Have been ordering these for more than seven years....why buy anything else?

Crocs, I've found, are something people either love or they hate. I happen to love them and have numerous pairs in many colors. I've reached the stage in my life where comfort is a priority. I truly have never found a more comfortable shoe. All the written and other media articles about safety on escalators are overblown, to my mind. Accidents with these shoes always seem to involve children who are likely standing too close to the edges of the escalator stairs. I've ridden many escalators and have had no problems with any of my Crocs.

Already have Chucks in white, which I wore for the b-ball team in high school...yeah, when Chucks were the shoes to be wearin'!! Decided to re-live days of Sandlot Black PF Flyers with the magic wedge, make you run faster, jump higher! But when I got them, they were about a 1/3 size too small and the shoes felt uneven (one bigger than the other, both still tight). Thought I could wear them in and couldn't. Chalked up to a loss. Paid less for black Chucks and they fit true to size! Love these black Chucks! GREAT PURCHASE!!Wonder what the difference is in the monochrome black. Anyone know?

I was very disappointed when I received these boots. They are now made in china (not too surprising guess) and made out of the toughest piece of leather ive come across.They were rediculously stiff, even for a new boot (I have several other pairs of leather boots lace up and non and none of them were as bad as these when new)Overall I would not recommend these boots, you can order the english made ones else where Id try that or buy a different brand
Good traction, and you can feel where your foot is in relation to the ground. The laces are secure and don't flop around.Very good product.

These grasshopper shoes are one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. The sole of the shoe is cushiony and you almost feel like you are walking on air. I was a bit concerned about the light color (they only had beige available at the time of purchase). There was a little bit of dirt on the shoes and it wiped them off lightly with some warm water. I would definitely recommend these shoes especially for summer and the warmer months.

I really wanted these because I needed really comfortable sandals for traveling. These are not it. They scratched my feet and caused a lot of blisters. I sent them back to the manufacturer in the hopes that they could fix them. No such luck

I bought this shoe in August of last year. I have worn them for about 300 hours, most of that time spent standing and walking, and walked many miles in them in all weather and all kinds of pavement. I guess the wear I put on them might be a little above average. I love the fact that a $70 dollar pair of shoes is of such high quality, has a leather sole, and looks so good. My only complaint is that after a year of wear, the soles, especially the heels, are wearing very thin. The leather heel is very soft, and wears down to the wood very quickly, which looks a little ratty now. It's not too bad, and if I find a cobbler I'm sure I can get that taken care of, but it is an annoyance. I highly recommend these shoes, but don't expect the soles to last more than a few months of intense wear.
However I liked the style of the shoe. Will order the right size in future.

My husband has plantar fascitis. His heels were hurting him terribly. He is on his feet all day at work and we had tried every over the counter insole available, and, a custom made orthotic insole that actually made the pain worse. We had tried Nike, New Balance, Propet, Dr. Scholls, and Reebok shoes and didn't get any relief with any of them. These Spira shoes in a wide width (E) provided relief. The problem isn't entirely healed, he still experiences pain daily. But I have absolutely no doubt that if not for these shoes he would not be able to work right now. He has been wearing them for about six weeks and I can't anticipate ever buying another brand of work shoe for him. Will probably invest in a pair for everyday also.

I love my Naturalizer Perth sandals so much that after I got them in white, I started searching everywher for more in other colors. I now have three pair of these, and they are the most comfortable shoe I own.
These were a gift for my son in law. Came just as promised...he loved it.
great product, just as advertised. The item was purchased at a good price and the shipping was fast. I would purchase from this person again. they come highly recommended.thanksusm1975black

Awesome product!!! I purchased this for my husband for valentines day. He had looked at the shoes and was not impressed; however when I surprised him with them- he loved them! He thought they looked great, felt great and what a great bargain! In fact all of his golf buddies were impressed and wanted to know where he had gotten them. The quality of the actual product far excedes what the picture shows. They are true to size and are of superior quality and workmanship. Thanks for a great product. The sandals are awesome as well!
Shoes do not fit my feet well but provide great support and wear comfortable. The bottom is a little slippery after several times.

These flip flops are not the same as the Reef GINGER flip flops I bought a couple years ago and still use. There is not as much arch support as my old pair and they feel kind of like cheap styrofoam soles. I'm still going to wear them, but if you are buying these to replace an older pair... they are not the same. On the positive, they are true to size. I wear a size 8 and they fit.

This is the classic Converse, basic black sneaker. They fit fine on my wide feet, and they have them here in half sizes and in women's sizes.They're a good price here and you can't go wrong with the black/white basic Converse sneaker. They're good for mom's, teens and kids, both male and female.The only drawback might be that they lack arch support.I would recommend this shoe to anyone except someone with really flat feet.
I have been buying this size and style shoefor many years... Increasingly, it is not instock at local outlet stores... glad you stock it.

For the money, I don't think you can buy a better hiking boot. In fact I think these boots are a great buy even at full list price. At least for my feet, Hi-Tec boots have always been long on comfort and durability. I've had these boots for several years and worn them for hiking, birding and general outdoor stuff. They're great for keeping your feet dry crossing streams or walking through wet grass. They require little if any break in. There's really nothing wrong with the laces that come with the boots, but for just a few bucks I prefer some good round boot laces on them. For me these are easier to tighten and have a more substantial feel.
Fit is very good and thick sole adds to protection. Love the look and hope they last. Will come back in a year and let you know,
Very nice shoe but nothing grate nor outstanding. I ordered by my exact shoe size and it is a very tight fit.
bought these for my wife... she's been wanting a pair of low-cut red chucks for a while. Ordered these for Christmas and they came quick with no issues.

These are great sandals! I bought some last summer and haven't been able to locate them locally, but fortunately they were available on the Internet. Love them! One of the most comfortable sandals I have found.
I have had these boots for two years now. I love them so much that I have ordered a pair of tall ones for those extra messy days. I never have wet feet when I ware these!
I have always had problems with shoes fitting. These have been the best shoes I have ever had. I have problems with my left foot after tearing all the ligaments, these have been a life saver.

Good part: it's airy, good looking, cushioning as they said, received on timeBad part: It's too tight around your foot and I would say you should consider this factor before to buy it! However, you can get a little bit comfort if you keep shoelaces loose otherwise ok

in South America the native people used to coat their feet with rubber tree sap and bake it on next to the fire to walk across the mountains.Crocs are that awesome without all the bother. get some now.
good quality leather. sturdy work shoes, and very comfortable. great non skid sole.
This item was a gift. It was received in time for Christmas 2011. received in great condition. The shoes are super comfortable and very stylish. Great buy! 2 thumbs up!

i bought these sandals after i found out at the beach party they had a bottle opener built-in..yes a must have. then i realized that they were very comfortable and you can walk in these all day with no back pain,for me this was fantastic! i recommend to all to have the comfort and the fun! Great product!

Very comfortable boots. Actually make you want to walk. But forget about being waterproof. Its very temporary. This was my fourth pair. They all have leaked, and soon after wearing. If they could solve this problem, I would buy again.
Love the black lower edge color. I have a couple sore spots after wearing all day. The past keds fit a little better. Wonderful shoes otherwise.

I LOVE these boots; they are very warm, and VERY comfortable. I bought a pair for myself, and my son. They were received promptly, despite the Christmas season. I would recommend this seller, and these boots.
Very comfortable and cute shoe. I wear a 9 AA and rarely find great colored shoes in my size. I bought these in aqua and am very happy with the fit and the look.

From the picture, the style of the shoes looked good. But when arrived, the style was too squared. It is still comfortable and good value for the price. However, make sure you like the style first before you buy them.
i got these shoes back in like early January and all ready the side is coming apart there is a open on the side. but there good shoes.

I have been wearing Clark Sandals for many years. They are a product that has always lasted with quality. My latest pair that I purchased through Amazon.com are they same good quality that I have experienced when purchasing them from retail stores, but far less expensive. I am very pleased with this experience. Thank you.
i just started dance classes.. this are very nice. comfortable. went with just about everything i wore. i have then 6 months and holding up very well.
the only problem i had with this shoe was the sizing, i usually wears 8 or 8.5 but the size i bought was 5.5 so it was a little bit unusual!!!

my son bought these with his own money and we were disappionted to find out the sizes run very large. Wasn't made very well, sides began falling apart. Wouldn't buy this one again. Did arrive quickly.

I bought two pairs of Adidas cleats. This was one of the pairs.I purchased them thinking of the comfort they seemed to provide based on the photo. And yes, they're very comfortable, it's like wearing a regular sneaker, but alas, after 20 minutes of sprinting on the field my legs really began to burn, the weight these cleats have is at least twice that of a regular mid cleat.I'd rather wear some worn down pairs I have at home that these, the unnecessary added strain on my legs is just too much.

My knees were killing me and my toes were ate up with blisters and black toenails (gross I know, but you long distance runners know what I mean). My shoe guy put me in this shoe and voila, no more blisters and no more sore knees (well, it wasn't quite voila as my knees took a little while to adjust to the change in mechanics and heal up and the toes are still healing, but it was plenty quick for all that). Anyway, I'm in heaven. I didn't realize I was an overpronater, well I thought I was, but didn't realize how much a shoe could help. Also, these shoes are a little small (as are all running shoes) so size up a little to avoid the toes thing. I've run 3 half marathons and 2 marathons in these in less than two months. Hurray for no more sore knees. The 15 miler and half marathon right before that in the old shoes were terrible. I've saved those old ones for short trail runs in the mud. Btw, my shoe guy recommended inserts for these as he says the ones that come with the shoe wear out really quick.

When I took them out of the box they looked okay. I threw the box out but when I put them on last night I noticed that the fronts were scuffed a little. The packing was not in the two shoes. This is my fourth pair from amazons and was never disappointed. If I order again from amazons I will check more closely before throwing out the box.

Not only is this shoe sexy, it's comfortable too! I had to loosen one of the straps on top of my foot then I was good to go. It's hard to believe such a tall shoe would be so easy to wear, but this one is. I have high arches, but the shoe did not interfere with them at all. You will enjoy this shoe for all it is!

I think Chuck's look cool, which is why I bought these, but I had no idea they were so uncomfortable. If you can deal with a shoe that has almost no cushion and no arch, then by all means get them (I still wear them every once in a while). But if comfort is a big thing to you, I would look elsewhere.

I purchased these shoes to wear for special occasions. My last pair was eaten by my bosses dog. I live in Costa Rica these shoes are not sold anywhere here. In this climate rain, mud, sand, & mold can ruin shoes quickly here. These are perfect they look stylish & are extremely comfortable. I am happy with my purchase!
These sneakers are OK....don't know if these are original or knock offs...fit is not the same as the Keds I remember!

This is my third pair of this style sandal from reef. The other two both died because the strap tore out of the outside of the sandal. I bought another pair because they fit my foot better than any I've owned before. Size 14M. I've put a lot of miles on the previous pairs I suppose, being in Florida and walking my dog in them adds up.As far as comfort, they are ok. When I say it fits my foot, it holds on well, there is no slipping or sliding. They dont even "flip-flop" too bad compared to others. But comfort-wise, severely lacking in front foot support. The padding on the front is non-existent. The heel support is great, but I find the front half of the foot to be lacking.So I bought these to wear as my casual flips, for short durations / dressier occassions(yes you can have grungy flips and nice flips, in Florida especially). I'm trying out teva's now for longer walks/better support if I'm out at events or walking my dog or whatever.Hope this helps. Cheers

I like the shoe--takes time to break in so shoe begins to fit the mold of your foot, like all Capezios. Comfortable. Really bought this shoe for everyday wear, since I like taupe to elongate your leg and foot. Makes you feel like a dancer!

This product was purchased for my mother-in-law who has poor circulation in her feet and has to be very careful to have shoes that do not constrict the blood flow or cause any blisters or sores. These shoes have been great for her. She has them in several colors.
I love these shoes! I didn't have too wait long. My hubby wants some too =)

I bought these shoes in hopes of having comfort at work. And they are wonderful. My feet tend to run a little wide and I found these shoes a perfect fit. I wore them 10 hours the first day and was on my feet a lot and had no discomfort. They are dressy also, look great with dress pants.
Great quality running shoes.My son is a distance runner and all we buy are Asics for practice. They have amazing support.

Having lower back problems, I find that Clarks provide the support I need. I can slip in and out of them, so I don't have to bend over to put them on, and they last forever... my original pair has to be 6 or 7 years old and they still look like new.
i gotta love these shoes they fit so nice and comfortably. Skate shoes are the best type of shoes.

This is the second shoes I bought after happily using the GT2150 for a while.It offer comfort and solid quality, will not bent in the middle after you use it for a while like some other brand.Breathe good and no smell after a long day wearing.Use it for walk, run or work.

I wear a size 9 1/2,so just in case, I ordered a 10W in these shoes. They were shipped VERY quick! I bought these because I was doing an Oklahoma Play, and we had to have these kind of shoes. So when I tried them on.....OMG! The top of the shoe that goes to the toes made it to where I could not even walk! On the top of the shoe that goes to where your foot starts to show kept digging into my foot. Everyday, my feet would be very swollen and sore. I had to were these shoes every day, 6 hours a day, for a week. Then, I had to wear them in our 4 performances. As soon as I would get off stage, I would just stop and rip them off quick! It was just awful! My feet are still sore, and the play was a week ago! I tried to wear them a lot so that the top would stretch, but nada! I know that I will NEVER wear these shoes ever again, so I am just going to resell them.
I Bought this shoes for my baby and they are great...good choice and good buyer

These shoes are really comfortable! I usually wear a wide shoe, and I ordered a whole range of sizes in wide, but I ended up going with my street shoe size anyway. If you have wide feet, these shoes are wonderful in wide! Even if you don't usually wear wide size shoes, I imagine if you ordered wide, you wouldn't have to order up a shoe size. In any case, I recommend ordering a few different sizes to see how they feel. I've worn them to several 4-hour rehearsals now and I love them!
these are great and fit true to size...not too high for dancing...color is close to skin and blends nicely with my leg

I would have given 5 but I have been buyer these for a long time and I feel the quality is falling just a bit. If a manufacturer in the US would make something as comfortable and as nice looking, I love this style I would buy them as I really hate the fact they are made in China.
I bought this as a xmas gift for my brother. The size of the show was way to big so he went and exchange it.

We really like this dryer for the speed in drying work boots, but you have to make sure you put each boot on opposite sides so it doesn't tip over! Good quality and much better than the last one we had for kids boots as well!

This boot is absolutely perfect for stomping around town. The leather is super soft and the laces will accomidate a larger calf. It does run about 1/2 size small. I usually wear a 9 1/2 but got the 10 and it fit great!The picture on amazon is wrong. The boot pictured for "dark brown" is in fact the brown suede. The dark brown is a beautiful smooth leather color.It's not that dark (about the same color as the suede but slightly darker and smooth) but will go with most leather belts. I love them! think I'll have to get a pair of the black ones too.
When I ordered the shoes, I thought there would be a screen to change to shoe size or else let me cancel the order. It did not, so I had to return them and have not yet received my refund

This is a great product. The boots fit great straight out of the box. The distressed leather gives them a vintage appearance and the leather is soft and comfortable. There are "flaws" where the leather sole meets the rubber - you can see the tool marks from where the leather has been trimmed down. These marks are barely noticable and give the boots a great hand crafted look. A very good buy - the best boots i have ever purchased.
Great product! it looks great on my daughter! Birkenstock's products are always a slam dunk!
I love these shoes. They are very comfortable, and people compliment me about these shoes all the time.
Terrific combination of comfort and stability. Even better than the Acadias I purchased years ago, albeit for a different purpose.
These boots are wonderful! My Husband gets the most comfort out of these! Love them.... You can work in them and wear to Dress them! great boot.
I'v been buying these shoes for years. I love them. They fit perfect every time. I use them for casual dress.

Let me preface this review by saying that I've owned these shoes for several years and they have been among favorite casual shoes. Although the uppers and outsoles have held up remarkably well, the sort of honeycomb midsole has disintegrated - the material has basically turned to what appears like ground coffee, making them unwearable. I don't know what caused this; they're not worn constantly nor are they worn in wet or other extreme conditions. I'll probably try to contact Clarks to see if they have an explanation or an offer of adjustment.

These are like a sneaker/tennis shoe hybrid. The soles are thick and the material is lightweight. I have bad knees so I was looking for something stylish and comfortable to wear at work and these fit the bill perfectly!

Sized small.. Little toe on left foot hangs out No way to get full foot into it. This is my third Olowahu Flip FLop. The first was great and lasted forever. The second was like this one. Wore heal down in 3 months. Small Little Left Toe wont go into shoe or stay there if forced. Tore my little toenail back attempting to wear. I love Teva but wont buy another pair of these.

The color is beautiful, just as seen on my screen. The color is also somewhat neutral so that I could wear these sandals with many outfits/colors. The design of the straps is very elegant and summery. I love sandals with heels of this height because I get the benefit of a more sexy leg without the discomfort I experience with higher heels. The straps are also very comfortable and do NOT cut into my feet (even though I have rather wide feet). As for size, I got a size 8 and feel it is true to size. Definitely one of the most beautiful sandals I have ever worn.

I bought the Asics Gel Nimbus VIII a few weeks ago and I've used them three times. They have a comfortable feel and I've enjoyed running in them. I usually run 3 or 4 times a week and average a 4 mile run each time out. Someone who runs similar millage will find these to be a good running shoe that will be comfortable to run in. This is the second time I've purchased this model and I had a good experience with the first pair as well.
I love the feel of this shoe but even in 7.5 it's a little snug. I might go back to Reebok.
I bought these for my daughter for rehearsal/performances when she is not dancing pointe. There are better quality shoes out there, but for the price, these are perfect.

Have worn out 2 pair of these shoes in past years. The only thing I don't like about them, they are not made in the UNITED STATES now.. I needed them or I would not have bought them. Hope they will give me the service the others did.

Original quality product received, however I followed the advice and bought a US size 11 which is normally a euro size 10.5 (as I take a 10-10.5, this was the size I needed). Converse say to buy a half size smaller than you need, but it would be too risky to do that and have too tight a shoe, so I bought the size I needed. 10.5 wasn't a listed size option anyhow.The label in the shoe says they are US 11 and UK 11. Go figure - doesn't make sense. So they are a half size too big. If only they told you that information somewhere up front.

I have had these boots for about 2 months (working 12 hour shifts) and they are still as stiff as the day I got them. Make a funny squeeking noise when I walk. Got the "wides" but still seem to be narrow.
Second pair of danskos I own and I love these one. They look naturally broken in. I've splashed them with water too and they don't stain.
So far I have always been very satisfied with all my purchases from Amazon and this one is very good

While I'm not the one wearing them, they certainly are attractive and classic in style. Build quality appeared good. We are actually going to laser engrave on the side of the canvas part to customize for a friend. They will be Supah cool!

Beware if you're buying size 1 for kids. Instead of sending a Junior size 1 that should be listed as J1 (I called the crocs company), they sent a M1/W3, which is a men's 1/women's 3. It is incredibly wide and NOT the same thing as a kids 1. I was very careful not to select the M1/W3 choice and yet it switched and sent that.This is not a big kid size for a 7 year old...just for a very small adult.

I really liked these boots. They look stylish on and they are warm and secure in the snow. The fit was great with room for socks. I wore them for several hours and they were comfortable and good in the snow. I did spray the boots with waterproofing because I didn't know if they were treated for the snow. Good buy, price was appropriate for this boot. Good job Bear Paws!

If you're new to purchasing dance shoes, make sure you go to the manufacturers website to check their sizing! Buying dance shoes is NOT like buying street shoes.We checked the sizing info, and saw that these dance shoes are comparable to street shoe size, so we opted to getting 1 size up. When the shoes came, my daughter tried them on, and they were just what we were looking for. There was just enough room in the shoe for her to grow into as the dance season progresses. The shoes are very well crafted, as most Capezio brands are, and the fit all around was great.

I bought these shoes about a year ago, when they were on sale. I just love them! My 2 1/2 yr old son can put them on by himself and, he looks, instantly, sharp!My only regret is that I should have bought the next sizes up for him, while they were on sale, so that he could grow up in these shoes for a few more years.They are easy to open and put on.The toe is wide enough that they do not pinch.Sturdy soles.Easy to clean.Versatile.My son wears these to church, family get-togethers, and light play. Have had them about a year and, they still look like new.

The boots fit great and there was no "break in" necessary, they were comfortable right away. No problems with the zippers coming down while wearing or riding. I like the ease and quickness of the zipper while putting on or taking off. Would be perfect for those with flexibility problems or big bellies :)
This shoe is so comfortable and got to be one of the best running and basketball shoe. Plus your getting official Iverson shoes!Great shoe!
I purchased these boots in brown for a friend of mine. He really liked them. They are true to size. I also ordered him a pair in black.
Got these for my boyfriend, he loves them. He is usually a size 14 or 15, I got him a 14 and they fit him well.

I bought these for my son last year and he has gotten so much wear out of them! After they arrived in the mail and he opened the box, he didn't want to take them off for a week! He wore them through the summer, fall, winter and spring again until he grew out of them. They are still in great shape and hope to pass them along to another child. Kudos to Western Chief for making fun designs and sturdy boots for kids. We're now getting the race car ones in the next size up (size 9). They are great for rain (even snow-for short trips wearing warm socks), especially after the rain when your little ones want to play in the grass and mud and you know their sneakers will be filthy - put them in these and just hose them off when they're ready to come in! My son could easily put them on himself with the handy loops at the top! I wouldn't put him in these if I knew he was going to be running all day - since sneakers fit the foot better for that, but for trips to the park or even shorter walks and lots of outdoor play, they are great... (just not for doing a lot of running.)

I love these shoes. They are comfortable and durable. My feet do sweat a little in them, but it is summer time. The reason why I only gave it 4 stars is because the left shoe the strap will not stay forwards. As I walk in them it slowly comes back and rides funny on my ankle. I have not contacted the company about this.
Timberland Men's Euro Hiker Boot, Grey/Grey,9.5 M US great boots for work or very day life very comfortable, worm and soft inside great boots for fare value.

I received them several days earlier than the estimated time, that is really nice. I read the reviews and ordered an 11 size, I normally take a 10 or 10 1/2, the size is just right, Thank You to those who suggested a larger size.I think these slippers are almost perfect, they are warm, they breath so my feet don't sweat, they stay on my feet while walking around, and are made well enough to wear outside to feed the dog or get something out of the car, I'm not sure though how they would be if walking through wet grass because of the outside material (maybe spraying then with some Scotch-Brite would work), all in all I recommend these and will certainly order another pair when necessary.The free fast shipping is excellent too.Edit on this purchase: After reading the comments I ordered a larger size but after a short while of wearing them they do stretch. Because they are so comfortable and wear so well I will be buying these again when I need too but I will order my correct shoe size, that is my experience. They are wearing quite well, I have been wearing them everyday around the house and outside for almost three months and they still look new.
My 23 y/o son asked for these for Christmas and he was ESCATIC! He loves them so I guess this would be a positive review! Shipping was fast and came in great condition.
Love the looks and confort of this shoe. Fit true to size and required no breaking in period. Goes with so many of my summer clothes.

Alright well i am a size fourteen and i usually wear 4e shoes they say its a D size shoe but to me it feel like a 4e because it fits me quite swell. any way i got the cool green ones it fits perfectly i mean the best shoes i ever got. the only problem with the green ones is that when ever you use them it attracts a lot of dirt. A lot! but all i do is spray Shout on them wait 5 minutes and then wipe it down with a damp cloth. but other than that they really have nice ankle protection, by the way there my first ankle tops i ever got and i am extremely glad i got them. i would and did recommend them to everyone. so get them the best 33 dollars i ever spent!
I bought these for my grandfather. He said that they are very comfortable. These were for a great price considering that this size is hard to find and usually runs about $90 or higher.

I am a Keen fanatic and had been dismayed by their lack of styles for summer until I came across Isabella.They are not at all like the other Keen clogs I have. These have a much, much wider toe box and a lower profile. They are much more like Earth brand shoes than regular Keens. Order 1/2 size smaller than you normally would as they run rather large.Very comfortable.
Beautiful, High Quality, Reasonably Priced Boots. Delivered quickly. Would buy a thousand times over, but have a feeling these will last me awhile. Trust the people saying they run a half size large.

I get a pair of crocs for each summer visit to Hungary--the treads last about a month of hard walking on cobblestones.Then they are 'retired' for home use. I find they stay on my feet, are extremely comfortable, provide excellent support for my high arched feet. I only need to take this one pair of shoes--note: shoes are removed when you enter someone's house so neatly groomed toes are more important here. Also, if it gets cold or rainy, it's quite possible to wear a pair of fleece or wool socks with the crocs so feet stay warm (even tho' wet). Only quibble: the croc color that I have found most usable/attractive is their 'Gold'. They haven't offered it in a few years. When they do, I'll buy a bunch!
The insole in the shoe was installed improperly. It was easily repaired but still not up to quality control standards
My daughter lives back east and really loved these - warm and comfortable inside with a rugged sole that lets her wear them outdoors (i.e. taking out the garbage).

I carefully went over all the details before I ordered this pair of shoes. Hi tops - check. Size 7.5 - check. White - check. Chuck Taylor - check. Everything seemed excellent. That is, until I opened the box (which arrived just on schedule by the way). By some mistake I had received a pair of very nice looking low tops. Which would have been perfect if that was what I'd ordered. Now, the shoes have been sent back, and a new pair is on its way.
My first time wearing them I thought I need a wider pair but then the second time was better and so forth, I truly enjoy my shoes. They come a half size bigger, remember that when ordering : )
Very confortable slip on I trully recomended as well as the seller. The item arrived in great conditions.

I have never owned a pair of original exercise sandals from Dr. Scholl's before, so when I tried them on, I was happy how comfortable they were despite the wooden platform. They are adjustable to fit wide feet such as my own, and the arch support is comfortable as well. I developed a blister on the side of my foot from it rubbing on the leather but for the price of $14.00, I guess I should not complain. This is a good quality shoe.

These are really sexy boots with a great, flattering shape. The heel isn't too high and is perfect for my height. I've been wanting these boots for months and they were unavailable for the longest time!!! But once I saw they were available I jumped and bought them and am happy I did so!!
It was good enough for the work it was required to do in a reasonable manner and at a very low price. Not the best though of the more expensive products out there.
Bought it only for the brand. I have used more comfortable slip-ons. Also the color of the product which actually arrived is a bit different, a bit darker and duller than what you see in the picture.

I have owned many pairs of prowalkers over the years. I currently have a black, brown and white pair. I purchased these to replace the white pair I have had for several years. The pair I replaced were still in serviceable condition but had lost their shine. I am very pleased with the new pair. I see no noticable difference in quality over the older ones. They were very comfortable out of the box. I delayed writing this review for a few weeks to give them a good workout. I would not hesitate to purchase another pair and probably will be replacing the brown pair shortly

If you have wide feet be sure to ask for one wider size the least...I always try to buy 2E but in this case I had to be 4E because the first few uses before break in they were a bit uncomfortable, after that, they are OK.

These shoes are incredibly comfortably, and look awesome. I was skeptical at first, but ever since I have received my pair of Red/White/Blue, I have not found a single flaw. These shoes will bring the old school back into your life and then some. Get a couple pairs of these things and wear a different color each day!

Alright well i am a size fourteen and i usually wear 4e shoes they say its a D size shoe but to me it feel like a 4e because it fits me quite swell. any way i got the cool green ones it fits perfectly i mean the best shoes i ever got. the only problem with the green ones is that when ever you use them it attracts a lot of dirt. A lot! but all i do is spray Shout on them wait 5 minutes and then wipe it down with a damp cloth. but other than that they really have nice ankle protection, by the way there my first ankle tops i ever got and i am extremely glad i got them. i would and did recommend them to everyone. so get them the best 33 dollars i ever spent!

This is a great boot. I have worn them most every day for two years, winter spring summer fall. They are great in the snow. My feet have never been wet and I don't think they have been cold. The only problem is that after two years they still look great so I don't have a good excuse for buying another pair.
Great product. More comfortable than they used to be and they seem to be very well made. I recommend this product

I am a Croc addict. There, I said it. BEWARE!!!! Crocs Classic and Crocs Beach have completely different sizing. I wear a W9 in Classic and they all fit like a dream. The same in Beach looks like duck shoes. Huge. These shoes in yellow were not available at this time in the Classic style, so I took a leap. The wrong one. The shoes were returned and my credit was issued immediately. No problem with the shoe or seller, it wasmy fault, but the sizing needs to be standard across all sizes. As far as the transaction with this seller, it gets 5 stars. Crocs themselve get the 3 stars. Will still buy more though!
These are my mothers shoes. She really love them. Don't hurt her feet at all. She has worn these kind of shoes for years.
I ordered these boots because they say they are 12" but they are really 10". They are also made from thin leather.
This shoe is as to be expected strong and durable for my teenager - she loves it and I am very happy with this purchase

This shoe is so comfortable from the minute you put it on--no breaking in is necessary. They are attractive and wear well and last a long time. This is my second pair and I only got it because my original pair is over 15 years old and looking a little ragged to wear out in public. I don't normally pay this much for a pair of shoes, but these will surely pay for themselves over time. Get a pair, you won't regret it.
These boots are fantastic and so comfortable. They were a great investment for winter. I would recommend them very very highly.
I bought these to replace an old pair I had, they are great shoes and hold up well. I generally use them to work around the house but they are good enough to where as a casual shoe anywhere.

I bought these for my father, not for myself. He had purchased a pair of these exact shoes almost ten years before at a local store which had then closed. He wore them EVERYWHERE. When they were new, they went with business casual AND jeans, which he loved. He always said how comfortable they were. As they aged, eventually he wore holes in the bottom and his toes stuck out the front, and he STILL wore them! We couldn't find another pair of shoes that he liked as much. Finally, I knew I could find them on Amazon and bought a pair - he was THRILLED!! And *I* was happy to finally throw the holey ones in the trash. I'll be buying him a pair of these every few years now. Thanks!! P.S. Nice to be able to find LARGE sizes!!

Very quick and easy, description was perfect. I went and tried them on in the store first just to make sure of the size. I usually where a 7 or 7.5 in most shoes, but wear a 6 in these.Delivered faster than expected!All in all it was a great deal!
Uggs are always so comfy. My feet are always so happy in Uggs. The blue is great with jeans. The best
Wish I had bought more shoes arrived in just a few days. Super buy. Great product you just can't wear them out!!!

This is a great shoe, one of the best I've ever purchased. This shoe has it all, comfort, style, and fit. If you have a wide foot or a high instep, this shoe will still be comfortable on your foot. This is a great shoe for anyone who has to be on their feet for long periods of time. It looks especially nice with jeans or other causal pants.
Shoes are about what works for you. These work. Light, lots of vents, and completed a half and a full w/o abnormal pain.

I have been buying these boots for the last 5 yrs they are great. I buy a new pair in the late fall and use them for around the house and out and about during the winter months, then I cycle them into my work boots during spring and replace them the next spring. They stay waterproof with no care taken and the soles do not split away like a lot of boots do, at work I 'am outside a lot in all kinds of weather snow, rain, and bitter cold they keep your feet warm in winter and they are not hot in the middle of summer. I highly recommend these boots, people are always asking what kind they are and the answer is Hi-Tec Altitude IV! (And no I do not work for Hi-Tec) but support any company that makes a great product.
They fit perfect an work like a charm!!! I am glad I got them fr here because they were cheap and still in good shape
I've been playing soccer for my entire life and at last I've found a shoe that doesn't hurt my feet after a game.Very good traction , beatifull design and very original model.Thank you ADIDAS.
I bought this item for my sister, who lives in another country. She was very happy with the purchase.

These shoes have great arch support and are incredibly comfortable. I usually buy these in brown, but got black so that I could also wear them on formal night on a cruise ship and casual Fridays at work. The shoes are stiff at first, but get broken in after about three days. The last pair that I had needed new cushioning inserts after three years and the laces frayed after three and a half years. The tread is still in great shape. It just needs some polish on the toes to cover up where they get roughed up from kicking things. I like buying them on Amazon because of the lower price and that I can get the narrow width that local stores won't carry.
I ordered two pairs of shoes for a musical: one black pair and one white pair. The black pair wore wonderfully, but the white pair broke a strap and when cleaned the coating peeled off the shoe.

My husband bought these slippers for me. The slippers are like walking on a cloud! They are soft and cushy. The only thing I would tell you about sizing is they are a tad short. I wear between a 7 1/2 and 8 womans shoe. I ordered an 8 and my foot almost hangs over the back. I have a wide foot and the width is good. I would recommend these slippers!
I have a very narrow foot. Hard and expensive to fit. VANELi is one of the few shoes that meet my needs. These flats are great - can dress up or down. Would like to have a pair in every color.

I love Converse and this is my ninth pair. Not of the shoe of the same color though. I'm fairly meticulous about taking care of my shoes so all of the ones I own (some for more than 5 years!) still look brand new with moderate wear. They're comfartable, durable, versatile, and flat out cool. Go buy them if you've never owned a pair!
I love love love these comfy, durable summer sandals. They're perfect with skirts, capris and shorts. I have them in several colors and wear them daily.
The pair I received ran about a full size smaller than expected. The quality appeared to be good, but I could not get it on my foot.

I live is flip flops year round! These are perfect! They match everything, offer arch support and are snug yet soft and comfy between my toes. I walk a minimum of 1 mile every day with a double stroller and and my back never aches with these!

I have bought white pair few years ago and loved it so much I wanted another pair. However, I have recently tried 3 new pairs of Dansko clogs (all dark colors) and they all dye my socks. They are extremelly comfortable but I hated to see my white socks dyed after few hours of wearing the clogs. I returned the shoes (black and blueberry colors) and ended up with Dansko Nubuck in light blue. The inside is light brown. That too does dye my socks, but at least it is not black.It is still the most comfortable work shoe I have ever owned, but be ready to see your white socks black.
Sweet and pettit, these are the cutest little ballet shoes I've ever seen. Perfect for any budding ballerina. Great for dance lessons.
These sandals are very comfortable and I am very pleased with this purchase. Shipping was speedy. I do feel, however, that the size ran a little small.

Comfortable, modern, light, great grip on asphalt, marble, linoleum. I like this shoe. Better than the Hush Puppies oxford that was too narrow and had too rigid of an outer sole. Fits my feet well. Warm in the winter time too.

I bought these in order to have a pair of quasi dressy shoes in my wardrobe. They are very comfortable and have plenty of room in the toe box for your foot to spread out. The more your wear them, the more comfortable they get. That and you get that worn in look which is also pretty cool. A great shoe at a pretty good price

My daughter has what you would call a "Princess" foot. She is super fussy about her shoes. Has to fit just so and no fabric rub or discomfort when she walks. She also has a hard to fit foot. Narrow heel and wider toebox. Thus shoe shopping for her can be a chore!Recently she picked up a cute little strappy dress for summer and I mentally prepared myself for the hours she would spend finding a summery sandal to go with it.When we went to the shoe store they had a large display of Dr. Scholl's in an assortment of colors.I remembered Dr. Scholl's from my teens. They used to sell them in the drugstore.The look is timeless and she instantly fell in love with them. Because the strap across the toes is adjustable they fit her toebox comfortably. And because they are backless, they are light and breezy for summer and there is nothing in the back to cause foot discomfort.The hard part was selecting the color. The sandals come in a variety of fun colors including pink, black, tan and more. We settled on the blue. Great with jeans and a nice shade to compliment her summer dress.Because the sandals feature a wood finished bottom and contoured footbed for arch support they are sturdy and comfortable.Price is right too when you consider they will last for years and remain classic in styling.Picking Dr. Scholl's is easy. Picking the color is the challenge!
I was trying to replace a previous pair of Clarks that I adored, but despite looking exactly the same, these fit in a very strange way. Shipping and condition was great, but I had to return the item.

I almost always wear a size 13 shoe, and as such, I ordered a size 13 for these. They arrived, and yet they're a size or so too big, which I found strange.As for the shoes themselves, I do rather enjoy them. They look nice, slip on easily, and are comfortable, but again, I usually wear a size 13, ordered a size 13, and yet they're too big.I wanted to exchange them for a size 12, but those are now out of stock, so away they go for a refund.:(

I did receive the Nuncio Pump, however, the one that I received is not the one that shows on the picture. I returned the shoe because it was too tight. I was advised that they ran large so I ordered 7.5m. So I brought up the fact that the shoes that I received was different and the person did everything he could to make it correct. The 2nd pair came and the shoe was still the wrong one. These shoes are very comfortable and I kept the color that was given to me which was also very pretty. It was more of a taupe snake texture.

I got these shoes for my husband, who has had a pair of these Sebagos for probably ten years or more. They are the same high quality and worksmanship, and he's looking forward to many years of wear with this new pair.

I was soooo tickled pink with my pink Nellie Chukka boots. I saw them on the web page and I had to have them. Pink is my favorite color. They are extremely well made. They didn't need breaking in either. That is a major plus. They fit perfectly. Also they arrived in record time except it was like waiting for Christmas. I love them so much it is all I can do not to wear them to bed. :-) I want several more pairs. I am waiting for them to be available in red leather.
buen articulo llego a la fecha sin ningún problema 100% confiable el vendedor,operacion realizada sin ningun tipo de incoveniente el producto llena mi perspectiva

I like these but I bought the 8 1/2 wide and they are a little too short - but I still wear them. I will buy more grasshoppers in future but will get them in a 9 wide. I haven't worn them enough to be able to tell if they will wash easy but I expect them to.

Initially the item was not delivered to the requested address; since the seller is using the USPS, which is not as efficient as UPS or DHL; however the seller made all efforts to track the item and finally was located in some post office and I have to go my self and collect it.For deliveries, I would suggest to the seller, to use UPS or DHL even if you charge the client the additional cost.

A Rockport fan for the past 10 years. This one is a hit also. The order process through delivery met expectations. The shoe fits for size and as always quite comfortable for ten-hour work days. The only reason it was given a 4 of 5 was that I prefer a little better shine. As Rockport designed, they feel like you're wearing a pair of sneakers.

I have plantar fasciitis which is easily aggravated by most shoes - especially sandals. It has been especially difficult to find sandals that don't bother my feet. To complicate matters, I blister easily. And, I need adequate but not hard arch support or I have foot pain.These sandals are the most comfortable I have ever worn. I wear them all day - I hike and walk the dogs in them - I even have run in them when I've needed to - without any problems. I would give the six stars if I could for comfort without looking like clunky old-lady shoes.

I like these shoes for just slipping on to hang around or go run errands, but DO NOT buy these shoes for any kind of serious walking. The elastic around the ankle is not tight enough to keep your foot well located. Particularly on downhill stretches, my toes bunched up into the front of the shoes. I ended up with blisters as a result.

My son loves sketchers and I bought these for a birthday gift. really well made and good looking shoe at a near give-a-way price. He loves the true to size fit and says they are more comfortable than any other dress shoe.
My husband loves these shoes. We always buy more than one pair at a time so he always has a pair.
Very good quality boots can find better for this price,I am proud now when I own a pair of Timberland shoes.

I guess I will be keeping this pair, I need them for an event and it's too late to go looking elsewhere. It's seems comfortable--basic style and for women like me who can't tolerate heels, it's a nice dress option. But it's advertised on Amazon as leather and it's not leather, nor is it going to fool anyone.

February 7, 2008I wear boat shoes all day everyday along with polos, chinos or jeans. That is because I have worked for others all my life, am now retired and own a business. When I meet clients and friends, they accept my mode of dress as indicative of my success which in and of itself permits my non-conformance and Ralph Waldo Emerson-like self reliance. There are of course hordes of men and women all over the country who wear and love to include boat shoes in their lifestyle for a myriad of reasons and applications. The Timberland people put out a legitimate boat shoe all features considered. These are rugged, smartly styled, very comfortable boat shoes. The company has an immaculate reputation that consumers have relied on for a long time. Although other companies issue notable competition,while I do not know the comparable revenues involved, my recommendation as a Internet product reviewer is to buy Timberland if they are a featured vendor wherever you shop, with the complete realization that your total satisfaction is historically assured.Jay Adler, Music Critic

This sandals is super amazing. At first when I worm it, it started to hurt my feet but last time I wore a sandals was 9 years ago... So I must get used to it.If you want a sandals that last long get this one. You won't regret.
I have had these shoes for 2 months, not a problem noted, seamless design, to spots for irritation, and I have not had any problems with sqeaking.

Casual looking, fairly lightweight steel toe shoe. Many of the places I've worked over the years required steel toe shoes though I could only find fairly heavy out of place looking boots. Once I discovered a number of companies offering steel toe sneakers I haven't looked back.This shoe has fairly good traction though If I had to pick again I would get a different brand as this shoe just doesnt hold snugly as my others have. It is sized correctly and I've given it three weeks to break in.Update:Three other employees where I work also had this same shoe and one other had the same issue I did. Within weeks of light use the soles started separating from both shoes. I couldn't even make it through a whole year with these. While light, these are easily the worst steel toes I've ever had. Most other brands I've had last easily 2-4 years and by then its something else wrong with the shoe, not the whole bottom part falling off. I don't think I'll be going with converse again

I bought these shoes for walking on trips, and I think they will be a good choice. For anyone who doesn't mind a "clunky looking" shoe, they are great and with good support. Very comfortable, roomy, and sturdy at the same time. These are especially good for women with wide feet as they come in various widths. I would say yes, buy them. I wore them right out of the box and they felt broken in.

Great product with fast shipping. The shipping cost was a bit high, but since the actual product wasn't too much, it evened out. The product was shipped in the flat rate priority box, which I know doesn't cost more than $10, but I paid WAY over that for the actual shipping. They definitely made a large profit on the overpricing of shipping!The bags are being used as awards and the ladies that have received them (we embroidered them with their names and the award) say that they just love them!
Unfortunately it has a seam right across the back heel that makes it unwearable for me. Too bad as it is so cute.
The order was a birthday gift for a granddaughter. It arrived promptly at her house and upon opening the gift on her special day, she informed me that she LOVED them. Service was great.
Comfortable and pretty too. However, not recommend buying from amazon. I found one in the store is cheaper...
I bought these shoes for myself. They look nice but there is no arch support and they just don't fit all that well. They are sitting in my closet and will probably end up at the local Goodwill.

Wonderful sneakers! They are comfortable and stylish. They run slightly large ( I wear a size 7 shoe, so I ordered a 7). They are very roomie, but comfortable and I can wear thick socks with them if I need to.

All aspects of getting and using four of these in three colors were great accept that the quality varied.Three pair are perfect and wear well but one fell apart. It was re-glued and has performed well since then.

I bought the size I would typically in the glass, and they are seriously tight. I would have probably gone up a half size if I had been able to try them on. I think it is fixable with a shoe stretcher, and this is just a warning.

The shoes were dlivered on time and are wonderful.If you like the way neg. heel shoes just roll along you will love these shoes.I walk 6 miles a day.As you walk your legs start to work with the shoes,it takes time,and the fluid motion gets easy.You just flow along.You'll see. I think 8-10 miles will be easy.I hope these shoes last many miles.Dan
still the best jazz shoe for the serious dancer. soft and flexible, I just wist the toe was stronger,after 6 months we always have holes.

Have only worn them twice, but good things to say about them so far. First of all, they weren't as stiff as I thought a brand new pair of spikes would be, and they are a pretty good looking pair of shoes. Good buy.

These boots are very cool! Not at all hard on the balls of your feet. Can walk in them all day. However they are a little heavy. But for beginners in the high heel or platform shoe department these are still very nice boots.
I have bought this shoe for work, play and just plain walking for 5 years. They are the best. I use special insoles inside and I have the best fit and feel ever. Highly recommend them to everyone.

My 6 yr old son really loves these boots and wants to wear them every day. He wanted "work" boots so he could be like his Daddy. Previously he had a pair of boots with a manmade upper and those did not last too long. He is very hard on footwear, but so far these seem to be holding up well. He even wears them to school on days he doesn't have gym.

These look as great being worn as they look in the picture; however, they do not hug the foot well. I wear nothing smaller than a 10 but have a narrow heel. These fit very loosely at the heel and slip off easily, so I'll either return them or try a shoe insert to improve the fit.

I haven't had a pair of Wallabees since I was in high school, but happening upon a Clark's ad brought them back to mind. I ordered a pair, and am glad I did. Next to my Clark's Desert Boots and my Birkies, these are the most comfortable shoes I own. I teach, and as such am on my feet all day. My Wallabees make the concrete floor a little less hard.

These all black Chuck's are my favorite All Star model ! It is no small task to find them at a regular retail store-most often your best bet is to buy online. They shipped in a timely fashion. Great Kicks, good deal.
I ordered some k Swiss for my daughter and I love them, they look so cute on her and the price was even better!!!!

I had the experience of having to exchange these shoes. It was fairly simple and I had no issues. I ordered them as a Christmas present for my daughter. They arrived fairly quickly in the mail. Though we ordered her normal size, they were about 1/2 size too large. So I followed the online instructions and sent them back for an exchange. I received a replacement in just a little over a week. I was impressed with the quick turnaround. The only drawback is that I had to pay to ship them back and also include a check for $7.99 to cover shipping of the new shoes.

Boots fit perfectly when using boot liner/sock combination. Very soft leather, break in time was just a few days. If you want a pair of boots that are solidly made that you can wear anytime, this is the pair you need to get. I purchased these originally for use when I ride my motorcycle, but have since found I can wear them anytime. These are definitely the best, most comfortable boots I have ever owned. I have even ordered a pair of the Brown boots and look forward to getting them delivered some time next week. Highly recommended!!

I have these in black western and they are extrememly cute and comfortable. They break in nicely and I haven't had any quality issues.I'd buy them again in different colors.I feel they run maybe a tad small lengthwise.The color I have makes everything look dressier yet offers the flat sole that I love.Great shoe!!
I bought this shoe because it was on sale at a great price. This shoe looks great and is really comfortable. I highly recommend this brand and style.

Hi, I'm from Colombia, it is the first time that I buy in Amazon and the product that I received was in conditions excelents, I'm very excited with the product !!! Timberland Men's Euro Hiker Boot,Grey/Grey,7 M US

OMG! i've worn my converse everyday for an entire school year an the worst that happened was a few small holes that gave it a distressed look. you can just throw them in the washing machine an they come out as white as they were when you bought them. i got new ones after 1 year because the bottoms began to wear out slightly ( emphasis on slightly ). overall, best sneakers you will find anywhere!p.s. they look better when the laces are loose not extremely tight.
Son buenos ahora pense que podian ser como los SAS, si esa son las espectativas no los compres , ahora como zapato comun no estan mal

If you're into the retro stuff, this really is a great pair of sneakers. People forget how comfy they wear and despite what your friends may think, they do actually still look pretty good with almost any jeans/combats. Whether it's the hi-tops or this nifty pair, you just can't go wrong for $30.

I have had these boots for about 2 years, I have hiked through the woods, dug 4' deep ditches in hard clay, and I take several motorcycle trips every year. I wear these boots almost every day and the sole is barely worn and the insoles are still in good shape. After all this I just polished them with kiwi parade gloss shoe polish to a mirror finish that would make your drill instructor proud (not an exaggeration they do take a good polish). Before I got these boots I went through about two pair of shoes a year, these boots are so tough that they will easily last for another 2 years. I would recommend these boots to anyone that needs a good pair of boots that with little maintenance will faithfully last for years, and for the price cannot be beat. I would actually rate these boots at 4.5 stars because they only have one minor flaw... Just after these boots were worn-in I noticed that the lining on the insole was pealing off, they were easy to remove so I took them to my sewing machine and stitched around the perimeter and they were as good as new and are still in use.
Not bad for the price. I guess I need to break them in as they are hurting my feet at this point.

I am an intermediate runner I would say. I run various 5K and 10K's, Half marathons and have started to dabble into the world of trail and adventure racing. I say that to let you know I am no professional but I do love to run and compete against myself. For the Kansas City half marathon this past year I wanted to try a minimalist shoe to see if my times would change any from my times I produced in Nike Vomero's and Mizuno Wave's. I tried multiple pairs of this type of shoe on and unfortunately for me (due to the color scheme) these felt the best.I was amazed at how comfortable they felt because by looking at them you would think it would feel like an old High School CC waffle, not the case. The only running I did on these prior to raceday was about 5 miles at an easy pace on a treadmill to get the feel of the shoe. Raceday comes and yes I get alot of looks but I eventually get over that. The first couple of miles were interesting and I thought I had made a mistake. However, once I got into my stride these performed greatly. I was able to maintain splits at personal record times with no thoughts about foot and leg pain. By the end of the race I had knocked off 5 minutes from my previous times, I will let you decide whether it was the shoe or training. My legs felt great as did my feet. I did have one little "hot spot" on one of my toes but that should be expected.I tried these just to see what it would be like to race in a minimalist shoe and I can now say I will never race in a trainer again. I swear by these shoes for racing and speedwork. Get over the color scheme and enjoy this pair of shoes. Oh yeah the "ecco friendly" piece doesn't hurt either.
So comfy and goes with any outfit. Great for everyday wear and you look cool too. I literally wear them everyday.
Love these shoes, bought 2 pair, and they are comfortable but they're just too high a heel for me. I teeter and can only take tiny steps. Still gorgeous shoes for those who know how to walk the walk.

Already have Chucks in white, which I wore for the b-ball team in high school...yeah, when Chucks were the shoes to be wearin'!! Decided to re-live days of Sandlot Black PF Flyers with the magic wedge, make you run faster, jump higher! But when I got them, they were about a 1/3 size too small and the shoes felt uneven (one bigger than the other, both still tight). Thought I could wear them in and couldn't. Chalked up to a loss. Paid less for black Chucks and they fit true to size! Love these black Chucks! GREAT PURCHASE!!Wonder what the difference is in the monochrome black. Anyone know?

These shoes are inexpensive, light weight, and very comfortable.They were hard to get on at first. There is a loop on the tongue that holds the laces... I relaced the shoes without using the loop and they went on much easier.I'm happy with them.

I bought these for work they are very well made you will see. Just want to forwarn though any potential buyers..........this brand of shoe runs very small and narrow. Normally I ware a 6 narrow and I bought these in a 7 and they were so tight I could barly get my foot in. So order a coulple sizes larger then you normally wear____SERIOUSLY!!!
Heavy duty and VERY comfortable. I'm really rough on shoes. I've had these only a short time but can tell already they are well made and will last. Great value!

The butterfly is so cute! It's nice to have something distinguishing without having to get a crazy color. I use these shoes for powerlifting as well as everyday wear. I visited the seller's website and they have a pretty large variety of designs. Would like to see some in kids' sizes but I couldn't be happier with my new Chucks!

It's a Chuck Taylor through and through. Not much support but I don't care. These were for my son and he wears a custom orthotic anyway. So we just dropped it in and he was good to go. He wore these with his tux for the prom. He was stylin' and comfortable. I do recommend going up 1/2 size if you have narrow feet and a full size if you have a medium width because they run a bit short.
I purchased recently ASICS Men's GT-2100 and i have to say i am very satisfied with this product. i really enjoy it every time i go to the gym. I can only recommend to people to use this product.
They have been the perfect gift for my cold natured sweetie. He said they are very comfortable and warm! Two big requirements for him!
I play rugby in mine. I wore them in the shower the first day i got them, and i have never had blisters!

I have fat feet, and I wear a size 12 wide. I ordered the 12 E, and they were long enough and wide enough, but not "tall" enough. This is a great shoe. Real light and well constructed. Lots of support, great bargain for the money.

These mocs are comfy and sturdy enough to wear to work every day -- I work retail, so I'm on my feet for about 7-8 hours a day. I have to wear arch-support inserts with them, but I do that with every shoe I own. I would buy these mocs again.
Perfect fit, soft yet durable,properly ventilated, makes walking a pleasure..They are healing my feet..I will be ordering another pair soon...

Since Nike bought Converse the have altered the shoe. There used to be an extra piece of stitched canvas on the inner part just below the big toe and stitching through the back heal of the canvas. This is a very lovely bag, and looks well-made and high-quality -- but I thought that the leather was too stiff and the strap-drop was also a bit too short, making it a struggle to get things in and out of the purse while having it on/over the shoulder.

These shoes are sturdy! I wanted something with the feel of a tennis shoe but would be "dressy" enough to wear with dockers and casual business clothes. This fits the bill. They're both comfortable and sturdy and seem like they'll last me a while. Worth every penny!

I've worn this shoe for almost a year and I couldn't be more happier with it. It's light weight and grabs the floor like no other shoe I've owned and for the price, it's a great buy. I'm so happy with it that I just bought my second pair due to the first being worn out. I play squash and volleyball about 5 hours a week total so the shoe has held up well. A few guys I know are also on their second pair of these and they are more than satisfied with Asics quality. I'm sure the Rocket III is just as good, but why mess with a good thing.

Converse Chuck Taylor All Stars are not just a fashion statement. Back in the day, they were my choice of athletic footwear -- following in my father's footsteps -- while starting center on the high school basketball team. For a 6'2" white guy with a moderate vertical leaping ability, I didn't have to worry about losing any spring in my step, and I always led stats in rebounds and blocked shots against players wearing the then-ubiquitous Adidas, Puma and Converse "Dr. J" hi-tops. In all fairness, and as a disclaimer, 80% of the opposing team members were white guys, too.Still, though I have absolutely no vertical leap left (hey. I graduated 24 years ago), I still wear these shoes, just because. Like one reviewer pointed out, they're a great conversation starter. Plus, they're as comfy as a second pair of feet.At the turn of the 20th to the 21st century, it appeared that there'd be NO Chucks left at all: The Massachusetts factory was closing down, and Chucks appeared to be going the way of acid-wash jeans. Fortunately (or, unfortunately, if you're a member of the garment workers' union), Converse went through some reorganization and now makes these overseas, presumably in China.Well, I'm boycotting the People's Republic of China, an anti-labor country that has helped more American CEOs bust unions than just about anyone else. Its own people are slave labor. Fortunately, I thought ahead, so when Converse was on the ropes, I went out to every shoe store around and bought up all the size 12 hi tops I could find. To be exact, 143 pairs -- a closet full. I've got 'em in white, optical white, green, red, basic black, navy blue, yellow, orange, you name it. Set me back $2700, but was worth every penny, knowing that American workers made them.I AM THE IMELDA MARCOS OF CONVERSE CHUCK TAYLOR ALL-STAR SHOES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!But, if you're a newcomer to them, or missed the boat, I won't hate ya for buying these for yourselves. They are so cool, I'll look the other way.I have to look the other way myself: I buy the toddler sizes for my two wittle one. Aw!!!! :) At least I help keep American shoe store employees employed, if not factory workers.

These shoes are touted as the best walking shoes you can get. I haven't tried all of them, but these are really great. I am glad I bought them. I have bilateral knee arthritis and walking can be difficult. These shoes have helped an awful lot.
They were a last minute Christmas gift. They came so quickly, the size was normal, the color fun, he loved them.

This very attractive little sandal would probably be very satisfactory, but it runs both short and narrow. It is not true to size by any means, so rather than return them, I gave them to a cousin with smaller feet. They were on sale. Now I know why.

I bought these shoes a little less than a year ago. Within two weeks I noticed the threading was coming undone. Now the shoes are stringy with the thread coming undone. I'm upset because I payed 76 dollars for these shoes, the most I've ever paid. Before these I had a pair of reeboks that I had for three years before they were at the same level of disrepair, and I was doing a lot more running in the reeboks. All in all, the saucony's got me through the year but I'll need to buy new shoes for the upcoming school year.

nice and comfortable. stylish. it goes well with suits or just with jeans for a classy look.

I've been wearing Chuck Taylors since the mid-80's but this is my first pair with a black outsole (all others have been the standard off white). This is just what my husband was looking for and could not find. He is very picky about his things. They are extremely comfortable, top is soft on foot, light weight, "just right". He is a happy camper, thank God! Anyone should love these slides, good deal.

The title sums it up but I'll break it down a little. These shoes are comfy, classic, timeless and stylish. The main attribute of these shoes is the level of comfort and support they provide. They offer great shock absorption and to top it off they are versatile and whenever you wear them you'll have comfort at your 'toe tips' (fingertips, get it?). Love these boots, but most of all love the color. Thought we were looking for the color "bronze" since some photos show the metallic gold being very yellow. These are definitely not a yellow, gold metallic, but a brownish, or bronze metallic. Very versatile!!

Beautiful shoes and cost over 3 times the price in Australia where I have purchased before so still a good buy even with air freight from Amazon. However most shoes in Australia come only in one width and not too many in half sizes and so shoes purchased in the US with their large range of sizes and widths can be confusing. Most shoes here also have US , UK and metric sizes on the label and my size 9 Aus shoes are nearly always shown as 10 US (however some websites say 9 AUS is equivalent to 9.5 US). These Rockport shoes are only sold as "W" in Australia which most retailers say is equivalent to 3E (most manufacturers here have only standard width or in rare cases 3E) whereas in the US 3E = XW and there are many many other widths.Unfortunately what I thought was the Australia equivalent of my size 9 wide, i.e size 10 US / 3E turned out to be too big and too wide. Am now trying US size 9.5 and width 2E but considering I can buy 3 pairs of these Rockports from Amazon delivered by airfreight for the same price as one pair in Australia where no one discounts them, it is still cheaper for me to try. So make sure you order the correct size AND width!Perhaps Rockport (as with many other suppliers and items) can explain why the RRP in the US is $99 US per pair (price on average on Amazon $67 US) whereas here in Australia the RRP is $220 AU (about $216 US at current exchange rate, or $275 US at the exchange rate of a few months ago) and there is no discounting and yet they are all made in Vietnam or China wherever you buy them.
These make wonderful Taekwondo mat shoes. They decrease mat friction and still allow you to see your foot positions. They pack easily. My new one's are my 3rd pair.

Crocs are to size but will eventually feel more comfortable as you wear them. Surprisingly, they do not retain foot odor nor do they 'sweat'.
