I can asure that when you get this new sandals you will feel great this is a special sandal and you will enjoy it alot. i love them to walt or to stay at home they are great

I own 5 pairs of Converse sneaks, my daughter has 3 pairs, and my son has 2 pairs. We all really love our Chucks. But this is my first pair of the low top kind. I love them so much. They are really comfortable and easy to slip on and off, and so very black so they go with any kind of casual clothing well.If you're buying Converse for the first time, be aware they run just a touch big. This is wonderful for my son who has fairly wide feet, but the rest of us usually buy a half size small.

Several years ago I had problems running to include back pain and shin splints and was limited to running 2 or 3 miles at a time. I absolutely hated running, and I attribute this to ill-fitting shoes. After lots of searching for a new pair of shoes, I was recommended a pair of New Balance shoes...can't remember the exact model, but it was a predecessor to the 856. Within a year, I was able to run 2 half-marathons and a full marathon. These shoes eliminated all complications...great for my overpronation and low arches. I have ordered 2 or 3 pairs at a time, paying up to $100 for them. Amazon's deal of $39.99 is a steal...I was told by another shoe dealer that this model was discontinued back in the spring. Good to see they're still available.

I ordered these boots for my dad, who is impossible to please. He is very fussy about his boots, and they needed to be:black, not too shiny, not have an advertising logo visible, be unlined (just leather, so he can wear them in summer), have classic styling and stitching, rounded toe, not too grippy on bottom, but not absolutely slick, have no leather "by-products", go up high enough on his leg, and fit under his jeans. We actually found something close to custom order - for about $250-300, non-returnable (Did I mention they couldn't be more than $150?). Not only would that seem impossible to find, but he needed them to be available in extra-wide sizes because I guess his feet are a bizarre shape. AND he wanted them by next week, since his "work sneakers" were falling apart at the seams. He wanted these to be his work boots.I received the boots within a few days, and gave them to my dad, who slipped his feet in and lit up. I checked in a few days later and he said they're so perfect he almost doesn't want to wear them to work - they're just too nice. I did see he wore them to church a few days ago. The impossible to satisfy was finally satisfied by these boots - so I HIGHLY recommend these to any man looking for a comfortable, durable, attractive classic leather boot.The price is a great deal, and you're not cutting corners. This is a quality product.

TROOP Footwear is back for the 2k3 and they are hot. These shoes not only look amazing, they some of the most comfortable shoes ive ever wore. they are definately worth ever penny i spent on them. However, this is made from fine, real leather material I found to be very durable and of a high quality. The footbeds are some of the best I have ever used, and the bottom soles seem to be very stred resistant, unlike many dress shoes. I did find these shoes a little hot without super thin socks. But for jogging, it is one of the best.

MY HUSBAND WAS VERY PLEASED WITH THIS BOOT AND I WAS PLEASED WITH THE PRICE AND ALSO THAT THEY ACTUALLY FIT HIM. YEAH,,, HE IS HARD TO BUY SHOES FOR. SHIPPING WAS GOOD BUT HAD NO RETURN LABLE IN CASE THEY DIDN'T FIT JUST SO YOU KNOW. HOWEVER, I WAS THRILLED THAT WE DIDN'T NEED ONE. THANKS SO MUCH.. WE SAVED FIFTY DOLLARS ORDERING THESE FROM AMAZON.

hola todo fino Excelenteeeeee muy hola todo fino gustaooo muchoooooo everything right all excellent recommendy poreque esta muy buernono em ha llegadotodo bien lo recomiendobuenoooooooooooooooooooo recomendado
I have worn these shoes for a while now and they are the most comfotable sandal I have ever owned. I am about to buy another pair. Oh, did I mention I have foot probems? Not with these sandals.

I usually wear a 10.5 in most shoes, including Vans, which are my normal brand. The 10.5 Chucks that arrived are almost a whole size larger than what i'm used to. They are more like 11.5 They fit fine width wise, but my toe barely reaches the white rubber in the front. So word of advice, order a size smaller than you think.
Wife had liiked for these particular sneakers for months. the 4.5 size was imposible to find in stores. We will increase our purchases on the internet and especially at Amezon in the future

I am pretty particular about my shoes. These shoes are both comfortable and durable. Support was adequate but I replaced the Rockport inserts with Dr. Scholl's after about a year. I've been wearing these on and off now for over 3 years! Soles still look pretty good with just a little wear on the outside of the heels. They still look fine with a little polish and are still supportive and comfortable. I liked them so much I bought another two pair.

I ordered these moccasins sometime during early december and they were shipped immediately and arrived when they were supposed to. I can't describe how much I like them. They are extremely comfortable and I wear them all around the house. They are warm and are very relaxing. Muy bien.

Descriptions on many products, even those with specs, (not all, and not just shoes) are lacking important detaials. These are not comfortable to walk around wearing as a substitute for say deck shoes. The main problem being they do not have an arch support. Without an arch support, it gets tedious to continually wear them. Such information should be supplied in the description/specs of shoes. The leather uppers are great, the sole should last a long time, but they are not comfortable for extended wear. Oh yeah, my cats think the shoes are great for sharpening their claws.

I bought this Converse sneaker in black. These All Star sneakers look stylish and good with any casual pants I own. I would have given the product 5 stars, EXCEPT, these shoes are like walking on bricks since they have no cushion in the soles for the heels. I understand they're supposed to have the whole classic appeal... but if you're over 30 years old and try to rock a pair of Converse for an entire day, you may encounter some uncomfortable lower back pain. So 4 stars for fashion.

A ballet shoe is a ballet shoe is a ballet shoe. Plain and simple. But they need to be worn a while to conform to your feet. If you have never tried them before, don't try to figure out which is the left and which is the right, they look just alike. I have a wide foot. Reviewers said these ran large, so I ordered my regular size... figuring they would stretch to make the right width, and at the same time get a little shorter. But, they hurt right away since they were too long and narrow. I didn't want to suffer while breaking them in. Fortunately my husband remembered we had a shoe stretcher, so I put that on them, one at a time for a few hours. Now they are a comfortable width and length, and I'm sure they will soon conform completely to my foot.
I have used Easy Spirit when I show my dogs for several years. They are light weight and have good traction when moving my dog. I wore my last pair for several years until my new puppy chewed them.
These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. The leather is soft and pliable. Buy these shoes!
Not a very sturdy shoe compared to other Saucony I have bought. OK for day to day wear but would not run in it.

Got these for my wife so we could still take evening walks when the rural roads here get icy. The product is easy on, easy off, and she reports greatly improved traction and footing. Got a pair for msyelf too and I say the same: much easier to walk on packed road snow, faster walking, greater stability and traction, less fatigue.
These boots were great! I ordered for my Halloween costume and they came before I expected them which was great!

The price was right, appreciated free shipping... received the product 10 days after the suggested delivery... purchased for a gift, and it arrived the day I needed it... was worried it would not arrive

My first pair of Wolverine boots. I have read nothing but good reviews, so I tried a pair. These are the most comfortable boots I have ever had. I use these 10 -12 hrs a day on concrete, gravel, slanted surfaces, etc. and these are sturdy and look nice. Almost like walking on air! Uppers made in Dominican Republic, assembled in the USA. I will never buy cheap Chinese (communist) made boots again.

I'm wearing these bad boys right now. These sneakers have a sexy look to them, and you can't go wrong with classic chucks at this price. Buy them! Every one should have black and white sneakers in their collection. They feel great, and I haven't had any problems with them yet. This is well worth the purchase. :-)
I ordered these shoes based on the picture provided, when they arrived i was dissappointed the color was much darker than it looks and it looked much different.

I bought these after having own Asics 2080s, which I loved. I wanted another pair of shoes with the IGS system. The product description says that these shoes do, but upon receiving them I do not believe that they do. No where on the shoe does it say IGS, unlike my 2080s which clearly have the IGS symbol on the heel.Other than that, they are fairly comfortable shoes. I have not had the opportunity to run in them yet, as I am still breaking them in.

I got these boots right before it snowed a good 2 feet and they have been indispensable. The faux distressed look makes these boots trendy and at the same time they are very useful. The perfect blend of fashion and utility. I just bought another pair of Rocket Dogs because at this price, you can't beat it.

Very well made and quite cute.I love the slipper, but it runs short andthe toe section seems wider than normal.Overall I love my "little dazzlers".I also gave 2 pair as a gift and she saidthey were wide in the toe area, but wasequally pleased with them.EXCELLENT VALUE.
I bought these for the advertised arch support and they do that for me. The strap however is a pain and I removed them... These are a bit over priced or I would get a 2nd pair..
I asked for these for Christmas and I was so excited to get them! Great product! Comfortable! Cute and great price! I want to get a pair in every color!
Comfortable and pretty too. However, not recommend buying from amazon. I found one in the store is cheaper...

This is a great shoe for lindy hop! It seems all the girls in East Coast swing use Keds shoes. I was having a problem because I have wide feet. I could not find wide width Keds in the local stores around my town. I was worried about the fit, so I tried my size on at the store of the med width, just to get an idea of the length to make sure I order the right size. I have worn them to several dances and they work and feel great. There is no need to get suede put on the bottom of these, they spin just fine on the dance floor. I am very happy with these shoes!

purchased this item as a gift for my sister to wear for her dance performances in high school for her jazz dance elective. the 6.5w was wide for her feet so i made an exchange. it was an easy process. i made the exchange the day my sister received the shoes, the 6.5n pair was sent the next day and arrived the following day. they fit a lot better now even though it was a little more snug and the sides still made it look wide. she broke them in and loves doing her spins in them. thanks!
I ordered for my son for Christmas . ...he loves them ..I didn't know the left sole was different from the right but one is for gripping and one for sliding
The items arrived on time and were exactly as advertised. We could not have been happier. My sone wears them most every day.
I bought these as a gift for my son. The sizing was spot on. He loves them. They are apparently very popular nowadays!

My brother and I wear the same size of shoes, so he bought these and I wore them 2 days, they are too tight at the toe area, so my toes were a little sore the second time I used them. I purchased the Mizuno Men's 9-Spike Pro Limited Low G4 Cleat, and these are much more comfortable a more wide toe area.

I purchased these shoes because I've always trusted capezio but the shoes just do not hold up well at all. I use them twice a week and have for the last 5 weeks and they already look awful like i've had them for years. The gathering on the bottom is beginning to come undone already too. I would suggest looking for a better model of shoe.
I ordered these sneakers for my cousin. He loves them! Great pair of basic sneakers that blends well with any outfit. Great decision, rather than over priced sneakers!

Been using my pair for 2 years now. They are durable and quite comfortable. What I love about New Balance is that they are available in many widths, mine is 4E. It is almost impossible for me to find a pair in shopping malls. This one fits perfectly. I think the price is not too steep compared to other brands.It is my everyday shoes for work and recreation. It is described as walking shoes but I also use it for some light jogging & tennis. Nice minimalistic simple design. Leather is supple...and yes, the biggest reason I bought it is velcro.
This is a very elegant and comfortable boot that it will dress up any outfit.I am very happy with my purchase,and I would definitely recommend this product.
These are the most comfortable timberlands my husband has ever had....He loves and wants another pair for work he said its worth it!!

I've had them for about a month now, and they are FANNNTASIC!!!!!!!You HAVE To Bring Them BACK to Buy!!!!They go with Everything! and they are SOOOOOO Comfortable!!!!!!!!!I Have the GOLD Color!!! and I want to buy another two more pairs!!! of those!!!BRING THEM BACK!!! PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!

The boots were delivered within reasonable time. The boots fit well and are comfortable to wear. Leather quality is OK though I have seen better quality leather for the same price. There is however a defect I noted on the second day. There are small cracks, about 12, 1/4" long each at the back of the right shoe. Photo sent. Manufacturer responded to my query and offered replacement or refund. Unfortunately, I am based outside of US and cannot ship back using prepaid UPS provided. Could have been nice shoes.
They are very nice looking shoes but they are a little tight in my toes, so I can use them not for long hours.
My last pair of bowling shoes were from around 1995 and had the leather soles.It only took 2-3 practice frames to get used to these shoes. They fit great and slide great and you can't beat the price.

These gave me a little knee pain initially, but after a week or two they became the most comfortable shoes I own. I have hiked in soft dirt and walked on wet pavement without any slipping but these are not waterproof.
I now own five pairs!!! All in different colors! Hope they never stop selling them!
These shoes are great for work. They are comfortable (not too wide either so I'm not swimming in them) and look really nice to boot. Overall happy with my purchase.

I've been using these for a number of years and they work great. My ONLY complaint with them is where the end is doubled-over and sticked back on itself is very week. Almost all of these fail within a couple of months, but is easily corrected by restitching or safety-pinning. I'm fat and my work-shirts won't stay tucked in without them. I will keep buying these despite the very minor design flaw.

I've been wearing the "Reebok Women's Princess" model for more than 10 years.I usually buy 2 pairs per year(one black and one white). I beg Reebok to never stop making them. My 12 hour work shift (standing and walking)requires a comfortable pair of shoes and these are the best! And I am an expert in the subject, because I have "problem feet". Everything hurts my feet, except the Reebok princess. I can't live without them!
The Last time I wore a pair of these, my codename was Roadrunner, fastest boy in the universe...lol.I bought these more for the nostalgiathan anything else.I have no complaints

I bought these shoes in the Stone/Navy color. They're a great neutral color that goes with almost everything. They look nice with the khaki scrubs and chinos that I wear to work. They are true to size, but I'd definitely recommend ordering them in wide if your feet are wide in the least. The fit is a little snug across the top of my foot, but it has improved greatly over the first day of wearing. They were a little difficult to get on the first time, but it was much easier the second time. I only gave the shoes four stars because they are way overpriced at $54. I got them on sale through Amazon for $34.90. The quality is okay, but not outstanding. My daughter has these and the colored rubber accents on the bottom tread came off after a while. The part of the upper on the heel and above the suede accents is actually vinyl. I expected it to be cloth. Leather would have been much nicer. I hope to buy another pair in black or brown, but only if they are on sale!

I own 2 pairs of these Quark Rockets. They are the best shoes ever. I work 12 hour shifts & I'm on my feet at least 10 hours. I tried the those expensive shoes with the "spring" in the heal. (cost over $200) The rubbed on my ankle bone & just were not comfortable. These are the lightest shoes ever. I feel like I'm almost barefoot! Yet, they are cushy enough that my feet & legs are NOT sore after 12 hours! I just love them. I wore them hiking in the Redwood National Park last summer, too!

I run marathons and various triathlon distances, and have done plenty of miles happily on Asics Kayanos. I was worried about the cushioning on such a lightweight shoe when I took them out of the box. But they run beautifully. They are so incredibly light it makes a noticeable difference to my running. Not sure how long they would last given their minimalist design, but I guess we tend to retire our shoes before there are any signs of wear & tear on the upper part of the shoe anyway. The only issue for me is the tongue design - yes the single-fold makes sense in a weight-saving capacity, and once the shoes are on there are no comfort issues (on the contrary they feel great), but if you do triathlons and need to do a fast transition, you need to spend a bit longer to make sure they are put on right. Nevertheless, they are still my new favorite running shoe. JK
These shoes worked out great for my three year old daughter just starting dance class. They are comfortable on her, and look so cute.
They looked good, so I bought them. They fit good, so I did not need to return them. They felt good, so I kept them. The service was great. I'd buy from them again.
This item was ordered as a gift for a relative, my nephew in Kansas. He received the item promptly and is very happy with it. Yes, we would order this item again.

Converse Chuck Taylor All Stars are not just a fashion statement. Back in the day, they were my choice of athletic footwear -- following in my father's footsteps -- while starting center on the high school basketball team. For a 6'2" white guy with a moderate vertical leaping ability, I didn't have to worry about losing any spring in my step, and I always led stats in rebounds and blocked shots against players wearing the then-ubiquitous Adidas, Puma and Converse "Dr. J" hi-tops. In all fairness, and as a disclaimer, 80% of the opposing team members were white guys, too.Still, though I have absolutely no vertical leap left (hey. I graduated 24 years ago), I still wear these shoes, just because. Like one reviewer pointed out, they're a great conversation starter. Plus, they're as comfy as a second pair of feet.At the turn of the 20th to the 21st century, it appeared that there'd be NO Chucks left at all: The Massachusetts factory was closing down, and Chucks appeared to be going the way of acid-wash jeans. Fortunately (or, unfortunately, if you're a member of the garment workers' union), Converse went through some reorganization and now makes these overseas, presumably in China.Well, I'm boycotting the People's Republic of China, an anti-labor country that has helped more American CEOs bust unions than just about anyone else. Its own people are slave labor. Fortunately, I thought ahead, so when Converse was on the ropes, I went out to every shoe store around and bought up all the size 12 hi tops I could find. To be exact, 143 pairs -- a closet full. I've got 'em in white, optical white, green, red, basic black, navy blue, yellow, orange, you name it. Set me back $2700, but was worth every penny, knowing that American workers made them.I AM THE IMELDA MARCOS OF CONVERSE CHUCK TAYLOR ALL-STAR SHOES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!But, if you're a newcomer to them, or missed the boat, I won't hate ya for buying these for yourselves. They are so cool, I'll look the other way.I have to look the other way myself: I buy the toddler sizes for my two wittle one. Aw!!!! :) At least I help keep American shoe store employees employed, if not factory workers.
THIS IS THE EXAT PARTNUMBER BOOT I HAVE WORN FOR SEVERAL YEARS. I WORKED A CAR WASH AND IT KEPT MY FEET DRY AND SAFE FROM ELECTRICAL SHOCKS. WORK ON HARD SURFACES AND THEY ARE VERY COMFORTABLE.

At first seeing the price of some of these Ecco shoes, I know a few may balk, saying, "two-hundred bucks for a pair of shoes!"I can assure you, Ecco shoes are worth every penny. The ones I am currently wearing have lasted over three years and still going strong.The best shoes I've ever owned.
These are the most comfortable timberlands my husband has ever had....He loves and wants another pair for work he said its worth it!!
I was very satisfied with the sneakers that I ordered for my son. He loved them. They were shipped in a timely manner and it was much easier than going to the stores during the holidays.
These sneakers are OK....don't know if these are original or knock offs...fit is not the same as the Keds I remember!

I always liked Converse shoes and since i moved to the Dominican Republic, i've gone thru my share of overpriced fakes. I'm happy that i can get these online now. I like having shoes that go along with any type of clothing or colour.....any!!!!So yes, these are great and one cannot go wrong in purchasing a pair unless u get the wrong size. I will definitely buy another or others in different colours. No regrets on this purchase.

I've gone through three pairs of these shoes in the last decade. Yes! Ten years! I'm about to turn 29 years old and got my first pair at the end of high-school from a friend. The second pair is still with me and has worn all the way through the sole but they are still comfortable and very wearable. IMHO there isn't a better casual styled shoe out there in terms of comfort, retro style and look.I will admit that I have fairly flat feet, and the slight lack of support might be part of what makes these a little more comfortable for me.In my opinion, for fifty bucks or less depending on where you buy them, getting three to four years out of a pair of shoes is simply awesome. And I don't own a bunch of shoes I wear these every day!
wear them fall, winter, and spring. love these boots. I do use an innersole though.Great price from Amazon (the best I could find)
This is the shoe that every teenager should be wearing when they leave the house. Abstinence is the only way to avoid pregnancy, STDs, and other associated health problems. Don't leave it up to them.
I was looking for birkenstock because they are very supportive and comfortable whe you are on your feet as much as I am as a nurse.

I bought these for my wife. They look good on her. These hold up much better than thesuede ones without a sole. When that type gets wet, they take on a worn out look.My wife says they are light and comfortable. Minnetonka is a good brand name, and shehas already told me that when this pair, wears out, she wants the exact pair in white.What more can be said. She's very happy with them.

There are a lot of hard core Chuck Taylor addicts out there and after ordering my first pair I can say I'm still outside that bubble. They look good and the high top doesn't squeeze my ankle or anything like that. The sizing was dead on so don't order a half size larger thinking it's a good idea! My 9's were dead on. The Chucks are a seasonal shoe I wouldn't wear them in the extreme cold, or really rainy days. As for soles and support they're flat. I've owned Vans and they're even flatter than that with less support. It might just be I'm not a kid anymore, or I've got the wrong type of foot but I'm not so sure. I'm expecting these to be my pair of Chucks to last a while because I'm not gonna be wearing these every day. So, they're definitely good .. and everything that other people love, but I think I'd rather wear Vans.
Watch out, Converse are 2 sizes larger than the labeled size. We ended up giving them away, my son is size 11 and they fit his size 13 friend perfectly.
This is the third pair of these shoes I have bought. All different colors. They are great to wear in the office in the summer.
Wonderful, cute boots for such a great deal !!!! For $9.99 you cant beat them.

I ordered these for my 18 year old son. He LOVES them. Has a purple shirt that he wears with them - bought them about 10 months ago and he has worn them so much that they are almost worn out - that's how much he likes them. I would buy him more, but he is going into the military soon. Love Lo Purple Chuck Norris Converse! Thanks Amazon.

I bought these shoes for my daughter a few months ago because we could not find them at the store. It was well worth the risk of buying them the wrong size because they are exactly what she was looking for. They don't look cheap, they're not noticeably dirty even when they are, and for a girl mostly importantly, is that they match just about any outfit. We can't find anything negative to say about these shoes.
Converse All-Stars are the all-American shoe, and the black monochrome goes with everything. Seriously; I've worn these to the opera.
I love these bogs. however they are heavier than I thought they were going to be. a little overkill for my uses, but fun and very functional.

I bought these boots after searching for the most versatile pair I could find. I wasn't sure about choosing brown over black, but I'm happy with the brown. It's a rich shade of brown with some red tone in it, very pretty, and can be worn with black pants if you want. Looks very cute with skirts, jeans, whatever. Also pretty comfortable overall. The heel is low so they're pretty easy to walk in. I read reviews about the boots that suggested ordering a 1/2 size up, which I did. I recommend ordering a full size up. These boots run very small. I wear a size 9 and have a narrow foot. The width was fine, but the length is a little tight. I haven't seen anyone else with boots like these, which is always nice. Overall, I'm really happy with the purchase.

I go through a pair of these about once a year. They are so soft and warm and hold up great. After about a year of being worn daily, the padding on the bottom starts to break down, but that is to be expected after that long. I highly recommend these.

I sized down 0.5 sizes from 8.5 to 8.0 like many have suggested and found these Chukka's to fit really well. However, the leather is quite stiff in the first few wears and more persistent break-in may be required to get comfortable. The beeswax color begins kind of a uniform dark brown, but it has since really brightened with wear and some nice lighter colors are coming through.Overall a great boot, just be aware that they may be a bit stiff to start off.

I have worn Hi-Tec boots for many years now. This is my third pair of Altitude boots. They are comfortable, durable and relatively inexpensive. The boots are great for day hikes these are a good boots for light to moderate loads. If you are looking for a stiff boot for heavy backpacking I would recommend looking at another model of boot. Hi-Tec makes other model boots specifically for backpacking with heavier loads.

After reading many of the reviews I ordered a half size bigger. My daughter is a 11.5 in street shoes and the 12M I ordered are too big and too wide. I am glad I did not order a full size larger, as many reviews suggested.
This shoe is durable and comfortable. It works for many different running surfaces for the outdoor runner. I recommend it.

HELP!, I need somebody, HELP! Not just anybody....and soforth. I cant buy these shoes ANYWHERE!!! Ive searched all over and they either dont have them in my size or I just cant buy them. this site wont let me buy them cuz it isnt listened as a product i can buy... i have no idea why. If any1 has any information on where i can get my hands on these shoes please email me at: stevemosca@hotmail.com
Great style. feel good and fit well. Quality leather, good stiching, quality heal and sole with smooth finish. Will buy again in future.
They velcro...I bought them a bit big but they can be tightened with the velcro. Of course, they don't get dirty and so far, they appear to be very durable. They do not light up...fyi.

these are the most uncomfortable boots I have ever owned. the tongue is so wide it wraps around your ankle and digs into your ankle bone. no way to fold it to keep it away. but they should never wear out. after an hour a day for six months trying to break them in they are still stiff and hard to wear. I would not recomend these to anyone.

This is my third pair. The first finally wore out after 5 years of use in the yard and all around durring the winter and my second is reserved for just hiking, (they took me over the Indian Himilayas very nicely, thank you.)Light weight, inexpensive, and a good fit. I can recomend them. Oh Yea they truly are water proof till about 5 years old.

I bought these for my 2 year old little boy. The boots look great and are well made but they are REALLY difficult to get on,even with the laces completely removed. After about a dozen wearings they break in and start to go on easier, but if you are buying these for a baby or toddler, be prepared to spend an extra ten minutes putting these on your little guy for the first few weeks!

Wore these in the Air Force for about nine years. Tried a different boot this last go around and quickly realized my mistake. I love Corcoran boots and am glad I am wearing them again. I would highly recommend them as they are comfortable, secure and last a good amount of time with regular polishing.
This is my fourth set of Hi Tec boots. They are the only shoe I own that never hurt my feet. They are made well and last.

im really so disappointed with this new balance , its really hard to wear it for long hours , my feet hurts, now i dont know what to do with it , i probably just gonna throw it on the trash , i wasted $38 , dont be fooled by false reviews , i have the same 574 but i bought it from a local store and its really good , the reason i bought the next one from amazon because it was hard to find the EE size at local stores , i should have a refund for this ,i know amazon dont return worn shoes , but i was expecting same comfort as the one i bought from a local store , iam very dissappointed
Very solid, timeless, and stylish choice. Make sure you order a size to a size and a half down from your usual size. I wear an 11 in Nike and ordered a 10 for these - 9.5 would be optimal for me.

I usually reserve myself to Doc Martens, but I was looking for a style change when I found these boots at an unreal price. They are lightweight and comfortable, and look very nice in solid black. The best thing about them is their durability. I am tough as hell on shoes in general, but these are very scuff resistant. I imagine these will still look good 6 months from now without any type of repair, but we'll see.

I have wore these since I was a kid, but now sadly these are hard to find. If you are looking for both quality and a product made in the states then these are the shoes for you. The nice thing is that Chucks come in a variety of colors so you can get different ones if you want to have a certain look.
These shoes are well worth the price. The most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. They also look great. A+

I love these shoes! I have bought several pairs in different colors. They are as comfortable as atheltic shoes but much more stylish. But beware--they run small! I normally wear a size 6.5, but I have to order a size 7 with these.

I have only worn them a few times, but they are comfortable and look great with skirts or slacks. I had a different pair of dress backless shoes that had a heel that was too flexible, but this one is wonderful.

Worked out of the box, used them for a few days on the treadmill, but probably wasnt needed. I have been using them for the weekly Treks here at Mission Peaks in the Bay Area, CA, which has pretty good uphills. No complains so far.Rated 4 only for the fact that the heels could use a little more padding - the heel of the shoe is hard which is good for support but not too good when you are walking up-slope. Also have been wearing 2 socks for better grip and to provide more cushion for the heels.

Couldn't get my foot more than half way in. Liked the style very much but was not confident I would get the right size by reordering. Cost me ove 8 dollars to return the shoes.Easy Spirit Women's Motion Sport Lace Up/ camel

I'm in the Coast Guard, and i just got the boots and so far they seem to be really good. They shine up pretty easily and they're very cushioned. On other reviews, people said that they bought half a size smaller and i'm happy I did. They fit like a gem. I look forward to wearing them in an operational environment.

Shame on me twice for getting a shoe that has a hard mid-foot. The first was recommended by a Footaction's salesman for an Asics Gel shoe. He said I was flat-footed and need a pair of shoe with arch support or a mid-foot stiffener. After my first jog my arches were hurting me. I thought it was a new pair and needed to be worn in. Tried it a couple more times and it didn't get any better. So back to Nike's Air Max.After great successes and comfort of Adidas MegaBounce and AS Trail, I shifted alliance with Nike to Adidas and decided to get the more cushioned Supernova 6 over the cheaper Orbed. For me with a flat foot and the left feet having the tendency to roll inward, this became extremely painful. More pain on the left, but not too much on the right foot. So I guessed it more of my physical makeup then just the shoe.The ShoeThe shoe itself is fairly awesome and extremely padded on the sides and cushioned in the front and rear foot. Again I don't like the mid-foot Torque system. I have likened the wider foot design of Adidas and Asics over the narrower Nike design; typically I had to buy a one size longer for Nike shoe. The upper mesh is one of the best ventilated materials out there. Plus the looks of Adidas shoe design are more pleasing in my eyes then the extravagant Nike's deigns. I can still use this shoe for walking, because it is quite comfortable like what I did with the other Asics Gel.Just not for my feet.

These boots seem to be very well made, and I have yet to slip on ice due to the super grippy soles. Of course, they look awesome.However, I bought the smallest size that Demonia makes (6), and they are too big all around. I'm generally a size 6, sometimes 5 1/2, but these feel closer to a 7 or 8 (I can't make my toes touch the end even if I try). Also, the boots stay up because they are stiff, but they are also loose on my calves and ankles. These are not designed for small and slender people.
The shoes ordered on this web site are satisfactory. Thanks for sending the order promptly and in perfect condition.

Not the same quality wallet that Buxton produced in the past. Interior of wallet and check book cover is vinyl, thin vinyl at that. The exterior is leather and is very pretty. I don't think this wallet will hold up to daily use very long. Would not order again.

This is the 2nd pair of the same style I have bought. The first pair I bought about 6 year ago and have worked them hard in an offshore commercial diving environment. That first pair is just now starting to fail, so I've now bought another. Great pair of steel to work shoes!

I gave these to my Mom for Christmas, and she loves them. When she's not wearing shoes, she's wearing these slippers. She loves the fact that she can wear them outside and not worry about having to change into shoes, as traditional slippers can be ruined this way. They keep her feet warm, but not too warm, which is the big selling point for her with slippers.

I bought my first pair of these boots at Airborne School, needing more appropriate boots for running in, as one does during the course. I found them to be extremely light (comparable in weight to Oakleys) and comfortable out of the box. You know how you used to have to break in your Bellvues or Altamas before even thinking about rucking with them? Not really a worry with these guys, as long as the fit is proper, you can complete a decent-length ruck march with little to no break-in. Also, they are somewhat water-resistant. Aside from those aspects, one more plus is that if you get the model with the rubberized toes and heels, its one less thing things to worry about scuffing up in garrison..HOWEVER. Don't expect these boots to last more than a year under rough condition. They are made and China, after all, which in itself is a discredit to the item. If water DOES get inside them, they do not drain worth a DAMN. There are no drain holes, and I ended up drilling my own where the leather meets the rubber sole. I'm sure this hastened the deteriation of the boot, but it was better than getting trench foot. The laces wore out to the point of breaking (they are cheap 550 cord laces), but were easily replaced with free, Army-provided para cord.Bottom line, these boots will probably hold up better in the desert, than say...the draws and streams of Camp McCall, NC. Even then, don't expect them to last over 8 months. But, they are damn comfortable, to their credit.

This is a generic big shoe of average manufacture and materials. It is clearly foreign but none of the cost savings of such outsourcing has been passed through to the consumer. It can be extrapolated that such behavior by the owners/managers of this company will overtime generate a market niche for an on-shore competitor to retake market share with potentially higher quality materials at the same price.
Bought for use with my llbean Cresta Hikers. I used Woodlore's sizing chart. In my case (10.5D), they are too narrow for the boots I own. Maybe they will be better for others

I have 2 pairs of this model shoe and love them. After being a Nike fan for years I decided to give something else a try. This shoe is lightweight and very comfortable. I also love the classic style. And you can't complain about the nice price.

I love these boots. They're so much fun! Don't let the height of the heel scare you...the platform actually makes the heel shorter when it comes to foot placement. Only problem - the laces don't stay laced when they're not on your feet. You'll have to relace them each time.

Rockport Men's Astride are my favourite comfort shoes so when I needed a new pair I hit the stores trying to get a pair. All shops I went to had none in stock and of those who said they could get a pair in for me the cost was to be somewhere between AUD250 and AUD270. So I did what any person in need of shoes that were not readily available would do - I went on line to Amazon. In a matter of about 2 weeks (it could have been less) I had a pair of Rockport Men's Astride in my size and the colour I wanted all for around AUD68 INCLUDING POSTAGE!

Was surprised how hard it was to find shoe recommendations based on arch type (high arch, flat feet, etc.). Saw in a comment somebody liked the Asics GT-2110 for flat feet and decided to give them a try. They are the best shoes I have had for my flat feet, with good support and comfort.Shoes held up well, although I use them for regular use (not running). Felt light, breathe well, and fit well.
These shoes fit great and look cool. They were shipped on time and looked exactly as described. My son's friends complimented him on his new shoes!
These Rockport shoes have greatly helped my sore, sore feet. Since being in the military I have had problems with my feet. These are the first shoes to give me a measure of relief!

These beautiful boots garnered many compliments and made my legs look great. But after four or five wearings, the cheap plastic zipper started disintegrating at the ankle (and I don't have thick ankles causing undo stress on the zipper.) Hoping it was a fluke, I exchanged them for an identical pair, and the zipper fell apart on them as well after just three wearings. I could have replaced the zipper for $40, but it's just a matter of time before some other shoddy component self-destructs. Luckily, Nordstrom's has a very gracious exchange/return policy. I won't be buying this footwear brand again.

I purchased these shoes to wear on vacation and they are fabulous! They were comfortable with no breaking in--the first day I wore them was the day I dealt with airport parking, walking and security. Also, I usually need a wide shoe, but found the medium width in the Leve Ballet Flat fit well and was perfectly comfortable.
If you walk on ice, you'll find these very nice. And much less expensive than a broken bone.
Loved the shoes, bought them for my mother and she is thoroughly enjoying them. Very comfortable and received shipment right away.
These are well-made boots and wide enough to be comfortable on my feet. The top is slightly narrow, so they will be snug on my calves. Great quality for the price.
These are really Great boots,............ I would recommend these for any growing boy, or girl,............ Just buy a half size larger!!!!!!

I have had Eastland Paxtons (Dark Brown) for the past two years. I bought them at Shoe Carnival for $50. They have been comfortable since day one and look great. They are pretty light, which makes them easy to wear if you're on your feet all day. I oiled them once (about a year ago) which made them look almost new again. The tread on the soles is now flat and there are some holes on the inside lining, but they have stood up well for two years. I'm having trouble finding them again, I'd buy them again if I could find them. Yesterday, I bought the Eastland Starks which seem to be the same shoe without laces. Still getting used to them, but so far they are good.
Our daughter is a dancer and its cheaper and easier to order her items online. These shipped fast and are holding up great!

The boots arrived on time, but I wasn't happy with the way they fit. They were heavier than I prefer and bigger than I wanted.I wound up donating the boots to a local church who was collecting for the victims of hurricane Sandy, so hopefully they found someone who could use them better than I.Quality-wise they appeared to be well made, so I had no problem with that. But I learned that, for me at least, I need to try boots on in person to make sure they feel right to me.

I usually wear a 10.5 in most shoes, including Vans, which are my normal brand. The 10.5 Chucks that arrived are almost a whole size larger than what i'm used to. They are more like 11.5 They fit fine width wise, but my toe barely reaches the white rubber in the front. So word of advice, order a size smaller than you think.

Very comfortable. I have not climbed in them yet, so I can't comment on the durability, but the traction on the sole is excellent and they fit like a glove. I ended up getting them in the same size as my sneaker, and they are snug. Love the laces.
Great looking shoe that can be dressed up or down. True to size and great dancing shoes with the leather soles.
Use for auto-x and the thin sole allows for great pedal feedback. Took about a week or so before they were broken in nicely. Good comfy shoe with great pedal feedback and style.

I used to have these about 20 years ago. So I was looking for a new pair of shoes and not just some running sneakers which crap out after a month and offer no more support so I remembered how comfortable my Rockports were. I notice on this pair there is no mention of a "Vibram" bottom or sole it only says rockport stamped in the bottom sole. So now im thinking was it the vibram soles that made them so comfortable because these soles feel more like hard plastic and not that "cushion-y" feeling I used to love and swear by. So what happened to the vibram soles? Now that these are made in vietnam do you think they are cutting corners and saving some bucks by using these soles. Shame because they are a pretty nice looking shoe even if bland a little.
These work great!If you have or plan to make the investment in a good pair of shoes, I recommend investing in good shoe trees as well.
they were comfortable
This was a gift. It arrived on time for my 80 something year old grandmother's birthday. Even she thinks they are comfortable.
Comfortable shoe. Nice deep white. Good leather uppers. Shoes really last. True to size. Wear at work at least 10 hours per day. Good support.

the Capezio Little Kid/big Kid Daisy Ballet shoes are very nicely made. The sizes run a hair small, so order about 1/2 size larger than shoe size. I ordered 2 sizes,not knowing which would fit from previous reviews.I ordered 1/2 size and 1 full size larger than her current shoe size. This worked to my advantage as my child is still growing and out grew the first pair within the first 2 weeks, so we were able to use both pairs, just not for very long with a growing kid. The product is worth the money in my opinion as they are well made. And according to our Ballet teacher, they were also properly made, with the strap in the correct place.
They're Chuck Taylor's. If you'll like them, you'll love these. Black high-top sneakers were a great gift for the scene girl with black everything
excelente..!! los recomiendo!! compra segura y a tiempo.! saludos desde ecuador! los zapatos llegaron a mi pais sin ninguna novedad..!!

First of all, the shoe came amazingly fast. In about 3 days, it was at my doorstep. When I tried it on, the cushioned sole was comfortable and everything was like it looks in the picture. BUT, the shoe did run a little narrow and a little bit short. Not enough to ruin the fit, but just enough for my toes to be against the front while walking. Therefore, I reccommend ordering .5 a size up.

The bag arrived before the anticipated due date.The bag itself has more than enough pockets for organization of items carried by anyone for business or pleasure. Leather quality for the price is better than expected. All in all satisfied with the purchase and would purchase from this vendor again.

How do I love thee, Reef Ginger flip flops? Let me count the ways. I am only sad that I could not find a new beige-colored pair this season, because I buy you in every color. I walk the whole of Manhattan in them with no blisters, nothing but total comfort. Literally, these are the one pair of summer shoes I cannot do without.

It's hard to find a white tennis shoe that doesn't just look plain stupid these days. I hate the huge basketball puffy shoes and the super white polo club/preppy versions. So when I saw this shoe I had to have it. It is the right combo of both retro styling and unassuming 'I don't care' fashion. The shoes are really comfortable, durable as heck and just keep getting better looking the more they are broken in. I'm going to buy another pair because after 1 year of abuse I know I'm going to need a backup when they eventually disintegrate.I recommend the white with Navy myself. The white with black are a little too 'Run DMC'...though they wore Adidas....I know.

Extremely comfortable and goes with just about any casual outfit you have planned out.However, I recommend ordering a whole size down, as the shoe runs big and also stretches the more you wear the shoe.
These shoes are great! They are comfortable, well-made, and are very durable. This is my third pair, and I will continue to buy them.

Original quality product received, however I followed the advice and bought a US size 11 which is normally a euro size 10.5 (as I take a 10-10.5, this was the size I needed). Converse say to buy a half size smaller than you need, but it would be too risky to do that and have too tight a shoe, so I bought the size I needed. 10.5 wasn't a listed size option anyhow.The label in the shoe says they are US 11 and UK 11. Go figure - doesn't make sense. So they are a half size too big. If only they told you that information somewhere up front.

Wore these in the Air Force for about nine years. Tried a different boot this last go around and quickly realized my mistake. I love Corcoran boots and am glad I am wearing them again. I would highly recommend them as they are comfortable, secure and last a good amount of time with regular polishing.

I have worn Danner boots in the military for over 15 years. I have always worn a size 11EE. This boot in that size did NOT fit me. It was very narrow with a narrow toe box. I gave them 3 stars because they look like a well made boot and I seriously wish they would have fit. However, I do love my military issued Danners and give them 10 stars!!
Simply made but works well for starter tap dancers such as my son. He quit tap after a few months so the price was right considering.
I purchased these shoes for my 10 year old daughter. The leather is very good however the cut is very small and therefore does not fit.
as I said I am a fan of easy spirit--was glad to get a bargain-and of course would recommend the product and Amazon for easy purchase

I got this months ago and honestly I never wear them, the size is a bit tricky, it's a bit short and narrow, my feet are narrow already, but they still are uncomfortable in these shoes. It's my first Minnetonka shoes and I don't think I'll get a second pair.
My order was processed and shipped in amazing time. Thanks so much for your 5 Star Service
These are the only sandals I wear. Have been ordering these for more than seven years....why buy anything else?

This is the best running shoe I have ever owned! I had trouble with my LCL, not anymore. I used to start to get tired after 4 miles, I can go twice as long with these. If you have flat, narrow feet and small ankles, this is the shoe for you. Pretty good arch support. Could use more, but I'm not complaining!! I hope they never discontinue this shoe!
Love the looks and confort of this shoe. Fit true to size and required no breaking in period. Goes with so many of my summer clothes.

I have had two pairs of these boots. The boots are very comfortable and are sized right for my foot. I use these boots in the snow and also when I go fishing. The waterproofing works very well. In my opinion a very good boot for price.
The sole is too heavy for the style of shoe. They are a bit too wide for a medium width. I love the look of them and the pink color is terrific, but they are heavy to walk in.

Was hoping to replace a pair from years before that we're worn to death. I was disappointed when these arrived, to find they have changed drastically from what I remember. The shoe box itself would have fit better. Like many quality brands that have gone offshore, they resemble a pair of shoes only in their outward appearance.
muy bonitos tenis y a un buen precio y aparte me ahorre el pago del impuesto que me hubiera costado en una tienda local---
These fit well, are comfortable & arrived in rapid time. I don't care much for the lack of eyelets inside the shoe itself. But, all in all, a great deal for the moeny. The colors are very nice.
This is a nice pair of shoes.....my husband loves them because of the quality, feel, and look. Would recommend to anyone...
Great shoe, a little hard to handle though. Practise makes perfect they say, so will keep trying! Excellent value! Lovely style.

I use this polish on my boots for the police academy. Excellent product does what it says, and is totally worth the money. Only downside is that once the can of polish is opened, it can't be resealed, so just throw some tinfoil over it and it wont dry up. Applicator pad works as does the shine cloth, gives an excellent shine if applied properly, and lasts for a long time.

I use these for walking, the first day, they hurt my feet a bit (most shoes do until they get broken in), but by the second and third day, I barely even knew they were on my feet. Sometimes I come home from walking and forget to take them off to put my flip flops on!

These are perfect to keep my beautiful new boots fresh and new-looking. I use trees in most of my shoes, but these are the first ones of cedar that I've bought. I love the quality and scent of cedar! Highly recommend these.

I purchased these shoes to wear for special occasions. My last pair was eaten by my bosses dog. I live in Costa Rica these shoes are not sold anywhere here. In this climate rain, mud, sand, & mold can ruin shoes quickly here. These are perfect they look stylish & are extremely comfortable. I am happy with my purchase!

Got my third pair of these boots just 3 weeks ago and have been wearing them about 3 times a week and, just like the others I have had in the past, they are already comfortably broken in. Waterproofing has been very good and I re-spray them about once a year. Very good on trail with firm support especially good on rocky conditions. Relatively light weight.

I ordered this shoe in black leather with black patent trim. It would have been the perfect dressy flat shoe and I even ordered two sizes to try. Alas, neither fit well enough and both were uncomfortable. Hated having to send them back. I'm still searching for a comparable shoe.

I purchased these for my 12 year old son who has a hard time getting ready in the morning for school! These are great slip on and slip off! The best is that they are great to wear when dressed up also as well as going to school everyday! My son was happy the minute he put his feet inside them and said they were perfect!

I increased my width to 2E to accommodate a comfortable fit but it was still too close for a comfortable fit. You may need to go one size up to get a comfortable fit. It looks quite attractive on the foot however.

They need to note on this listing that in Capezio world woman's size 3 is a child's size 1. So if you buy your kid with size 3 feet a size 3, you are going to get a shoe that is way too small! It's very irritating, cause at this age/size, you can't buy from the listing that have child sizes anymore. Otherwise the shoes look very nice. You do have to start sewing on the elastic now - not like the Daisy's that come with it presewed. Just do the math and make sure you get the right size.
Im not a big fan of sneakers, but these shoes I now want in every color. They are so comfortable and a must have to every college student. Love them!
The product was delivered in two days' time, just as described. The shoes are comfortable and durable, I was very happy to find a pair for so cheap. The seller is very reliable!
I did not give this a 5 star only because the sizing was large. I always wear a 7.5 but these are wide on me.

I love these boots, very adorable, however they left dark rings around my calves even when I wore jeans inside the boots! Also, anytime I wore them in the snow my feet got wet even though snow never came over the top of the shoes!

I purchased these boots for my cousin in England, who has trouble finding such a large size in a hunting boot. He said these boots are wide enough for his feet ( he usually wears 15W )eventhough they read Medium. He also said these boots are the best for keeping his feet warm while out in the fields in temperatures well below freezing. The fleecy type coating on the inside keeps feet dry and warm.He did comment one thing though......he said he spray paints the yellow strip around the boot, purely because it stands out too bright for real hunters like him. I do not have a clue as I am a City kid!!!!In any case, the boots are the best of the best and he is a World Champion Shooter.....Great Purchase indeed.
I had to get these for a wedding. Let's just say technology has made more modern shoes more comfortable. Liked 'em more when I was 8.
Great sneaker really comfortable like walking on air anybody who has a thing for old school gear should try these.
These sneakers are OK....don't know if these are original or knock offs...fit is not the same as the Keds I remember!
I got these shoes in the camel-and-orange choice for $5 at urban outfitters LAST spring! I almost grabbed the black too, for that price! $48? please....
I ordered these shoes for my grandson in Michigan. I knew K-Swiss was good quality because my two sons used to wear this brand. The shoes fit my grandson perfectly.

I don't know about the other colors, which seem to look okay, but the pink color is terrible!!! The rub off really means messy and ugly spots of pink and white all over. It is not evenly "rubbed on." The shoe color is nothing like the picture. I am returning it.

My husband has had a pair of these for a few years and it came time to replace. He did not want to try any other brand/type and just reordered the same type, he likes them a lot! He says they are very comfortable, almost as tennis shoes, but they look professional. Very quick shipment.
Hi,Can anyone tell me how to buy the item? I can only select the size or the color, but never both, so I cannot buy the item. And I don't know how to contact the seller. Thank you!

The first time I saw this shoe (in black/white patent leather) was on the feet of Boston Celtics All-Star forward Antoine Walker. Being a fan of "old-school" shoes and Mr. Walker, I immediately took a liking to the Adidas Promodel 2G.The Adidas Promodel line has been around for over four decades now and many a current and former NBA player has spent time in a pair, whether in high school, college or at the pro level. The first thing that stood out to me was how Adidas kept the classic "shell toe" as part of the shoe while adding minor adjustments to give it a nice blend of modern/retro looks. The patent leather also gives it a nice touch making the shoe simple, but unique.Another huge plus which I'm sure everyone will notice is the price. ... it ain't gonna clean out too many pockets and for this price y'all can go out and cop a pair or two (one for home games, one for the road). So, the bottom line on the Adidas Promodel 2G is that it's worth considering if you're a junior high or high school-level team looking for a good value in a team shoe (... the Promodel costs a lot less than most shoes designed for team use) or if you need a shoe for those lazy Sunday afternoon games down at the park.

These are way better than the hauraches I remember from the 70s & early 80s; they're built like better shoes, with some foot cushion and support. I liked the first pair so much, I ordered two more colors the next day and am equally thrilled with them all. Great looking for sun dress to jeans and anything in between.Also, my kudos to ShoeMall for a fair priced, well-packaged & quick ship!

Great color to add to the collection. Own roughly 15 different pairs of New Balance 574s, currently. Have received many comments on the color from people. Make sure to spray with water proof/stain resistance before wearing to ensure long dirt free life. Would recommend to anyone looking for a colorful sneaker. Order a half size larger than you would normally wear as the shoe seems to run small.

I own another pair of the Mephisto Helen sandals which I've had for almost 10 years now. These sandals are comfortable, well made and I often get compliments on them too. All in all I'm very happy with them and would highly recommend :o)

These have got to be the most comfortable shoes I have ever purchased. The fit is perfect. The quality is flawless. I am sold. These are my first Enzo Angiolini's. And they certainly will not be my last.

this is my first time ordering shoes from this site last time i ordered some shoes from a different site and they were nothing like they previewed on the site anyway i'm ordering now and i'll complete my review when i get the shoe so everyone will know if the companies full of it or not peace

I bought the pink and green to go with my Bebe capelettes in the same colors. My feet are a size 3 kids but wide. I wear anywhere from a 6-8 depending on the style. This shoe is very narrow and pinches even more because of the band on top of the vamp. If you are to buy this shoe, unless your feet are narrow, go 1 size up. Otherwise, it will pinch too much and you just might rip the vamp off the side screws.

These are the most comfortable shoes I ever had - even from the first moment I put them on. No breaking in necessary. I have received so many compliments on them - I am looking into getting the same shoes in some of the other colors. Highly recommended!

very good purchase for my daughter, she had a pair before and she wouldn't take them off unless she went to sleep so they worn out in almost 3 years, so i got this new pair for her for xmas, i'm sure she's gonna love them.perfect sizing and quality.
I have worn this Softspots Stephanie shoe for many years in various colors. They are comfortable and can be worn with different styles of clothing.

I WAS NOT ABLE TO KEEP THE WALKING SHOE'S, BECAUSE THEY SEEM TO BE RUNNING A BITNARROWER THAN MY OTHER BRAND OF WALKING SHOES. BUT I DO HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM.I AM AT AN AGE THAT I PREFER VERY COMFORTABLE WIDTH, AND SUPPORT. LOVED THEVELCRO. KEEP UP THE GREAT PRODUCT, PROPET. SINCERE TRUTHFUL, DH

These shoes are so comfortable I don't even feel like taking them off at the end of the day! Walking is so comfortable with them that even my posture is improved naturaly, without even trying! Amazing how, unlike some shoes that advertise air-cushioned, etc., etc., "technologies", these shoes give me real natural comfort with style.I own a pair of Black and a pair of Tan color.They are so stylish that they make even your average clothes look better!Don't buy them, so only I will be the target of all those admiring eyes at work and in the community! :)
The shoes are great. The leather is very soft, they are well made. Super comfortable with cushions inside. Super fashionable. Shiner than on the picture, but the color is the same.
Very satisfy by the product and I was impresed with how fast I got the order.I will order again from this place for sure.

I love how comfortable they feel on my feet. I did forget that Timberland's are usually sized a bit large when compared to shoes. Normally I'm a size 12 shoe but only in Timberland's I would be a size 11. Luckily for me I ordered a 11.5 size so it wasn't bad enough for me to return. Just have to lace them up tighter but still not an issue when it comes to them being comfortable and durable. It did take me a couple of days to break them in so now the size issue is none existent.
I've seen these boots for $300 on other online sites. This is my second pair of Danner boots and I will be a lifelong customer.

I've been wearing adidas Samba shoes for about four years now. I love the fit and feel of them. They are durable and haven't ripped or broken in any way, they just get very dirty after a few years, which I'm pretty sure all shoes have that problem.I often wear the mainly black ones, but as I was searching for a new pair of shoes I saw this color pattern (mainly white, black stripes). It's also cool, but still simple. I have had this pair of shoes for almost six months and it still looks great.I will say that I have pretty flat feet and somewhat narrow feet, and these shoes fit me perfectly. I'm not sure if they would work well for someone with wider feet, but to anyone else I would reccomend them. They are cool, feel great, and are durable. Very happy with my purchase.
These shoes are a classic and are very comfortable, but, you have to be careful or they will rip. mine ripped in the first month
zapatos de excelente calidad, muy comodos para realizar cualquier actividad llegaron en el tiempo acordado y sin ninguna novedad los recomiendo ampliamente

These weighed a ton. They fit all right and everything, high quality and the color I like, but I had to ship them back, they were just too big and heavy. I opted for a low cut athletic style safety shoe with an alloy toe that weighs 1/3 less than steel toes.

Anyone that says these shoes are amazingly comfortable has never tried on a pair of Rockports.That being said these shoes aren't UNcomfortable so much as they are wearable with minor discomfort. Basically they look better than they feel on the feet. But honestly for $30 I did not expect anymore. They do look snazzy and the size was accurate.

This is my 3rd pair of the Carly sandals which I have bought over the past 5 years (in 2 different colors). They are very comfortable and go with almost any of the outfits which I wear. The service was excellent...very quick and great price. I could not find these shoes in a store.
I just love Easy Spirit Traveltime Slip-Ons. For the last 4 years they are the only shoes I wear. I have diabetes and Easy Spirit shoes are the only shoes I can put on and wear for the full day.
Cheap shoes, doesnt look cheap at all, fun snickers well made, confortable. Wont regreat if you decide buying this pair. Good look

The new style of the T-macs. These are the best. They are very comfartable. I bought them the day they came out. If you are into black then buy them now. Because I know they are coming out in White and Blue so they will have the same pattern as last year. So if you like black buy now if you like white wait till mid December. Otherwise this show is very comfy and better than last year.
Very cute, comfortable and true to size. You can wear them with, practically, everything, from casual to more dressed up attire.

I bought my first pair at a department store at a higher price. When I saw these were on sale, I had to get another pair. There were so many colors to choose from. Since my first pair was brown, I thought I'd get this Cotton color. So cute and comfy, I always get compliments when I wear them!
I really enjoy wearing Rockport shoes. They fit well, as usual, right out of the box and there is never any breaking in period. A perfectly light weight walking shoe. Best shoes for the money !
I love these shoes, great comfort---a little heavy, but you get used to it. I have had manyu compliments on these shoes.

these are the best flip-flops one can ever purchase. Extremely Comfortable, stylish, very very very long lasting. I had them for SIX (6)!!!! years and used them at the most. Now i will purchase several pairs to have them in colors and for my whole lifetime :)
These shoes are wonderful. The color is great and they arrived much quicker than I expected them to.
Awesome price for an awesome shoe, my son loves them. For anyone looking to save money on this product I would recommend them to purchase them for Amazon.com.
I purchased the shoes for my son and he found them very comfortable. He loves them.
Danner is so good,the all friend of me are love it.The shoes with GTX make foot toDry and loose.

This makes my third pair of these little shoes, I have them in black, brown, and now white. They go with everything and so very comfortable. I would highly recommend them to anyone. Certainly worth the money!I wear them to work and they look and feel wonderful.Sign me Mootsie Tootsie Lover
She loved them - They were just like the shoes the real ballerinas wear. She put them on immediately and wore them all day. Nice leather bottoms.

i have had these ballet slippers for many years, this year i am fortunate enough to be able to order a few new pairs and as always i ADORE them! not to rough when first worn, very comfy and will last me a long time! thanks (O:also though i have a wide foot and ordered these 2 pair in wide , i didnt need to i could have used just the regualr width. the elastic ties will straighten that out for me just fine though so im keeping these.
This is the 10th pair of Supernova Cushions I have purchased and I love them. They have a very thick cushion and it has cured my shin splints.

I took a chance and purchased these as a Christmas gift. When I bought them I was not 100% sure they were real UGGs or not. When I contacted UGG they told me this company is not an authorized dealer and cautioned me that these might be knock-offs. When they arrived I noticed that these boots were made in China. I found that there are several dealers selling a lot of these on the internet and they are shipped from China. According to UGG and other sources (Norton for one)they are selling counterfeit boots. Bottom line is that so far these appear to be of good quality but I am still unsure if they are the real deal or knock-offs that are over priced.

i was hiking last sunday on the north east side of barbados, they protected my feet when i stepped the sea rocks along the shoreline.i used wear shoes and my feet are not longer wet i walked thru wet grass or i stepped into water.they are comfortable. i dont have worry about twristing my ankles no more or hurting my feet on jagged rocks.one hiking buddies stated that i must have on goat parts because he said, i was going very fast along the shoreline, sometime there was very little space for footing. i was going buy an other brand but when i saw them online, i wanted them! they are grrreeeaat!them light weight. before i bought the boots, i used wear a pair of running shoes and the rain comes or falls the night before! my feet would wet and will bring alot of discomforts to my feet but alas i have my htmaivwp hiking boots. they are great.
These crocs were a gift to my husband and he loves them! They may not be the cutest shoes, but very comfortable and he wears them all the time!
this was a christmas gift for my wife..she loves these things..keeps her feet warm..and make her heart feel warm with love.excellent gift..thanks amazon

Pros:Very comfortableGreat daily-wear shoes after you have put too many run miles on themRelatively lightweightAdequate supportGreat cushioningCons:Ugly as sinConstantly clicking or squeaking after they wear down a bitThe bottom edge of the shoe is rather jagged and I have nasty cuts on both ankles from when I accidentally nicked myself while runningPriceyI had always had trouble finding a shoe that worked for someone my size (6'7'', 220lbs.), but I was very impressed with these. I got a good 550 miles out of them in Summer 2008 and still wear them occasionally.

The sandals are cushy enough and seem sturdy, but the straps get twisted every time I put them on and if I don't take the time to straighten them out it makes it uncomfortable to walk. I've never had this problem with a pair of flip flops. Maybe the straps are too thin.

I have this shoe in black bought it in February at a great price from a discount store, they are "simply" one of the most comfortable shoes I have EVER worn!! I have had severe foot trauma, that required 9 different foot surgeries and have to wear very supportive shoes and I'm suppossed to use orthotic inserts in every thing I wear, but with this shoe I don't need them at all and I can be up on my feet for hours with no reprecussions at all. I loved this shoe so much that 2 weeks after I bought them my daughter accidentally left our new puppy in my bedroom where my new shoes happened to be as well, he liked them so much that he ate the entire tongue out of the shoe. I made my daughter go out that day with me and buy me another pair, I had to search a few places but it was well worth it, I should have bought the brown ones then as well now I am searching everywhere for them. I hope you all enjoy this shoe as much as I do.
This show is so comfortable and looks great with anything. Light weight with clean lines. No need to wear them in. They are instantly comfortable.

Simple great shoe. eS has been in the skate market for a long time but has yet to turn full hipster and still makes a quality skate shoe for those who need something durable and fashionable. I had my first pair of accels in 1999 and I can say that they have not changed a bit. They last forever and are very comfortable. I my self so not skate but I do a lot of walking/trail hiking and they are even good for that. I bought them originally for their durability but I keep buying them for their comfort and style.

I like these sandals, they are comfortable right out of the box. The only thing that makes this pair of sandals a three star, is the stink of plastic that emits from these. The sandals are super comfy - and I have badly battered feet - so comfort is of top most importance. shipped fast ordered around christmas at the last minute and were brand new as listed size was right have held up great

I ordered these and when I got them they were everything I thought they would be. I love em!

Although the heel on these boots look kind of high, they are actually really comfortable and stable to walk in. I have done business with your company before, and everytime I have had a great experience. Thanks for the great products.

I wear a size 9D (US) and my order was very tight on my feet. You should consider ordering a larger size than you wear. The break-in was not that bad though. Awesome shoes that I've bought several times over the years. I love the nondescript style and the (somewhat) retro look. Low key, nothing flashy but very cool.They're getting harder to find. Here's hoping Reebok keeps making these.

The boots are comfortable and easy to wear. Are not heavy, which was the main reason I was looking to replace my other pair. The boots are durable and appropriate for the snowy winter in Boston. Water does not penetrate them at the bottom. Nice buy!

I grew up in Hawaii wearing these shoes and fifteen years later they are still an integral part of my wardrobe. I LOVE Sandies for a number of reasons, not the least of which is that they're an incredibly good deal. For $22, I get shoes that last an average of two years. They come in so many colors and each year, another one or two is added to the line. I wore these touring around Europe and Japan earlier this year--walking around all day, every day for over a week in each place--because they're much more comfortable than my Nikes etc., that cost five times as much. They go great with everything, and don't try to tell me different! A great investment at $22.

Am a long-time Minnetonka wearer - I live in a house with stone floors so I need a sturdy slipper! I bought these about a year ago. First off, even though I bought the usual size, they were skimplily made and snug. The materials are not up to the previous quality. My toe bust through the stitching within a couple of months and now I need to buy a replacement pair, but they won't be Minnetonka's.

The shoes worked great, right out of the box. I use them for Ultimate, and the first weekend I wore them, they performed nearly flawlessly. I had only worn them for one short hour long practice session before using them for an entire tournament weekend (7 games over two days). So they had not been broken in, and still I only got one hint of a hot spot (blister) on the back of my heel.The tread pattern worked great in the long grass field. The ground was definately soft, and the firm ground cleats dug in consistantly, providing traction in all the various movements required of Ultimate.Great Shoes, great tread pattern, no break in required! Buy 'em.

I bought these shoes at full MSRP $49.99 at New Balance Shoes. From the moment I tried these shoes on my knee stopped hurting and even better because I have been wearing them for a year now and my knee trouble is totally gone. The only weakness I could find in the shoe was that the color fades a bit when you wear the shoes in the rain.

These boots are extremely comfortable. Awesome traction and very warm. These are a little on the heavy side but that doesn't stop me from giving them 5 stars. They also have a 6 month guarantee of being waterproof.I was out doing some chainsawing in the snowy woods of wisconsin and this boots kept me comfortable and my feet dry, warm, and safe. It is hard to find a warm boot that is also steel toe. I found it and it was money well spent. Thanks Rocky.

Since Nike bought Converse the have altered the shoe. There used to be an extra piece of stitched canvas on the inner part just below the big toe and stitching through the back heal of the canvas. I had a hip replacement and bending over etc is not as easy as it use to be. Got other shoe horns, all metal or wood were just were not flexible and broke two wooden handle ones. Saw this one had flexibility and gave it a try. Very happy I did. Though the horn is a little thicker than most, I am glad it is the way it is for durability purposes. The length is just right for someone who is 5' 11". Because it is flexible, no matter what angle I hold the handle, the horn flexes and foot slides in easily. It has made it easy to put on all my shoes without having to bend over. I also leave my shoes with shoe laces tied up and just slip them on now with shoe horn with ease and not have to continually tie/untie the shoe laces. I truly believe you do not need to have a hip replacement or other ailment that would behoove you to need this. It is nice not having to lift my foot up to finish sliding my shoes on. Ordered another one just to have it in two places where I put my shoes on. Why, I have work shoes stored in the garage for working outdoors. Will keep the 2nd one handy there. I highly recommend this shoe horn. I believe you will not regret it. It might not please everyone, but it did me.
If you're looking for a lightweight, casual, hang-around-in shoe, this is a perfect choice. It is comfortable and can be spot-cleaned. Machine washing is not recommended.

I am usually very picky about what shoes i wear and it was my first time ordering them online and not having a option of trying them on, but i heard good things about this brand and model, so i gave it a shot, i have bad support in my feet and week ankles, these shoes look kinda big, but amazingly they are very very comfortable and have nice support, and they lasted a very long time, i plan on making another order soon.

And as you wonder, what exactly is this "shizzysweet" that she speaks of, I will enumerate the qualities of the Comptons and you will understand. The body of the compton is made with a killer fabric, the orange is my favourite though I own both colors, that is thick and would take serious wear to do any kind of noticeable damage to them. The soles, and soul, are pretty substantial. Knowing lots of people who dig writing slogans and other assorted B.S. around the sole, the substantial sole gives space for soul. They're also good for those of us who are shoe-lacingly challenged (or time challenged) and just put the shoes on with the laces tied behind the tongue. You can slide them on like this without your feet sloshing all around in shoe and you falling over in front of your co-workers, looking like a dumb---er, okay, I'm getting off on a tangent. Whether you're a Ben Sherman sycophant or you've never heard of this Sherman guy before you will love these shoes and understand the "shizzysweet" label slapped on them.
