I received my Scout Sandal very quickly. It was in perfect shape and fit just like was supposed to.I am very pleased with the service and the product.
I appreciate the warmth and feeling of stability with these boots. They are roomy enough in the toes for extra socks.
Usually take a size 11, so ordered those, but they were strangely small.Don't understand all the raves here about this shoe!

I got a pair for myself and absolutely loved them. They are comfortable and versatile. My husband liked them, too, and wanted a pair for himself. So now we have a pair of matching shoes that we each enjoy. They were delivered in a timely manner (both times)... I recommend these shoes and this seller.
I wear a size 9 to 10 and these fit the best. I love how I was able to find the half size on here. A very sexy chuck. I wear to work and also out

I've had a cedar tree from Florsheim for a decade or longer. I've known how a tree will give shoes a longer life. I needed more trees, and got these Rochesters. They are very good, with a wider, rounder heel than most. They come in a nice (recycled) box with lots of helpful information on the back. The company seems to be in business with a passion for what they do, environmentally sensitive, not just knocking out product in plain cardboard boxes.Oddly, I found them at local high-end department store for 20% less than Amazon's price. But, Amazon's price seems competitive relative to what I've seen online.
Exactly as advertised the famous Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Sneaker is a great buy! Looks great, fits great and is super comfortable. I highly recommend it!
My husband is very happy with these shoes, comfort and value are important. Would get these shoes again and will recommend them to his co workers.
The shoe is very comfortable, but is small and tight in the toe. I would recommend ordering a size up from what you typically wear, especially if you want to wear socks inside the shoe.
Amazon is a great way to buy. Quick and inexpensive shipping. Informative emails. Grandson loves them. Thanks
I ordered these sock slippers for my 90 year old mother-in-law because she was complaining about her feet being cold. She loves them!

I have been wearing Hi-Tec Altitude hiking boots for more than a decade, and I am now on my fourth (and probably last) pair. There are several reasons that I like them: 1) they are comfortable from the beginning, at least for me, and and don't require "breaking-in" (blisters are rare even after hiking ten miles a day); 2)they are reasonably priced (but I almost always buy on them on sale); and 3) they are relatively waterproof (however this doesn't last too long, but can be restored by treating them with Sno-Seal or a similar product as needed.I started buying and using these boots after owning an expensive pair of Vasque hiking boots and replacing the soles on those twice. For a little more than the cost of getting the soles replaced on those I could buy a pair of Altitudes when they were on sale. I've worn out three pairs of Altitudes (each lasts about three or four years for me with moderate to heavy use).The biggest drawback about these boots (for me) is that the glue used to attach the rubber sole and sides to the leather is ineffective. The rubber/synthetic materials start separating from the leather not long after I start wearing the boots. For years my solution has been to reattach and somewhat seal the edges with copious amounts of Shoe Goo. It makes the boots look ugly, but it does the job for a year or two, and then I need to reapply the Shoe Goo in smaller amounts. I've been hoping that Hi-Tec would start using a superior system to attach the sole and sides to the leather, but this has never happened. At this point I've given up hope and will be trying out other brands. It is really a shame, because I do like these boots otherwise, but I am tired of the lame glue issue. If it weren't for that perpetual problem I'd be giving these boots five stars, but as it is they only get three.

I love my New Mary Jane shoes. This is my 2nd pair of Propet Mary Jane's. I also have a pair of booths by Propet. I have problem's with my feet and this brand of shoes is the best so far that I have ever put on my feet.

I have wanted shoes like this since I was a little girl. And I was very pleased when I got them, I'm planning on wearing them for my wedding. They came in the mail faster than I expected, with in the week. There really comfortable and I can walk fine in them. Although I would prefer if they were a bit more rounded at the toes. I read other reviews, who suggest getting a half size larger. But I got my true size and they fit perfectley, I didn't have a problem with my toes being squished. But every one's feet are different, so I would suggest using your own disgreshion. I do however suggest having well pedicured feet, as every one can see your feet.

These shoes were a lot dressier than I thought they were, I wanted them for everyday shoes to wear with dressier jeans and slacks. These shoes are very shiny almost like tuxedo shoes but they look really nice and the price can't be beat.

The shipping fast, the product came in the right size that i ordered. The shoes are great I love them. Only problem is they sent me a different variation of this product than what is pictured. The stitching shown in the toe area that looks like a "cowboy style" is replaced by a rounded curved line. I bought these over a cheaper model to get that "cowboy v" stitch and received the cheaper model anyways... should have ordered them elsewhere and saved 5 to 10 dollars.

My favorite shoe's,I were sneakers all the time & these K-Swiss ST329 have been my go to for the last 3 years.Well made quality shoes leather/rubber soles (which don't make my toes warm/hot),i think these shoes are over all great for walking,running errands,everyday life.
I love these flip flops! I am a lifeguard so I wear them everyday all day and they are great! Very comfortable and inexpensive. They dont do well wet however.

I ordered these shoes for my son who is a Crossfit Trainer. He wears a size 13 shoe so this is what I ordered. When the shoes arrived they were at least 2 sizes too large. My son said that they measured at least a size 14/15. I had to return them. So if you are ordered these remember that they run very large.
I GOT MY SHOES IN THE MAIL VERY FAST I LOVE THEM THEY GO WITH EVERYTHING I WEAR I RECOMMEND YOU BUY THEM.
These are great looking summer sandals. Wore them to a wedding reception and received tons of compliments. Not for those who are new to wearing heels though - they are pretty high.

I took a gander at these shoes at a very low price of $20, worth every penny. Owned a pair of the blue stripe ones and they've lasted 2 years and still are comfortable to this day and sporty. I've gotten some nice compliments on them and it didn't cost me and arm and a leg.

The sneakers were very comfortable as soon as I put them on. I immediately went for a walk and they felt great. The velcro straps probably could be an eighth of an inch longer to allow for extra tightening, but the shoes looked smart and I received compliments. They seem to be well made and I would buy Propet sneakers again.

this is the only work/motorcycle shoe that i will wear 10 yrs. running now. comfortable, wears well,looks good,and now its even a better price. was paying 55 in stores got em for 35 here and they were deliverd 2nd day. awesome
Very good ball control for an indoor soccer shoe. Looks attractive and easy to clean as well. The brown Sambas (retro) look better, but are not as wearable as this pair.

I have purchased many pairs of ECCOs over the years mostly with good results. I am a woman with bad,wide feet and I stand all day long as a painter. In the past I have purchased the ECCO Men's "Cross" style as a work shoe and found it met my comfort requirements: soft breathable leather, including a smooth leather insole, great arch support and flexible sole. Since that style is no longer available I took a chance on the "Seawalker". Unfortunately, I have been trying to "break-in" this shoe for several weeks but still cannot wear them for more than an hour. The leather seems heavier and stiffer and the sole is not as flexible as the "Cross", the stitching is higher on the foot and it is DEFINITELY cut more NARROW. It is still a well made shoe and if you have narrow, less sensitive feet, it could be a good choice.I may have waited too long to return these but I am still looking for a comfortable, supportive work shoe that fits me....will sell the "Seawalkers" to anyone interested.

I have lots and lots of problems wearing shoes. I find many women's shoes too constraining and tight, and have had various problems with my feet over the years that seem to just boggle the podiatrist. Putting me in orthotics seemed to make things much worse, as did just about any arch insert or other things inserted into the shoe. Most sneakers become almost unbearable to wear after several hours, and over time I've found that a light shoe with basic support worked best for me. I'd had good luck with some other easy spirit shoes so gave this one a try. And it is really amazing how comfortable this shoe is for me. It's so rare that a shoe fits and is comfortable without a serious break-in period, but this particular style just works that way for me, and I just hope they never discontinue it! I've tried a few other Easy Spirit shoes, even some walking shoes that look very similar but they just never seem to be as comfortable as this one. It definitely would not be the choice for someone who needs a lot of arch support and a really solid sidewall, but if you like very light shoes, this is an excellent one to try.
Clark continues to enhance their shoes. Great color combo for summer.
they seem to be well made and keep my feet feeling good all day - after hours of shopping and chasing kids!
EXCELLENT BUY. I'M ENJOYING MY SHOES AND I'M FEELING LIKE WILL SMITH, JE JEEEEE. I RECEIVED MY SHOES IN THE OFFICIAL CONVERSE BOX. THEY ARE ORIGINAL AND TOTALLY NEW.

Our toddler loves his crocs. He chooses them from his other shoes almost every time. I've heard there are some safety concerns with crocs, but he has never had any difficulty with them getting twisted or caught.
This is my favorite walking shoe. When one pair gets used enough so that it no longer provides good support, I get new ones.

No, I am not out on a cross country "Walk for Peace" but when I wear these shoes every step I take promotes World Peace. I have a red pair of peace shoes and I bought my mom a pair of pink ones. We love wearing them out together - we are a Mother/Daughter team making a double statement! Also, we get many comments - whether together or alone. People just love them! I wish I had these Peace shoes in 3 or 4 other colors.

These Saucony Jazz shoes are very comfortable. They are springy, padded and with just enough heel and arch support. You can rely on consistent fit and comfort in all colors. If they wear down, use gel inserts after months of walking/running. I paid $39 at another website after this purchase and free shipping both ways!

Crocs are the best shoe for a backyard, water playing child. My daughter immediately put them on and went everywhere in them. When they get muddy or dirty I just wash and scrub off the dirt. I love that I have a shoe she can get muddy, but also still protects her feet.
Love the boots, fit perfect. Brand new in the box with all the paper and wrapping from the factory. Shipping was fast and the price was even better! Wear them all the time!
they really fit good, are comfortable and nice and smooth for dancing.Glad that I made this purchase would do again
Great mocc - comfortable with rubber bottoms so fine for outdoors. definitely stretch with wear.

Softspots are my favorite shoes. These are super comfortable, fit well, and last a long time. So far I have two pairs of these that I use for work, and my feet never hurt. Bravo! I highly recommend them.

I Love my UGG'S!!! They are super comfy... I'd wear 'em to bed if I could!!! will for sure order more in near future... excellent shipping too!!! A+ :)

My son requires a wide cleat which is hard to find. I ordered the 3E Zephz Wide Track Men's listed in Amazon but I received a 2E. When I called Amazon they referred me to the seller, Fogdog. Fogdog told me that the widest they sell is an "extra-wide" which is a 2E, not 3E as listed on Amazon.Even for a 2E they are not very wide. Good shoe, similar to Metrum, but more light-weight and narrower. The white color does show skuff marks after you use them for a while. But overall, an adequate replacement for my Metrum shoes, which seem ever increasingly hard to find these days...

These are a nice pair of leather ballet shoes. Although the size I ordered was still big for my daughter, even tho Ive read reviews to order one size up because they ran small. I found it to run almost true to size for my daughter.

The style of this shoe is exactly what I was looking for. However, the size I ordered was too small and unfortunately it was not available in the size needed, so I had to return it and couldn't get another. Otherwise, I definitely would have kept it.
The first time I purchase these boots was in 2002 for work. They are very durable and don't feel like mens boots. My daughter took my first pair so I had to order another. They will last a long time.

Would have been perfect if we could combine the wide sole with the regular top. Not the shoes fault, she's picky & hard to fit. I may see if there is a pair in my size :-)
This is the second pair of Mary-Jane-style shoes I have bought from this manufacturer and I get compliments all the time...They wear beautifully and go with everything.

Great boots,waterproof,attractive,fit true to size,highly recommended. Looks identical to photo,genuine Timberland boots. Great on rainy days,clean up well. Identical to the man's version of this boot.

very fast shippping..so great i have this shoes for my 4 yrs old son...like the color and the shoes..wanna buy some more shoe like this sooner..great product..very comfortable to his feet,as if he dont want to take off the shoes..love it that much.................................happy shopping

I bought this product after reading the reviews. Well maybe it works good for basic usage, but I work with landscaping and snow removal. This product will not dry your boots off in time to get to work after you have soaked them. I thought it worked great when I would get home from work and my boots would be dry but I was doing work on a pond and had to get in the pond, so my boats where soaked. I put my boots on it at 6pm and tried to put my boots back on at 6am the next morning and they were still wet. Really wet in the heal........Don't buy this product if you are depending on it.....

Always love this one better than other Capezio ballet slippers.The best part is it's true to the size. It's not necessary to buy half size bigger than your normal size as I always do when I buy other dance shoes, such as capezio-Julia.

I've worn them a few times and they've stretched some now so they're not too tight like they were at first. If you have large calves, you won't be able to tuck your jeans inside them. Like others have said, these boots are comfortable. I like that the heels are rubber and less likely to slip on hard floors like other boots do.

I wore these about twice a week for about 5 weeks before they began splitting apart. To late too return them now so it was a waste of money. Very disappointed in the quality. I wore Keds for years and never had any problems with quality. Will not buy this brand again.
I'm really happy with these Chucks. Seller sent them in perfect condition a couple days before expected. Good Price. Good Purchase. Good Day!

Very comfortable shoes. They are a lot squarer at the toes than it looks like in the picture. But I like them because they are comfortable and I wear them when I am standing all day in a retail environment. I have had them for about 1 month. I cannot say how long they will last.

I'm on my third pair of these. I wore out the first two on my daily 3-mile walk. Now, one year into these, the left boot has started to crush my left big toe as it flexes when I walk. There is still plenty of sole left but I'm afraid I can't wear these again. I have really liked this particular boot for hiking and walks but I'm afraid I'm going to have to look for something else to replace it.2013-01-23: Update. I didn't wear these for a couple of weeks and then I tried them on a 3-mile walk tonight. They were JUST FINE. My left foot must have just been sensitive for some other reason which caused the problem described above. I wouldn't hesitate to buy these again when these wear out.

Good ankle and arch support, and waterproof. I can't comment on how long they last as I haven't owned them long enough, but they are solidly constructed and I have owned Hi-Tec hiking boots in the past and never had any problems.

These are really cute and I got them to bring with me when I go out and want to switch from heels to more comfy footwear :).They offer no support and are a little flimsy, but will roll up so I can fit them in a small purse.

Mine were a few blue shades darker than the above pics.

As a farmer, practical rubber boots are a must. But,last week I was confined to a ankle brace for 8 weeks, which meant I had to find a boot that would fit over the brace and the shoe. A web search found the workbrute on Amazon.Your boot will serve the purpose perfectly. The future puppies and lambs thank you for your prompt delivery.

I ordered shoes an got those by accident. So I wanted to send them back and I got a refund. They didn't. it was only about $6 but still... you promise something - deliver.
These insoles are very warm, but they made my shoes too small. I think you would need to use them with a 1/2 size to 1 size up. I ended up taking them our of my boots.
I usually wear 11.5, but it was a bit small for me.The product was good, so i will try 12.

The slippers I purchased are very luxurious and attractive. They are nice and warm which is what I wanted, as I have poor circulation. They were moderately priced, and were delivered in a timely manner.

My son has dropped arch's and severe pronation from fast weight gain from all chemo meds. We went the route of medical orthotics and in grade school all he got was blisters and couldn't walk or any extra activities. We found these shoes and have purchased them ever since. Not only can he walk without pain, he's proud to say he's not last doing the mile run at school!!!!! I greatly recommend these shoes to any one I talk to, they've made a extreme difference in his life!!!!!!!!
I love these slippers. Had another pair and wore them out completely. They are warm, comfortable, and can act as shoes if necessary.

I find myself aquiring a third pair of 10 EE in a year. Up until now we have outgrown soccer shoes, but never worn them out. My 16 year old has hit six foot tall and has wide feet. The growing seems to have stopped and we should be having shoes last. Instead they are falling apart midseason and we limp along with them simply getting a new pair for the following season. For anything else I would not again repurchase something of such low quality. Unfortunately I cannot find any other soccer shoe that comes close to fitting. 9.5 EEE in a better made shoe would be ideal. (Insert Irish sigh here.)

Very comfortable boots. Actually make you want to walk. But forget about being waterproof. Its very temporary. This was my fourth pair. They all have leaked, and soon after wearing. If they could solve this problem, I would buy again.
I usually wear 11.5, but it was a bit small for me.The product was good, so i will try 12.

I had never heard of these shoes before but decided that since they came in a women's 10 1/2 I would give them a try. I received them this week and I have never had shoes that are so comfortable and light weight. I went out walking and didn't come home with my feet and legs aching. They have great support. I am going to order another pair. I have worn many different brands of walking shoes and these are the best.

For the price these are great shoes. I do wear them with a liner because they are slightly uncomfortable without one. I plan to buy more in different colors. I like them much better than crocs. I am on my feet most of the day and when I come home my feet do not hurt.
these sneakers are perfect to use for an exercise class or at the gym. they are lightweight and very comfortable

I am sure they are great on real grass with the right size. One thing I noted is that they are bigger than what the guide says. I am a 10.5 regularly but they feel like a 11 or 11.5! In addition to that, I got the worse shin splints and hip pain playing on turf and sun backed grass! Unimaginable pain. However, I will give it the benefit of the doubt and blame it on the playing surface.Conclusion: Get these one size smaller, and use them on firm natural grass fields.

I have worn the ASICS GT-21XX shoes for years now and the 2160 is the same old reliable shoe in this product line. I did have some problems with last years model (2150?) with both foot and knee soreness but not with the 2160, which is the whole reason I have stuck with this line for at least the last 7 years or so.

I just purchased my third pair of Bonnie Lites and own wine, black and taupe. I have knee problems and a hard insole really hurts my knees. The Bonnie Lites are well padded and like walking on pillows. Stylish and comfortable!

My husband is 6'8" and he loves these shoes. We have a hard time finding anything comfortable in his size that he likes. These seem to run true to size. They have plenty of room in the toe too. He has had these before and they seem to wear really well. Overall they are a quality product.
Demasiado excelente diria yo. 100% original. 100% recomendado. Por eso le doy 5 estrellas y si se pudiera le diera 10 estrellas.

Don't know why Converse can't ship their high top sneakers with long enough laces, but the 63 inch laces are the perfect replacement pair. Also passed the teen boy standard as he said they were similar to the original's quality.
Excellent quality boot with fast shipping. Will remember when I buy a new pair.

I really like the look of these shoes. Everyone who sees them thinks they are cute. The feel like flimsy flip-flops on, though. If you are not OK with essentially walking around barefoot (no support) don't get them. Also, if you break off one of the sequines, the rest start coming off since they are just threaded on one string. I covered the toes with clear nailpolish in the hopes that they would not unravel more and to stop the other one from starting. It seems to have worked so far.

I have every color known to man, and am always looking for more. I teach, so I am on my feet all day; I'm comfy and happy in my Converse All Stars! I must say that in my old age (40) I prefer the lo tops over the hi tops.
I have several pairs of Sanuk sandals but had not been able to find a pair in black. Great price on a great pair of sandals and received them within 3 days, love the fast shipping!!!

This is my second pair of these shoes - I literally wore out the first pair. Very tall, very pointy. As far as size, I'm an 8 and they are just a tiny bit big - my heel slips a little when I walk, but I think a 7.5 would be too small.

Timeless look, whether you're a prep or a punk, anyone can pull off wearing a pair of chucks. Not good for athletic performance, it shocks me to realize they were created for basketball use. Ouch! Also, due to their lack of traction and feeble soles, it's easy to burn through a pair in a matter of months if they're your regular shoe. That makes them not worth the $40 price tag Converse is offering them for. If they were $20-25, maybe. I recommend this shoe for people more concerned with style than comfort.

These shoes are great. Probably the most comfortable shoe I've ever had. These shoes make me want to stop wearing Vans because of how durable and comfortable they are. Style of the shoe is awesome. If you're looking for a shoe with a "fat" tongue then these are the shoes for you. Would definitely buy another pair or a pair just like them. You don't have to be a skateboarder to get these. I don't really trick skate anymore, but I've always been a fan of the Accel. The all black Accel is so cool and fashionable, which means they go with any style of clothing, any color, and so on. Umm, just all around great buy. FIT TRUE TO SIZE. Recommend getting them in your most common shoe size if you like them snug and want the shape to stay the same after months of wearing them. If don't care about the shape, then get a half size bigger. Either way the size will still be very comfortable.

i am 15 years old and i have played soccer for at least 11 years.these are the best pair yet.this was the first time i ever had used kelme soccer cleats. i was very inpressed on how these babys worked.i decided to give them a try and they are very confortable on your feet since i have wider feet. i bought them last year from amazon and have used them in at least 4 or 5 seasons and have played in every game and every minute. they front spikes are very worn out since i used them so much and i finally started to feel the differnece in play. i have decided i am going ot buy a more expensive KELME pair since i am very satisfied with thise pair of kelme miura m cleats. i am 15 years old and these cleats are great.
Had several pairs of these in the past and they were the most comfortable ever! So glad they're still available.

The sandals are super comfy - and I have badly battered feet - so comfort is of top most importance. Have only one complaint - that Naturalizers don't carry the SCOUT sandal in Canada, so had to go via daughter in the USA, and she had to ship on to me. Don't understand that sort of merchandising. This is shoe - not some Cuban Cigar nonsense.
This is a good work shoe for the weekends. I wouldn't use it necessarily for running a whole lot but more for errands and working around the house.
Again, the Dereon brand shoe seems to be very cheaply made. These shoes were comfortable, but they have a cheap feel to them.
Normal chucks...awesome as always. I've worn them for the past 2 years. They're looking a little worn now, time to buy another pair. :)

I ordered these for my granddaughter's birthday. They were shippped promptly, and I was able to track them very efficiently. They were exactly what we wanted!!! They are very attractive and wear well.

I don't normally buy shoes on-line; I have a wide foot and wasn't sure that the 9w would be wide enough. The pair I got fit perfectly, is an excellent buy, and was delivered in a matter of days. Very good looking and comfortable shoes.

We had ordered crocs for years and wanted to try something different this year. My daughter loves these. She tells me they are extremely comfortable. I am so glad we tried something different this year!
Nice-looking shoe, but too expensive. For big foot guys like me, makes your feet look a lot smaller.
Went camping on a sand bar and these boots went right to work. They fit well and do the job nicely. Wear some thick woll socks in winter as these are not the insulated version.
Very well made boots. Nice and hard. Comfortable when standing most of the day. The leather is very thin and the boot feels very light.
it looks really cool and really comforible. everything on it is great except sometimes there will be some dirt that sticks to the dark black part in the front even if im not walking by dirt.
These were really point, the arch was awkward, I returned these. The heel was also wooden which I guess I overlooked in the picture.
I bought these shoes for Halloween to go with my Steve Zissou costume, and actually wear them all the time. They're so light and comfortable, I simply love them.
This is a very confortable pair of shoes from the start. No break in period is required.
Bought for husband. Keeps it hanging by back door. Makes putting on shoes a breeze. Should hold up for years. I have even gotten to like it.
I had been looking for navy sandals in my hard to find size for about a year. Finally found them, but decided canvas close toe shoes looked better with skirts. Service was good.
I love my new running shoes! They provide all the support I need and for a decent price!

Love this shoe. I have a lot of problems buying shoes which is evidenced by the number of shoes in my closet that I can not wear. I was sure I was going to return this shoe as soon as I tried it on. Only Amazon's generous return policy convinced me to try it. The shoe has a solid comfortable heel base which takes the weight off the ball of the foot. There is a generous toe area which allows the toes to move. I have a lot of problems with my feet, a bunion and neuropathy. This shoe was so comfortable, I ordered a sandal in the same brand. I haven't received the sandal yet.

Beware if you're buying size 1 for kids. Instead of sending a Junior size 1 that should be listed as J1 (I called the crocs company), they sent a M1/W3, which is a men's 1/women's 3. It is incredibly wide and NOT the same thing as a kids 1. I was very careful not to select the M1/W3 choice and yet it switched and sent that.This is not a big kid size for a 7 year old...just for a very small adult.

I love these loafers, especially the Velcro closure. They are a great fit all the way around. The only reason I knocked off 1 star was because the upper is coming loose from the sole on the right shoe. Think I can fix it with some Superglue, but should not have to for an $80 shoe. This happened after one wearing, but have not had the problem on the black pair of the same style. Even with this small problem, I would buy these again.

My son called these my Ellen Degeneres Shoes. They are comfortable and practical. They go with a lot of my casual, khaki type pants. I think the style is more mature than some of the others. They have a more pointed toe, not so squared off. Good product for the money.

I have owned this pair for about 5 years, still going strong, still in a very good shape, wouldn't be surprised if they lasted another 5 years. After short break in period they are my go to sandals for the summer, very confortable, would recommend them.
This is an excellent boot and great for working outdoors. They are comfortable and sturdy, providing all the protection you need.

Great pair of shoes with a lot of history. the only crappy thing is that i lost them... :Cthe shipping was quick and with a low price and yes... they were not avaliable for super saver shipping...Highly recommend them for everyone

I actually ordered the black suede/black leather shoes and received these by mistake. But they're so interesting and comfortable I decided to keep them. The suede is so soft it's almost like wearing slippers that conform perfectly to your feet. I don't usually like patent leather and that's what the toe portion of the shoes are made of but it's really attractive. I'd recommend these shoes to even the most conservative among us. Try it, I think you'll like them.

I bought these for my mother for her birthday, and she loves them. She's a bit of a slipper connoisseur, in that she wants her slippers warm, cushy, and well-fitting, but with the caveats that they don't make her feet sweat, that they're not so cushy that she feels like she's going to lose her balance like those cheap thick-foam-soled slippers do, and that they don't slide off her heel but aren't too tight either. She's a 7.5 and I bought her the size 8, which she says is perfect. The quality of the materials make them well worth the price.

The shoes arrived in a jiffy and were all that I'd hoped they would be ... a little wider than those of my youth (because that's the way I'd ordered them), still lightweight and comfortable, and with solid arch support. They're good walkers without being bulky. They're trim summer oxfords that don't overpower the look of an outfit. I got a stony-beach scuff on one toe, so I washed it. It washed and dried nicely, but the toe isn't pristine anymore, so, I guess I'll polish these sneaks just as I did in the '60s.
These fit my daughter just fine (she is 18 and a size 11)She has been happy with them.
With no doubts claks has the most confortable shoe in the market, you only have to be careful with the shoe size.

these are some VERY awesome looking shoes. they sparkle and shine in all the right ways.the shoe itself is actually fairly comfortable. i'm not usually a huge fan of any height platform, but these seem negligable. to me it doesn't make the shoe any more or less comfortable. i DO like how the entire exterior of the shoe is covered with the glitter fabric. they catch the light something fierce!i am a true to size 8, which is what i ordered, and i found them to be slightly tight in the toe box area. i am sure after a night or so on the shoe stretcher they will be more than fine. the heel area feels a little loose, but some inserts in the back should take care of the issue.the only real beef i have with these is that the really fine particles of glitter DO come off on things (hands, clothes, etc.). i don't know how this will effect the appearance of the shoe over time, so i may try to locate a spray of some sort to "seal" in the glitter. i'm not sure why the shoes don't come that way anyway, but it's not that big of a deal, especially if i can remedy it myself.all in all, i found these true to size, reasonably comfortable, and really stunning shoes!
These shoes are okay, they are poorly cut and cramp my toes, though. I use them just as "costume" shoes as they are wearable for short periods only.

I'm sure this would be a fine shoe if it fit. Ordered a size 9w. It was a about a inch less in length than the size 9 I normally wear. Return was free, but I am disappointed that the size did not conform to what I thought was a standard.
Very quick shipment. Great product. I ordered the croc in Orange, but one looks sliightly more of a redesh orange.
These shoes are really comfortable - so much so that I decided to stop wearing skateboard shoes altogether and just walk and skate in these.
Shoe was attractive but runs very wide. Normally I wear a Medium but this fits like a wide.Not much arch support. Newer styles of LifeStride seem to be running very wide. Shoeswere returned.

I have flexible flat feet and tend to pronate. While this shoe is not as good as Brooks Addiction, it is lighter and moves more easily. I only wish I had known it was available in narrow width. I expect that would have made it an even better fit and more help with my pronation problem. It does accept my custom orthotics. I ordered a pair for my mother as well as myself and she loves hers. She has serious mobility problems but these shoes in her narrow width and size 10 make walking much more stable and safe for her. We will certainly order them again. They look good too!

Great for a Halloween costume, or for a goth, punk or black metal look (I will be adding some modifications to mine). They arrived quickly and they're exactly what I wanted. My normal shoe size is 8 or 8.5 (wide) and the size 9 fits perfectly. They aren't super high quality, but they are perfectly good quality for the price and look like they will last as long as any other $30-$40 pair of shoes. I am usually in between sizing for boots, being too big in the calves for regular boots but not big enough for many of the other plus-size boots out there, so I am very happy to have found a pair of boots that fits.The circumference at the top of the boot is described as 17.5", and my bare calf is 17". In a size 9, the boot is actually a little wider than this. I can't see myself ever needing to use the zipper to get in and out of them (and you will have to relace them every time anyway, since it's hooks all the way up, with the exception of eyelets on the foot and at the very top). While wearing them with heavy jeans underneath, and laced completely shut all the way up with no tongue showing, they measured 19" around the top and 12" around the ankle, and felt snug and comfortable on me while allowing enough room for motion. If you had to unlace the top as far as it would go without showing any skin in the gap, it will go to 21". Even if you need it bigger than that, with skin showing, you definitely won't run out of laces; they are very long and I could wrap the extra around the top of the boot a couple of times with the boot laced completely shut. As far as foot size, the boot is 3.5" across the widest part of the foot. Shoe length is hard to measure due to the shape, but my bare foot is 9.5" long when flat on the floor, and the size 9 fits well with a comfortable amount of toe room.The sole is hard plastic with only a token amount of tread, so some caution might be needed on a hard floor if you're not accustomed to high heels. Not a major problem as the wide heel is very stable. I found them very easy to walk in, and if you're not on a slippery floor, they're as walkable as any other platform boot.
I Got mine on clearence at Sports Authority for $75!!!!!!!!!! Feel like they were broke in out of the box. Really comfortable and lightweight

I love these shoes. I cannot wait to take them on my cruise today because they are just so comfortable and cute to me. I have the Sanuk sandals so I wanted these and when I got them I knew I had made a great purchase

I carefully went over all the details before I ordered this pair of shoes. Hi tops - check. Size 7.5 - check. White - check. Chuck Taylor - check. Everything seemed excellent. That is, until I opened the box (which arrived just on schedule by the way). By some mistake I had received a pair of very nice looking low tops. Which would have been perfect if that was what I'd ordered. Now, the shoes have been sent back, and a new pair is on its way.
You really cant go wrong with Birkenstocks..they are the MOST comfortable shoe on this planet!! I wear these all the time! And, what a great price!!
great shoes, available in wide width at a great price. Very comfortable, I have been walking on concrete floors 8 hours a day for 15 years, these shoes provide a great deal support and comfort
These shoes are great for the price. They are light and they let your feet breathe easily. Only con is there is no arch support so after wearing the for a while my feet hurt badly.
My husband will only wear this brand of shoes. THey are very comfortable, and it's great that they come in his shoe size and extra wide! This was the best price that i found online.

I didn't want to spend a lot of money on character shoes since my daughter would only wear them for 2 nights. My daughter is sized for a 4 - 4 1/2, so based upon the other reviews, I ordered 3 pair (6, 6.5 & 7) to make sure at least 1 pair would fit. She ended up with a 6, so they do run 1 1/2 - 2 sizes small.

I enjoy these shoes, but have not figured out how to keep the laces tied. Also, I prefer to wear these for short outings and nothing that requires a lot of walking. I'm used to wearing well-supported hiking tennis shoes. I don't regret the purchase. I love the look.

Tengo estos zapatos desde hace mas de 4 años; los compre originalmente para cross training, y termine utilizandolos para casi todo, son comodos y duraderos. Una recomendación, verifiquen su talla en un vendedor local de Columbia.

Very simple, comfortable shoe- I get lots of compliments. The only negative is that it took a few weeks to wear in the shoe so that the back didn't rub a sore in my heel. A 1/2" notch at the back would have fixed that problem, but I guess they didn't think of that. Also, I recommend going a half size or full size larger than normal because your toes are really cramped otherwise.

I bought these shoes as a beater pair to only use while playing basketball outdoors. I have been pleasantly surprised at the good cushioning, comfortable fit, and great traction these shoes provide. I now use these shoes as my primary basketball shoes for indoor or out. I've had the shoes for a few months now and they have proven to be very durable as well. My only complaint is that if you get one of the glossy colors, it scuffs easily - but it's only cosmetic.

These boots rock. They made the outfit. Good quality, nice looking. Definately need time to get use to walking in them, but other than that LOVED them. Highly recommend this seller fast transaction and shipment.
Sent it back because it made my feet look even bigger. Did not fit well either. The support was comfortable but did not like the look on me.

I've been wearing adidas Samba shoes for about four years now. I love the fit and feel of them. They are durable and haven't ripped or broken in any way, they just get very dirty after a few years, which I'm pretty sure all shoes have that problem.I often wear the mainly black ones, but as I was searching for a new pair of shoes I saw this color pattern (mainly white, black stripes). It's also cool, but still simple. I have had this pair of shoes for almost six months and it still looks great.I will say that I have pretty flat feet and somewhat narrow feet, and these shoes fit me perfectly. I'm not sure if they would work well for someone with wider feet, but to anyone else I would reccomend them. They are cool, feel great, and are durable. Very happy with my purchase.

I love how comfortable they feel on my feet. I did forget that Timberland's are usually sized a bit large when compared to shoes. Normally I'm a size 12 shoe but only in Timberland's I would be a size 11. Luckily for me I ordered a 11.5 size so it wasn't bad enough for me to return. Just have to lace them up tighter but still not an issue when it comes to them being comfortable and durable. It did take me a couple of days to break them in so now the size issue is none existent.

My son has dropped arch's and severe pronation from fast weight gain from all chemo meds. We went the route of medical orthotics and in grade school all he got was blisters and couldn't walk or any extra activities. We found these shoes and have purchased them ever since. Not only can he walk without pain, he's proud to say he's not last doing the mile run at school!!!!! I greatly recommend these shoes to any one I talk to, they've made a extreme difference in his life!!!!!!!!

I usually get a 9.5W in sandals, but the footbed was too long in this shoe and the back straps were way too loose. I reordered in a 9W and they fit a lot better, not perfectly.. but they are really cute. I throught they were pretty comfortable until I could feel the side of the zipper on one shoe cutting into my big toe. Hopefully it won't happen again!

Keds have always been good sneakers. These seem to have lived up to that. Since they are white, they did not wash well but I discovered if you dry them in the dryer, the streaks that show up when you air dry them disappear.
The service was very good, the product arrived as request.The product was excellent, and was sent on the date specified, and their arrival was equally efficient.

I had these shoes for about 2 weeks now and they're great. Very comfortable, i especially like the cushion in the back of the shoe. I'd recommend these shoes to anyone who loves the game of basketball.

I've been a Top-Siders fan for years. The shoe does have an excellent grip on wet surfaces. The look is also great and they are comfortable. The price on this purchase came in less than other sites, arrived on time and in good condition. Overall, a great buying experience.
One of the few soccer shoes still made in Germany. Leather is very soft and shoes don't need to be broken into. I've been using this shoe for many years now.

(...) AND I WEAR A LOT OF FILA'S I HAVE WORN FILA'S SINCE I STARTED WALKING AND NOW I HAVE GOTTEN TO THE POINT WHERE I WOULD LIKE TO SEE SOME BB84 MID IN LADIES I WOULD LOVE TO PURCHASE A PAIR OF PINK/WHITE/BLACK FILA'S. Great for the person that is on their feet for long hours. They may not be as nice as the Hi-Tec Magnum boots but they are close and about half the price. The best way to break them in is still to get them wet and wear them all day while hiking or just walking. By the end of the day the boots will be fitted to you feet and broken in to perfection. You may find youself wearing them more often then you thought you would.

I have fat feet, and I wear a size 12 wide. I ordered the 12 E, and they were long enough and wide enough, but not "tall" enough. I couldn't get the tops of my feet crammed in them, even when I loosened the laces. There's just no stretch to the canvas. They seemed like they'd be comfortable if I could just get them on! So those of you with fat feet, get something else!Returning them was so easy though, and only took a few days.

I am delighted with this product. previously bought addias trainers,but found these are lite, hard wearing and very comfortable . After numeruous training sessions with senior and junior teams this lad on a underage team that my son plays with commented " Your Dad has the coolest BBall boots out their " . which made me feel 7 ft tall for a small man. EXCELLLANT PRODUCT.
OK shoe but not as comfortable as other Clark models. Certainly well made but just not the right one for me.
I ordered these in a wide width because the regular ones always seem to make my feet hurt. They are comfortable.
I actually bought these shoes for my wedding so that my dress would just barely skim the floor. They worked perfectly and were pretty comfortable.
Wish all my boots were as warm and comfortable. Have lots that are not as comfortable, wear a lot of black so I wear them all the time this cold winter.
I brought this for a gift to my brother and he's very happy, his really a good shoes!!!

I bought this shoe in August of last year. I have worn them for about 300 hours, most of that time spent standing and walking, and walked many miles in them in all weather and all kinds of pavement. I guess the wear I put on them might be a little above average. I love the fact that a $70 dollar pair of shoes is of such high quality, has a leather sole, and looks so good. My only complaint is that after a year of wear, the soles, especially the heels, are wearing very thin. The leather heel is very soft, and wears down to the wood very quickly, which looks a little ratty now. It's not too bad, and if I find a cobbler I'm sure I can get that taken care of, but it is an annoyance. I highly recommend these shoes, but don't expect the soles to last more than a few months of intense wear.

Dada's are some of the best basketball shoes i have ever had. The only bad thing i have found is the price difference between youth and large. $20.00 more for a bigger size is rediculous, but other than that they are really cool shoes especially how you can personalize them with your teams colors and your team name, your name, and your number. Some of the reasons they are really good shoes are because they are comfortable, have good traction, and just look good.

These shoes are very comfortable to wear if you are not really going to be walking around anywhere..Really cute for dinner or to go out somewhere where you will not have to walk very far. The scarf part is extremely comfortable but the bottom gets soreif you wear them for too long.

Ordered these flip flops for my husband and me. They were true to size and so comfortable! Living in Florida, we wear flip flops almost year long. We are sold on Crocs and own several pairs of different styles. These flip flops give very good arch support. So glad I found these!

I gave these shoes three stars because they are comfortable and good for just walking around. However, I would not ever do anything that involves running or jumping in these shoes. The aharp edge on the bottoms make it difficult to land safely. I've sprained my ankles three times in these shoes playing volleyball (went up for spike, came down with the worst sprain I've ever had), basketball (sprained while trying to cut while running; foot sideways and my ankle gave), and once just walking (walking along a sidewalk, I stepped on a tiny pebble. my foot went sideways, and the edge of the bottom cause my ankle to go out instead of helping my foot go flat. minor roll, could've sprained). I'm prone to sprains, but I've never had this many issues with any shoe before. Here's hoping it doesn't happen to someone else, though I'm sure it has.

Nice shoe, but definitely not true to size. My daughter currently wears 8 (toddler) in "regular" shoes, so I ordered a size 9 thinking she would grow into them. Her toe is right on the edge, so she won't be wearing them long.

I purchased my Croc clogs based upon the great reviews and I am so glad I did. They are very shock absorbent and cushy so they would be perfect for anyone with knee and or back trouble. I ordered my regular shoe size and they fit perfectly. I plan to purchase these again in the future when this pair wears out.

I've been wearing Clarks Natureveldt shoes for at least 7 years now and have gone through about 4 pairs during that time.Previous pairs had been made in Europe, however, the two pairs (one black and one brown leather) that I recently purchased were made in China. So far, the fit is the same between the Chinese manufactured shoes and the European made ones. There are however some design differences, of which the tongue is the most apparent as it appears to be made a little bit cheaper than previously. The laces also appear to be a bit cheaper.Should note though that overall the design/build of the shoe appears to be about the same or better in most areas. Time will tell however, as these shoes are pretty much legendary for lasting a long time.The main thing that I've always liked about these shoes is how comfortable they are even from the first wear. They do not require any break-in whatsoever due to the type of leather used, how they are constructed and how they fit on your foot.They just feel good on my feet. They are also pretty comfortable to walk in and since I have flat feet, this is a must have in a shoe for me.I personally like the style of the shoe, although some might find them to be a bit too classic, laid back or casual for a leather shoe.All in all, these are the only leather shoes that I really feel good about buying these days, however that might change if the move to China significantly decreases the useful life of the shoe.

The shoe looks just like the picture - very comfortable to wear and looked great out of the box.My only complaint is how quickly these shoes developed creases.i put the shoes on, took one or two steps and looked in the mirror to see how they looked with my pants. And there they were: 2 perfectly and quite deeply-made creases across the top of both shoes.. Permanent ones which erased that New-Shoe look in about 3 seconds of wear time. I found that to be a bit odd and annoying. But being that they were pretty inexpensive and not 100$-plus shoes i'm still pretty happy with the purchase. and the shipping was very fast.
Best fit I have had for these shoes would recommend them to anyone who is in the market for a soft play shoe..
I bought this pair of converse for my daughter and she loves them. they are comfortable to wear and the quality is great

I purchased this tennis shoe for my 87 yr old mother as she wanted a pair like the ones Ked's made 25 years or more ago. The shoes arrived very fast in the mail to her, but the rubber sole much thicker, not like the ones originally made by Keds. Also, she is always a size 9.5 narrow, this is the size I ordered, but they were too short. If she kept them she would have had to have a size 10. Unfortunately, these shoes are made in China,so who knows what you are going to get. Why don't we have these shoes made in the USA where then the size would be correct?

I bought these on amazon and for some reason they don't fit as well or are as supportive as an exact other pair i bought from a local adidas outlet store. Granted the other pair i own is a black pair, but that should have nothing to due with its comfort level. I couldn't walk in them for very long, i had to buy dr. scholl's insoles to make them livable. They look great but aren't comfortable.
Keds is one shoe I can always depend on for the best fit, color, style and comfort. Washable, and wearable right out of the box, I loved Keds as a kid and even more as an adult

Received these as a birthday present and am VERY satisfied with them! They're light and comfortable and stylish! I would recommend these to anyone that might want a nice pair of boots.

I purchased this tennis shoe for my 87 yr old mother as she wanted a pair like the ones Ked's made 25 years or more ago. The shoes arrived very fast in the mail to her, but the rubber sole much thicker, not like the ones originally made by Keds. Also, she is always a size 9.5 narrow, this is the size I ordered, but they were too short. If she kept them she would have had to have a size 10. Unfortunately, these shoes are made in China,so who knows what you are going to get. Why don't we have these shoes made in the USA where then the size would be correct?
What can be said about a pair of canvas tennis shoes ?They fit, the laces tie, I wear them.
Very satisfy by the product and I was impresed with how fast I got the order.I will order again from this place for sure.

I normally wear a 10.5 or 11, but based on reviews, bought these a little smaller in size 10. They are snug, but feel great, especially on bare feet. I do a lot of ballroom dancing and often have sore feet. After long dance practice sessions, these boots cradle my sore soles in luxuriously soft sheepskin. Sometimes, I even wear them in the house like slippers because they are so comfortable. You can look at the knock offs and imitations, but real Uggs are worth every penny. My recommendation is not to compromise.

This shoe is fabulous. Like a glove on your foot. True to size, I have worn them for three hours straight and felt no pain hiking through golf courses etc. They are the cutest womens golf shoe out there. I've seen FootJoy, Callaway, Addidas, etc and they do not compare to this cute shoe. My boyfriend even thought they were cute. I love the youthful look they have! Great the Teens and 20 somethings! I got cream colored and they go with any outfit. Pink looks cute, as does green, but I'd go with the cream if I were you.

i purchased the pink glitter heels. i was SO happy when i got them, they look really good and are VERY glittery!!! i got them for a halloween costume. i would recommend them for anyone that has pink in their costume. they are suprisingly comfortable and easy to walk in. WAY HOT!!!!!!!!!!!

Nice ballet shoe for the price. My preschooler wears a 9 in street shoes and the 9.5 was best in this as it gave her a tiny bit of room. Technically they should fit the foot, but she liked it that way.

Great shoes, the same product as in the description. Few did not like the fact that the adhesive is already dirtied Nubuck Leather in some places. Otherwise, everything is fine. Recommend to anyone who likes sports shoes.

A long time Easy Spirit wearer, I'd been disappointed in the AP1s I ordered about a year ago; they had a sharp, toxic smell. Well, that's gone now. The shoes smell like good old leather, and they're softer than ever. Plus, the gray is true: not too brown, not too blue.I'm active, and have problem feet (sensitive heels, arthritis in the instep) so I need a shoe that not only fits like a glove without my having to crank down the laces, but gives me the support I need as well. Thanks Easy Spirit, for making the shoe I need!
This is a wonderful soft comfortable shoe that's perfect for every day wear but can take you into the evening as well. I bought two of the same in different colors. Highly recommend.

I recently retired my ASICS 1110s after racking up 300 miles. These shoes are by far the best value for runners!I used to wear Nike, but read in Runner's World Magazine that the ASICS 1100 was the Editor's Choice for best overall running shoe, so I thought, why not? In the past I've dealt with shin splints, knee pain and plantar facitis (a.k.a. sore feet), but my ASICS 1100s kept me healthy and comfortable, and relatively stylish.I now own ASICS Kayano running shoes, which cost $135 - considerably more than the 1100s - and truthfully, I find no difference between the two pair of running shoes except for the price.I ran about 15 - 20 miles per week in these shoes, enjoying superior comfort. If you run short or medium distances (<25 miles per week), this is the shoe for you.
Another great shoe from J.S Just remember they do run a little small. Oh and guys love them

This is the second pair of Aetrex walkers of this particular type I have purchased because they support my feet, never cramp them, are easy to put on and take off, the velcro straps stay in place all day and my feet do not hurt at night when I take them off. They are good appearance (black) and I wear them with formal business attire (suits) as a professional business man. I also have a more casual pair (white) for daily non-business wear. If you have foot problems - give them a try. I could not find any of my size in any store and had to estimate at the fit on the first pair (13-wide)and they fit perfectly. After 10 month's of daily use (10/hours/day/5-days a week) they show no noticeable wear. The nonskid soles are of great importance, although they do cause a squeak when wet(rainy days) and walking on marble corridors of some buildings. It goes away quickly as they dry. I highly recommend them.

My son has dropped arch's and severe pronation from fast weight gain from all chemo meds. I've worn Fort Lewis boots in my home state of Alaska for five years. They have taken plenty of abuse, including two runs down the Chilkoot Trail. Not only are they still intact, but they are still waterproof - pretty astounding for leather boots. They require almost no breakin and are a whole lot lighter and more comfortable than my Wescos. But Danners run a bit narrow. Go for the D width if you normally wear a 'C' or 'B'. Otherwise, I suggest you might avoid having to hassle with returns by purchasing EE width. The Danner D is narrower than that of other shoe manufacturers.

These boots are sturdy, comfortable and stylish!I am a 7.5--my feet are average, neither narrow nor wide, and one foot is slightly larger than the other. The first time I tried on the boots (size 7.5), I felt as though the toes of my largest foot were being squished together. When I next wore the shoes and walked in them for an extended period of time, however, they were already broken in. Wonderful!Also, I have rather muscular calves, but fitting them into the boots was no problem. There was plenty of extra space for tucking in my jeans.I love these boots so much that I just bought another pair in a different color!

This is the worst walking shoe I have ever owned, and I would not recommend it to anyone. My left toes (all but the big toe) go numb every time I wear the shoe. Yes, I have the correct size of shoe; they're not too small. My toes don't feel cramped. It's just that for whatever reason, my left toes are always going numb. My husband and brother-in-law both have this same shoe (in the men's style obviously), and they both have the same problem with their left toes going numb. My brother-in-law says it happens to him when all he is doing is working at his desk, not even walking. My husband has only gotten a chance to wear them while using our exercise equipment, and his toes go numb while he's doing that. I've worn them exercising in our home and going on walks around our neighborhood, and it happens every time. I am extremely frustrated because we're all stuck with these stupid shoes, which were expensive, because they've been worn a few times, and the store won't take them back now.

These boots are really nice, however, they tend to pull my long socks down around my ankles and start chafing my shins. I'm not sure if there is a way to get around this problem, but I've started wearing them with crew socks and it seems to help a little. I've thought about just tucking my pants leg into them, but it looks funny, since these boots are a little shorter than normal.

No idea why this shoe has stuck w/ me for so long...The design, the construction, the fact that it reminds me of days gone by? I have had plantar fasciitis for over a year. I have tried several different shoes that were advertised as good shoes to wear for this condition.
