This is the original! (Rubber soles) Rockport changed the production to a injection moulded model now in stores which is inferior to the original.Thanks Amazon. This is a great walking shoe.
This is my second pair, the first are wearing like iron and I wanted to make sure I could replace them.

Based on previous reviews about these running big, I ordered my 'normal' size 11 knowing a bit big is far better than a bit small. When the shoes arrived, they were very snug. I had to return and order a half size larger. (good thing Amazon's ordering/return system works so well) Receive the 'right' size as promised. The shoes are pretty comfortable but do have a few quirks. First off, there is a slight pinch on the top of the big toe where the leather bends while walking. Secondly, there is a decided 'pop' in the leather with each step, again in the toe area as the leather bends then relaxes with each step. I'm hopeful that once worn a bit, both issues will remedy themselves. The shoes are very nice looking and I've had several compliments on them already. The toe pinch does seem to be going away and I hope the popping sound does as well. The shoes appear to be very well made. They are not light as the sole seems to be very durable. All in all, I'm glad I ordered them as I expect them to be great shoes. Just not the slipper feel I'd hoped for, but are very comfortable none the less.

I have gone through 3 pairs of shoes before settling on these and they are wonderful. I have REALLY bad arthritic knees which makes it difficult to walk around for any length of time without pain, but wearing these Softwalk Mariposa's makes for much less pain and I'm able to walk around for a much longer time. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

I recently ordered my third pair of these K-Swiss and right away noticed a change in comfort over the previous two pairs that I still have to directly compare with. I also noticed the new pair are now made in Indonesia where as my previous two pairs where made in Thailand.There is a VERY noticeable decrease in the padding around the ankle sides, so much so that the new pair fit looser around the ankle area than both of the old pairs. I really do not like how lose they fit now nor the feeling of my foot coming out the back of the shoe.Bottom padding does feel like a new shoe should but overall they just do not have that amazingly comfortable new shoe feeling like my second pair had when they replaced my first pair. I remember how amazing the second pair felt when they were new compared to the ones they where replacing. This time I had to put the old one on one foot and the new one on the the other to feel a difference.I am on my feet in my restaurant for 12-13 hours a day and I wore my first pair for about 6 months and my second pair about 4 months. These I may use only as long as it takes to find a pair that are made in Thailand or another brand all together.Even with the decrease in comfort they are a decent value. In my opinion though they went from a good deal for comfortable shoes at $60 to just an average $60 pair of shoes. I would rather go back to spending $80-$100 for a comfortable pair of shoes that last the same amount of time.

These shoes are quite the top of the line. I have a very small foot and cannot always find shoes for men. So...I buy women's sizes and they fit swell. The Skecher runing shoe is a great fit and it is made well. It looks strong and durable. You won't be sorry if you buy these...men you will not look sissy!
It's perfect for my two and half year old daughter. Comfortable, durable and easy to clean. The only concern I have is that she may twist her ankle in these shoes, but it hasn't happened yet.
There very comfortable, slip on easaly. I don't know how durable they will be, but if their like other Ecco shoes I won't be disapointed.
But the size is very small for the normal we find in other modelsMy 11 received is like 10.

The most comfortable and durable walking shoes I've found, especially great for travelling as they don't mark you immediately as a tourist (unlike sneakers), slip on and off easily when going through security, and look good in all but dressy situations. I only ever need to buy a new pair every year or two because I wear out the support in them for lengthy walking. I still have my original two pair for use around the house or on weekend errands. While not waterproof, the shoes seem to be water resistant, the sole thick enough to keep the cold of the pavement from coming through, and a decent enough grip to walk in all but the iciest conditions. I hope Eastland never stops making these shoes!
Came in a timely manner, correct style and size but the color looked different online. Still happy with the color. Very happy with the quality and price!

I love these shoes because the medium runs on the narrow side. They do come in narrow, but not always easy to find in popular size 7. They are classic, tailored, like much of my wardrobe, so I own them in every color and color combination. They also wear well. Excellent quality at a good price. When I'm really lucky, I find them on sale.
I bought these as a gift . The child loves these shoes! Her mum loves the fit and comfort as well as the style. Good price on Friday sale... fast service.
These are a nice pair of casual work shoes. Very comfortable and decent looking worn with a pair of slacks. They run true to size and I would recommend to anyone looking for work loafer.

First, I'll start by saying I love Chacos. I got my first pair in the spring of 2003; (I wear sandals year round, I'm not a closed-toe shoe person)I finally wore them out in late August of 2007 when one of them snapped in half from being worn so thin. That was 4 years of year round wear. I did everything from hike( all seasons & conditions), horseback ride, to just hanging around in them. They are my every-day shoes. I was an avid Birkenstock wearer( and I still LOVE them), but Chacos do better in my acyive lifestyle. I just recently purchased my 2nd pair, same style as before, and when these wear out in 4 years I'll be buying another pair just like them.
very comfortable. i am very pleased with these shoes. i have bones spurs that are quite painful and the shoes work wonders to help relieve the pain
This is my 3rd pair in 24 years. That's a fine testimony to their durability. Matterhorn makes great boots IMHO.
have been wearing this shoe most of the day, almost every day forever. It is very long wearing and super comfortable. Hope Easy Spirit NEVER stops making this particular sneaker.

Dada's are some of the best basketball shoes i have ever had. The only bad thing i have found is the price difference between youth and large. $20.00 more for a bigger size is rediculous, but other than that they are really cool shoes especially how you can personalize them with your teams colors and your team name, your name, and your number. Some of the reasons they are really good shoes are because they are comfortable, have good traction, and just look good.
The shoe pictured is what I was expecting, but the shoe received has a shorter, flatter heel; I'll keep it, but really prefer the 1-1/4" heel depicted..
Everyone rants and raves when they see these boots and are totally astonished at the price as was I!

The color did not go with the outfits & the fit was not narrow enough. I really wanted just the camel color without the croc look, made the shoes look cheap. Sent them back, will try again. The seller was excellent, will buy from again.
I love, love, love these sandals, they are the most comfortable sandals I have ever worn. Wish I could find them in more colors!

This is the second pair of these I have purchased. It is a neat looking and very comfortable choice. It is a great shoe if you are on your feet a lot. Purchased my first pair at a retail store, and, when I found them so favorable, I immediately looked for them on Amazon.

I had earlier purchased these shoes in another color and really liked the fit and comfort. No bulging at the sides and they look really expensive! Will probably purchase the same shoe in yet another color. They fit true to size.

I have wore these since I was a kid, but now sadly these are hard to find. If you are looking for both quality and a product made in the states then these are the shoes for you. The nice thing is that Chucks come in a variety of colors so you can get different ones if you want to have a certain look.
These boots run HUGE. If you want them to fit,buy a half size smaller than you usually wear. Also, the bottom of the boots are extremely slippery!
Ordered for a Christmas Gift for a friend. But product looks fine. But Timberland does not make a wide enough width for my feet.

This is my second pair of Earth Lazers. They are wonderful walking shoes. I use them for work and exercise. Very comfortable, lightweight and flexible. I wore them on a trip to Europe and my feet never hurt after doing much walking.
I love these boots they are perfect for my six year old. They are durable and I love the darker color so the dirt does not show as much. The price was great and shipping was fast
The shoes're great. I love them. They're very light&comfortable and easy to wear. They're perfect for the summer and can go well with the jeans & short.
I have a 3 year old who is hard on shoes. These are good inexpensive boots that last a while . Its definitely worth the money

I love these Eastland shoes but can't seem to find them anymore. I was excited to see them on Amazon as my old pair is looking quite worn. When I got them, they were too small! I guess I learned my lesson and won't purchase shoes online again. I just did my first ever return to Amazon and will see how that goes. By the way, I have worn the same size shoes for years!
The order was a birthday gift for a granddaughter. It arrived promptly at her house and upon opening the gift on her special day, she informed me that she LOVED them. Service was great.

I saw these in a J. Crew store and of course, they are cheaper on Amazon. They are exactly what I saw! I've washed them a few times and they held up. The canvas stains particularly easily so they didn't stay nice and white for long, even with the washing.
These are comfortable and easy to slip on. These will also be good for surgery

I've gone through 3 pairs of these bad boys and each pair has been more then worth the money. I'm a big guy (6'4" 195lbs) and even with running about 25 miles a week these shoes will easily last me 5 or 6 months. Even then I just replace them to refresh the cushion. The shoe itself stays in good shape, no holes in the heels, no worn out tread.This shoe offers my big foot just the right amount of ankle support and you can definitely feel the cushion. They also breath very well and keep my foot relatively dry. As a bonus these shoes dry quickly if you happen to get caught in the rain.After the shoes get retired from running I use them as everyday shoes until my next pair of running shoes gets replaced. After that, they get donated.I'm getting ready to buy a new pair and once again I'm going to be getting a pair of these.

I bought 2 pairs of these crocs for my twin boys and they love them!! They like to put them on and run around the house and they are so easy to clean, just wipe off with a damp cloth. The sizes do run big!!

It was well past time to replace my set of H2 sandals. Quick search, quick order, and quick delivery were the hallmarks of dealing with this vendor. As a bonus, the company reused an old KEEN box for packaging. While the box was gently used, the sandals were pristime - which is just fine with me. There's no need to stand on cememony with a sparkling box: just get me the sandals I need at an affordable price and on time. That's just what they did.
Customer Service was quick to reply as well as very helpful. The item arrived fast and in perfect condition. Excellent service.
I love the shoes, the shipping time was really fast, the price was better than I found anywhere else. Great product!
I LOVE THESE BOOTS! THEY'RE WARM AND SOOOO COMFORTABLE THAT I NEVER WANT TO TAKE THEM OFF - MY DAUGHTER HAS HAD HERS FOR 6 YEARS AND THEY'RE STILL LIKE NEW!
These shoes are very comfortable. Wear with thin socks to prevent them from stretching. Only negative thing is that they scratch easily

These boots were given to my husband as a replacement of something similliar but the heels have held up so much better on these boots. He was happy with the fit, not too tight, and how well they hold up in all kinds of weather. The color and leather still look great.

I ordered shoes an got those by accident. So I wanted to send them back and I got a refund. The only irritated thing is that this company has a return form that demands that you send it back and make sure you add insurance and tracking number and they'll refund that as well when they get their shoes back. They didn't. it was only about $6 but still... you promise something - deliver.
Sent it back because it made my feet look even bigger. Did not fit well either. The support was comfortable but did not like the look on me.
I really like the Keds sneakers.. I ordered Navy and they look black. I would order again but in another color.
These shoes are awesome, my girlfriend loves them and they are very classy, definitely buying another pair after these!
My 3 y/o loves these boots! He wants to wear them to school everyday! Will definitely cont. to buy Timberlands!

I normally wear an 8.5 (wide, if they have it) so I ordered these shoes a 1/2 size up (and wide) from other reviews suggestions. Welp...it still wasn't enough. These shoes definitely run small, and with hindsight I would have ordered a 9.5. Because it's too small, and because I'm too cheap to send them back, I will wear them anyway and just suffer a little bit from the pinching on the top side of my foot and toe box area. They are very cute though, and the heel is low enough to walk a moderate distance, but tall enough to add a little length to the legs. I took a risk by buying shoes I had never tried on before online, and it was almost a good idea.
I bought the shoes for my son. He likes it very much. Your Amazon services are excellent.
great craftsmanship, but sized smaller than previous purchase. I should have ordered a size larger, but went by last purchase of a similar item.

Easy Spirit tennis shoes are the best for my feet that I have found. They have good cushioning and arch support. These are relatively inexpensive as far as Easy Spirit's go. I am very happy with my new shoes so far. They have met the Easy Spirit threshold as I expected.

I was so very glad to find these shoes! I was a bit worried at first-it had been so long since I had a brand new pair of slip on shoes! The reason for that is because Eastlands are so good, I can wear a pair for 10+ years! I have a pair of brown similar ones that I've worn for about that long-maybe longer. But they last forever and are the only brand I will buy. I'm still wearing the brown ones, but wanted a pair of black ones to match my purse and coat for winter. They felt a bit tight at first, but it's been so long since I've had to break in a pair of shoes since Eastlands last so long! Wore them a couple of nights at home, broke in perfectly, now they're my new favorites! I've tried others, but Eastlands are still the best:)

I have been wearing these shoes for YEARS! My sisters tease me about my "ugly" shoes but they're so comfortable that I don't care-let them tease! I wear these in both black and brown and they're actually the only shoe I wear. I am a postal employee with a walking city route and walk about 12 miles each day and these are the shoes I wear. I love them! The leather relaxes fairly quick but does not really stretch out. After about 6 months of everyday walk and wear the bottom cracks but that's to be expected, I'm HARD on these shoes and they're still sooo comfortable!
The shoes are very comfortable and the delivery was fast and well packaged.I'm happy with my purchase through Amazon

I purchased these boots to have a better foot/ankle experience while hiking in the local mountains. They definitely helped my feet and ankles be more comfortable. The one down side has been the top of my toes keep getting rubbed raw while hiking. The first time I hiked in them I thought it was due to breaking in and maybe another pair of socks would help (I had on 1 pair of good hiking socks). So the next time I went out I wore 2 pairs of socks, but the same thing happened. I have now hiked many times (so boots are broken in) and I always have rubbed some toes raw. Not sure why, but I think it maybe there is too much distance between the boot and the top of my foot (I have normal size feet and have never had this happen before). So overall I like the boots, but they don't seem to like Me.

The boots are comfortable and easy to wear. Are not heavy, which was the main reason I was looking to replace my other pair. The boots are durable and appropriate for the snowy winter in Boston. Water does not penetrate them at the bottom. Nice buy!
a lot longer than i thought they would be. but a nine would be to small. but they are nice. just wish they weren't so long.

The boots are comfortable and easy to wear. Are not heavy, which was the main reason I was looking to replace my other pair. The boots are durable and appropriate for the snowy winter in Boston. Water does not penetrate them at the bottom. Nice buy!
Comfortable beyond my expectations. I usually wear a 12, but I had to return the 12s and re-order 13, which are exceptional in comfort and appearance. I will buy another pair in the near future.
quality is very good. Be sure to order 1 size bigger than your normal size. I am normally 8, and 9 is perfect for me

I was looking for an Easter Gift for the boys since 2 of the 3 have Sugar diabetes, So i found these Converse Men's Team Respect style sneakers. So i bought them for 19.99 and the value was 79.99.Boys were happy and so was I.Great quality also.

This is a funny shoe. The bottom is flat,with no arch on the outside ( the inside arch is well developed) and the toes curls up. Works well running but feels odd walking. Works well for me, a heavy runner, and has held up well. Big toe box and true to or slightly large for size.
the shoes were awesome quality, shipped very quickly, but i guess that style runs big, i usually wear an 11, ordered that. they were huge, had to send them back.
it looks really cool and really comforible. everything on it is great except sometimes there will be some dirt that sticks to the dark black part in the front even if im not walking by dirt.
These boots are great. My husband swears it's like not wearing shoes at all. They are tough and withstand his job as a groundsman for a tree company. Outstanding. You can't go wrong with Tims.

I just purchased a pair of these shoes to replace some exactly like them that I have worn every day since 1994!! Those have reached the point where the heels are so run down that they make me walk a bit crooked and one sole is nearly worn through. But can you believe that kind of service from a pair of shoes? They are so comfortable from the first day of wearing and like a well known bunny the just keep going and going. I can't reccommend highly enough.

I absolutely love these shoes! They are cute, comfortable & match so many different outfits! They were also very reasonably priced. The only problem I found was upon arrival, the shoes had a couple little scuffs on them. Nothing huge, but they were there.Other than that, they are fabulous!

my husband and i are managing a cow/calf herd which we began in 1995 and found our feet, wearing rubber boots most of the time, were in need of major support. These Birkenstock are not only good looking but have solved some feet issues for us as a bonus. these sandals are unsurpassed in support, looks and price. we own a pair for the farm (warm weather) and another pair for going public. thanks

I had a similar pair of Reeboks and couldn't find another pair so I decided to try these. Well they arrived and I loved them instantly. Everyone that sees them asks about them. They are really neat shoes. Don't hesitate to get a pair while you still can. They are comfortable and really in style!

It's a great shoe with a great design. Feels comfortable over all, however the front of the shoe rubs on the top of my big toe and has caused a blister of sorts. I believe this is due to the design of the shoe being somewhat restricted in the front with little room for my toes to feel comfortable which ends up with the top of the shoe rubbing on it constantly after a long days work. This causes mild comfort issues and if I could return it I would (problem came about after 4-5 day usage).
A great shoe. Doesn't show off a lot. Really comfortable, and never out of style

This was the first time I had bought shoes online, and even though I own a old pair of these Timberland shoes, and ordered the same size, they were a poor fit. So I sent them back, and paid for the postage. Not sure I'll buy shoes online in the future.

My husband has a pair of these shoes in brown and wanted another pair in black. I ordered them through a catalogue companyand was informed after months of waiting that the shoes were not yet available. So I surfed the web until I finally found theshoes available via Amazon through Shoe Mall. It is very difficult to get shoes that fit and the Ultra-Walker Men's Quick GripWalking Casuals have proven to be excellent. My husband always had problems getting comfortable shoes and afterhe was diagnosed with PD which created difficulty in walking we found these sturdy well made shoes which are goodlooking to boot. (No pun intended). Thanks to Amazon's prompt service he finally has his much needed shoes.

I work physically hard and spend most of my 50 hours a week on my feet. I find that dansko's give me the support so that my legs and feet are not exhausted. Which allows me to run 25 miles a week. Being over 50 says something for the great design in the dansko shoes.alwaysjoyfulAJ

These shoes were so highly reviewed that I got them, but to be honest they are no more comfortable than any other work shoe I have ever had, maybe even less so for a nurse shoe. They seem sturdy though, so I am hoping the fact that they are average in comfort will not matter because they last a really long time. Fingers crossed.
This is my first MBT shoe purchase. This sandal is comfortable, adjustable, and well-made. I bought an MBT because of back problems. I am not sure if the shoe is helping or not.
From my eight year old son: These shoes are very very soft, they make a great noise. They were a great value.

I recently bought 2 pairs of Nellie Chukka Timerlands in colour Wheat.I received 2 pairs of nellie Chukka Timerlands in colour Wheat White.when requesting the colour on the order form, you have 2 options for wheat. The option for Wheat White is not separate from regular wheat.I am now stuck with 2 pairs of the wrong colour. I live in Ireland and therefore would be very expensive for me to send them back to you.I am very dissapointed with my purchases. Unless you can rectify the situation for me I will not be recommending your service to family and friends.Thanking youRachel Costello

I purchased these shoes to wear for special occasions. My last pair was eaten by my bosses dog. I live in Costa Rica these shoes are not sold anywhere here. In this climate rain, mud, sand, & mold can ruin shoes quickly here. These are perfect they look stylish & are extremely comfortable. I am happy with my purchase!

Purchased these boots on Amazon two weeks ago. They were delivered in about 3 days and the fit was perfect. I have found them to be lightweight and very comfortable. And most important to me, since we get lots of snow, the boots keep my feet warm and dry. These boots delivered!
I have a lot of shoes (I've been accused of being the Imelda Marcos of men, but this is a winner. Comfortable, and it can be casual or dressy. It started me on the Neil M kick!
Love these converse shoes.They are a great shade of red, have already got a lot of comments on them.Thanks Chuck!

My husband has been wearing this exact shoe for years...we are sad that it appears to be discontinued and that finding a suitable replacement in his size ( 15 US ) is nearly impossible!For NB 991 lovers...get 'em while you still can! Reviews we've read on the replacement aren't very good!

This LifeStride shoe is one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever had - I like it so much I have it in three different colors. Even after wearing it all day my feet are feeling great. You can't go wrong with this shoe.

As a daily runner and marathoner, I was in the market for a new pair of running shoes. I considered the Nike Shox, but after a few tries with them I decided to go the alternate route and picked up these new Adidas.Wow.The UltraRide blows away the Shox in terms of support, comfort, and stability. The "cool" factor is also very high with these shoes.Recommended over Shox

I purchased the Naturalizer shoe, Scout, Since I already have bought 4 or 5 pr Naturalizer shoes through Amazon, I knew the quality of the shoe, and what service to expect and I have not bee disappointed. Easily, a 5-star experience!
I love these, I fine them very comfortable, no problem to break them in, I have been wearing this brand for the last three year.

This is the third pair of these shoes that I have owned. The previous two pair were comfortable and nice looking but this new pair has the look of pleather. Adding to the shoody appearance (which I thought I could improve with polish--with no success)is the annoying squeek that these shoes make when walking in them. I would not recommend purchasing them.
They look good. They are very comfortable. I have wide feet and high arches the EEE was a good choice. Not made in America... but not made in China. Indonesia is not Indiana but better than China.

I purchased this sandal about a month ago and have worn it virtually every day since its arrival. I am well pleased with it as it is quite comfortable to the extent I wear it. I tend to shift in and out of several shoes during a day so I can not comment to its comfort if worn for extended time or over substantial distances.Mid-October, 2012. Still wearing these sandals, though with socks on some crispy days. My feet are happy in them. I have a painful right foot which has been problematic since my early teens. Dress shoes have always been an exercise in stoic endurance for me. Most shoes grow uncomfortable in a matter of hours. I habitually change footwear several times a day to keep things under control. As I have aged I have less padding on the soles of my feet resulting in mounting discomfort. Only one pair of Columbia hikers permitted me hike all over North and East Africa oblivious to my feet. Until these sandals. I have found that I can wear them nearly all day walking for miles, changing only when I get home. It must be wonderful to have normal feet. I hope you aren't taking yours for granted. Now that I getting old enough to not give a damn I may even evolve into wearing them with formal attire. Einstein got away with non-conformance to social conventions. I may just have to remain silent so that people think I must be brilliant, and eccentric. Happy feet.

I buy tennis shoes on line all the time and they run true to size. I wear a 5 1/2 and have trouble finding certain shoes. When I read reviews that these shoes run small I ordered 1 size up and they fit just fine. The box said 61$'s and many in my class bought from a local shoe store for that price. So this is a very good deal. I'm an senior and love to TAP now!

Thank you for this shoe - I saw it at my aunt's and I had to have it. It looks great, fits great and wears well. Excellent price, great service - it arrived here before the date it said it was to get here - and in great shape. Now my mom wants a pair! Thanks again!

These shoes are the best things I Bought on amazon. I recomeend this product who wants the real converse. I love them and now i wear them everyday and everywhere i go!!! I cant wait till i buy or get my next pair!!
I've owned several pairs of these shoes and have always had complete satisfaction. They are comfortable and durable. If you search there website, Propet offers free shipping.
GOT WHAT I ORDERED, DELIVERED IN GOOD TIME, AND THEY FIT AS I EXPECTED, VERY COMFORTABLE AND A SUPER GOOD PRICE.

Really like the flip flops sandals - but the height of the soles don't match - one is at least an 1/8 to a 1/4" higher than the other. I had already worn them before I realized what was wrong with them. So I guess I'm stuck with them (pitched the box & receipt). Have bought alot from Amazon in the past - never had a problem before. :(LindaDisappointed
They were wider than I had expected. Usually children's sizes run more narrow and these ran much wider. I needed to wear two socks and they were hard to break in.
extremely durable oxfords, universal shoes-great with dress slacks to jeans - clean styled boot toe. Comfortable street shoe. Like 'em lots.
My 2 1/2 year old LOVES these shoes! And I think they are too cute!! Shoes are true to size. Perfect fit!
I have been buying Hi-Tec for years. When I found the Altitude IV I fell in love instantly. This shoe fits great, has little break in time and still holds its sturdiness as it ages. Well recomended.
i want to return these WORST shoe i have ever bought!!!!! i only wore once !!!! and will not wear again
You would expect a name like timberland to have reached a certain level of expertise to be able to build a $ 100.+ shoe that can compromise between comfort and toughness... ,but it doesn't .
I just bought them and they look and feel wonderful. I highly recommend them, I can even run in them, they are that comfortable. The price is definitely right.

Most comfortable shoes I have found.After a few tests of brands and sizes, these are the best.I walk 5 to 10 miles a day .Once I found my size,my feet don't hurt or get tired.I add gel innersoles for extra comfort but it's not necessary.Concrete floors,ladders ,rough terrain,mud,rain;no problem.And they are beautiful.People ask me about them all the time.Enjoy.
Love the fit and performance of my new Ryka water aerobics shoes. The only problem I have is that they tend to be slippery on the lane markers in the bottom of the pool.
These shoes are really comfortable - so much so that I decided to stop wearing skateboard shoes altogether and just walk and skate in these.

My husband was having a hard time finding another pair of these at all, much less at the cost savings these were offered. Lovely and long wearing, he now has four pairs in case they have been discontinued.

I bought a pair of Seawalkers to use for weddings as I am a professional photographer.Pros: Leather body and sole has held up with four years of hard use; comfortable shoe; nice fit; non-slip soleCons: Eyelet grommets were sharp-edged so lacings frayed within a few months (had to take to a cobbler to fix the problem); rubber sole squeaks on linoleum and hard wood floors; expensive compared to similar quality ECCO shoes.Overall, nice shoes but suede begins to get old looking after a year or so. I have therefore purchased another ECCO shoe, the Boston lace-up, for wedding work. I would give the Seawalker 4-stars for comfort but having to pay a cobbler more money to fix the eyelets was a bummer, particularly on such an expensive shoe, so 3-stars in my book.
Just love this shoe. Not exactly the same as the old school but the changes are more comfortable. Visually, its just a slightly thicker sole. I highly recommend getting them.
Bought for my husband he absolutely loves these shoes. Comfortable to the max. Wanted the senators but they were discontinued. Wish they weren't but he loved these too.

these shoes were exactly what i was hoping for. they are my first pair of chucks and i must say i LOVE them!!! i want them in every color possible!=P super comfortable too...i could wear them forever!

I like the color. It's not a common color - different but understated. Just wished that the bottom of the shoe could be more ergonoic and the shaft could be taller. Where it hits is not flattering to a woman.

The mocs were beautiful, soft and supple, and didn't fit at all. With feet swollen from a recent accident, I thought they would be perfect for the times I actually have to wear shoes, and was crushed because they didn't fit. Other shoes, marked less wide, do. They made a wonderful gift for a loved one, who wears a narrower width, and she was ecstatic, but I was/am disappointed.

Having a wide foot they fit a little on the narrow side - I kept them knowing that canvas will probably stretch without to much problem. Also my shoes make a slight hollow sound from one of the baby toe tips; I'm assuming with time that too will abate.
My 17 yr old son loved the shoe but was so disappointed how big it was. We returned it for a size smaller we r hoping this one will work.

I bought these sandals 3 years ago when I couldn't find my size in the thicker strap Reef's in store. I wasn't thrilled until I got them on. They are wonderful!I've now had them 3 years and they still look/feel great. These are a fabulous purchase, so I'm buying them again!
My 4 year old loves these shoes and he wears them almost everyday. They look very nice and my soon puts them without any help. They fit true to size. I would recommend these shoes to anyone.
Very good sneakers, the most comfortable ever. And also one of the cheapest! I'd like to try some of the new Converse models

I have major problems finding size 9-1/2 medium in any shoe so I was pleased to find these at Fusion through Amazon. They are great, the fit is correct and very comfortable. Not much one can say about canvas tennis shoes but they are nice quality and more important, as I said before a good true fit.

good indoor shoes. stylish as well. These are volleyball shoes which have enhanced outsole rubber for improved tractino and flexibility.fitting is ok. they just run a little narrow. I would suggest to buy half size up and wide if possible.

This shoe was superb when I used it for my highschool football team. I was able to run my fastest and not feel dragged down by a pound of lead, with out the high cut ankle support I was able to cut faster and throw off almost all of my defenders. This shoe really did enhance my perfromance. Ideal for wide receivers and running backs.

I just picked these up for my uniform working at A&F, and I gotta say there's a reason they'll never go out of style. These shoes are damn fine, and they're the only thing I own that'll really fit my flat feet. My roommate/coworker gets a lot of use out of them, too.
I went looking for shoes for my nephew all black and these came up and the price is unbeatable that I got them and that 2 day free shipping is great. Thanks to my Kindle Fire HD 1 yr memebership...
My son needed these for wrestling and is very happy with them. He says they are comfortable and also look good. I would recommend them to anyone.

I have been wearing these Teva sandals for three years now, and I have to say that I was really disappointed with this year's crop of sandals. I used to love these sandals because the bottom part of the flip flop was so squishy and comfy and because they fit my narrow feet so perfectly. They were by far the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. I would wear mine every day throughout the summer, until I wore the heels through!But this year, its seems that Teva decided that the fit was too narrow for the majority of their customers so they decided to make the fit a bit wider, the straps a bit looser. I tried on multiple different styles and colors while I was at the shoe store, and it seems that they've all be changed to fit this way. Unfortunately, this completely changed the comfortability of the sandal for me. Though they fit length-wise like they used to, they now feel like they're about two sizes too big for me and flop around way too much. Where before I would have rated these shoes 5+ stars, I can now only give them 2 stars. They are no longer my favorite sandals, and I really wish that Teva hadn't decided to mess with a sandal that would have been my favorite go-to summer sandal for years to come.

I thought the straps on this would bother me after parting with my old leather-strapped Reefs, which are no longer sold. I bought these along with a newer version of leather straps, and I favor these, surprisingly. I love them, and haven't had any problems with them yet!
I ordered these Navy Keds tennis shoes for my daughter. The color shows navy, but when they arrived they looked black...the box said navy! Had to return because of the shade.
These boots are just what I was looking for. They are so easy to put on and get off. They are very comfortable

Granted, at first glance one may not be too impressed with the looks of these shoes. I was one of these people. However, on a trip to Maine, I needed a pair of shoes that would serve well on land as well as in the water on trails and on the oceans. That being said, I discovered the true toughness and comfort of these shoes. I even hiked up a 3,000 foot mountain in these things and they still exhibit modest wear on the soles and around the entire shoe. This was extremely rocky and rugged terrain to boot and would not advise this as the primary terrain to tackle with Crocs.SIZINGI am a true 10.5 in mens. However, 10 was definitely too small and uncomfortable for me, so I bought size 11 since there are no half sizes. From this discovery, it is safe to say that Crocs are pretty true to size. 11s are a little big on me, but the strap still locks my foot in place and it does not feel like my foot is coming out of the shoe if I am not using the strap. The foam material Crocs are made from grips your feet pretty well, even when wet or sweaty.COMFORTThere are not many shoes, even shoes I've spent over $100, that can match Crocs in comfort. I could wear these shoes all day and my feet would not hurt or blister while on the trails. On a regular day out, same story. For summer, they are great because air is constantly able to flow through and cool your feet. When they get wet, I mean completely soaked, they usually will dry off within about 5 minutes.STYLEThese are really not as ugly as people think. Once you wear them and get them on, they really start to grow on you both on how they look and how they feel. People who say they hate these shoes are those who have never put a pair on and worn them (I was one of these people). As far as colors go, white and lighter colors seem like they will definitely get dirty easily. I have black and they are easy to clean of, just a rinse and rub down with a rag.The main thing is people just have to have an open mind when purchasing this style of footwear. They are a little unorthodox but they are high quality, functional, and as bad looking as people think. They are so easy just to slip on and they are featherweight and easy to walk in. I use them a lot for just getting the mail or going to the gym before I put my gym shoes on. I have been pleasently surprised with Crocs' resilience and highly recommend these bad boys.

Bought these for my husband for Christmas. He Loves them and expecially loves the side zipper for easy wearing. He received alot of compliments on the style. These boots are definately sharp lookingThey are made very well, durable, and very comfortable. I would definately buy these again without hesitation!

This is an excellent light-medium weight boot. I wanted to find a reasonably priced hiking boot for weekend trips. This boot meets all of my expectations. I would defintiely buy from this seller again.

This is my 2nd pair of Propet walkers. I have the other pair that has mesh instead of solid leather, which are good for summer time but not winter when it's wet outside. I wanted a leather pair to keep the moisture out of my shoes when I'm outside & I do walk a lot so a good walking shoe is a must.I'm type 2 diabetic & was having some ingrown toe nail problems. After buying my 1st pair of these shoes, within 3 months I was able to get rid of the ingrown toe nail. The shoes have more toe room & are stable to keep my foot from rolling out when I walk. I was having lots of back pain, and if I don't get a good shoe like i said my foot rolls out & my ankles start to hurt.With these shoes I have no pain, am steady on my feet & the rubber sole is good to keep me from sliding around on wet floors: an added plus.I wanted to mention that these shoes are comfortable, they have a snug fit feel to them, but not so tight that your feet feel crammed. Earlier I was wearing these shoes because my feet were so swollen I couldn't get anything else on except slippers. These went right on, did not make my feet feel crammed, & with the heel pain I was having from the swelling i couldn't feel it.These are really some nice shoes, they are light weight & feel good after being on my feet all day walking around, even when I take the dog for a walk.I've cleaned out my closet of all the other favorite shoes I had, and only have these 2 pairs now. Nothing else can compare to how these feel for me & how well they keep my feet healthy.

After a rare snow and ice storm here in Atlanta, I slipped on my driveway and broke my leg (in two places). Among my get-well wishes were a couple suggestions that I should have purchased Yaktrax, which I had never even heard of. My leg healed quickly, but soon had to travel to Moscow on business. I ordered a pair to make sure I wouldn't re-injure my almost-healed leg. They were amazing! And everyone in Moscow was amazed, too. They had never seen anything like it, either. I would keep them in a Delta Airlines amenity bag I got from the plane and carry in my pocket until going outside, then put them on my shoes. I made it to and from Moscow safe and sound and now have them in my closet awaiting the next inclimate weather or my next trip to Russia.

this is my first time ordering shoes from this site last time i ordered some shoes from a different site and they were nothing like they previewed on the site anyway i'm ordering now and i'll complete my review when i get the shoe so everyone will know if the companies full of it or not peace

I've been shopping around for a good pair of Converse for a while, thinking that I could find them for under $20.00 if I looked hard enough. My last pair, which I bought three years ago, was $20, and I thought surely I could find more for less than the $35-45 price tag I was seeing. Stupid inflation.I finally bought these when I realized if I was going to get a new pair, I had to cough up the extra dough. I'm really glad I did. I wore the last pair all the time, and though they're still comfortable and I'm far too attached to them to throw them away, they have holes in the leather and in the sole, and they smell something foul when it rains. I have no doubt that these canvas Converse Chuck's will last just as long and be just as comfortable, and my first few wears makes me confident that I'm right. My last pair was leather, but the same shoe style, so I don't know if the fabric of these will stretch. I do know that the leather ones never did, it only got a little less structured after three years of wear.What I like:1. These are meant to wear as regular sneakers, so while you don't want to go on a run with them, they are just as comfortable if you're going on a long walk. There's no chafing on the heel no matter how far I go, and the support means they're not going to destroy your lower back if you find yourself walking or standing all day.2. For me, at least, they fit true to size. I have wide feet, but the design of the shoe means I can lace them tighter or looser and not worry about them cutting into my circulation or falling off.3. I got the navy blue ones, and the color is exactly what you see in the product picture. It's vibrant, but not bright, and well-dyed and even-toned.As for dislikes, well...there's nothing I dislike about Converse, so you're asking the wrong person if you're looking for complaints. All Converse I've ever owned are comfortable and simple, and I think it's what the brand does best.
The shoes are versatile and very comfortable. Sizing is accurate and the price is right. I am pleased with my purchase. Good buy.

I was delighted to find the The Enzo Angiolini "Liberty" shoe through Amazon. It's perfect for casual and dressy casual wear - shopping and running to the dentist or doctor. Ordering was easy and service was prompt. I'll do it again in the future.
I have a narrow foot and the AA fits ok. Well made shoes. I am not too crazy about how high they come on my ankle but I knew that when I bought them. Thought I would give them a try.

What can I say, this is a pretty basic straight forward sandal. Very comfortable. The toe area is indented slightly matching to your foots contour which makes them extra comfortable in my opinion. Its not just a flat surface. This is my second pair. My first pair lasted well over a year before my border collie turned them into her personal chew toy. Very durable. The bottom of the sandal is a very grippy material. The butterscotch colored bottom will not mark up your boat or floors which is an added benefit if you are spending time in the boat. These are great sandals...not too much more to say.

I asked for and got a pair of Crocs via Amazon.com for Christmas 2010. They fit fairly well, more comfortable with socks, size 14, black. The right is a bit bigger that the left. I wear them for the most part in the house, wood, tile and carpet flooring. You would expect them to wear slow on those type of surfaces but I noticed that after only two months of use, 4-5 hours per day, the tread has worn away about the heel and beneath the big toes. I do not drag my feet so I should expect a longer lasting shoe. I don't expect them to last more that 6 months. Based on comfort I give 5 stars, for lasting quality 3 stars. For the $44.95 you would expect them to last a year. I'll let you know if your willing to sit there and wait. Oh! go order a pair you'll like them, while they last

This is the best running shoe I have ever owned! I had trouble with my LCL, not anymore. I used to start to get tired after 4 miles, I can go twice as long with these. If you have flat, narrow feet and small ankles, this is the shoe for you. Pretty good arch support. Could use more, but I'm not complaining!! I hope they never discontinue this shoe!

This purchase was another gift for Christmas. I bought this particular pair of shoes for my wife. Although it was not a direct Amazon.com purchase and I was redirected to another site, the process was easy. The shoes were shipped fast and on time, there was great communication from the site that sold them. Another great purchase!
Great shoe for winter, but too warm for summer. You need an insert or socks for this shoe or you will sweat too much in them. Very comfortable otherwise.

I bought these shoes for my husband because he is on his feet all day. He enjoys wearing them and states that he has not had any cramps in his legs or feet. The only thing that I notice about them that I am unsure of is the material on the upper part, toe area. It appears a little thin, but perhaps that is because this a walking shoe. I am hoping they are able to endure his daily routine.
The sandal is stiff and the quality is so so. The original price is marked much way too high compared to the quality.
These are nice boat shoes. Look good & fit well. I like the elevated heel & sole as opposed to the flat bottom shoes. When I wear 'em out I'll buy another pair.
Fits well, Looks good.Price was right. Much more comfortable than rental shoes. Will pay for themselves in 6 trips to the Bowling Alley.
They didn't have the color I wanted so I settled for a different color shoe.
Purchased these for my 75 year old sister who had been looking and looking for some navy keds. She loves them.
I have only had these shoes for a short time and maybem they need to br broke in a little, but the arch area is a little uncomfortable.

This is an exceptionally good looking shoe, however, the sole is not as thick as the Rockports my son has enjoyed in the past and says he can feel the rocks pushing up through the sole where he didn't feel that in the Rockports.Thought we'd give these a try and again they are gorgeous, but we'll be going back to the Rockports after this.Seller was very fast and there is no way to compare these to anything else unless you've owned both. We'd buy from this seller again.

As a daily runner and marathoner, I was in the market for a new pair of running shoes. I considered the Nike Shox, but after a few tries with them I decided to go the alternate route and picked up these new Adidas.Wow.The UltraRide blows away the Shox in terms of support, comfort, and stability. The "cool" factor is also very high with these shoes.Recommended over Shox
MY GRANDSON ORDERED THESE FOR HIS CHRISTMAS GIFT AND WAS VERY HAPPY WITH THEM. THEY WERE THE PERFECT FIT AND VERY COMFORTABLE FOR HIM.

Image shows Purple HI TOPS, but when you order....you get LO tops. Also, items that say 'qualifies for super saver shipping!' they're not. So unless you are ok with lo tops when you want hi tops...don't fall for it!
I bought this as a xmas gift for my brother. The size of the show was way to big so he went and exchange it.
THESE SHOES ARE SHARP. GREAT QUALITY AND WORKMANSHIP.THE FIT IS GOOD AND COMFORTABLE. I HIGHLY RECOMEND THEM.I THINK YOU WILL FIND IT THE SAME.

I love these flip flop. This is my second pair of Teva flip flops. They are so comfortable, I do not want to take them off. I have flat feet so I have problems finding comfortable flip flops. They are not only comfortable but they look great. I will buy more of the Teva shoes.
These shoes are to die for. I ordered them at 7pm and they were on my door step at 3pm the next day! Great fast shipping and amazing quality for what I paid.
This are super confortable shoes if you do not mind the 'men' look. Great with pants. Wear for 8h or longer with no pain, padding is extraordinary. The brown is beautiful.

I ordered 9.5's, because that's what I normally wear, but the shoes don't have any padding to speak of, so they feel a little big. I like the look, so I'll probably go get some Dr. Scholl's Inserts and start gellin' like a fellon.

I ordered a 40, what was supposed to be a women's size 9, but these were way too big. At least 2 sizes. I found a store that sold these and ended up with a size 38. I was told by someone else they had the same problem. Now that I know my correct size I would have no problem buying these again.

THIS IS MY 4TH PURCHASE OF THIS SHOE STYLE. USUALLY THERE IS A NEW SHOE BREAK IN PERIOD BUT WITH THIS SHOE IT'S COMFORTABLE FROM THE FIRST WEARING UP TO THE FINAL WEARING. I'M SURE I'VE PUT MORE THAN THE 1000 MILE GUARANTEE ON EACH OF THE PREVIOUS PAIRS BUT I LIKE THAT THERE IS A WARRANTY ON THE SHOES. AND THE PRICE IS GREAT TOO!

These boots are the only ones my husband will own. He's on his third pair. He wears them at least five days a week and wears them until they are coming apart. They last him roughly two years. Great value!

These sizes published are off an inch. I can get my feet in them, but the top arch makes them to tight. The extra toe length wont matter because these come to a point anyway, your feet will not be lose in them. I've been buying these shoes for over a decade, same problem with size today as a decade ago. They are very soft, and super comfortable if you get the right size, zero break in time. Very soft rubber which wears out pretty quickly on cement/pavement, but great around the yard or short chore stuff, great grip no slip. These are always sharp looking too, athletic look to em, but I would not work out in them because they do wear out quick. I buy 2 pairs at a time.
I love the look, quality is good, but I gave it 4 stars because they run very small. I recomend ordering size up.

This is a great boot and my son loved it. We live in Hawaii and went home for Thanksgiving to Idaho. Since my son had never worn boots like this we were concerned he wouldn't do well with them. But he really loved them and they survived two weeks in the rain and snow of Washington and Idaho. And they looked great on him! I definitely recommend them.
Love these shoes, they are sooooo comfortable and hold up very well, I wear them all the time.

I use a 10 1/2 W, 1/2 a size bigger than I wear for a sneaker, in this shoe. The heel is comfortable, and I can stand or dance in these for hours with no problem. They are also fine with slacks for a regular day.

The ballet shoes are very nice, but not true to size. My granddaughter (age 4) wears a size 7, I ordered a 7.5 to give her room to grow, and they were too small! Some advice about the sizing would have been helpful. Now we have to send them back.

I bought these as character shoes for opera performance. They are very uncomfortable for now and I cannot wear them more than an hour without swearing, but all the singers I work with tell me that once you wear them for a while, they become very comfortable...

So far I am very pleased with these less expensive versions of Birkenstocks. Haven't noticed any lack in quality and of course love the comfort of these shoes. Birkenstocks (and Betula's) are the best!
I love these shoes! They are comfortable and stylish. I have gotten nothing but great complements from them. Well worth the money!
I have been wearing KEDs for over 50 years, love them. They were exactly what I odered, no problems
Im not a big fan of sneakers, but these shoes I now want in every color. They are so comfortable and a must have to every college student. Love them!

This type of sneaker is not a durable quality sneaker at all. I have purchased at tag sales old Ked's sneakers for $3-$5 dollars which were much more durable. I save this pair purchased for going out on business trips or the like since this type of Ked's sneakers wouldn't last a week with my daily work chores, sad to say.
Insoles are permanently glued in so that orthotics can not be installed. Insoles in shoes give no arch support.Returned them

I got them today around the time they said they would be here. The shoes were in great condition inside the box and they were just what I expected to be. I'm very satisfied with my purchase. I would order from them again.
very good product I recommend it to everyone I came perfectly and has no sign of damage apart is very good product!

This is a high quality product. The shoes are quite comfortable and can take the beating of a big city sidewalks. I have had them for 6 months and use them 3-4 times a week and they are still in the "almost new" shape. The price is pretty good too.
these are very nice, comfortable and can be worn outside and inside. Very Soft

This is a funny shoe. The bottom is flat,with no arch on the outside ( the inside arch is well developed) and the toes curls up. Works well running but feels odd walking. Works well for me, a heavy runner, and has held up well. Big toe box and true to or slightly large for size.
I looked all over for these shoes found them at a great price and love them so much and will buy another pair very soon as these ones are almost destroyed

I find this pair of Reebok running shoes to be of excellent quality. They are very comfortable and cushion the shock of walking. I am past the running age, so I need a good foundation and arch support. The price was right also. Reebok is the best name in sport shoes in my estimation. Thank you. I hope this helps.

For over 25 years I have relied on Softspots for casual wear. The shoes are durable and very comfortable. Great for travel and slip off going through airport security. The range of color choices (black, navy, brown, taupe) add a plus.

This boots look great, materials feel lush and pleasant. However, the feel and comfort for the feet is way too original - looks like they were not designed as a normal modern shoes, look like 'how simple the shoe can be created'. They look great, and feel nice, but don't expect comfort. Sizes fit perfectly, no need to order larger/or especially smaller unless you need some torture for your feet.

I love these sandals. I got the brushed leather ones, and they are very comfortable. They have some arch support and all the straps adjust for a comfortable fit. I wear a 7.5 in most shoes and that is what I ordered in these. They fit me perfectly.

I just bought my third pair of these boots in five years. I found them to be almost indestructible for light machine shop and daily use on the street. They are VERY COMFORTABLE, ideal if one is on your feet all day.They also polish up well and are presentable WORN as a dress boot/shoe.They felt like a favorite, comfortable old pair of shoes from the first time I put them on...SORT OF INDUSTRIAL STRENGTH BUNNY SLIPPERS!The boots are very well made from real leather.They are not heavy duty enough for heavy construction,logging or concrete work. Good for light farm work and driving.THEY ARE THE BEST WEARING WORK BOOT, I HAVE FOUND FOR DAY TO DAY WEAR.The soles have some tread, giving you fair traction in the grass, snow and ice plus have excellent wear resistance.Also...the boot's sole patterns does not leave large clumps of the outside on the kitchen floor, while stepping into the house.The boot sizing is pretty much exact. Only buy your exact sizeExcept a WIDER SHOE if you plan to wear multiple pairs of thick socks in the winter.They have an excellent size / width selection. I usually need a 14 EEEEE in a boot.The boots are almost waterproof, you will need to apply a reasonable coat of waterproofing silicone spray or mystery oil leather treatment. KIWI SHOE POLISH makes them shine up very well.The leather uppers are well cut out pattern and sewn together with care.I never had problems with the leather, material, sewn seams splitting or tearing, and no loosening or unusual wear with the heels or soles.The leather is thick enough to protect but still thin enough to be flexible.I have bought both he 6 inch and 8 inch versions of this farm boot.Both boot heights are just as easy to get on and off, however the eight inch high boot does gives you a bit more ankle support.So, I prefer the eight inch height.The only thing I can recommend extra for these boots...Order a bit thicker,round nylon boot laces, instead of the flat, cotton shoe laces that come FACTORY standard with these boots.If you need soles with more traction get something with a VIBRAM sole.However, trust me, your wife will remind you,often, to remove your boots before coming into the house with VIBRAM soles on.The only tougher and better boots I have seen and bought,have been just as happy with, are the White's Smoke Jumper Logging Boots and they COST ALMOST $500.00The FARM BOOTS are a great deal! I wish more American companies made things with this amount of care /pride in the product,a good design philosophy, used quality materials and all put together with wonderful workmanship!The people at WORK AMERICA remind me and hearken back to an earlier time in this country, when something that was stamped AMERICAN MADE or MADE IN USA meant often this product was the best made in the world!http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B008D94HNQ/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title

This is a great shoe, though I find that it runs narrow. I could not get my left foot in the shoe at all. My right foot wentin with some effort. It is very well made and I like the padded arch support that is built in. I will re-order in a wider size.Idaho potato

got these, in brown leather "croc" for my husband who saw them someplace but had a very hard time finding them in his size (12) - he loves them - they're super comfortable and very good looking. For Reef lovers, and flipflop lovers, we highly recommend.

I bought these shoes for my husband/son on a Saturday and they were delivered to my house on the following Tuesday. Super, fast delivery I really like the colors they have in these shoes, they are in a cute style, the quality is good,and the price is great.
These are warm, comfy and fit well. Just as I expected. There is only one problem and that is they shed alot. I still would purchase them in spite of that, hoping it will stop.

I've purchased these Minnetonka suede mocs while on vacation in the U.P. for many years and was delighted to see them for sale on Amazon.com. The same size is always the same size so no worries about having them not fit.

I bought these for my sister as a birthday present. She loves them! The style is sassy and the heel is just the right height. It seems to be well constructed. I noticed the other review said the suede was worn looking around the side and toe area and this is true for this pair as well. I believe these are made to look this way on purpose to give it a slightly worn look, much like they design jeans these days. All in all this was a great purchase.
a great shoe, buy a size below what you usually wear. comfy, durable and a great casual look with jeans.

I love these Eastland shoes but can't seem to find them anymore. I was excited to see them on Amazon as my old pair is looking quite worn. When I got them, they were too small! I guess I learned my lesson and won't purchase shoes online again. I just did my first ever return to Amazon and will see how that goes. By the way, I have worn the same size shoes for years!

Per Wife: Comfortable fit, as always with Hushpuppies. Looked great and was a good match for my dress. Glad I bought this. just know your shoe size for dress shoes in US sizing. Is very good with keeping to the US shoe template and quality is usually very high. Very happy with the shoes.

The style of this shoe is exactly what I was looking for. However, the size I ordered was too small and unfortunately it was not available in the size needed, so I had to return it and couldn't get another. Otherwise, I definitely would have kept it.

I bought two pairs of Adidas cleats. This was one of the pairs.I purchased them thinking of the comfort they seemed to provide based on the photo. And yes, they're very comfortable, it's like wearing a regular sneaker, but alas, after 20 minutes of sprinting on the field my legs really began to burn, the weight these cleats have is at least twice that of a regular mid cleat.I'd rather wear some worn down pairs I have at home that these, the unnecessary added strain on my legs is just too much.
These shoes last long and looks great, just like the first day I brought them, and I recommend this product and seller to anyone. This was an AAAA++++ transaction and product. Thanks

I bought a pair of these shoes (in Espresso/Creme) for walking, because I'm a college student and I do a lot of walking around on campus every day. The sales person at Foot Locker did not recommend them for walking, but I do. They're comfortable, feminine, and very nicely designed. The shoe is made of breathable leather (a must for this Texas heat!), and fits my foot very nicely. In addition, the padded insole is much more comfortable than a regular tennis shoe. And don't let the thin soles fool you - this shoe is durable!As an Adidas "fan", I'd recommend this shoe simply because Adidas makes high quality, long-lasting shoes. As someone who needs comfortable shoes, I recommend this pair not only because of the quality, but also because of the comfort they offer. The fact that they're also quite cute (at least, I think so) is an added bonus. Overall, this is a great pair of shoes, and I'd recommend it to anyone who needs a sturdy and comfortable, yet stylish, pair of shoes for an active lifetsyle.
They really do keep any water from getting in, and they are quite warm! Don't know what I'd do without them with winter coming along.
MRS BOWLES WAS "VERY PLEASED " WITH THE PRODUCT, THE SPEED OF DEV., AND THE ACCURACY OF THE ENTIRE PROCESS.WE FELT LIKE WE "WERE FAVORITE CUSTOMERS"....
These arrived very quickly and were as advertised, brand new in box. I havent been able to find them in stores, thanks for having them available. Happy customer here.

I wanted a shoe that I can use like a slip-on. Buying without trying was a bit scary. I'm happy to say I didn't have any problems. It is a well made shoe. You won't find something like this at Walmart. A helpful hint here....if you spill kerosene on one shoe you might as well dump some on the other one too. They're real leather.

I wear these when I visit my parents' ranch. I am used to flip flops but out in the country where there are snakes... closed-toe shoes are kind of a necessity. They're VERY comfortable and fit great, and I can slide them right on and go. Very nice material and well made.
The shipping was quick, and the product was in perfect condition. Expensive shipping though...

As i say i bought it for a friend and he says that is great. He wasn't wait too long for it (thanks!). He got a RDV with girl, he planned to wear it at the rendez-vous. He was worry thinking will he get it at time.
My teenager picked these out. she loves them enough to wear them at least 2x a week and says they are comfortable. I like that they don't show dirt.
A great shoe. Doesn't show off a lot. Really comfortable, and never out of style

As i say i bought it for a friend and he says that is great. He wasn't wait too long for it (thanks!). He got a RDV with girl, he planned to wear it at the rendez-vous. He was worry thinking will he get it at time.

My daughter loves these. They are what the nursing professionals wear, but in white. They are supposed to be the MOST comfortable thing on the planet. They have a nice 'cushioned' walk due to what the entire sole is made of but the deceiving part is that you think they are 'hard' on the inside. They have an arch support that is the key. Much like Power Steps that you can put into your workout shoes in place of the innersoles they come with (Power Steps are STILL better than ANY athletic shoe puts in at the factory) they support you entirely so it reduces fatigue. I have found that wearing even the Rainbow Sandals all the time do that, and I wish I could wear these, but my husband is 'of short stature' so I would tower above him in them (which I would hate) and they would also make my size 8 foot look HUGE! So, I'm sticking with my Rainbows but they are DARLING on my daughter (who is so petite) and once she broke them in she loves them. I am sure she'll still be wearing them in 10 years!!! GREAT SHOE!!!! Good deal too if you already know your size!!!

I read super reviews, and wanted the best, so I bought these. I am quite disappointed, actually. I am a girl, maybe that made the difference. The toe cap rubbed my toes something fierce. The soles are super, I loved that about them. But they are really heavy and I clump everywhere. This has not changed in 2 months. I have strong legs, so this is not a weakness issue. They have a bit of a pointed toe, too. I do not think these are sexy, on me or anyone else. Danner has been nice enough about my issues, but I forsee a lot of money continuing with these. For standing long periods, these are probably great. But I will have to run, walk and try to be stealthy. Forget it with these! Maybe in a year or two, they will be quieter? I tried to buy American, but these are just not that great. Sorry.. I see that another man has said the same things, now that I re-read the reviews. I will try to walk through a river, or let the sun soften them. I hope it helps, otherwise I just flushed over $300./04/2012 Amazon gave me a full refund, as apparently these were defective. The toe box killed my toe and when they realized it was a defect and not preference, they fully refunded my money. They treated me like they wanted to keep my business. Good customer service!So, I guess these have the potential to be great boots, like others seem to think they are. Just keep in mind that they are heavy. The pros are that they are very easy on and off, well made, and the sole is very comfortable and protective. My feet felt well cared for.
Unfortunately these run a bit tight. Length is fine but width is actually tight. I wish I could fix this issue but I really do not want to have to send these back...

Firstable I have to say that the service was perfect!!! They were perfectly in time and I really like them. They are warm and confortable. You must buy a smaller size. I usually wear 8/5-9 and I bought 8. Thank you Amazon!! and Happy Holidays to everybody!

Actual size was about a full size maybe even two sizes smaller than what they were labeled as. Had to return them. Pink glitter was all over the floor by just trying on one shoe so beware of glitter shedding
Great seller, Super fast shipping. These are a great pair of shoes. They just have to be broken in before they'll truly preform at their best.
I have narrow feet and it's difficult to find shoes in my size. These were size 13 B and fit fine and are good walking shoes.
Broke in right out of the box. I would buy again and again. Most comfortable boots I have ever owned when I put them on they felt like a broke in pair

This is my second pair I have purchased of this type and model. Boot wears out slowly - especially on the top and front where wear typically shows first. Sole eventually wears out, but wearing daily can last 2 years or longer. Very comfortable and flexes nicely, while standing up to abbasions well. I would recommend some type of conditioner if the boots will be exposed to water or liquids on a regular basis.Personaly, I prefer saddlesoap.
comfortable, great feel. only draw back is that the product was made in Vietnam. Has been great for on the job.

The ad showed a picture of the shoes with dark gray stripes, but the ones they sent were solid white; I can live with the color difference, but the shoes seemed to fit kind of tight and were hard to break in, so you may want to order a larger size in this one.

I have these sandals in five different colors. They are incredibly comfortable yet stylish, and can be worn with slacks or skirts for work or play. Although they are not leather, they look and feel just like it. Great for fashion-minded vegans or those looking for a comfortable, inexpensive sandal.

While I'm not a runner, I bought these on advice from others that have to walk on concrete as part of their job. The anti roll and cushion soles are the best support I've had for my feet in a long time. I ended up buying a second pair, one set for work, and the other for home and biking.You can't go wrong with this shoe, not to mention you can get them in 4E widths!maloy
Dark Red boots - many compliments received! AK is always a good purchase.
What can I say? These shoes are insanely comfortable and go with everything. The more worn they get the better they look.

I personallyu play soccer with the white pair of the Beck designed ones. They are comfortable and very useful for curve shots. The pricing, shipping and handling are convenient and easy. I recommend this seller.
These shoes are great! This is the first time I ordered them online and they came in fast. This is my fourth pair of sketchers and I will definitely keep ordering them.

Well, what more can I say? They are nice shoes for the dress blues... I had trouble finding the ones I could manually polish, but these work... Just make sure not to scuff them... Because for the most part, scuffs do not come out... Cleaning them is simple and can be done with windex. The shipping was also quick, faster than Vanguard's second day, even though I did standard shipping with these... But they get the job done...

My granddaughter absolutely "...had to have, more than anything in the world..." a pair of Converse Purple High-tops for Christmas! Ordered them on 12/19 & they arrived on the 22nd, in plenty of time for me to once again be "the greatest grandpa in the world"!
Love the color "cotton candy", it is really cute without being too loud. These are super comfortable. True to size.
Great product. Does run slightly smaller, so I took the advice of others and ordered a 1/2 size larger. Fits perfectly. Arrived quickly, too.

I had to order a pair of these for my daughter for a play she is in. Normally she is between a 5 1/2 and a 6. We purchased a 6 1/2 thinking we would be ok... nope! Way too tight! We are returning the 6 1/2. After calling around we found a place about 35 minutes away that has one pair which turns out is a 7. My advice if you order these.... order 2 LARGER pairs at the same time and return the ones that don't fit since size seems to be a common issue with these shoes.
If you are reading this review you probably already own a pair of Chucks. I love the look and feel of the Lo Top ones. They look great and feel great.

I basically wore nothing but these shoes, when they were made by Adidas, back in the 1970's/early 80's. The fit and quality was great and you could really move in them. Of course, after they stopped making them and my last pair wore out I was out of luck. I've had many other types of running/athletic shoes since, but always wished I could find some forgotten stash of that old Adidas model again. When I saw these shoes I was pretty surprised and hopeful, but when I found out Adidas owned Reebok I got excited! I have 3 pair now and I'm completely satisfied with them. Same fit and feel, with the added bonus of remembering good times from the past each time I wear them. If you remember these and liked them back then, do yourself a favor and get a pair. You won't be disappointed.
May just be the best looking walking shoe on the planet. Its designed for real walking - not just to look like it.
I have used Easy Spirit when I show my dogs for several years. They are light weight and have good traction when moving my dog. I wore my last pair for several years until my new puppy chewed them.

These boots are often on sale for $50 or less. That is a fantastic value for a all-leather waterproof hiking boot. These boots are not the lightest weight, but they are fairly durable. The leather is a little stiff when new, but breaks in quickly to give you a very comfortable semi-custom fit. The wide, thick sole gives you great stability on and protection from rocky trails. These boots do have an EVA midsole, so they won't last for years like high-end boots with polyurethane midsoles, but these do cost half the price of high-end boots.
I love the Nova Pumps which are true to size and very confortable. I lovethe pumps.
I'm a size 8 1/2 in womans and I'm in love with these great fashion statement. Keeps my feet warmm

I bought these boots for a costume, and after 2 years of average use (6-12 hours a month) they are still going strong.I ordered size 13 mens, and it came a little large, as if it was a wide, but nothing a simple insert couldn't fix.I am very happy with my purchase, and they have held together more than I thought they would. I was a little concerned about quality because the price was so good, but I have not been disappointed.I will definitely purchase from Pleaser again for my next boots.
These are great all around shoes for toddlers and pre-schoolers. They are easy to put on and very easy to keep clean.

I bought this pair from a plus-size catalog, and have been extremely pleased with them. My flat feet are clown-sized and wide, and I'm partly disabled (one foot is usually swollen), so you can imagine how difficult it is to find comfy shoes. This brand and model is very lightweight and cushioned as I walk. The light weight is important because I don't have to stomp around in boots, and I don't trip on carpet or other surface disruptions. I can put on some mileage with this pair! The Velcro straps easily adjust for my normal foot and swollen foot. It's all good. Time to buy another color, because the first pair, bought in 2008, is by no means worn out or broken. Add to my cart, Amazon!
I got the red/white/green ones for my birthday and almost cried. They are the best shoes made on the planet, and the fact that they are even offered in Italy colors makes them that more fantastic.
This is my fourth pair of these, the most comforetable shoe i have eveer worn. They arrived on time, in the origianl box, fit perfectly and fell like a glove on my foot.
I couldn't purchase these anyplace in town and as usual you had them available for me! I got them in record time and ready to send off for a christmas gift.

After placing my order for these shoues, they arrived very soon.They're comfortable (and ideal for me because I have diabetes; the velcro allows you to adjust the tightness of the shoes). Great traction on the bottom. Very nice looking. They appear to be well constructed and should last many years.
GREAT SHOE. THE LEATHER IS REALLY SOFT AND THE SALE PRICE WAS WONDERFUL. A REALLY GOOD DEAL.

As a nursing student I'm required to wear white shoes for clinicals. Trying to find plain white shoes in a 4E width was nearly impossible. I looked for weeks locally in stores, only to be confronted with certain brands that cost over $125! The Propet shoes not only fit my foot, but fit my budget at half the cost of the shoe store. Very comfortable and they look good, too.

THESE ARE NICE AND SPACIOUS BOOTS AND THE BURGANDY IS A HARD COLOR TO FIND BUT MY GOD THEY COME WITH NO INTERIOR CUSHIONING SO BEWARE.....IT TOOK 2 SETS OF INNER CUSHIONS TO RENDER THESE WEARABLE. I wasn't real comfortable with spending this much on a slipper the first time I bought a pair of these but, I have to admit, these are the most comfortable, warm, flexible, and durable slippers I have ever owned.
